links_reviews_title: Great color for simple work piece
links_reviews_text: It fits true to size (so I thought it was a bit large on me, but I liked the look of oversized). Worked well with skinny jeans and heels, and the color is gorgeous

This shirt is not stretchy at all. However, it was still roomy in the stomach and bust area. The sleeves were a nice touch and well made. I received several compliments on the color of it. It's a nice V neckline for a bigger chest without showing any cleavage. Would wear again and recommend this top!
This was a really well made blouse. Very comfortable, soft material and the length is perfect to leave out or tuck in. Would definitely wear again!
Great blue color! Easy to wear.
Such a cute top! Great quality material. Fits true to size and is perfect for work or a fun day/night out!

I wore this to dinner with my parents and to work. I loved the color and the sleeves. Feels classic but with a little more visual interest. Fabric feels very quality. It did wrinkle a bit but it was easy to iron/steam out. Love love loved.
The blue is beautiful but the top didn't particularly stand out. It wrinkled easily.
Very flattering oversized v neck. Nice thick fabric, perfect for spring or even winter. Would be a nice shirt for the office or professional setting.
I didn't wear this because it didn't fit right. Too loose in the sleeves and too tight on the body
Excellent fit. Nice quality.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: I rented this shirt to be able to wear to work or a night out. I loved the color, and the idea of the cut of it. However, once I put it on it was very big and poofy and didn't really have a shape to it, so I only ended up wearing it once before returning it. I would not rent this shirt again.

links_reviews_title: A good way to mix up a black wardrobe
links_reviews_text: The color is really great and the structured sleeves are fun and different. It doesn't feel like the most well made top I've ever rented but I enjoyed wearing it twice.
Not a fan of the sleeves, they didn't suit me and then were too bunchy to wear this shirt with a jacket or cardigan.

Absolutely loved everything about this shirt. The color. The fit. Everything. Wore it with tighter work pants to balance the flowyness of this shirt and received so many compliments! Would 100% rent again!
I love the fit and color.
Really pretty, vibrant color. Runs a bit large but it's meant to look oversized. I ordered true to size and was perfectly fine.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous blue top, great fit and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a concert and I wanted something that gave me plenty of room to move in. The color is a gorgeous blue, true to the picture. Loved the way it was longer in the back than the front and the V neck isn't so low it reveals any unnecessary cleavage. I hated at the end of night I realized I didn't have any photos of the whole top, just a ton of me and my friends having a blast at the concert! Will definitely rent again.
Really love this bright blue shirt. The detailing is simple but chic.
I wore this top with vegan leather pants. It's a little longer in the back and covered my tush, which is good for everybody!
Loved the voluminous sleeves and color
Loved the sweater but very oversized I ended up tucking it into my jeans in the front

Wore this during the week. I work from home and was looking for some nicer pieces without sacrificing comfort. I debated buying this I loved it so much. My only slight gripe was that the buttons were spaced out almost too far so it bunched a bit.
Super comfy, oversized sweater that's perfect for fall and cooler weather. Wore it several times for weekend outings and even worn to work. Loved the design and color scheme.
Absolutely loved this sweater! The colors are perfect for Fall, so comfortable! I'm definitely going to rent again!
Runs big, I'm usually large and got it medium. I liked it, didn't pile.
Funky sweater. Got lots of compliments. Knocked a start off only because it wasn't my favorite, but definitely good for a one time rental.
I have worn this so many times already. The colors are perfect, it's easy to wear (dressed up, down, layered or alone), and it is soft and comfy. I don't want to return it!!!

links_reviews_title: Cute trendy sweater to add some color to an outfit. Will rent again!
links_reviews_text: Loved this. I wore it with a white ribbed, slightly cropped tshirt, ripped boyfriend jeans, and doc martens. Will for sure rent again - like the slightly oversized lose look of it and colors are awesome
This sweater was so comfortable and perfect for fall. I got a ton of compliments. I think I might buy it
Beautiful and warm in every way. Pair it with black or white tee .. even brown or mustard or red. Looks great with jeans or skirt. Get a few wears out of it. Compliments and stares all day.

links_reviews_title: I might buy this I love it so much
links_reviews_text: The fit is slightly oversized and relaxed and it is the perfect cardigan to wear as a top. So on trend. Very versatile.
Was hoping to wear this as a cardi w nothing under but it was a little lower in the front than I would have liked, and the horizontal stripes weren't loving my midsection.

links_reviews_title: Love the colors and style, this can be dressed up to wear to work but also super cute with jeans
links_reviews_text: it definitely runs large, I am normally a small and I ordered an extra small but it still falls off my shoulders even when buttoned.
This was huge on me--wide and short. Very unflattering but comfortable with enough for a work at home day. Looked like something you'd pick up at a thrift store.
Looks exactly like the pics but it was thinner than I expected. Would definitely rent again but not on a cold day.
Comfortable, stylish. Fit is a bit large, but good for layering. Wore this sweater several times.
Totally solid sweater!!
Loved the cut and colors.
I really liked the colors on this one. It's a chunky, oversized fit but I wish I had sized down to an XS.
Buttons wanted to splay open. Shoulders wanted to slip off even when buttoned. I was annoyed by the end of the day at work. Not sure I would recommend
Good color combo, relaxed fit.

This is a lovely sweater that hits me just my hip. Since I'm pregnant, I wore it over a longer black V-neck shirt and black leggings and brown boots. It's a good material and the sweater doesn't roll back on itself at the buttons like lower quality sweaters do (I'm looking at you, Madewell). I got compliments on it and it felt comfortable!
Love the colors and the coziness. Cropped, but not too cropped.

Great casual slouch sweater! Alot of people said it ran big, so I ordered a size down which I don't think was necessary. The sweater is meant to be worn a bit slouchy, I would say stay true to size! Would probably rent again.

I really enjoyed this. So soft, so comfortable, so warm... I didn't want to take it off. It's shorter in the back, but I didn't mind that. I like the oversized look, so I sized up & it looked great. Not the most exciting rental, but overall a great casual piece. I would love to have this as a staple in my closet.
I could have sized down - but this made for a cute boxy sweater for fall.
Cozy and slouchy, but true to size. Perfect for every day wear!
Would rent again and again. Such a cozy sweater and flattering color. Perfect beginning of fall cardigan, the red stripes add a little something fun. Obsessed!
Loved this sweater - cute & comfy!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a work appointment and ended up wearing it three times.
links_reviews_text: Perfect for fall, the colors give it an edge. It hangs well, looks the right amount of "shlumpy"
These are super fun, but the cut is not flattering, and I don't care for the weird slit on the legs. The material is stretchy and comfortable for traveling or to wear casually.

links_reviews_title: Work from home pop of color
links_reviews_text: Cute and comfy for work from home. Vibrant colors. The pants ran large, jacket true to size.

typically a 14/16 so I worried about this 12 from ulla but I knew it didn't have a zipper + elastic waist. it's a little tight but I don't have much of a bust so it works for me! can't wait to wear this out and about. considering purchasing as a summer staple

I normally wear a size 4, but other reviews mentioned it running large so I dropped down to a 2 and it fit perfectly. There are ties on both sides to cinch the waist and give a more flattering figure. I wore 2 inch heels which gave it a good length off the ground. A very flowy and incredibly comfortable dress that HAS POCKETS!!
I have been wanting an Ulla Johnson dress forever. Always in Vogue magazine as the prefect summer/ vacation dress. I loved wearing this dress and getting so many compliments!!!!

I had fun with the color of this dress! I don't think that I have ever worn this color before. This dress has a lot of material and will draw attention. The dress is roomy. There are draw strings at the waist to make a more fitted waist for those with smaller waist. I enjoyed wearing this dress. I think it could be easy to get lost in this dress, which is why I paired it with my fav jean jacket.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a cute country pilgrim!
links_reviews_text: Longer than I thought it would be - and I was sized down. But super fun, attention grabbing dress. Country western? Pilgrim-ish? I don't know? But it was fun to dance in!
This dress was a blast to wear! The waist has adjustable ties, so you can cinch it to be more flattering. It was just perfect for a cowboy rehearsal dinner.

links_reviews_title: On trend but not that flattering
links_reviews_text: This runs huge! I am a 6/8 but probably could have worn a 2. I got the waist a little tighter with the pulls after I took the picture but it is still pretty shapeless and not the easiest color to wear. It's on trend but felt a little like western cosplay to me. I ended up just wearing around the house and on errands for the weekend.
This dress has a real boho vibe and is fun and flouncy. It's a LOT of fabric though and made me feel larger at the hips than I already am.
Definitely oversized, lots of fabric. Nice color.

links_reviews_title: Little house on the prairie chic
links_reviews_text: Love this designer but the looks are a bit out there. Very on trend right so alright I'll try. I actually got a lot of compliments on this one. The overall size is in fact large I'm more of a size 14/16 and I could wear this as a 12 - it is fitted in the bust / waist area which for me is my smallest part. Tons of room in the hips/butt and the arm puffs have stretch as well. The wrinkles came out after I wore it for an hour or two.

This was an amazing dress - I loved the western vibe. It was very comfortable and light weight - the arms were puffy so if you're not into this lewk I wouldn't go for this style. Otherwise, was very flattering and beautifully made.
Perfect dress for my Italian vacation! Definitely size down as it's a lot of fabric and the waist is adjustable
Comfortable material

Love this dress. I typically wear a size four but rented a six because it was the only one available. The 6 worked but would have preferred the 4 as it was a little big on the top portion. Overall gorgeous dress!
This dress was so easy to throw on and go. You automatically look put together. The dress is true to size. It was perfect for work and the weekend.
I was dubious of the color, but love Ulla Johnson. The dress was comfortable, cotton crisp. I would not have brought this dress, puff sleeves and all, but actually loved wearing it.

links_reviews_title: A little OTT, but it works
links_reviews_text: Gotta admit, I was on the fence about wearing this. The sleeves are pretty poofy, it's not exactly figure flattering, and it's a bold color. But I'm glad I did because I got a ton of compliments and felt pretty chic. I also felt like a Westworld extra, but I guess that's kind of chic too. Fit wise it's a little loose and puffy, but you can adjust the waist by tying the side tassel thingies tighter. I was trying to hide my tummy, so it was great for that.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, got lots of compliments. Loved it
links_reviews_text: My only wish with this dress is that it wouldve fit a little differently. It felt like it was made for super tall people (i'm over 5'7' which isn't short, but I felt it swalloed me a bit). I belted it which helped... if I purchased this dress I would definately have to get it altered a bit to fit perfectly. Still special dress, loved it, got lots of compliments.
This is def a statement piece! Not for the faint hearted. Prairie chic at its finest

links_reviews_title: Prefect dress for a fashion risk taker
links_reviews_text: Just a little too out there for me. The right person could definitely pull it off though!

links_reviews_title: 5 stars all the way. love this dress.
links_reviews_text: details on this dress were amazing.
great spinny skirt and super comfortable!
Loved this dress. Perfectly bohemian and so easy to wear and with sandals or with sneakers. Definitely will be renting again
Great comfortable dress with pockets. Had to accessorize it up, very loose fitting so recommend size down

links_reviews_title: Very nice dress with nice details
links_reviews_text: Overall this fits about one size bigger than it should. I am petite so it is a long dress on me which is fine but the V is so low I need to wear a tank. I still like it though.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress! I was worried about the color but it was great! The fit is very flattering!
links_reviews_text: Adjustable to tighten at the waist. Fit is true to size!

This dress is cute. I actually rented it twice. I wouldn't wear it on a date, but it's great for work. I did receive a lot of compliments. The problem is wrinkles. I spent well over 30 minutes trying to steam and iron this dress both times, but once you sit, it's wrinkled again. Nice quality material and the color is a true mustard.

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner. Super cute--loved the color. Definitely generously sized. I'm a 10-12 in dresses and the 10 was roomy in the waist. Lengthwise, it hit me a few inches above the ankle. Maybe not the most "flattering" dress but very comfortable and fun.

links_reviews_title: Oh wow wow wow. I was over the moon in comfort and style.
links_reviews_text: Color check Style check Fabric check Fit check This was just a heavenly thing to wear for my 40 bday party in my back yard
Runs quite large, not sure it's very flattering given how baggy it is

links_reviews_title: Cute but my husband thought it was a costume
links_reviews_text: This was cute in theory but it was kind of costume-y
The sleeves were great in my opinion. I don't think its too pilgrim I think its perfect desert dinner wear.
Great sweater dress for winter! Fit like a glove, fun print. Likes frayed bottom and sleeves. Wasn't too short. Faux thigh high tights made this dress more sexy. Would wear again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for when you want to be dressed up, but not really.
links_reviews_text: Warm dress. Cute print. Good fit. I'm a 6 though and the small was a little big. Only thing I didn't love about this dress was the turtleneck part. It was too big. I think it would have been better if it was more fitted. Also, I felt bigger than I actually am wearing it.
Such a great print and soft material. I got so many compliments. It was a great dress to wear during the day to walk around in! I wore an XS but usually wear a small. The XS fit fine!

I wanted to like this dress for a casual dinner but it didn't fit me well. It was larger than anticipated and not flattering on me. If you are looking for a loose fit, this is it! It was comfortable when I tried on and was a good length.
This dress is really comfortable, but also the animal print makes it fun. I think you could dress it either up or down. Really forgiving fit. The sleeves are a little long on me, but I'm only 5'3".
Confused by the other review who said this was too long. I am 5'4 and it fit perfectly but required wearing tights to make it more work appropriate. Super comfy and easy to wear
This dress runs EXTREMELY large. I'm almost always a size medium, but in this, I'm a comfortable XS. Size down if you wanted the fitted look.

links_reviews_title: Runs a little large. Comfy fabric. R
links_reviews_text: emember this has tattered edges so it's a little edgy. Might not be right for the work environment.

Im 5'5", 27" waist and 130lbs. I should have rented the small it was long in the sleeve and just a little baggy overall. The fabric was very soft and the perfect medium weight for a fall day. I paired with black hose and tall velvet heeled boots. I did notice the fabric had started to pill by the end of the day under the arms and on the butt, which really would have bothered me if I had bought this item, but is nbd for a rental. I might not rent again, but it was really nice for a day!

links_reviews_title: I tried it on...and I'm rushing to return it. The fit was terrible
links_reviews_text: The shape is all stretched. The uneven finish just looks sloppy and chewed versus cool & edgy.
I rented the XS and was worried it would be too loose, but I felt it fit perfectly. Would definitely rent again. Comfortable, flattering, and not itchy.
I loved this dress! Wore with over the knee black bots. It is way cuter in perfect! Love the soft fabric! Great for winter!

It's VERY short so I layered underneath it because it is winter here. It's too short for me as a dress but I loved it with leggings or skinny jeans under. It showed some wear with pilling and the seam was twisted from laundering.
Cute, edgy dress, but enormous!!! I love Pam & Gela, so I'm planning to rent this again in a S or XS.

Skims the figure- but not too much. Wore with thigh- high black boots. Warm and cozy, but has an edgy vibe- frayed hem and at the wrists. Deliberately a little pilly. My husband thought it looked "worn" but that's the look! Fun to wear.
Warm but not stuffy. Thick but still flattering. Awesome design. Perfect for a winter date night. Will rent again!
Loved. Comfy and easy, not tight. Neck not as structured as site picture.
This dress was so comfy and cozy. I loved the turtleneck and long arms. I received many compliments on the dress. Perfect for winter or fall and paired great with black booties.
Fun dress with edgy rough cut trim. Was a bit longer than I expected, but probably could have sizes down and solved that. Nice comfy piece.

links_reviews_title: Extremely long in arms, not fitted in waist as shown
links_reviews_text: I got a medium because of my hips, which fit. However, the dress is significantly longer than shown, and the arms came all the way to my fingertips. It looks ridiculous unless I roll the sleeves. Also, I expected a somewhat fitted waist as pictured and as seen on the model, but nope. It's still a nice dress, and I've gotten compliments wearing it. I took off a start for the bizarre sleeves, and another for being boxier than pictured.

links_reviews_title: This item is very cute for a very tall supermodel.
links_reviews_text: Its extremely large, the arms hung down about 7 inches further than my actual hands.
Very warm and comfortable. Only complaint would be that the sleeves were short and I wish it had been a little more of a relaxed fit. Should have sizes up 1-2 sizes to get that baggy fit.

links_reviews_title: This was a warm and comfortable jacket
links_reviews_text: Came in handy, can be worn dressed up or down
Wore to work & casually on the weekend and it was perfect for both. Super true to size from my experience.
Sooooo cozy I never want to take it off!!!

links_reviews_title: Super fuzzy and soft! I feel like I'm wearing my robe!
links_reviews_text: I loveeeee this coat! I wore it out for drinks one night with flare jeans and also with white jeans! The jacket is a bit big and oversized but I didn't mind it with skinny pants! This jacket was also super warm (comparable to my NorthFace parka) and so cute! I had so many people pet me all day!! I felt like I was wearing my robe all day long! I loved this coat!
The perfect jacket for a long weekend away! Easy to layer with so many different looks and just a great color!

Definitely a good coat to layer and play around with. I wore this when it was about 28 degrees and I was super warm. The length in the sleeves is great too considering I have short arms. I didn't feel like the coat was swallowing me, true to size.

links_reviews_title: Love this warm coat with glam look!
links_reviews_text: This coat is so warm and comfy! I don't even mind that it doesn't formally zip or button up. Has a glamorous look that can go with any style

Loved this coat! I rented the large because that's all that was available. It was roomy on me but i liked it bc I could wear a chunky sweater under and still be comfy. The color is perfect. It's super warm and perfect for a cold day! So trendy and practical
Very warm coat, easy to overheat. Very cute, traps smells
Rented this for a trip to NYC, the jacket was so warm and beautiful. I loved it
Fit great, loved it!

I rented this jacket for my sister to stay warm while she was visiting NY from Florida. It definitely did the trick! We are both pretty petite and I wished the coat was a little smaller overall but it was fine for what she needed. There are two hook and eye type closures that are a little tricky but kept the jacket closed. Solid rental.
This is such a cute jacket. It's super warm, soft, and versatile. It is a bit bulky though.
A little big for petite but still super fun to wear. Very soft and warm

links_reviews_title: So Warm and Soft! Wouldn't stay closed though...
links_reviews_text: This is a great coat but the clasps don't work very well so don't count on it staying closed. The color is a beautiful periwinkle blue and is so warm that even in the Boston cold I could get away with just a light sweater underneath
This coat was soft and cozy but runs large - i ordered a medium and felt like I was swimming in it!
I wore this many times and didn't want to give it back! I got so many compliments, and it's very soft. A great color too!
Oversized fit. This coat has a beautiful color and is surprisingly warm.

I'm between a small and medium for jackets, and grabbed a medium to be on the safe side in case I wanted to wear a sweater underneath. This was so oversized, that I probably could have fit a full parka underneath it. Otherwise, feels really well made and plush.
It's definitely an oversized fit, but so soft and luxurious feeling that I would def rent again in a smaller size. A great statement piece for sure.
Wore this to work and to get new headshots for work. Great fit, beautiful color!

Rented for work and it I loved it. It's comfortable and flattering and a nice color. The top is a little large but I think it's supposed to be. Sometimes dresses that are loose on top can be ... revealed but this wasn't. Everything stayed where it was supposed to while I was in the office. Will rent again!

I sized up to 16 from my normal 14 based on RTR's recommendation. I wore the dress, but you'll see in my photo that I had an extra fist full of material at the bust. Overall I think the dress was about 2" too big at all the usual measurement points. I'm estimating this is true to size because I suspect a 14 would have fit just fine. Don't size up!
Great simple dress for work. I wore it with a jacket over to fight the cold but it would look great alone. It fits true to size but loose so if you want something right (I didn't) def size down
Fitted but not body conscious, lined, nice bright navy color, knee-length and shows zero cleavage. Wear this dress to feel like the boss or a banker.

There was a bit of extra fabric in the chest (particularly when I sat), but the dress is stitched a bit to keep it from falling open. It ultimately was very comfortable, didn't wrinkle and looked modest and professional for the office.
This dress is incredible. It's simple, well-structured and classy. I wish that I could keep it! It runs true to size. You won't regret renting this one!
Great dress. But if you're small chested like me, then it'll likely be baggy up top. It's still wearable, but you may want to size down or find another style.

I'm petite, and wanted to wear this for a work event, but while the bottom fit great, the top was too big and gave me an odd fabric humpback no matter how I tried to work the top. If I were slightly taller it would have been great!
This dress would be my #1 pick for a versatile work dress. Comfortably fitted without being tight, midweight fabric.
Fits perfectly. I received many compliments wearing this dress and plan to add it to my regular rotation.

I rented this for work and wrote it three times, I LOVE it and want to buy. The shape was perfect for my pear body and it was incredibly flattering. I loved the neckline and thought it was very stylish and not revealing. I will rent again.
Great fit and look. Perfect for work.
This dress is perfect for the office. True to size and very comfortable. I felt dressed up but appropriate for an important meeting.
Great pick for the office but with the right accessories, could be worn out in the evening as well. Was a little looser than I expected - I could have gone a size smaller for a more tailored fit.
Beautiful fit, quality and a classic easy dress for business professional work.

links_reviews_title: Nice quality, but torso was long
links_reviews_text: Nice quality; fit great below. But my torso is short for the dress. If it was a petite size, it would have been perfect.
Obsessed with this dress! So comfy, slimming and professional. Had my professional pics taken in this dress.

links_reviews_title: A little too workish for my event
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a baptism for my goddaughter but it felt a little too much like I was headed to the office. Would be great for a work event. If you are between sizes, size down.

I got compliments on this one! Really nice neckline and comfortable enough to wear all day at work. Lightweight fabric, with some extra room to move around (but kept structured lines despite that extra space). I really liked this one. It's as blue as it looks in the picture.

links_reviews_title: Size down if you like it more fitted
links_reviews_text: I'm typically a size 2 and a size 2 worked but was probably a little large (space in sleeves and shoulders/chest). Still wore it and it was super comfortable but I'd suggest sizing down for a more fitted look (with it loose it kind of looked a bit retro). Color is gorgeous.

Wore this for a work conference in a reasonably conservative industry. It was absolutely perfect -- tailored fit that skimmed the hips (not clingy), knee length, and yet just the right amount of style on top (without cleavage). Will rent again and maybe buy next time if it's cheaper.

This is the perfect dress for the transitional September days when it is chillier in the morning heading to work, warm in the midday, and cooler after hours. The dress is extremely comfortable, drapes well with just the right looseness at the waist yet retains tailored polish. I like the slight collar at the neckline and the crossed material at the bodice. I also appreciated the 3/4 sleeves with a silky contrasting material so the sleeves could be rolled up higher to the elbows. The subtle royal blue color of the material is very flattering... and more fun than Navy.

links_reviews_title: Material gives, but doesn't loose shape. Nice fit.

links_reviews_text: These earrings are a perfect addition to any outfit. I wore them with leggings and a sweatshirt, and then to a wedding with a gown. So beautiful and fun without being too much of a "statement"!
I loved these little earrings! I wore them to a work awards banquet and they got so many compliments. I did take them off after a few hours to give my lobes a break but they aren't heavy.

links_reviews_title: A little preppier than I anticipated but still a fun statement earring
Perfect earrings to wear for any occasion
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved these earrings. I wore them to a bridesmaid luncheon and they were absolutely perfect! I wish I could've worn them with my bridesmaid dress because they were that beautiful. They weren't heavy and did not overpower the dress at all. I will be renting these again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful earrings, but didn't wear due to it looking like the earring was falling out of my ear.
links_reviews_text: The earring itself is beautiful, however the pearls do not line up directly to your ear. Once you put on the earring and attach the back, there is a small bit of gold hoop showing in between your ear and the start of the pearls. It makes it look like the earring is falling out of your ear. Beautiful earrings other than that part, which is the reason I didn't end up wearing them. Others might not care as much about that!

Instantly pulls your outfit together. I grabbed them for a speaking engagement and then ended up wearing them to brunch, a cocktail party, to work and on a date. Endless ways to wear them. Will rent again.
This dress reminds me of the 70's! It's so fun!!! I really liked the textured details!

links_reviews_title: Many compliments and fit in the right places
links_reviews_text: I wore this for several work events. It's thicker material so I would avoid summer outdoor events. I got lots of head turns and compliments on this choice. The fit was true to size and I have a curvy shape.
I loved this dress so much I wore it to work and kept it on into the evening for a date night.
Great fabric and fit. I wore this to a fundraiser and totally stood out. Very fun dress.
Honestly, wasn't sure when I saw it on the hanger, but when I put it on, I LOVED it. Really comfortable and fun pattern. Literally, people were stopping me to tell me they loved my dress!

This dress was comfortable & stylish. I received a bunch of compliments. It wasn't as forgiving in the belly area as I'd hoped but I went with it. I wore for work with high black boots. The fabric is nice...has some give....and is textured. Didn't find the weight to be too heavy but wouldn't choose to wear in the spring. More of a fall/winter dress.
This dress was perfect! It fit like a glove and was super flattering. Will 100% rent again!

links_reviews_title: Awesome fit & got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_text: This dress was one of my favorites! The fit is so flattering with lots of stretch, and the fabric is thick and intricately detailed. A joy to wear.

I paired this with tights/booties and a black shawl for a winter look. The dress is a thick fabric and very warm. I don't love how clingy the dress is tho, it really hugs the body in a way that is almost work inappropriate. Also it's quite short, I would not have been able to wear this without tights

This dress feels boho + bougie all at the same time. I'm 5'2 and 120~ pounds, the XS fit perfectly on me and came just above my knee. I got so many compliments on Thai dress and felt so chic in it the whole time!
Awesome dress! I wore this to a Valentine's Day weekend wedding and got so many compliments. The fit was great (I wore a large). So comfortable to dance the night away.
the pattern is intricate. it fits well and is flattering. color has more white than red. good for cold weather.

Good dress for colder weather as it is pretty thick. I could see where some people may think it's short but it was perfect on me! Definitely going to wear again before sending it back. I got so many compliments on it!
The dress has a bold pattern and is very comfortable and stretchy but not too form fitting. The bell sleeves could get in your way.

links_reviews_title: Most liked Instagram of all time?
links_reviews_text: Set a new personal best with the Instagram of this dress. Absolutely top notch dress! I was at a super formal, high pressure dinner with a friend and this dress gave me all the confidence. All of it. I didn't want to take it off! Look how cute it paired with my little booties. Amazing.

links_reviews_title: Loved it, wore with leggings to work
links_reviews_text: Great material, thick, and fit like a glove

links_reviews_title: wore to work then to a date at jazz club.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Fabric has some stretch. zipper buckled slightly but did not affect fit. Warm but sexy enough without being inappropriate for work. Got many complements. My very first RTR rental was a raging success

links_reviews_title: I loved it so much I bought it !
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing ! Very comfortable and stretchy, it was a win !!!
Loved the dress. Very comfortable. Lots of compliments. True to size.
Would definitely rent again. Loved this.
This was a great workday rental. Very comfortable and flattering. Wore it with tights and booties. Plenty of compliments too.
Amazing comfort! 70s vibe all the way. Got tons of compliments. Show stopper for sure.
I didn't end up wearing this because I felt it wasn't appropriate for the event I rented it for. It's a cute fitted dress! Very stretchy and comfortable.
Wonderful dress. Really cute fit and love the sleeves.

I liked this and it fit and people died over the cuffs and told me I looked great, but if you have a little softness at your stomach like I do, it will show it. It wasn't tight across the hips, but the fabric accentuated middrif weight. It was also short enough that I wore leggings rather than tights.
Loved this dress so much. Perfect cut. Perfect weight. The sleeves are awesome. I got a ton of compliments.
This dress is super cute but a little too short for work if you're tall and leggy.
Channeled my inner 70's girl with this fun dress! Had nice thick material and bell sleeves that didn't get in the way. Would rent again!
This new Slate and Willow dress exceeded expectations. It’s super comfy and I love the raised fabric pattern. I always order up in S&W. I usually wear an XS but got the S and it was perfect.
Compliments galore. This dress makes a statement. It's a bit short but the fabric is very soft and comfortable and it doesn't wrinkle. Great rent.
This piece rocks, comfortable and so many compliments. Not too short for work.
This dress is shorter than I expected, but with some tights was perfect for a wedding for evening event. Very comfortable.
Sleeves are a statement but this outfit is grooooooooovy.

links_reviews_title: Thick material, like a sweater dress
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress to look at. Once i had it on it was like a thick sweater dress. Stretchy and bunching I'm all the wrong places.
Super cute dress with fun sleeves, paired perfectly with tights. Slightly more red than brown in color. One of my favorite rentals so far!
Nice fabric with some stretch - great for fall or winter lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful casual dress that can be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing. The color and fabric is beautiful, and functionally, very warm, a plus for my Minnesota climate. I'm on the shorter side, so it hit right above the knee, length-wise. It was a close fit, but not clingy and the material is very high quality. I ended up buying this dress because I loved it so much.

links_reviews_title: I wore this with worm and it looked fo great!!!! Loved loved loved it!
links_reviews_text: Nice for but too short for a dress so I wore it with skinny black jeans . Very nice

links_reviews_title: Nicely made dress. Fun and funky.
links_reviews_text: This ran small so had to return. But the overall dress was very nice. Loved the style. Surprised there was a red/plum in the fabric. Very nice.
Landed in the right places. No problems with bra showing. Flattering.
Basic black but won't disappoint! Beautiful fit - I did fabric tape the cleavage to avoid a wardrobe malfunction. Would love to own
Absolutely stunning blouse and super comfortable!

Yep, if you move the draping on this blouse will display your belly button. Hello office mates, hello conference room, what a way to start my presentation! Sometimes fashion designers don't use their brains

I wore a black cami with this every time and it was insanely flattering and hid my belly well. Without it, my belly bulge would have been on display and the cleavage would have been a bit much for my taste. Considered buying.
sexy but also work appropriate with a camisole. looks good with skirts, pants and even jeans. drapey cut is flattering and covers any belly bulge
Cute, feminine and comfortable. I wore a black camisole under for coverage and paired it with some tailored maroon pants. Classy enough for work in a legal department.
This blouse is sooooo gorgeous! It is flattering, slimming and so cute. I am obsessed with it!

links_reviews_title: I wasn't able to wear it because I had to return it due to deadline. Bummer!
links_reviews_text: Absolutely gorgeous! Stunning!
Super comfy! I got so many compliments and it was very flattering & not too revealing.

links_reviews_title: Great black top with day to evening potential
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were long enough, I preferred a tank underneath to wear to a work event.
Sexy yet classy! Wore it with some jeans and high waisted shoes! Loved it stretchy material

Enjoyed this shirt, however, I wasn't a big fan of the fabric. It looked/felt like an athletic type material (if that makes sense) which made it feel a little cheaper. Other than that, the draping cross in the front was pretty (wore a tank under it) and it fit well.
This shirt was SO flattering and comfortable! I wore it with a pair of maroon jeans and OTK black boots for our thanksgiving. Perfect holiday outfit! Wish I could buy this shirt!
Beautiful simple yet elegant top. Pairs well with any type bottom. Great go to staple
This top is amazing!! Perfect length and "sexy" style while not being flashy or uncomfortable. Great for a night out or work--it's incredibly versatile. A must-rent!
I love how this draped, but definitely not for work since a quick lean forward revealed a bit more than I wished. This would be killer for an evening event, though.

links_reviews_title: Not so casual but great statement piece
links_reviews_text: Definitely fancied than expected - not jersey material. Looks great though!
Fit is great, but you'll need to wear a tank top underneath it or you'll be pulling to cover up all day!
I wish I could afford to purchase this top. This is a great go to shirt that could be worn for work, play or even dressed up for a nicer occasion. I will rent again and again
Loved the fit of this top. The fabric is very stretchy and flows nicely. The top does fall open on me.. I had to use fashion tape to keep it from falling open.

links_reviews_title: Received a lot of compliments on this blouse. Loved it so much I bought it.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly. have to be careful because the neckline opens up no top button. I solved it by wearing a tank under.
This shirt is awesome. I wore it to a funeral and a dinner date and it was great for both occasions. True to size and very flattering to my curves.

links_reviews_title: Rented this duster for a few trips to use in the airport and over dresses/shorts in restaurants.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit and length, comfortable thickness, nice texture, neutral enough to wear with many colors/outfits/textures.
Nice simple piece to throw on over pretty much anything. Fabric is soft and hangs nicely. Length is great with a work dress as well.
This was a great casual cardi for quarantine chic!

This cardigan is cozy and stretchy and soft. I found that I was wearing it in lieu of a bathrobe over my PJs - that kind of comfy. I tried once to layer it over a gray shift dress for work but found it a little too casual so I just kept on enjoying it at home.
Wore with jeans, leggings, dress + tights. Layered well! Great construction
Very comfortable, good length, would recommend.
Loved this long cardigan. Comfortable and beautiful
Super comfy and liked the length. Fit in shoulders and arms felt different but think that was due to design.
So comfortable, bought it immediately!
nice
Looked cute with everything. Solid weather transition piece. Lots of compliments.

I've worn this a ton. Its perfect for that early fall weather, where you just want an easy piece to layer over whatever your wearing. It hangs nicely, not too voluminous. I'm contemplating buying it, just because I've been wearing it nonstop.
This sweater was perfect for a couple of long days of travel. It's very comfortable and I will definitely rent it again!
Easy everyday piece that can be worn casually or at work. It is definitely warm, so good for cold offices. The arms are tight, which I liked.
Love the length. For a tall girl it's difficult to find a good length sweater. It was my go-to piece to throw on with jeans or to work.
The fit was true to size, but it was a little shabby looking, and I didn't bother wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Such a flattering fit, not too hot or light so it's super versatile.
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit, not oversized or tight.
Too large
I wanted to live in this sweater. It was so comfortable. Goes with everything. I might have to buy it.

This sweater is so adorable and comfy I might buy! I had multiple people tell me the stitching of the sleeves makes me shoulders look petite and narrow. The color is nice, the fabric is sooo soft, and the sweater hangs perfectly over my curves.
This sweater is comfortable, but it is unstructured and more casual than I expected. Good for lazy weekend at home, but didn't look great for wearing out.

Loved this cardigan, though I do wish it had pockets. Perfect length for tall people. I went a size up because i wanted a looser look as opposed to more a more fitted look. It's really simple and light weight, easily dressed up or down. May rent this again in the future
Definitely on the more casual side. Material and length make it look almost pajama like if you're not careful with what you pull it together with. Otherwise, super comfortable and great fit!

links_reviews_title: So soft and keeps me warm without being bulky at all.
links_reviews_text: Got this for these transitional spring days where it can be chilly and then super hot out of nowhere. I am very happy with this! It's lightweight, which is perfect because if I get too hot I can throw it in my purse easily and it doesn't add any weight or make my purse look like it's about to burst lol. I ended up buying this. Great for walking/carrying around the city during these transitional weather days.
soft and pretty color
Loved it!! So comfortable. The material is great. You can dress it up or down. I would wear it every day if I could get away with it.
Comfortable sweater, but material looked old and it was way too long. Didn't love.
Nice fabric, fit, except top of arm where meets shoulder, odd fit
Had many compliments on this item

links_reviews_title: Feeling like I was wearing a comfy robe all day
links_reviews_text: Perfect cardigan for work! So soft.

This is a nice quality piece. There's nothing super special about it, but it's cute and fit well. I was able to dress it up with some fitted slacks for work and then wore with jeans another day, so very versatile.
I have a couple of sweaters like this in my closet already, but this one has a nice weight to it while still being soft.
I ordered 2 gray cardigans. This one fit very nice, but I liked the other one just a little bit better. I would have been happy with this one as well though.
Nothing stellar about this sweater. It's something you could easily find in a department store. Still cute, but I would rent something more unique.

Perfect fit with plenty of length in the arms. It was easily dressed up for work and down for casual wear. I did not want to take it off! I loved it so much that I am buying one for myself. Great find!
Comfy, cozy but still nice and stylish. I thing real special but did wear twice

links_reviews_title: This was a cozy sweater that worked well with multiple outfits.
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed the color of this sweater as I was able to pair it with other items easily.
Super comfortable! Wish I could buy!
This goes with anything that has a fitted sleeve. Very cozy and soft. Will rent again.

Damn I love this thing. Already dreading having to send it back! Fits true to size, and it's warm and snuggly. The fabric has a nice weight and doesn't show lines. Perfect both for work or just to lounge around the house.

This top was an instant hit! Everyone loved the colors and fit. It is a little low cut. Put some Tape to hold it together. Hugs curves in all the right places. I wore with jeans and heels. I want to rent again to wear with blue capris and heels. Thought about purchasing but it's a little heavy for spring/summer. Don't hesitate renting. Totally worth it.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous cut and color. Runs a tad big.
links_reviews_text: I am a very petite person on top and so many tops run a little large on me so this top was a little roomy, but looked very good. The fabric was so soft, and the pattern was gorgeous!

Love the color, print and fabric of this top! Very stretchy and comfortable,l. No buttons so no gaping! Neckline is a little low but works great with a cami. The only problem is that it is HUGE! Too big to wear. It definitely needs to be fitted to keep the shape. I'm an 8/10 34dd and the 46 was wayyyy too big and I decided not to wear it. Definitely needed to size down for the waist and the arms. Lots of volume in the arms but even the cuffs at the wrist were too big! It just hung off me :(

Ran a little big but I didn't mind this fit with the pencil skirt look! It was comfy and classy chic for work! I want to find more shirts like this and would have purchased if it were closer to my price range.

Nice quality and fit. Very feminine. Perfect color palette and a tasteful twist on colored animal print. Forgiving in the chest, and cut a little bit low, but worked for me. Pairs nicely with dark denim and neutral shoes/accessories.
A little bit large on me but I still wore it with dark wash jeans to work. Lots of compliments. Flattering but I would get the next smaller size if renting again. Sleeves are loooong.
The material, color, and fit is great. Perfect to wear to work or out.

links_reviews_title: Beautifully made, sleeves way too long
links_reviews_text: Like others said, the sleeves are way too long. The rest of the shirt was kind of big, but I liked that part of the style. They tailoring and cuts are amazing and so flattering. Fabric is great, shirt feels great on. If you got those ape arms, this is for you.
The fabric is surprisingly light, and it's flawlessly cut to enhance the shape. Loved it. Will rent again for work

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and easy to move in
links_reviews_text: For well, had a cute flare at the bottom and a decent v-neck while not exposing too much. Very professional.

I wear mostly black, but these cool ors were flattering with my skin tone and dark hair. It does run a little large, and the sleeves are long. It's low cut, but I have a large chest so it worked. May be tough if you are flat!
Different shape but so fun / flattering
I wore this to work but it was a little large. Felt like I had a zipper undone but there wasn't one. The font is beautiful and the material feels expensive.

The cut is a tiny bit strange but I think it's just because I'm large chested. It was not low cut on me like some other reviews mentioned but if you aren't too big in the chest I could see how it was low. The fabric is high quality and the shirt just feels expensive.
Loved the color and cut. Found it to be tight around the bust and back. Would size up next time.
Nice fit, low cut but a beautiful blouse!

This shirt fit me so well! I am tall and found the sleeves to be a perfect length. The body was also a good length and the cut overall was so flattering with the shaped waist. The neckline was a little deep, especially for me when I wore to work, but looked perfect when I put a blank cami underneath. I loved the color and print! I got tons of compliments!

Loved the length of this top for my height. I ordered a 42 and should have worn a 40. The V is deep, so it's good for dates/going out, but would need to wear a cami under it for work. Would rent again!

Fit well and was flattering. Easy to wear with black slacks or it really dresses up a pair of jeans. Just slightly low cut but not unwearable. Slightly tight under the arms too but again still wearable.
A little low cut and a the sleeves are a bit long

This shirt is a flattering length, and the cut adds some curves. I loved the sleeves, and the design detail of the "lapels." It was a little low cut for work, nothing a cami couldn't solve. I wasn't sure I liked how those lapels bunched up when sitting - it was much prettier when standing up and they were flat. I liked the vibrant color, and one of my coworkers said I looked like Prince. Not sure if that's a bad thing.... haha
The print was bold and beautiful, and I really wanted to love this shirt. Unfortunately it was rather large and baggy. Returned without wearing. Be sure to size down.
Interesting pattern, bold colors. I wanted to like it, but this top was ill fitting. Sizing down would have made it wearable, but still an odd cut.
Vibrant work choice. Lots of compliments in color, design & fit.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color but I couldn't wear it for work because it's very low cut.
links_reviews_text: n/a

I have really enjoyed all the items that I've rented from this designer. This top was a beautiful color and pattern and length. I did feel that it was slightly too large and the sleeves were too long.
I really liked this. It was a different fit, but I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Liked the pattern but the length was way too long for me.
links_reviews_text: Very cute pattern, I was looking forward to wearing it to work but it was too long and just hung on me. Therefore it was very unflattering for me.
Absolutely in love with this top. It is super flattering, beautiful color, and can be worn for a date or to work.

links_reviews_title: I'm 5'7, 150 lbs, and I ordered size 42, it was too big
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were crazy long. The colors though were nice and bright.
This was longer than I thought it would be, ended up wearing it over leggings to work but it still looked professional. Fabric is lightweight, doesn't have any give so order true to size
I rented this for work to add some interest to my work wardrobe. Trendy print with great colors. I loved the fit!

links_reviews_title: Just didn't fit well enough to wear it.
links_reviews_text: The overall fit was large, but the waist fit fine. Sleeves were very long and the neckline too low. I tried to pin the neckline but it just didn't look right. That, combined with the very long sleeves, just didn't work.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering, very cute in person! I love the love big sleeves!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, sleeves were a little long on me- but I'm only 5'2"

The neckline was too revealing for work so I wore a cami underneath. Bust fit well, but would have preferred better (closer) fit at the waist. The cuffs were a little too loose to have the cute blousy effect pictured on the model, so it looked like my sleeves were a bit too long. Was both appropriate for work and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I paired with black pants and a cami and wore to church.
links_reviews_text: This tunic blouse was fun to wear. The print was nice, and the material luxurious. The sleeves were too long, so I cuffed them. I will rent again.

Fun but not too ostentatious for work. The sleeves are insanely long, so I had to cuff them once for them to fit me. The shirt overall was large. I went with the RTR recommended size (44). I am normally a size 8.
This is a beautiful blouse but it does run big and because of the style it really needs to fit well to work

links_reviews_title: My boyfriend thought this looked great with leggings and boots.
links_reviews_text: I loved the color for me. It is deep cut in front. I am tall (almost 6') The sleeves and loose swing is better for a tall woman.
Love this graphic sweater. Super comfortable for a casual day. It's big, loose and thick. And will keep you warm. Definitely a fun rent.
This was so fun and unique. I wore a M and they run large but the oversized sweater look is in.
Great sweater - plus size friendly

Snug fit and flattering fit. I am on the short side, but the XL was not too long and it did not swallow me up. Was cozy for those cooler days of Spring, and the design on front gave it a chic edge over a regular sweater. Great for running errands or meeting friends at at a coffee shop. Definitely added style. #warm #daytonight #chic
I absolutely loveee this sweater! Its super comfortable and fit perfectly.

This is definitely oversized, but not as boxy as I was expecting from other reviews (my height probably helps). It's great with skinny jeans, and I wore both on the weekend and to my casual-ish office. Versatile, warm, and fun to wear!

links_reviews_title: Not flattering unless you're really thin!
links_reviews_text: I wore this just out running errands. It was not pretty on me! I have an athletic build, I'm size 12, C cup bust. This sweater made me look bigger than I am. I posted this unflattering photo so other gals can see exactly what this print and cut do on a not skinny frame. It was fine for just going to the grocery and such, but I would not recommend this unless you're very thin framed and also the sweater runs very big. It's boxy, thick, and heavy. If you're really petite, avoid. You'll be drowning in fabric.

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater. Cute design gives it a unique look.
links_reviews_text: It was a little shorter than I was hoping but does come midway down the zipper line so would probably not be too short for most people. Very comfortable and heavy, in a good way. Rent this now, it'll be too warm very soon!

Fit is nice. The weather warmed up a little so I wasn't able to wear yet. I did notice that the sweater looks worn and some of the white stitching connecting to the black is loose. If it cools down I will give it a go.

links_reviews_title: Cute, comfy, warm, but not as large as I wanted
links_reviews_text: Based on other reviews and the pictures, I was expecting it to be very oversized, which is the look I wanted. It was a bit more fitted than I expected, but I did get an XS - I guess I should have sized up to a S. Generally, though, I really liked it - it's a comfy, warm knit sweater, and I got a couple compliments when I wore it.
Love this casual sweater. It is a true open knit, not like a sweatshirt. It's comfortable and over-sized, and covers my bottom. Would look adorable with leggings.
Oversized fit. Very comfortable.
Fit great, was warm, looked cute. Perfect transition piece.

I really enjoyed this sweater. The heart is playful and cute but not over-the-top. It was warm and baggy without looking frumpy. It is certainly an oversized sweater, so if you don't want the oversized look like on the model, then you should probably size down. I loved the oversized aspect and that it scaled.
Pros: Soft, quality material. Cute design. Worn with dark grey jeans and black boots Cons: Runs large.
Wore with tights. Fun to wear
Work this sweater on vacation and on to work. This sweater was fun and cozy.
Super cute! Didn't look as baggy as I expected which was a good thing. Still a lot of room in it

links_reviews_title: Where your heart on your Sweater!
links_reviews_text: This is a cozy sweater with an abstract heart. Similar to other customers, I found it ran big, so I went with the small (I'm normally a medium). It's not a complete show-stopper of a sweater, but it'll keep you toasty and warm!

This is an oversized sweater that goes with anything - jeans, mini skirt, pleated skirt, you name it. I wore it with an RTR pleated skirt and long boots to work and the same outfit with heels to church. Got plenty of compliments. Very comfy too :)
Cozy

links_reviews_title: All the attention the sweater got!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for work or just hanging out Truly a statement sweater as I did get a lot of folks find it eye catching.
I love wearing this with leather leggings - just the right size, shape, and fit. Super comfortable.
It's a great sweater to add your winter rotation. Loose fit but not too boxy.
runs true to size

links_reviews_title: it makes a statement and is a fun looking sweater
links_reviews_text: loose fitting and oversized
This sweater runs large and is very roomy. Was not the most flattering for me with my broad shoulders but would probably look great on someone who is very slender.
oversized sweater but the design makes it feel on trend.

links_reviews_title: Not for me It makes me look 3.5 times fatter
links_reviews_text: It's good for (very) skinny people
N/a
This sweater was just okay. It is roomy in the fit but I would not consider it oversize by any means. It was a good sweater but not memorable.

I thought I needed a bigger size based on other reviews and it being a heavier knit, but the shoulders hung off me and it was roomier than it needed to be. Made me look boxier than I am and that's no fun.
meh. Fit fine. Just kind of whatever.

links_reviews_title: Loved this, ver cozy. Not itchy
links_reviews_text: This fit well, I was comfortable and it looked great with jeans.
I liked the style and fit. Wore with jeans and boots and was super cute!
I loved this sweater. It was a little oversized, which is exactly what I was expecting. Very warm. I would rent it again.
Feel like I'm in a giant yarn sac. Would be cute on a skinny gal

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous eye-catching gold plated frames are stunning and were fun to wear.
links_reviews_text: I love these glasses. They were however slightly crooked.
A very pretty top. The sleeve ruffles add a feminine touch. Looked great with jeans for casual Friday at work.

links_reviews_title: Super fun shirt for work and everyday. Picture doesn't do it justice.
links_reviews_text: Love this shirt! Wore to work as well as a family night out. The sleeves have elastic around the ruffles so they stay in place comfortably. Love the neckline and gold embroider accents. It's fun and still easy to wear
Great top for work or everyday. No compliments, lol, but I thought it was adorable!
Baggy in the torso and tight in the arms. It was cute, but I didn't find it to be a very flattering design.

Loved everything about this shirt from the little gold bees and the pattern to the amazing ruffled sleeves. Unfortunately, just like the photo of the model, it makes you look bigger than you are and wrinkles easily. I wore it several times as it works for many events-from thanksgiving to work. Nice relaxed piece. Camouflage for tummy and thanksgiving eating big you don't mind it already looking wider.

links_reviews_title: Very cute pattern but wrinkles easily and runs tight in the chest area but baggy elsewhere
links_reviews_text: I didn't realize it had the tiny gold flowers, I thought I was just getting a blue and white striped shirt. That was a nice surprise. The patterns looked so cute together. Unfortunately, the sleeves looked super wrinkled and I couldn't see a way to iron them so they would look like the photos even if I wanted to. Furthermore, I usually wear a 0 or a 2 in blouses and got the 0 thinking it would be a loose fit, which it was at the bottom, but the top part was very tight. I would need to leave the top button open and that's not how I planned to wear it... So I'm returning this unworn. I may get this in a 2 in the future and hope that it comes to me with less wrinkled sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Dramatic but just right for work
links_reviews_text: Brought with me on a work trip. Photo doesn't do it justice. Great for summer!

Gathered ruffle sleeves add an avant-garde update to this classic striped button-down shirt by Badgley Mischka embroidered with shining stars. Taking the modern buttondown to a whole new level, this piece is unforgettable. Running true to size, I typically size between a 0-2 but size up with buttondowns - due to having a larger chest. No gapes or awkward pulls on the buttons. Would recommend to any women looking to make a subtle statement.
Sleeves can sometimes be too tight if your larger! Not on this one!

This shirt is not constructed as shown in the RTR photos. Felt like I needed a pair of maracas, which wasn't the look I was going for. It's too bad, because the fabric print was cute and it otherwise fit well.

links_reviews_title: Didn't realize there was a small pattern. Not my style
links_reviews_text: Didn't realize there was a small pattern. Not my style

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite rentals ever.
links_reviews_text: This blouse is just super cute and fun to wear. Fit is great, star embroidery is pretty and sleeves are a nice touch. Loved.
Loved this top! Fit great, but was still flowy. It made me look super put together, but the gold accents made it fun. Would rent again.
Beautiful shirt!
Great fit. Ruffles on the arms add some flair to a standard button down shirt.

links_reviews_title: I felt comfortable and put together.
links_reviews_text: I didn't think I was going to like this blouse, but I wanted to give it a try. I am not a ruffle type of woman. Surprise - I really liked it! It was comfortable and looked great.

links_reviews_title: A playful twist on the classic striped shirt.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were playful and unique -- and weren't uncomfortable, either. I wore this with jeans as well as with summer shorts for a casual dinner gathering, and it worked out great for both events. Would consider buying as a fun wardrobe classic.
Very cute and good quality. A bit tight across my chest.
professional, classic

This blouse is great. I did not notice that there are little gold flowers embroidered on it from the RTR picture but they are cute. I have a large bust and even though this blouse is a good roomy fit, there was bad gapping between the first and second button. Wardrobe tape did the trick though...

links_reviews_title: Cute. Embelled with small gold stars. Loose in middle. Tighter in arms.
links_reviews_text: Wrinkles.

Loved it! Lightweight and breathable and casual and cute. Slightly tight on the chest, roomy everywhere else. Not 'dressy' so don't try to fit with a pencil skirt or slacks. Better with jeans or similar.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful casual top with eye catching details.
links_reviews_text: I wore this blouse at least 5 times. The white and light blue stripes were perfect to pair with blue or white jeans. Loved the tiny gold embroidered details and the poofy sleeves really set this style apart.
Fit everywhere but one button opening I wire it anyway unsure if you are big busted if you size up. Fit everywhere else got lots of compliments
The sleeve detail was not too large. Very cute.
Well designed and beautifully fit- just a bit boxy. I paired with white jeans and it was perfect. Compliments all day long!
Cute, casual shirt. A bit too informal for my work and the body was short for me (I am 6'). It got wrinkled pretty quickly / easily.

links_reviews_title: Nice but not well captured in pictures
links_reviews_text: Did not expect the gold stitching throughout
This shirt fits so well! The sleeve detail is great and the star embroidery is so fun!
This was a cute top but the material was very wrinkly, even after I steamed it. Ran a bit big, too.
Definitely size down with this shirt. It was so big I couldn't wear it.i like the unique style.

I was excited to wear this, but the sleeves were too tight. If you have bigger arms, or chest this shirt does not accommodate. Also I didn't realize there is a super high slit on the side that came up to almost my bra, would have definitely needed an under shirt.

links_reviews_title: This top went to Paris and rocked~
links_reviews_text: My husband to us on a trip to Paris this summer and this was so adorable with white skinny jeans! I'll definitely rent it again!

This top is a little dramatic for a typical office look, but I really did like it. I didn't even relive there were little gold flowers embroidered on the top when I rented it. I am very busty for my frame and I had no issue buttoning this with no gap, which was great. Gals with a smaller chest may find this feel very oversized and want to size down. I wore with a pair of hot pink cigarette trousers and a high heel with the blouse untucked.

This is a very pretty blouse, but if you're free busted like I am, I would go up one size. I actually wear a tank top underneath it and left the top button open for it but it's been too tight. Very pretty top.

links_reviews_title: Loved it - the detail of the gold stars make the shirt.
links_reviews_text: I wore it for casual cocktails and dinner. The gold stars and puffed sleeves make the shirt interesting. Great fit.

links_reviews_title: None. Unable to wear and immediately returned.
links_reviews_text: Was unable to wear. Blouse was too small.
Fits true to size
Loved the print and sleeve details, dressy yet causal.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful purse -- used on my wedding day

links_reviews_text: Great clutch for an event! Got a lot of compliments!

Rented for a trip to Mexico City. Wore it ALL OVER. My rental's shearling (?) section was a little matted...you could tell it's been through a few rentals. But tbh I think you wouldn't notice unless you looked closely - overall I was pleased with the rental!
The coolest fit on this jacket! Not stiff like most jean jackets when you first wear them. Only thing is the Sherpa on the one I have isn't as white as I thought it would be. Still a great jacket

The shearling makes this jacket deceptively warm! It's super cute and a little different which I love. Only slight challenge is that it can be tricky to match with pants- I didn't love how it looked over black pants, so then I had to select shades of denim that wouldn't clash. For that reason I feel like it's a perfect example of something I loved renting but would never buy.

links_reviews_title: Denim jacket but with the coolest edge!
links_reviews_text: Got so many compliments from people! Comfy, with a padded top half. Will definitely rent again!

I love a good boxy jacket, so this is right up my alley. It's as warm as you'd expect for a denim jacket - perfect for NYC fall weather. I received tons of compliments on this one and considered purchasing...still considering...

Got compliments on this as soon as I walked into the office. Nice cozy boxy fit and it feels broken in so the denim isn't stiff. That being said, the white sherpa definitely looks a little... grimy? It has a bit of a used, gray tint to it which made it look like I'd had the jacket forever, and not in a good way.

links_reviews_title: Loved this. I felt 50% cooler upon putting it on.
links_reviews_text: Perfect oversize fit, and pretty warm for the midwest. Loved. Will definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Easily dressed up or down. This item is super versatile and great for fall.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit with cozy materials!

Super cute and comfortable jacket to dress up or down! I believe its meant to fit bigger for a baggy fit, but if you want something more fitted order the next size down! Absolutely loved this product!
Cozy, comfy, so so cute! Fits true to size and actually keeps you quite warm in the shoulders. Easy to match and perfect for weekend wear. I can't wait to wear all season long.
jacket is also nice and warm
Easy to wear, made a normal out fit much cooler. Does wrinkle just FYI so I'd like me you sit at your desk all day the rear will get wrinkly.
This coat is perfect for spring. I wasn't a huge fan of the ties on the cuffs but was able to tuck them in. The coat also is rather big but it gives a nice oversize look.

This jacket is very thin and light weight, but unfortunately it was way too big and baggy on me to wear. I'm usually a medium and I sized down to a small, but it was still pretty big. Also, the length was a lot longer than I would like in a trench coat (I'm 5'3 for reference). Love the color though!

This is my favorite color so I love this coat!! Wore it for a night out and got lots of compliments. Would size down next time for a small or medium. Wore it on a cold night and it kept me warm! Super cute.
Too big, someone said I looked like I was wearing a bathrobe
I really like this trendy jacket. It looked best on my open. Closed, it looked like a graduation gown on me. Dressed up, this jacket will look amazing!

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear this item.
links_reviews_text: When the jacket arrives to me it was very wrinkly and worn looking. I couldn't get all the wrinkles out so I opted not to wear it!
I love the color and lightweight fabric of this trench coat. Perfect for spring

I ordered a large; should have gone with a medium, but I made it work. Tied it in the back amd wore it open! I felt very fashionable and it paired well with the top I rented! Loved the color for spring!
This coat is lovely, I just had to wear it all day long!
loved the color

This is a great trench and is a nice soft material and gorgeous color. It is really big, I wish I would have hit an xs. The sleeves wide and weird straps on the sleeves weren't my favorite and made it more casual than I would have liked. It also didn't come with the belt which was especially annoying given the size. It has a couple stains as well.
Cute color but the fabric is too casual -- too lineny for it to feel chic. Not a great fit and not the right fabric.

links_reviews_title: My kids thought I was in my bathrobe.
links_reviews_text: Very thin material with little to no structure. From a glance it COULD appear to be a bathrobe (as my kids thought it was)!

links_reviews_title: Cute for brunch/day drinking. Received several compliments.
links_reviews_text: Ties on the sleeves were awkward

links_reviews_title: A little too big and wrinkled
links_reviews_text: A little too big and wrinkled.
Cheap quality and cheap looking. Really want to make it work, but just can't bring myself wearing it.
Ran slightly large and the sleeves were pretty baggy. But I loved the color!

links_reviews_title: Lovely color - a bit wrinkle prone
links_reviews_text: I got this to wear as a fall trench for a work trip. The coat is a great length and a unique color, but the fabric tends to get - and stay - very wrinkled. Just be sure to hang this one up at all points and you'll be good to go.
None

links_reviews_title: Swimming in this xs; awkward fitting arms Did not wear
links_reviews_text: Could not wear. Arms were so long and awkward I couldn't make it fit. The body of the coat fits fine but I felt like a bird with huge flapping wings...
I got so many compliments on this coat. It's extremely lightweight and flowy, perfect for needing just a little extra during spring. I was very tempted to buy it.

So cute and perfect over dresses, work outfits and jeans. It gave the perfect extra later with a feminine feel, and the sleeve ties were a fun touch. Subtracted one star just because it wrinked so easily, and I had to steam the back every time I wore it.
The length was too long for me..

The color was beautiful but it wrinkles so quickly I could not wear it. I steamed the coat after arrival (it was very wrinkled when I received from RTR) and wore while traveling for business. When I arrived at my destination it was so wrinkled again I could not wear to our dinner event. Otherwise, very cute! Also runs a bit big, but I think that is standard for a trench.
not cute

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear this as much as I would have hoped as the weather didn't cooperate.
links_reviews_text: Fabric is much floppier than it looks in the picture. Nice design but it is not structured like a traditional trench coat. Very flowy.

links_reviews_title: Pretty but very flowy and reminds me of a robe
links_reviews_text: I planned to wear this on Easter but it's soooo long and the material is so soft and flowy that it just looks like a robe on me. I prefer more structured fabrics.
Super cute and fits well. Very long and impossible to stay unwrinkled.

Looks and fits just as it does in the photo. Runs a bit large (could have sized down to an XS for a tight fit), but looks great bc it's blousy and very chic. Sleeve is cool without being too much. I'm 5'5" and it hit a couple inches above my ankle. Soft fabric, reasonable warm for a spring day but not heavy. The slit in the back is a bit of a surprise, and can be a little blustery if windy. Will definitely be keeping for a while.
Love the side slits, flows beautifully! Wore to a concert...lots of compliments :)

The dress is long but I'm 5'6" and wore a small heel and it was fine. I wore it high on my waist. The skirt underneath is comfy and allows a lot of peace of mind, since the slits on both sides go all the way up. Lots of compliments and I felt fabulous in it

links_reviews_title: A skirt you could wear all year around!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this skirt with boots and black tights to a rehearsal dinner. I can't tell you how amazing and flowy this skirt is! It has slits all the way up so it's more like two pieces of light fabric over a short black skirt. It's VERY LONG. I'm 5'5" and wore 3 inch booties. You could also wear it during the summer with high heel sandals. You do have to pick it up if you're getting up from the table or walking up stairs so you won't step on it. I will be renting this again in warmer weather, too!

links_reviews_title: If you're tall, or willing to break out your tall shoes, get ready to love this skirt!
links_reviews_text: It is quite long. I'm 5'8" and my height is thanks to my legs so I could just barely wear flat shoes with the medium. But the skirt is SO FUN! The outer layer is two pieces of fabric that aren't connected to each other, just slightly overlapping on the sides, so they're essentially like a front cape and a back cape, if that makes any sense. The black layer underneath is super stretchy, not too short, and didn't ride up. The skirt can be easily dressed up or down. Strongly considered buying this!
Little long- needed my highest wedges but looked killer with a body suit!
Fresh take on a maxi skirt. Loved the high slit and flow! Can dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: Cute but know it is long!
links_reviews_text: Cute skirt, super comfortable and practical; it has a cotton liner that's like a mid thigh length pencil skirt, so no worries on windy days. Only 4 stars because I was expecting a midi skirt, but it's definitely maxi! I wore heeled boots, the skirt sat above my belly button, and I'm almost 5'8" -- shorter girls, be aware!

links_reviews_title: You'll need long legs (&/or high heels!) for that one!
links_reviews_text: Got lucky as it arrived brand new with tag. Loved the outfit. The slit on the side is very sexy but the underskirt makes the piece wearable. Could have rented XS instead of S
I adored this skirt, fits true to size and great quality! It is very versatile, elegant, and beautiful. Would 100% rent again.

Loved this skirt, incredibly versatile, wore with boots because I'm a shorter girl, however loved it for day, work, and night looks! Really fun to wear on windy days, gives a cool cape vibe! Must rent again!
I wore this skirt with tights and a turtleneck and it was a great option for a pop of color when I normally wear neutral all winter. Definitely would wear again with a tank in the spring!

Runs pretty true to size. Could have gone XS but my size wasn't available so I made it work. Wore it to the office twice and received a lot of compliments then wore to a kids birthday party during the day on the weekend with a cropped top - very cute. Considering purchasing!

links_reviews_title: Great fun skirt to wear in napa for wine tasting
links_reviews_text: It was a little tight around my waste but was not too bad. Could have probably sized up to make it better!

links_reviews_title: Wore this skirt for a 90s themed birthday party and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'4 and it was long wearing flat boots. I had to roll it up but it was a very comfortable and flirty skirt! Would rent again and pair with heels.
loved the slit but it was winter so i had to wear tights, still so fun tho

I wore this to work one day, and it's a beautiful skirt, but the small was way too big, which is unusual for me. It's very long and has slits on both sides, which I didn't realize! Overall, it was nice, but nothing to write home about.

This was such a fun, swishy skirt! The short black piece underneath is such a nice touch. It definitely runs long. I'm 5'8 and wore it very high waisted and I still had to lift it to climb stairs to avoid tripping, so anyone shorter would probably need heels. If you're between sizes i would size down. Overall it was fun to wear and I would rent it again!
the front and back are separated so there's more material which makes it extra flowy and cool! I'm 5"3 so of course it was a little long... but nothing a slight heel wouldnt fix.

links_reviews_title: This dress is perfect for a boho look! I loved the high slits on both sides of the dress.
links_reviews_text: It is very long, I wore with Dr. Martins but some may need to wear heels. I styled with an oversized black sweater and belt. Super cute!
Looser style sweater but edgy w shoulder exposed. Had to wear strapless bra. Good daytime look for cooler weather!

links_reviews_title: Loved this sweater for the holidays! Comfy and understated trendy with the cut out
links_reviews_text: True to size. Wore this with black pants and high boots and loved the look. Great look for the holidays and winter - combo of cozy but trendy. Bra situation is tricky - I ended up not wearing a bra but stickies or strapless would work fine

links_reviews_title: Cute in theory but hard to wear
links_reviews_text: The style is cute and chic but actually wearing it is hard the cut out is exactly where your bra strap has to be. I spent the whole night stuffing the strap under my purse to hide it.
Just loved it. I have sensitive skin and this sweater is not itchy at all.
This outfit is a head turner - will get you a lot of comments. Comfort and fashion at its best
I loved this sweater. Perfect for a cool fall night hanging out. Wore with some high rise jeans. Comfortable and cute!

I was excited when I ordered this because I thought it would be really cute. Maybe if I sized down (to a small) and it was more form fitting that would've been better?!? The stark ivory against the tan arms just wasn't very attractive. Like that drew away from the nice cold shoulder style. I didn't wear it and returned it immediately. I really wanted to like it.
Cute sweater. No complaints or anything to rave about.

I rented up a size because I wanted a cozy fit, but I think it runs a bit small (a large still fit loose, just not as much as expected). This is such a fun sweater! All the details are so cute and if it wasn't so expensive, I would buy it
unique, high quality embroidered knit. fitted shape with room. thick and cozy feel in a bold color with fun detailing.
I thought this was cute and comfortable, even in LA spring weather. It was a fun choice and the perfect thing to rent once.

This is the cutest sweater. Loved all the fun details and shoulder stitches. I got a large since I'm 3 months pregnant but a medium would have worked and my typical size. Hits right at the waist and has a bit of a body shape. Got a ton of compliments.
