links_reviews_title: Short allover, looks like it shrunk - but cute!
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this unique sweater! It's really different from the sweaters I own so it was fun to mix up my work wardrobe. I like to wear high waisted pants so I didn't mind how cropped the body of the sweater was, it was actually better for me. But the sleeves were really short which made it look a little bit like I was wearing a kids sweater. Fine for one day but definitely wouldn't buy/rent again.

links_reviews_title: Cute, warm sweater, but runs very small. Large = 6-8. Don't bother if you are above an 8.
links_reviews_text: Cute, warm sweater, but runs very small. I felt like someone had put this sweater into the washing machine and it shrank all across. I am usually a size 8-10 in tops (5'8", 155 lbs, 36C) and this sweater in size Large was too small for me (sweater length too short, sleeves too short). I would say the Large equates to sizes 6-8. "Honey, I shrunk the sweater."
Lots of compliments on this one. Nice way to look cute and pulled together, but cozy.
This was an adorable non-itchy sweater. It was bright and fun. I got a lot of compliments and most of them were from children!!!!

links_reviews_title: Fun twist on a classic sweater
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this! Got lots of compliments around the office. Was a little concerned it would be more of an ugly sweater than cute when I put it on but it was better than i imagined. It runs a little short but is true to size fit wise. I could have maybe done a large to get it a little longer but if you are a fan of front tucking you won't have a problem. Overall 10/10

Nice twist on a basic sweater for a cold New York day. Loved the pop of color. It is cropped, so size up if you don't like things short. I wore this dressed down for a Friday at work, but you could dress this up with a skirt or heels. Or maybe some nicer pants/leggings.
Didn't get a good picture, but this sweater is really cute. I wore it over New Years weekend and got a bunch of compliments on it being fun and different. Fit me well as petite, is somewhat cropped.

links_reviews_title: Fit is adorable. It's adorable. I wore it so much. Considering buying it.
links_reviews_text: It's great. Comfy. And I love it. Got tons of compliments. Unique. Nice fit. Great quality. Cute pattern.
Halloween fun
Absolutely love this sweater. One of my favorite rentals and will rent again. I'm usually a small or medium and there were no reviews so I went with medium to be safe. Glad I did.

links_reviews_title: Alright. Not as vibrant as I thought it would be. Seemed more like a teacher/grandma sweater to me.

links_reviews_text: I wore this for a Sunday of momming hard and loved it. It is sort of short and cropped so I wore a tank under it. I loved the details and it felt so cute with light colored jeans and W white sneakers. Love it!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and patterns, but not soft and too short
links_reviews_text: I loved the idea of this sweater but it was unflattering - too short for my relatively long torso and very wide. It was also not soft at all, it felt more like a cotton/wool blend and I was expecting a cozier texture. Sadly I sent it back without wearing it out. Four stars because it really is cute.
too small for me :(

links_reviews_title: Great color. Some thought it was a Xmas sweater
links_reviews_text: Really cute sweater but some people at my office mocked me for wearing a Xmas sweater. I thought it was cute and fit great. wool is not soft

This sweater is everything! So unique - I had such a fun time wearing it. I wore it to an interview at a creative agency and got major compliments. The fit is slightly cropped, so a high waist or tank is a must!

links_reviews_title: Super cute. Lots of compliments. A fun, quirky, relaxed look - but still polished.
links_reviews_text: Accurate fit. Good quality fabric.

Excellent quality, very warm, and stylish. It hit me at my hips, so I can see this being short for tall women. A bit boxy but not slouchy and still allows you to look polished. I wore this with jeans and a leather skirt, to a job interview and to lunch. Can dress this up or down. I want to buy this!
This sweater is so bright, cute, and unique! The material and embroidery are in good condition, but the small seemed shrunken to me, especially in torso length. It also had a weird smell.

It's a little zany but I love this sweater! I'm usually a small or medium, but the small fit fine! It was fairly fitted, so I think the medium would've also worked but would be a more oversized look. Wear with high waisted pants as it's cropped.
Way too small. Very disappointed

links_reviews_title: SO FREAKIN CUTE! I legit want to be this sweater when I grow up! SO MANY COMPLIMENTS!
links_reviews_text: Runs really small, I could have gotten a large (and I usually wear smalls). SO ITCHY, I wore a long sleeved tee under

links_reviews_title: short, watch out if you have a long torso
links_reviews_text: the photos make the torso of this sweater look longer, it's definitely a short cut sweater so be warned. very warm and vibrant, love the color for the cold winter

links_reviews_title: Might fit an American girl doll
links_reviews_text: I'm 5-5" and when I pulled the sweater out of the bag I couldn't help but laugh because of how incredibly tiny the XS was. It's probably perfect if you're 4'11"-5'1". If you're skinny and average I suggest no smaller than a medium. The sweater is adorable and the photos does no justice for it.
I normally wear a small or medium, and this fit just right. It does run a little short though; it's cute with high waisted jeans or a skirt.
Cute sweater. Goes well with any jeans for a nice cold winters day.

The sweater is cute, true to size, and warm. It is short but I'm short-waisted so it works out that way. However, I didn't find it flattering - maybe because it's boxy and/or because it's an orange-red which is not too good on me.
Soft and fun.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to ugly sweater party!
links_reviews_text: Loved it!
wore a size larger than normally wear....comfortable & versatile
too small
Loved wearing this for work and then drinks later that night. Soft not itchy. Chic kindergarten teacher vibes.

It's so cute in person! The only thing is it's definitely a FITTED sweater. If I raised my arms at all it went up to my rib cage almost to my bra line. Would recommend ordering a size up for a normal fit and two sizes up for the standard oversize sweater.
Baggy, boxy fit. So cute. Wore it to two thanksgiving dinners. Was a hit!
Super cute, fun sweater! Love the print and colors! I'm 5"5' and it was on the shorter side for me. If I rented again I'd get a M because I like sweaters to be more oversized.
I loved this sweater! I got compliments on it all day from both men and women. The designs on the front help make this one more exciting than your average sweater. Would definitely rent again.
These were cute and very soft but the sizing labels didn't match. Not sure if they were a 25 or 26.

So so soft and comfy. They are quite stretchy though. I normally wear a 29 and was concerned when this size was suggested as I'm not my regular size right now (4 months postpartum), but these fit great and hold all the junk in!

I love these jeans! Pulled them out and they fit soo well. They have just the right amount of stretch on. Took a few days of wear before they stretched which is awesome. I ended up buying these because I loved them so much!

I wanted to try some jeans that I might actually buy, and these looked nice on the app. They had good stretch, were high waisted like I wanted, and they were a good length to wear with sneakers or heels. I wore them to work for casual Friday, and for running around on the weekend. Still thinking about purchasing and may rent again!
Love, love, love these jeans! They are the perfect amount of thickness with the perfect stretch. These have become my every day jeans! I couldn't bring myself to return them.

links_reviews_title: Flattering cut jeans with just enough stretch.
links_reviews_text: I loved these jeans so much I was tempted to keep them! I may still but them... They are a flattering cut that nips in at the waist and the color is more flattering than I find most lighter washes to be. The knees do stretch with wearing a bit like most jeans.
Perfect color, cut, and length -- definitely for the smaller waisted/bigger bottomed.

links_reviews_title: Love these! Stretchy, flattering with structure
links_reviews_text: Flatters. Has some stretch but not too much and doesn't stretch out throughout the day!

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and fit larger legs/smaller waist
links_reviews_text: These jeans fit great! They are a great length for me (5' 7") and fit well in the legs without gapping at the waist. Hit at a good height and look cute with crop tops.

links_reviews_title: decided not to wear these jeans at all
links_reviews_text: I felt the jeans were too big through the calf.
I don't love the mom jeans style that's so popular now, but these are at least semi flattering and comfortable.

These run a bit large. I usually wear a size 28 (for example Citizen Olivia) and with the non stretch jeans I've been wearing a 30 (Citizen Sasha) In these I comfortably wore a 27. I didn't care for the length. They're a 27" inseam and on my 5'8" frame they just looked too short.
Fits well, but it's straight leg. Wish it was more fitted around the calves and ankles

I've rented these a few times now. I love how comfortable these jeans are. I usually wear a 30 in these but sized down after trying the 30 and it was big around the waist. They are more of a short pant so your ankles are showing but super cute with sneakers or tighter fitting booties.
Loved these, wish I could buy. I got my regular size and I think they were a little big around the waist - wearable but started slipping a bit. Extremely comfy, perfect ankle length.

links_reviews_title: My new favorite pair of jeans!
links_reviews_text: When I initially put these on I was not a fan. They seemed quite snug and I had every intention of sending them back. I am SOOOO glad I gave these jeans a second chance. I decided to wear them out and much to my surprise, they are absolutely perfect. I don't generally care for jeans that have no stretch and assumed that due to the heavy material, these wouldn't budge but they stretched just enough. This pair of jeans is exceptionally well made, heavy but comfy material. Definitely a keeper.

links_reviews_title: Great jeans, will size down next time
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love the cut and fit of these jeans. They were slightly below the ankle for me at 5'4, and hit right at my belly button. I'm extremely picky about jeans, so I couldn't believe they fit so well. The only issue is they have more stretch than I thought, so after a few hours of wear, they got pretty baggy. Next time, I'll size down.
Absolutely comfortable, the right amount of stretch! Great with boots.

I absolutely loved the high inseam on these and the blue is an attractive wash. These are perfect for almost any crop top! They are very stretchy so you could easily size down if you want a more snug fit. If you have muscle calves like I do, these bunch ever so slightly at the knees. Otherwise, excellent jeans!
Everything about these is great. I returned them because, for me, the color is too light for the season. Will definitely rent again in the spring.

These jeans fit well, they do stretch a little as you wear them, fabric was stiff (true jean feeling). I wore them two times. I thought they were fun jeans to run around in, but wouldn't be something I would purchase.
Just not the perfect fit for me.

I wore these for everyday and toyed with buying them because it was love at first wear. The Botton fly is fun and comfy. The cut is trim but not too close in the calf. They really need a belt to stay up or the stretch combined with the high waist lets them creep down. That is the only reason I didn't buy them.

Y'all. This coat has everything you could ever want in a coat. It's warm, it's fashionable, it has lots of pockets, it has zippers inside pockets and it's an all-around great winter coat - especially here in NYC!

links_reviews_title: THE BEST JACKET I HAVE EVER WORN
links_reviews_text: I had more compliments on the jacket than the dress I wore to the wedding. I was in the airport and people came up to me asking where I had gotten this jacket. It's super warm, as I had worn it in the Windy City of Chicago. Really stylish and so comfortable. It's really unique compared to anything I have ever tried for a winter coat. I went up 2 sizes as I was desperate to get something before I left that weekend. But it runs true to size as I have tried and 8 and it is not so massive on.

links_reviews_title: LOVE LOVE this jacket for winter
links_reviews_text: This jacket is awesome. It's cute, functional and SO WARM. I like the option to remove the the layers and wear them individually. I plan to purchase this jacket.
Its a bit heavy in weight if the temps are more mild.

links_reviews_title: Too much coat for petite size
links_reviews_text: Nice coat. A bit bulky. Sleeves very long.

links_reviews_title: Heavy winter coat & just so perfect!
links_reviews_text: I got this big because I wanted to make sure I could wear with a sweater underneath. It was still a tiny bit big - but truly the most amazing winter coat ever. I kept it for 3 weeks and wore it in the cold weather. It is so well made and is able to cinch at the waistline to make it look more flattering. I LOVE THIS COAT and can see why it is so expensive. It is truly the best winter coat ever.
LOVED this jacket, but definitely not heavy enough for winter in NYC. However, if you pack on the layers you're golden. Would rent again in the fall!

This jacket runs HUGE! I wish I had sized down one size... at least. It's not lined, so it's not all that warm, but it is wool, so it's quite heavy. It's a nice men's wear look. Had fun using it for a week.

links_reviews_title: Your favorite fall and winter jacket
links_reviews_text: Oversized but a beautiful cut and style. A must rent for the winter season!
Oversized fit but I loved it and felt very trendy and wore it to several dressy occasions throughout the holiday season.
Warm; beautiful coat. I could have worn the small, but only the medium was available
It was overall a good coat but too overwhelming on me. Long in length and sleeve. The piece itself is good quality and warm without being overly heavy.

links_reviews_title: Well made, gorgeous, could be warmer
links_reviews_text: This coat is so well made and looks much better in person. The color really went well my hair which is rare.... it could be warmer so I don't advise it for the ladies living in freezing climates
Liked this coat. But not lined/30% wool so not warm enough for mid winter. TTS.

I sized down and it still has the oversized look that I wanted. If you want a more tailored/fitted look size down twice. I'm short and the length was great on me. It is very soft and I wore it quite a bit
Pretty boxy, but that's the look of the coat. Prefect for Fall in NY
I really liked this! Def long and oversized but I'm tall so it was ok. I actually love that it's not lined, perfect for CA weather. Will rent again when it cools off again!

links_reviews_title: I used this coat everyday I had it and loved it. Makes all outfits look complete! So tempted to buy
links_reviews_text: I loved this coat because it was warm and stylish. I really wanted to buy it! I highly recommend this coat for going out or dressing up any outfit. Even for everyday wear it was great!

links_reviews_title: It was comfortable, functional and cute.
links_reviews_text: Very large and loose but extremely comfortable and functional. I loved the large pockets and wore it several times. Received compliments several times.
I rented this for my wedding weekend because our colors were blackwatch and i loved it, but it ran very big.... i should have ordered a small but am in love with this coat!
Warm & so cute. Hated sending it back.

links_reviews_title: Cute idea, but way to big
links_reviews_text: I rented a small and it was still so large as to look comical. Maybe an XS would look better, but seems like style runs really large
Enormous. Even for oversized this was too much for my petite 5'3". Nice fabric and quality, just needs someone taller.
So very stylish and warm! Mine still had the tags on it. People recognized the brand when I wore it. Downside it was very large, I would size down. Makes just about any outfit look chic.
Coat is beautiful and a fun winter look; however, this particular style runs very large. I understand it has an oversized look; however, this just felt too big.
Fit is comfy not slim. A bit heavy but warm.

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect top for a chilly Saturday in Florida!
links_reviews_text: I would size up if you want a looser fit. It has a fitted waist band, but i just front tucked it. Perfect to wear to a brewery on a chilly spring day in Florida! Will definitely be renting again!

I actually threw this on and paired it with a scarf. and a thing long sleeve underneath. It was a little chilly so pairing it was perfect and I didn't have to wear a jacket. It doesn't have the best shape to it bc it is a sweater but it has such a great, comfy, cozy fit and wasn't wide. I'm glad I rented it
This sweatshirt was fun for a casual Friday workday and was very comfortable. I normally wear an 8/medium on top and the 3 fit well.

links_reviews_title: Not the softest but still cute
links_reviews_text: Not as soft as I expected but still a cute sweater. Sleeves were slightly long for me.
Fit is boxy and cute. Got tons of compliments.
Great sweatshirt for everyday wear. Got this for a beach camping vacation and wore it on the flight and every night!

Sundry is one of my favorite brands for material and softness. Unfortunately this sweater has not been maintained properly therefore it doesn't have the "sundry" feel anymore. It's stiff and scratchy.
This sweatshirt has just enough detail to be worn out on a casual day. The sleeves were a tad short for my arms but it didn't stop me from wearing it. I would consider renting it again.
Love the stars

links_reviews_title: super comfy sweatshirt that is easy to wear anywhere.
links_reviews_text: soft and comfortable everyday sweatshirt.
Love that the stars are embroidered and not just printed on.
Loved this top
nothing special - soft
Nothing special, I wouldn't really recommend. Very comfortable though.
fits true to size -
Wore this many times. Cute with jeans, leggings or sweats.
I wanted to try a casual sweatshirt for work. Fit true to size
This was a cute, every day sweatshirt. Comfy and cute.
Looks great with black or blue jeans
Love this comfy sweatshirt with the star details. It was perfect for flying. Loved pairing it with superstars and skinny ankle jeans.
This sweater is so comfy and easy to wear. It's a bit oversized but in a good way. I loved wearing it. Good staple for winter.
This sweatshirt was the best. Probably could have done a size 1 but the 2 was more laid back and comfy. Might just buy it!
TTS, great for lounging!

links_reviews_title: Cute sweatshirt to wear with yoga pants
links_reviews_text: Adorable sweatshirt to go to coffee in after workout
This sweatshirt was very cute and comfortable. I have long arms and a long torso so it was a little short on me. To have it be a bit slouchy I would recommend sizing up one or two.
it was cozy but nothing special
Shirt was cute and comfortable, but nothing to write home about. The stars are cute, but it fits and wears just like a normal sweatshirt.

links_reviews_title: Keeps you warm on a chilly day.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and true to size. Very cute with skinny jeans
Fit true to size!
Cute and fit, but looks way longer in photos
Yep, it's a casual gray sweatshirt but the embroidered stars step it up a notch. It's on the thinner side. I love it and will be keeping it for a while!
Very comfortable and good for running errands and lounging.
Ran smaller than I hoped and the material wasn't great!
I really love this sweatshirt, but even on sale it's $$$. Super comfy. Great quality fabric. It's the perfect sweatshirt.
Super comfortable
Received lots of compliments on this sweatshirt. The pattern is super cute and has an oversized fit.
Slouchy, but cute paired with skinny jeans. Nice for the weekend or causal day at work.

links_reviews_title: This sweatshirt is cute but it didn't change my life.
links_reviews_text: Fit great, very cozy.

links_reviews_title: So cute and comfy, got a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and nice material

I'm a size 4 and I previously rented this in a small, which was a bit snug on the groin, my torso is regular sized. I sized up to a medium and it's night and day! This is right out of the bag in the photo so it needs a steam but it's comfortable, a bit thicker denim than typical rompers but I think it adds to the quality. Button front and drawstring waist. Very cute , I'm buying!
Loved the fit. Perfect for brunch and shopping on a sunny vacation day
Wore this walking around Disney and Universal. Comfy and cute. Short but not too short for a mom my age.
As someone who is quite tall for a women, I loved this look, but the the romper was a bit short for me. Next time I would get a size up.
Great length and very comfy

I loved this jumper so much I ended up buying it. It is really cute and easy to wear, and I liked that it's easy to sit in too (some jumpers are very uncomfortable in the crotch region if you know what I mean). I have a bit of a booty and it was flattering in that department, and because the top part is a little bit loose it provides room to run around and eat / drink to your hearts content.

This had potential but I thought it was just ok. I sized down based on everyone's reviews. I'm glad I did, but I still felt like it made me look a little frumpy in the midsection. It was comfortable and great for nursing my baby but it's not really figure flattering.
This ran large and bulky on me. I was envisioning a lighter weight denim but it was a heavier denim and just didn't work out. Just all over large bulky fit so didn't wear.
I really liked this. I paired it with tom wedges and thought it was really cute but my husband said I looked like a sexy mechanic so I ended up not wearing it.
Really liked his romper. True to size, very comfy, just a good romper!
A little tighter than expected and seems to ride up. Did not wear.
I love this romper but didn't wear it because the top part wasn't flattering on me.
This was super cute and flattering. I was very tempted to buy this one, but didn't since summer is coming to an end.
I ended up not wearing this because of timing, but it was comfy, easy, and fun. I liked the waist detail and the weight of the denim (not lightweight, pretty traditional).
Fit perfect and received lots of compliments! Almost purchased it but ended up wearing it enough times to return.
good
Wanted to like but a bit boxy. Should have sized down.
This romper is just ok! It was rather big on the top, but fit on the bottom. The buttons were weird at the top and gaped open when I tried it on. Just wasn't for me.

This is a cool piece. It was great to wear for a long day of classes when I spend the entire day on campus when I have to do a lot of moving around. The only complaint I had was that the top was a little large and baggy while the bottom fit great.

links_reviews_title: nice casual denim romper; fits TTS
links_reviews_text: Nice casual denim romper, heavy weight, no stretch, runs TTS. I like the fit HOWEVER, when it was extremely difficult to get off so I couldn't chance wearing this in a social setting.

links_reviews_title: I was not able to wear this. I have a long torso and wider hips, I couldn't even pull it up.
links_reviews_text: Runs short, maybe better for someone petite.
It's a boxy, baggy feel. Great for beach but really does nothing for your body...

links_reviews_title: The outfit did not fit and I was not able to wear it.
links_reviews_text: Did not fit.

links_reviews_title: Practically dislocated a shoulder getting dressed.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to like this romper. It had all the feels of ‘00s Jenny from the Block and I was looking forward to wearing it to a casual beach lunch in Florida January. I tried it on and had the most awful time trying to situate the top. It didn’t seem to easily allow for things like shoulders and elbows trying to maneuver it on. Once I got it on it hung like I was back to being a skinny teen with nothing up top or bottom. Just not a good look. My sister wanted to wear it too since another review said it was good for breastfeeding, but I think it would have been worse on her. Perhaps if you plan on oiling up before dressing and not peeing, this would be a good fit for you. Just a plain disappointment.

I rented this romper for a vacation to Hawaii and it didn't disappoint! Although it arrived rumpled and needing to be ironed, it traveled well and looked great with a variety of shoes and hats. Per other reviews, I sized down and am glad I did as the top is a bit large. I wouldn't recommend this romper if you're taller - I'm 5'7" and it was really short on me.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a casual dinner. It was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Super cute, ran a tiny bit large, but the drawstring helped tie it off and it looked totally cute!
This is cute just not for my body type - i have a tummy and it was snug around it ... if you have slimmer waist or when I am able to lose some weight I feel it is very cute
not perfect but not unflattering either. threw it on and went about a day off in the city.

links_reviews_title: I wish I had listened to the reviews!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is super cute, in theory. However unless you are extremely top-heavy, do not even consider renting this item. It was so loose and baggy on the top, I had to return it right away. Flying squirrel look on lock!
It came very wrinkled and it was way too big.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but consider getting a size smaller than you normally wear.
links_reviews_text: Order a size down because this romper is very baggy. I ordered a small which is what I normally wear and it was extremely unflattering. I felt like a potato sack.

links_reviews_title: I got this a little big for comfort, but the snap wouldn't stay closed.
links_reviews_text: Loved this but needed a safety pin to keep the snap closed, and it was a total pain to pin so you couldn't see it. Bummer because it was super cute.
This was an XL but it would not even go up to my waist. Either it runs SUPER small or it was mid labeled.

links_reviews_title: Not cute on if you are short. Looked Like a TENT
links_reviews_text: Huge. Makes you look frumpy

links_reviews_title: Would not rent again. Way to tight at shoulders hard to get on and off
links_reviews_text: Loved the look. Shoulders way to tight while rest fit fine. Even a different size would not have worked.
Good fit, very comfortable, lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Cute but not for the tall women
links_reviews_text: I am 5 '10" tall the outfit was too short for me to wear.

links_reviews_title: Could not pull the shorts up past my mid-thigh.
links_reviews_text: I wear a large on the bottom, so I was surprised with the small fit on a XL
Runs big on top, pretty baggy. Very comfortable.

So disappointed with how in-proportionate this was. It's was GIGANTIC on top and smaller (but still baggy) on the bottom. I was so hoping to wear it with white converse but even the smaller size would be too big. So sad :(

Loved wearing this to work and for a Christmas. They're a bit of statement bc of the relaxed but but complements the fitted waist very well. They were a bit too long for me but with heels it wasn't too bad. I almost considered buying and tailoring the length!

I wore these to a meeting I knew an exec would be in, but also knew it would be a long day so I wanted to be comfortable. The material is stretchy and soft, so comfort was achieved. I wore about 2 inch booties with them, and the hem was just above the floor. The one thing I didn't love is that they got very wrinkled, especially around the crotch area, from sitting most of the day. Not the cutest look...

Really loved these pants... sadly only the 4L was available -- at 5'8" the long was way too much for me. Threw on some 4" heels and the pants were fine! Totally comfortable and great fit through the waist. Very flattering. Might buy the 4R!

Fabulous pants- definitely a nice change of pace from the regular black work pants. The pleating makes them so flattering but because of the pleating and the pockets, I could see these being not as flattering for shorter gals. They're definitely also best with heels. I am usually a 10 or 8 but I went with the 10 and they fit like a glove- but did stretch out a bit! Could have probably just gone with the 8.
Great for an hourglass. So comfortable and stylish. Wish I had gotten the long but paired with 1.5 inch heals and was ok.

I ordered these pants for a date night & received them with the tags still on! The pants are very very cute, but are a very wide leg. I ordered the petite size since I am 5' 4", and am super happy I decided to go with this size since they are a bit long. Planning to pair these pants with a cute off the shoulder top.
Warm, comfortable and versatile. LOVE LOVE LOVE this sweater. Worn to work with pixie pants and then changed to jeans for happy hour. Debating buying it!
The photo doesn't do it justice. It was flattering and comfortable and so warm! Received tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Perfect sweater for a cold day!
links_reviews_text: Perfect sweater for a cold day! Wish it was softer though.
This sweater is awesome
I thought it was really fun, but it was super thin, and super short! I had to wear a longer T under it so as not to expose my stomach!
Flattering fit and soft, warm knit. Good way to spice up the everyday wardrobe with a fun design.
Love this sweater! Softer than I expected. I'm long waisted and it hit perfectly at the top of my hips. Keeps its shape after multiple wears. Fit is loose but not boxy.
Cute and warm. Kinda short. Had to wear high wasted jeans. Good quality.

This fits a bit roomie, but I liked that for a sweater as I wear tees under sweaters always and I like a draped but not huge fit. Soooo soft, cozy and actually warm. I wanted to wear it everyday. I could have done the XS. Hit the hip line on me, I'm very short(5feet)

It was freezing in Seattle, so a layered it with a charcoal turtleneck. This was perfect for the day that it was being so cold and about 30°. The material is soft it's not itchy at all it runs true to size and it's definitely an adorable piece.
Great sweater. I got compliments. The sweater is black, but has beautiful blue thread in the weave.
This is cute but definitely does not look or feel like a $400 sweater! Sleeves are nice and long and body is long enough to reach top of jeans. An ok piece for a weekend activity!
Really enjoyed wearing this comfy, colorful sweater.
Cute and soft sweater. Love the graphic. Overall great !!!
Super soft and cozy
Really cute and warm. Nothing super special though
Cute and very soft, I liked the shorter cut.
Surprisingly cropped, which isn't my most comfortable cut. Cute design, nice cashmere.
Looks black online but definitely dark blue
I liked the color and design of this sweater. It was also super soft. A little on the short side, which kept it from being a five star for me.

I really liked this sweater, but I almost didn't wear it because of the hanger bumps near the shoulders. Not sure why RTR hangs sweaters like this. I feel like I'm wasting money if I don't wear what I've rented, so I wore once before sending back.
I wore this sweater 3 times and loved it. Super comfortable and cute.
Got a lot of good comments.

links_reviews_title: Graphic pop, warm & ziggy stardust realness
links_reviews_text: Cozy, versatile cute sweater that worked for business casual office, Sunday brunch with the family, and a lazy day at the movies. I love this sweater & my unslakable thirst for new graphic sweaters prevented me from buying.

links_reviews_title: Wore too many times to count!
links_reviews_text: Super unique and fun sweater. Paired with jeans, a skirt, and some nicer pants for work.
Super cute sweater! Easy to throw on and go...
Live the design - medium was perfect for a casual look
Super comfortable, casual and fun.
Like the sweater but it did collect hair, fuz, anything I touched

links_reviews_title: Second rental of this sweater... I still love it
links_reviews_text: Soft & cozy... size small is a trim, perfect fit. The medium was roomier & more casual.
Nothing special, but a fun everyday, casual sweater.
This is so cute for everyday. Lots of compliments. Really comfortable. Almost bought
Cute

This is a warm sweater. I rented it in April in Texas. Perfect for the first couple of weekends impossible for the next two. So cute with jeans and sneakers. I would absolutely buy this if it wasn't about to be 100° here for the next six months.
Fits great!
Great for everyday and I paired it with a grey blazer and jeans!
A little itchy, but true to size and thicker material
just a cute basic sweater

The sweater was surprisingly warm for such a thin sweater. Not itchy at all. The colorful heart design is super fun and the sweater is constructed well such that the bold pattern didn't seem cheap or gaudy. Sleeves were long enough for me, which is great because I oftentimes have issues with long sleeves that are too short. The small was just right -- not too tight, and not too baggy.
Soft and comfy. True to size.
Fit is just right, perfect for business casual.
Only really looks good with high waisted pants!

This top was cute. I'm usually an 8/medium and the medium was appropriate. It's a little on the shorter side so I tucked in a tank to make sure I wouldn't show unintended skin at work. I rented it in the fall but it would probably be cuter for spring/summer.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, easy-to-wear blouse with fun pattern
links_reviews_text: This is a very forgiving and flattering blouse. Flowy bodice and sleeves. The bands at the waist and cuffs gives it some shape. Navy background. Small circular pattern with red, white and tan. Comfortable to wear. Great with jeans.

links_reviews_title: Not a shirt you can wear to work
links_reviews_text: Lift your arms and your belly shows - not a little, a lot. If you're wearing this with high waisted jeans you should be fine in a casual environment, but this shirt has the fabric and look of a much more expensive piece. I wouldn't wear it to a dive bar.
Wore to work and also With jeans and the fit was good just not as special

links_reviews_title: Cute top, but a bit too short for me
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9" with a large bust, so this ended up being just a tad shorter on me than I had hoped. Still cute though!
Lots of compliments, comfortable
The top area runs large.
Was able to wear this casual with jeans for dinner and drinks! Although it runs big it looked great with jeans and I felt great in it. Will be renting again

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing it as it was too short. I would have LOVED it if longer.
links_reviews_text: It fit very well but was too short for a bigger person so I decided not to wear it as I was self conscious of it riding up too much. Loved the fabric and design - if longer, I would probably have bought it!
A nice change in silhouette with the square neck and gathered waist. Easy to wear

links_reviews_title: Cute print, but too short for me.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'11'' and this shirt was way too short on me.

I loved this. This tip would work at the office but great with jeans. Nicely shows off your neck with square opening. The bottom will hit your pants so no belly shows. Nice material, silky not shiny. I would rent again.
Sleeves were a bit long. It was overall a cute top and fun for a night out.
cute

Loved this shirt, I ordered a size up based on some of the recommendations but I wish I had stayed with my normal size as it as stretchy in the sleeves and wide along the bottom. Great casual top, I got compliments from quite a few people.
Felt chique and funky. Will rent again!
I looked like an extra from orange is the new black in this tan jump suit. It's about as flattering. Not at all what I was going for.
Love the playful polka dot and the color. Didn't like the oversized fit, I could probably fit another skinny person inside this jacket. Wore it unbuttoned and made the best of it.

links_reviews_title: Super cute sweater that makes any outfit fun!
links_reviews_text: I love this oversized sweater. The pattern is super cute and fun and it added a pop to any outfit. I would definitely buy this or rent again!
This sweater is just amazing! It feels great, it looks great, is a staple!

I loved this sweater! It was a little bigger and boxier than I expected, not sure what I expected tho bc it looks just like the photo! It was super cute and comfy. I kind of felt like Fred Flintstone, but I still felt good and got compliments!

Comfy, slouchy, reasonably soft and not-scratchy sweater. I wore it to an all day training over black jeans and a black T-shirt and didn't have to give it a second thought. The neck of the cardigan seemed really stretched out - I think this is a result of use and not intended. Size down and it'll still be sufficiently oversized.
I love the design. It's also very comfortable and long enough to wear with leggings.
I loved this. Thought about buying it, but there's so many other clothes to try.
Worn this out to girls dinner in Venice. Was comfy and felt put together at the same time. Loved it.
I want to keep this and make it a staple part of my wardrobe. So many compliments and fun to dress up or down. My favorite color!
I loved this sweater. I wore a size small and it was oversized. I paired it with a black cami and black leather pants and chunky gold jewelry. It was a perfect fall look.
Didn't notice until midway through the day... this sweater makes you look like Fred Flintstone. Spent the rest of the day feeling rather ridiculous.
This is a nice sweater, took one star away for it being acrylic. Fits really oversized so size down if you are between sizes.
Not as soft as I expected but still super comfy! Casual top without sacrificing a chic look. Highly recommend!
Very cozy yet not bulky. Soft and casual...and perfect for taking the kids to school!
This was not great quality and also appeared to have been washed too many times. This is the first and only item I have ever received which was of poor quality and condition.
very boxy not flattering or even very cozy
Love the drawstring, incredibly comfortable and great color and pattern for fall.
I loved the cut of this sweater. It fit perfectly, hit my hips in length and sleeves just barely to my wrists. Unsure how it'd fit anyone taller (I'm 5ft!), or maybe it's meant to be cropped?
Love this sweater. Cozy and fun. I'm 5'1" and did not feel like this swallowed me up at all. The sleeves weren't too long and that's something I was concerned about.
Very comfortable sweater, cute pattern. Cozy cowl neck. Material slightly itchy, tends to grab and hold lint (or dog fur in my house)
I rented this for a winter stroll with my family and to a bar after! The sweater was comfy and cute. Very soft material
Wore this to a football game in the fall and it was perfect. Love the bell sleeves. Got tons of compliments from this photo!
Great cozy piece to pair with jeans. Great design.
I normally wear a small medium, but I was told to get the large. It was a thick, but very nice sweater. I wore it in 30 degrees...and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Warm and cozy for apres ski
links_reviews_text: Warm and cozy
Rented this for my daughter for a cold weather trip. She couldn't wear it, said it was too itchy. Cute pattern though. Shorter than I thought it would be.
I wore once and sent back. Nothing special. The sleeves were bell type and didn't add style.
Loved this. Great oversized sweater to keep you warm in the winter.
Very simple and gorgeous. Comfortable and warm. Stylish sleeves. Very happy with it.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater for work and play
links_reviews_text: Really liked the slouchy look to this sweater. Wore to work one day and to apres ski the next.

I wore the available size on my short frame. I loved the oversized feel of it. Sleeves were wide as it's meant to be loose on the arms. Color & simple design was great for everyday wear. Slightly itchy that I wore a tee underneath. I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Style, quality and fit were perfect.
links_reviews_text: Great sweater all around. Wore a few times and will likely rent again.
Fits true to size. It is super cute with a pair of crop pants. I wore it with some orange courds and got lots of compliments.

Cute sweater. I wish I had ordered the small but I think overall it's true to size and an oversized sweater with nice colors, cute with jeans/boots for every day. Sleeves are very large too just to note.
It was so warm and comfy on a pretty cold fall day in NY.
Love this sweater! The print is super fun and matches back well to a variety of bottoms. It's also warm and perfect for fall or winter. Runs true to size and is very comfy. Highly recommend!

The IDEA of the blazer is amazing; it is a great material, super sturdy and gives you that tailored look that you're probably going for, however, the fit isn't all there. The blazer comes across online as a very feminine blazer but in person the fit is a bit boxier than expected. still beautiful, just not cinched or form fitting like you might expect!
This blazer is well tailored and flattering. I could have worn a size down as it was a bit oversized, but still definitely worked. Perfect for an evening work event!
Absolutely gorgeous, high-quality, boss bitch jacket. Unfortunately, the sleeves were about 3 inches too long and I couldn't make it work.

links_reviews_title: wanted to love this but weird fit
links_reviews_text: I don't know if it's just my body but this was HUGE in the shoulders, and SO long in the sleeves. And then fit everywhere else. I was really disappointed, but it definitely didn't fit nice and tailored like I wanted it to.

I ordered this for my work holiday party. I wear between a 14 and 16 so I ordered both L and XL to be safe. I settled on the XL so it wouldn't be too tight although I did wear a Spanx underneath. The fabric was a lightweight jersey knit but didn't feel like I needed a slip. The length was a touch longer than I would have preferred and I'm 5'7". I would definitely rent again.
Great LBD! Got so many compliments on it.
This dress fits well with medium weight material.

links_reviews_title: Incorrect Description but fine black dress
links_reviews_text: When I rented this dress the RTR description stated it was a 90% wool-10% cashmere blend. In actuality, it's a 55% wool-45% viscose blend. So the dress is quite thin and only moderately stretchy. That said, it's a nice dress, soft enough, good for layering, and flattering on my 26 week pregnant belly. The slit is nice to balance out the below the knee length. For reference, I'm 5'6", a pre-pregnancy size 8 who so far has really only gotten bigger in the belly/boobs and the size medium fits well
I rented this for a dinner cruise in late November. It was warm and comfortable.

I love this dress! Such a great basic to have. I got a small and it ran true to size. However, the sleeves were a bit tight and the neck hole was REALLY tight (Put on the dress before doing hair and makeup). I was pleasantly surprised by the slit that ran alongside the dress (higher than I thought but very classy). I was 10/10 pleased with this dress especially because the fabric WAS NOT see-through! Thank goodness!

links_reviews_title: made for a perfect all-purpose maternity dress: fitted but flattering, dress up or down
links_reviews_text: the dress is slightly worn but still looks great

This dress actually fit great in an XS (I am usually an S) but the neck was SUPER tight to get on. Once it was on though, everything fit great -- just be prepared to put this on before you put on any makeup!

links_reviews_title: This dress was fabulous! So classy and fabulous.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and so sleek. The slit was higher than expected for work, but it made for a great casual dress.
Very versatile, curve hugging dress. It fit perfectly, and showed off curves in a chic way. I wore this dress on Christmas Eve to church and then out to dinner on NYE! It was perfect

links_reviews_title: Paired with suede tall heeled boots( tobacco colored) felt great in it. very classic
links_reviews_text: thin material for a sweater dress but very comfortable, would rent again

links_reviews_title: Sexy fall look but material was thin and worn.
links_reviews_text: I thought this was a cute, sexy look and I liked it overall but the material was thin and worn. It fits loosely so it's not overly sexy but the slit is a little high for work.
Too tight on me, fabric clingy. Liked the style

links_reviews_title: I love this dress, the photo didn't really show the slit up the leg very well. Very comfy!
links_reviews_text: Very Comfy! Slit up the leg was unexpected but still looks very professional. Wore with sneakers and some jewelry, got a lot of compliments and definitely executes curves!
great fit and beautiful dress
I wanted to really like this dress but the fit didn't work. I got size medium and it ran large. Overall, it wasn't flattering.
material was very thin, and the length was a little long, several inches past the knee and I'm 5'6", arrived new with tags still on

links_reviews_title: Compliments and confidence. Not sweater material though.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. Warning: it's more t shirt than sweater material though.
The fit it's perfect, makes your body look fantastic, and is comfortable.

links_reviews_title: BEAUTIFUL simple staple black dress, a bit itchy
links_reviews_text: Love the fit of this dress. I have more a pear shape and am 5'3 so the slit came right to the side of my knee. I loved this piece and it will definitely be my go to for the fall and winter. My only concern was how tight and itchy the turtle neck was. Besides that.. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND
Nice dress but the fabric was a bit itchy and it runs large. Would have needed an XS.
I was surprised that the material was so thin. Worked well to layer with a sweater, but I wouldn't wear by itself.
Fit true to size, fabric was soft. Just a standard everyday dress. Nothing bad to say, nothing to rave about.

Fits perfectly. I normally wear a 10 and the M was just right. I did rent the L but it was a bit too baggy. I'm tall and the slit on the side hit me just right. The sleeves were the perfect length and so was the dress itself. I got many compliments on this and I felt like the most stylish version of myself wearing it to work.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Will definitely rent again
links_reviews_text: Hugs your curves in all the right places

links_reviews_title: A little bit long, but lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Wore to a baby shower, I wore 3.5 inch heels and they were definitely still 2-3 inches long, but I wore them anyway. Super comfortable, but run a little bit big in the waist and length.
You need to be one the taller side to wear these. I'm 5'7" and wearing 3 inch heels. They are so great. Fit perfect.

The pants fit perfectly at the waist with lots of room in the hips and thighs. The color is really fun for a party. The fabric has a shiny-ness to it that is really cute. The one draw back was the length. I'm only 5'4" so I had to tape up at least 3" from the length even in my 4" platform boots

links_reviews_title: So cute and comfortable, and pockets
links_reviews_text: These are so cute! The color is true to the photo and looked great with a top I also rented! The length was perfect with 3 inch heels! I am usually in between a 6-8 and the 6 worked fine however next time I rent these I'm going to try an 8!

links_reviews_title: Statement pants in the most beautiful color
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric, you will need a heel. I wore tights underneath to smooth things out as it does show bumps and you can't tuck a shirt in either for the same reason.
These pants are gorgeous! They will spruce up your work wardrobe. They are very long and will need to wear heels! I'm 5'6" and wore 4 inch heels- worked perfectly!
I wore these along with a body suit and jacket to work. Definitely a stand out piece. Pants are long so I wore with 4 inch heels
Loved everything about this rental. The pants are gorgeous and so soft and comfortable. I definitely recommend.
These pants are beautiful in person. I'm usually a 2 in high waisted pants but sized up to the 4 and they were perfect. They are long, I'm 5'6" and they fit me well.

These pants are ALL the things! Comfortable yet chic, slimming yet movable, show-stopping yet work appropriate. I literally got ten compliments by both men and women. I paired with a silk black blouse and threw on a blazer for the conference. Could easily go from work to date night. High-waisted. I would buy if they were more than 10% off. Will rent again.
I could have sized down to a 4. These babies are long - I wore them with a 3.5 inch heel and I'm 5'7

Aside from how much I love the color and style of these pants, I also soaked up how great I felt in them. Ladies, I felt POWERFUL walking around in these bad bois. They made me feel on top of the world. I got so many compliments at work. As for size, they fit pretty true around the waist, maybe a pinch large. They are VERY long; I’m taller than average and needed to wear heels so they didn't hit the ground.
Great movement. Cam be worn day to evening. Best suited for ladies 5ft 8in or shorter, if you want to wear heels.

The fit was pretty good-- the waistline sat weirdly on me and not in a flattering way, also as a tall girl with long legs the inseam could've been about 2 inches longer to keep the look perfectly polished when worn with heels. I wore the pants with a black crew neck long sleeve bodysuit and black pumps. My accessories were a silver Cartier tank watch and bar earrings and a silver Cartier love bracelet

I rented these pants for a work event and they were perfect. I'm between an 8 & 10 in pants, and the 8 fit well. They are beautiful pants and were comfortable for the 12 hour day I needed them for. The standard size was long enough for me, so may be too long for someone shorter. I'll definitely rent these again, and am still thinking about purchasing them!

links_reviews_title: Love these pants - but need "6 inch heels!"
links_reviews_text: I'm typically between size 2-4...but only 4 available ...they fit but are loose around hips (wish I could try the 2 certain they would fit better!) i happen to have sexy beige patent leather platform heels which allow me to wear. As these are abnormally long. I'm 5'5" and need the 6 inch heels Beautiful color and fabric

links_reviews_title: Nice pants, but simply too long!
links_reviews_text: I was hoping to wear these to a work conference in San Francisco. The colour is rich and the fabric is high quality, and the fit was great around the waist and hips, however I couldn't wear it outside of the house because they are way too long. I'm 5'5" and even in my tallest platform heels (6 inches) they were still dragging on the floor. I wish there was a way to temporarily hem these for the day/night without using pins as I didn't want to put any holes in the fabric.
Vibrant slacks long enough for tall gals, loved wearing these!

links_reviews_title: I love these pants so much! Perfect for dressing down for work and then for date night!
links_reviews_text: These pants are so comfortable without looking like they are lounge wear. I felt like I was wearing silk pj's at work but was dressed up. They fit perfectly and I wore with a sweater and scarf for work and a cute top for date night. Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: These pants were really fun! Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I paired them with a Navy Theory blouse and gold accessories. Winner!!!
Larger fit with little shape
Color is beautiful but I couldn't wear them because they were too long. I'm 5'4" and wore them with 4" heels and they were still too long
wore to a dinner in vegas, fun bright pink color and really comfortable. They skimmed the floor on me with 2 inch heels on.
Even with high heels this was too long.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear this time, but will rent for a fun party
links_reviews_text: The material is shiny so definitely more event-worthy than everyday. I really liked the style. They are super long so will need tape or very high heels. Cute pants, will rent for fun event.

links_reviews_title: No stretch in waist but POCKETS!!!
links_reviews_text: I have LONG legs – a 34" inseam, and these pants were perfect! Anyone with shorter legs will need heels. No stretch in waist but are flowy otherwise, and deep trouser pockets are VERY NICE

These pants are beautiful, the material is stunning and the fit is perfect...apart from the length which is crazy long. Even with 4 in heels, there was too much excess length to make this work. Would LOVE LOVE LOVE if RTR decided to offer a petite hem on this.
These were gorgeous in person but unfortunately couldn't wear because they weren't long enough (I'm about 5'10).

links_reviews_title: Did not wear due to lenght. I am 5'5 and wore a 4 inch heel and they were still to long.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric and color, but WAY to long

links_reviews_title: Way too long- what a shame!
links_reviews_text: These pants are beautiful, the material is stunning and the fit is perfect...apart from the length which is crazy long. I thought I could try to make them work despite other reviews but even with my highest heels there was lots of excess length. My legs are on the short side so sometimes length is a problem but these are very long!
Didn't wear but original got 4 and had to re order size smaller
Definitely one of my top 5 rtr rentals of all time! Loved loved loved these. Comfy and fabulous. Really didn't want to send these back.
Loved the wide leg
Received so many compliments, truly stands out.

links_reviews_title: Nice fabric and color however they are long!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'6 and they were still to long, even with a 3" heel.
I'm 5'8" and these were way too long for me. Beautiful color though!
So want to wear these. Nice draping fabric and beautiful color with sheen. Fits well at waist but way too long. Do not attempt if petite.

I probably should've paired it with a different set of shoes. Something about it felt awkward. It was incredibly comfortable and I loved the color as well. I am wondering if I actually should have sized down. That might have made the difference for me.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty take on a sweater dress
Don't want to give it back
links_reviews_text: I'd keep if it wasn't still so $$ even though it's been around for more than a season. I'm 5'2 and barefoot as pictured - while long, it's elegant and slimming when paired w an oversized blazer. The armpits are a little big as others mentioned but given the fabric I can't really imagine wearing this except in fall/winter. Would wear to work, too.

For starters, this stress is definitely more cream-colored then it appears in the photo...I would even go as far is it to say it's Oatmeal colored. I will admit the dress was a touch risky for the workplace due to the wide armholes and slightly high slit in the center, but the length and overall nature of the dress is conservative so I went for it and it paid off (with compliments)! The weight of the knit is very flattering and gives the body a very smooth line. Like others have mentioned, the belt was missing from my dress so pack an extra if you are traveling.

I love (almost) everything about this dress. It feels and looks very posh. I brought it with me to France and wore it twice, once for daytime once for night, and I think it worked either way. Paired it with a denim jacket and mules for the chillier night. The only negatives, as other reviewers have said, is that the arm holes are very large so wearing a normal bra can be tricky. I also found the length to be just slightly odd, but it didn't bother me too much. I'm shorter (5'3") so would be more normal on a taller person.
Fit perfect.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my engagement photos. It was so comfortable, and my fiancé was obsessed.
links_reviews_text: From the other reviews, I was worried about the large armholes (so I ordered a size down as backup) and that the dress would be missing a belt. The size down was perfect- no bra showing whatsoever with my multi-way crossed back straps. And not only did the dress come with a belt, but RTR sent an extra one with it as well!
Stretches out a bit, and the belt can look sloppy, but I would love to own this one. Great winter white. Not really warm, but beautiful.
Wore this to my bridal shower, felt so comfortable and got a ton of compliments. This dress is well made, structured, classic but also unique. Highly recommend!
Fit was a little loose but I ordered up. Very flattering. The only thing that bugged me about this dress was the sides are cut really narrow so whatever bra you are wearing is going to show.

A friend said I had "Diane Keaton vibes in the best way". Another said it was "tres chic". This dress was so comfortable, and I felt so glam in it. I wore it 3X, including to a photo shoot for a local magazine profile. Rented in the midst of 16° NYC weather and wore it with heat tech leggings underneath, you couldn't even tell I was warm AND chic! Thanks RTR!

Comfortable and super easy to wear! Because it's winter, I paired it with a black thin turtleneck underneath which also helped with the very slightly large arm holes. I chose black stockings and sock booties, but easily could've done my black cowboy boots for a little extra! They didn't send me a belt so I wore my own and loved the look!

I wore this dress for Christmas Day. Very high quality, heavy sweater material that makes it appropriate for colder weather despite being sleeveless. I was thrilled to be able to wear this longer dress dress despite being very short -- note I did wear high boots to make it do-able though. Endless compliments!
Rented this just because but took it on vacation. Enjoyed the mod belt detail and overall flattering cut. Not for warm weather though...hence, pictured here by the ice machine.
Very cute for the holidays but was expecting a bit more from this dress. The XS was not as tight as I expected.

This is a great dress. It's a sweater dress but skims the body nicely. Great turtleneck and the armholes are not too low and hide bra straps. The dress did NOT come with the pictures belt but I wore it with a vintage Pringle cashmere beaded sweater and my own belt. The length and fit and feel of this dress are lush, elegant and it has pockets! Swoon! Top 5 rentals so far.

Favorite rental to date, and will absolutely rent again!! Wore 3 times: once to work, once to a conference, once to a family event. Felt like a fall/winter goddess each and every time. Paired with my own black Gucci belt (instead of provided cream fabric belt), black over thigh suede boots (perfect for knee length front slit), black spandex slip underneath (smooth everything out & provide coverage at Large arm openings), and gold vintage Chanel jewelry. Can't wait to rent again!!

Beautiful beautiful dress! I switched out the belt it came with for a brown leather belt, but is gorgeous regardless. Runs long - had to wear with pumps - but I think that's what makes it so stunning. Definitely not for shorter ladies.
Really liked this dress. Only complaint was it was missing the belt. Arm holes were largely cut but this could be because I sized up because they did not have my normal size. I plan to order again!

Wore this around Boston. I was physically stopped by several people commenting on how good I looked and got a number of other comments through the day. I wore it with flats as a casual outfit. One drawback was that the arm holes are too large for me. If they were my size or I thought it was an easy fix I would have bought this dress.

links_reviews_title: Love, love love -- unique, stylish, comfy
links_reviews_text: Love, love love -- unique, stylish, comfy

links_reviews_title: Flattering easy to wear transitional outfit.
links_reviews_text: Flattering dress that wears like a jumpsuit. Easy to wear and will be a great transitional outfit from summer to fall. Even on a 100 degree day, this outfit did not feel too heavy or warm. Felt very chic. The one negative is the armholes are large so I wore a camisole underneath. Next time I rent, I will go down a size.

Ordered the wrong size. Should have rented either the LR or M. XLR was way too big in the arm holes and even with a belt couldn't be made to look like it fit. The material is heavy sweater material and stretches down with the weight of gravity as you wear it.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy dress for summer evening event!
links_reviews_text: Got a ton of compliments on this one. Didn't love the placement of the slit (kind of awkward), but overall a good dress. The fabric stretches so you can bank on it fitting well (enough) for whatever event you've got.
Very comfortable, runs true to size but the arm openings are large and require a sheath.

links_reviews_title: Armholes very gape-y, kind of saggy
links_reviews_text: Rented this to wear for an engagement shower, but ended up not. The arm holes were too big, you could see my bra :( ended up not wearing

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Just did not fit me right.
links_reviews_text: Really great dress.
Lovely, well-constructed perfectly for transitioning weather. I threw a denim jacket over it with brown Celine boots & gave off Santa Fe vibes. Would def rent again.
Loved this dress. Great fabric and fun cut, but the size I got was way too big. Hoping I can still rent it in a smaller size some time.
This dress is a high quality knit that hangs beautifully. As the other reviews say, that arm holes are large. But not insurmountably so. Gorgeous dress. Would definitely rent again!
Wore this to a friend's baby shower, and got a lot of compliments. The fit is pretty fitted, but flattering. Runs true to size and great for curves

I thought this dress would be a totally different material. It looks like a sweater rather than a pretty think material. The color was also not ivory, it was more of a dingy off white. The dress ran huge and didn't really do my figure any favors. I'm really bummed because I'd been eyeing this dress for weeks. It ended up being very frumpy.
I would say the dress runs large, but I mistakenly ordered the large when i'm a medium. Aside from being a bit big (my bad) it totally comfortable. Will prob order again.

links_reviews_title: Long, great flow and fun slit.
links_reviews_text: This is a nice cotton knit dress with great styling belt and awesome slit. I thought it was a jumpsuit, but the slit long skirt makes it even better.

links_reviews_title: Little bit wide on the bottom for me but it is a unique dress and I liked it. Material is thick.....
links_reviews_text: A little bit big toward bottom

links_reviews_title: Cute fit. Arms holes are revealing.
links_reviews_text: The arm holes were pretty large and revealed too much side boob for me to wear without a jacket. Cute fit- did not accentuate big hips as many woven/knit dresses can. Wore with a leather jacket.

The dress fits great. It is very comfortable. The only thing to be careful about is the arm holes are a little large, so I could not wear a regular bra with it. I switched to a strapless, which was much better, but still showed a little bit. I did wear a cardigan with it so it was fine! Loved this dress!
The dress is cute and style as expected. Note it's a bit darker than the photos from RTR, not ivory but more like an oatmeal. It seemed a little used, but still wearable.
This dress is so pretty and comfortable. Fits true to size. Has pockets. Received tons of compliments. Definitely wearing this again before sending back !

I loved this flannel and will rent again. Great quality, a bit oversized, and perfect for tucking into denim or skirts. It did fit a bit snug around the hips so I wouldn't have been able to wear untucked, but it's rare I wear shirts that way anyway so it worked well for me!

links_reviews_title: Runs big, worked well open and with arms rolled up.

links_reviews_text: Really soft and cozy, but still polished. I didn't love how long it was, so I wore it either tucked into high waisted jeans or tied at the waist.

It was too big on top and too small on bottom so I tied it at the waist. Very warm fabric. I like the pocket detail; how they turned the fabric so the lines go diagonally. Cute and wearable but not perfect for my body type.
If you're in between sizes, size down. It's baggy and comfortable, but quite long. It's not a standout piece but it's high quality and looks nice with tight jeans and heels.

I rented this for every day but wore it to work on a casual day. It is extremely comfortable. Fit true to size. I would consider purchasing but it is still very expensive even with the discount. Great shirt.
It was a bit boxier, but just make it more casual and easy to wear. Wore it with the french tuck with jeans and chucks. Loved it!
True to size. Roomy. Stylish. Fun.
I wore this shirt open with a tank top , jeans, and short brown boots. Perfect casual outfit.

links_reviews_title: I'm in love with this shirt. If I could afford it, I would buy it now. Love the cut, feel and look.
links_reviews_text: Roomy but flattering fit, so soft, and nice look.

My husband kept telling me how much he liked this on me. I wore this top to work, out to dinner, to a party, and church. It was really comfortable and appropriate for cold weather but I didn't look like a lumberjack

links_reviews_title: Cute and cozy, too big to work
links_reviews_text: Soft and comfy, but it was just too big for my frame. Should have sized down, but it wasn't available. Would rent again in smaller size.
Boxy. A little big for sizing.
Overall was way too big. Baggy in the shoulders, arms, waist and too long. Material and quality of the shirt was very nice, though.

links_reviews_title: Warm and cozy but just ok fit
links_reviews_text: The fabric is super warm and cozy and I wore this top twice. My issue with it was that it was little narrow and too long.
I loved this shirt and plan to wear it multiple times. The fit was perfect and the sleeves were actually long enough for my arms! The fabric was incredibly soft and warm, too
I wore this a few times while I had it. Comfortable, good quality

links_reviews_title: This is a flannel shirt. I didn't even wear it. Returned it right away.
links_reviews_text: Runs very large. No shape to it. Its a flannel shirt....

links_reviews_title: Great flannel for the start of fall
links_reviews_text: Loved the feel and color of this flannel, it is a great quality piece. When buttoned it was a little long and tight around the hips but tucked in it looked nice. Looking forward to wearing this a few times while I have it!

This shirt is incredibly well made. The material is a bit warm, so it may be better suited for colder seasons, but overall, it's the perfect piece to tuck into high-waisted jeans or a skirt. Planning to buy this shirt!
Classic shirt. Comfy, oversized look. It's very long, so I tied it in the front.

links_reviews_title: Love this. Nice long length. Wore twice with grey pants.
links_reviews_text: Is black and white. From the photo I thought maybe there was navy or dark green in it. But it is black-and-white only but I really liked it

Lovely shade of blue 💙 Was strongly recommended to me by some other renters. Pretty Bow details on the sleeves. Classy length with buttons down the front. I maybe could have rented the 4, but I went with the 6 because I have big arms and muscular back. One of my favorite rentals. Will rent again!
This was a great dress for work, and it fit well. I wore a size larger than my usual size, so it ended up being a great fit.
Hands down my favorite rental so far. So elegant and classy. Beautiful thick fabric. The huge bows on the side of the sleeves are TO DIE FOR!!!

I'd been eyeing this dress for weeks for an event, so when my size became available I ordered it (without a backup size available) & I'm so glad I did. It was comfortable and very professional. Endless compliments. If I could buy this, I would.
The large bows on the sleeves and the hint at a business suit made this an interesting dress. The fabric is denser and pulled down the neck line. The look is classy and a little 80's.

links_reviews_title: Perfect bit of color for a business formal meeting!
links_reviews_text: Confession: I HATE wearing suits. But this dress was the perfect compromise. Business professional but so much style and class. I probably could have worn the 8, but I think it may have gapped at the buttons when I sat down, so the 10 was the right choice. Beautiful blue that's not too "out there" for business but still let's you stand out. Will definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Amazing professional dress that stands out in a crowd
links_reviews_text: Wore to a conference for work and got so many compliments. Was in the dress from 7:00a to 10:00p and felt comfortable all day. Bow details on sleeves were super cute! Was a little low cut but I pinned it and it worked out great. I sized up but probably would have been okay in my regular size.
Absolutely loved this dress for a work function. It definitely runs on the smaller side and the buttons make it so that sizing up is helpful. Would absolutely rent again!

Gorgeous blue wedding-perfect dress. The fabric holds a press and its shape even through packing and travel. The color is soft yet bright. Although I found it large for a size zero, there is absolutely no give or flexibility in the fabric. I would recommend this for work and formal settings.

This brand runs small so i sized up and it was great since it's fitted. Thick luxurious fabric. Amazing color. Multiple people told I was the best dressed person at the conference. True to photos. Went right at my knees and I'm 5'11". So comfortable. A pin to keep the top closed was necessary for professional situation. Great for plus sized ladies! RENT THIS NOW!!

links_reviews_title: Odd color and Hard to pull off
links_reviews_text: Definitely something of a particular style. I didn't think it suits me, and the color and material makes me look large. Glad I gave it a try anyways
I don't usually wear sheaths (being pear-shaped) but the distinctive sleeves balance the hips. Low-cut, May want a camisole.
The color and the fit are fantastic. Details of the sleeves make the dress! Despite a relatively light color the dress is sliming. Perfectly timeless!

I got so many compliments on this dress that I didn't want to send it back. The baby blue is a beautiful color and the fabric is rubber and thick enough to be flattering. It is really low cut, so you're going to have to pin it if you're wearing it to work or wear a cami. The bows on the sleeves add a nice feminine touch to this suit dress.
I was told to buy this one- from my boss! It's just a great professional dress. The color is fantastic!

links_reviews_title: I mean what's not to love?
links_reviews_text: Love this dress. Paired with simple earrings and nude stilettos. I've been in it for 20 minutes and had two people stop me on the street to tell me how clean and lovely it looks. Professional and beautiful - just like you!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to the White House
links_reviews_text: This was a perfect daytime business choice. It was comfortable all day (though sit carefully to avoid stressing the bottom buttons) yet feminine and polished. I got a ton of compliments and felt right at home during my time on the WH campus. Regarding the bust: I wore a Uniqlo Airism bra with this for the cami effect without the bulk. This gave the perfect amount of modesty in the front and smoothed everything in the back. This would also be so pretty for a christening or Easter. I'll be thinking about this dress fondly for a long time.
Felt a teeny bit flight attendant but mostly I just loved it! It's thick so good for over air conditioned indoor summer wear. Get this and enjoy!

This suit dress was very pretty, but it does run a bit large. I was hoping it would be more form-fitting. However, it's perfect for the work place. I also really liked the bows on the sleeves. It was a fun touch. For more of my RTR looks, check out my Instagram @hannahkahn.

So, I can agree that the dress sort of loses its shape, and DANG, you definitely need a cami in this. I wore a slip and have a very small chest, and still kept fussing with the neckline. Looked hot though. No one said anything except compliments (except when I got home- husband didn't think I should have wore it) I'm usually a 2 in RTR, 4 in juniors, and I thought it looked great... but may have sized down if I was renting again. I've been waiting to rent this for months, so glad I got it!

Felt like a working lady powerhouse when I wore this standing -- got lots of compliments. Way less flattering when sitting though (obviously). If you're at your desk sitting alone, not a problem. If you'll be sitting in a conference room on full display, this is maybe not the best dress. Loved the color too!
Great color with a good bit of stretch
Love the color, well made. Runs too small.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love it, but worked well as a jacket unbuttoned
links_reviews_text: Love the style of this dress. But way to unflattering to wear as a dress for a city girl. It was better off as a jacket. Later in the day I accessorized with a monochromatic scarf and it was the ideal cool day outfit.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite dresses! Beautiful color, bows on the arms for a little flair
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. It is low cut so I wore a slip dress underneath. Wore this for an important work meeting in Paris and it was one of my recent favorites!

Loved this rental! Lots of compliments- was told I looked very "stately" and "senatorial," lol. Material is thick and has lines in the texture. Had to fashion tape the front down to keep everything in place. Was warm for a brisk morning- would be too thick for a hot day. No issues with this dress- all pros.

This is a perfect Carolina blue dress! I wear it for my husband's graduation and it was a blast. I was afriad if it is smaller than other dress but it is not snug at all. True to size or even a bit big. Material is quite thick. I felt a lil bit like Michelle Obama thanks to this wonderful piece. Thanks, RTR!

If you're looking for something to hug you better and you're a 6 I would drop a size. The material is extremely comfortable and flexible but it does loosen up throughout the day. Something I didn't notice from the pictures are the MASSIVE bows on each sleeve. I am NOT a bow person so that really surprised me in a bad way. Would I order it again though? Yes! It's defiantly flattering.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous and classic with a modern twist on Princess Diana glam!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a women's event at my church. The fit was great. The density of the material is perfect. The buttons stayed closed...it's cut a little low so I did end up pinning the collar. The elbow bow detail is so fun. It was a bit snug because I'm curvy but not in an overbearing way so you can wear it to any daytime event. I would definitely rent this again.
Birthday suit
Beautiful piece to elevate the average women's suit. Wore it to a national conference and got lots of compliments from friends and also strangers. The color is everything.

This was my first rental and I'm Thrilled. Dress runs true to size. Neckline plunges a little low but nothing s safety pin won't fix. Fabric had a slight give which helped at a sit-down event. Going back to find something nice for my next daytime party!!

Very vintage feel to the style and thick material. Actually rather low cut so I had to use a pin inside to keep it from showing too much cleavage. Sleeves are adorable. I felt like it needed a string of pearls which I don't own.

Wore this to a formal business dinner. Classic light blue dress. Color is slightly darker than in the online pic. A bit low cut but given the style it was easy to control with a little tape. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Professional and classy! My second time renting for work.
links_reviews_text: My second time renting this sophisticated and classy dress. I always receive compliments. Highly recommend.
I grabbed it from the store despite it being too big, because I really loved the color. Loved it!!!!

The dress does run small, and isn't great for bigger chested women. I love the fabric, it was not stiff but had a lot of give to it. Very comfortable. Great for a spring outing since it was a heavier fabric.
Runs small so I will size up next time, low cut but pin it and you'll be good to go
Beautiful & unique

These pants fit perfectly, except the waist which was tight. I didn't like how the shirt looked tucked in when the jacket was open, it was too tight. Otherwise I loved it. Not a huge fan on the pattern though, looked like dog hairs...

The pants were very roomy and the light material stretched out further throughout the day. I would definitely get a 6 if I rented them again, even though I'm a tight 8 in other Rebecca Taylor pants. I did have to roll up the hem to avoid looking frumpy, but it created a nice tomboy look and I got lots of compliments.
Was worried it might be a bit tight but fit perfectly. Perfect cropped pant. Would rent again and consider buying.

links_reviews_title: Awesome pants; great for work to HH
links_reviews_text: Arrived NWT. Fit well, not too long for my height w heels. Loved these! Almost bought them.
Perfect suit for fall! The pants are unlined and totally reasonable on unexpectedly warm fall days. The jacket is a bit boxier of a cut but not overly so. All in all, I highly recommend.
I really liked the fit of these pants, as I can have a hard time finding pants that don't gape at the lower back. They were comfortable and stylish. Would rent again
Great pants, too bad due to COVID-19 I didn't go into work much after all. Will definitely rent again once back going into the office everyday! Great length for spring or summer.
actually a really nice fit, but SO ITCHY.
These pants fit perfect and the detail on the side was very cute!

links_reviews_title: these are great subtle but interesting work pants. Loved them and will probably be getting again.
links_reviews_text: fit true to size
didn't know they are high waisted but liked them
Very comfortable and flattering.
Nice fit and true to size if not slightly roomy, so great if you are curvy.

links_reviews_title: Such a flattering pant post partum
links_reviews_text: I love this suit (strong recommend on the matching jacket). It's a powerful cut and so so flattering. Felt like a million bucks. I've rented it twice and will probably buy - if you need a traditional pant suit with a little pizzaz, look no further.
