I wore this for 2 weeks straight i think- loved the style, fit, quality, and pop of light pink faux fur was way out of my comfort zone but so glad i rocked it.

I wore a small. It fit well and was really warm. It's short, though, so it's not good for really cold weather. I would have liked it better without the quilting on the arms, but it's still lovely. The collar sheds a few little hairs throughout the day, but nothing too bad. I wore with skinny jeans and a band shirt.
I'm typically a 4 or 6 and the small fit perfectly. If you want a more loose fit then size up. The collar makes this coat warm. Tons of compliments.

I really liked this jacket. Its an over the top statement piece. Wore super casual looks underneath and popped this jacket on for an automatic upgrade. It had nice warm pink fur lining and each time i wore it people never failed to comment so i got to make the same silly "Oh, this is pink panther fur, its super rare" joke that killed every time. (They were drunk so jokes were easy) But also, i cant wear it ever again because its so obvious. But Thanks to RTR i'll just send this back and get something different.
Really cute and warm!

I literally took the tags off when this jacket arrived a few weeks ago, I cant part with it I love it so much. I guess I'll only have 3 unlimited spots rather than 4, cause im not sending it back until after winter! It's jusr TOO GOOD!

links_reviews_title: It was -11 degrees today, so I decided to cheer myself up by wearing this gorgeous jacket to work.
links_reviews_text: This is probably one of the most beautiful things I have ever worn. The soft leather jacket is a lovely navy blue and the faux fur collar is a soft baby pink. The lining of the jacket is also a fuzzy furry pink. It was a little warm wearing it inside, but I didn't take it off because it was so pretty and comfortable.

Shed pink faux fur everyyyyyywhere All over my pocket book, sweater, jeans, car and office Was unable to take jacket off bc my sweater was covered in pink fuZZ The jacket fit and color combo is adorable but returning bc of the excessive shedding
I'm usually a medium but the large fits perfectly, so I would say this runs a bit small. Warm enough for a cold New England winter's day. Beautiful color combination and comfortable.
So many compliments
Cute and unique. Loved it for work and a party.
A bit tight o pull in but comfortable once on. Material and cut are striking.

This top was perfect for work with a pair of simple cigarette pants. It was comfortable yet structured. My only complaint is that it is pretty boxy and hid what little waist definition I have. Other than that, it is a great way to diversify from dresses every day.
Fits true to size; has a defined waist but not super fitted. Nice layering piece for winter.
A little big in the waist. High quality and comfortable.
the design is pretty good, but runs big for me. it could be better if fits my body.
The perfect rental. I'd never buy this ensemble but I absolutely loved wearing it. Top is a little big and the skirt is a little big as well so you could size down. Very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Fun top! Love the fabric and print!
links_reviews_text: Great quality! Not super flattering but with a sweater over it for work, it was great!
This top is exactly why I do Rent the Runway. It's something different and fun. Really nice material but not something I'd wear everyday. Runs a tad big, especially in the stomach

I loved this shirt because it was structured enough to wear with or without a jacket. It is open higher on one side. I pinned it when I wore with suit pants but it didn't feel revealing when I wore with jeans since they were a higher waste. I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for work and after work
links_reviews_text: Excellent rental. Quality fabric and good cut. Many compliments. Black cami avoided other reviewers' issues with the slide slit and large armpits. Size was right.

I rented this top for the cold office. It kept me comfortable. It has a short zipper in the back and a long one on the side. The fabric and colors are very nice. the cut is outstanding and the more you wear it, the more you appreciate the details. I only wished it run smaller.

links_reviews_title: Nicely made shirt for everyday wear
links_reviews_text: I liked the fabric and feel of this top. Great quality. Only downside is that the base of shirt is wide and makes your hips look large than actual size.
I wore it to work. It was very comfy all day. It made me feel a little boxy but was still a great top.
The fabric and fit of this top are perfect. Heavier fabric, which worked well in my freezing office during the summer. Zippers at side and back. Comfort is my top priority, and this top nailed it.
#professional
Material scratchy. Nothing special.
Quality material, very fitted however I have a small chest. Would have purchased & kept if more affordable

links_reviews_title: Loved this top. So many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fitted and comfortable. Very sharp looking.

This was really cute and i wore it twice on different work trips with black pants and a long black cardigan. It's a very structured top and not particularly easy to get on and off, even with the zippers on the side and back. It looks really nice though and I liked the wrap detail. I'm typically an 8 in tops/dresses (10 in pants) and I wore a 10 in this top, so I'd say it runs a bit small.
Larger fit so go a size down. Lovely material and feels expensive!

Well designed, layered fabric creates flattering shape without being constricting. Zippers at side and neckline made getting dressed a breeze. Loose and comfortable fit. A winner, whether styled with black slacks or denim.
Loved the asymmetrical lines and perfect fit. Received lots of compliments. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Too tight and very tall slit
links_reviews_text: I am very long waisted and this didn't work for me. Too tight across the bust and the side slit showed my waist. Not a fan.
Fit like a glove and very well made. The fabric is thicker than it looks, but still make you look thin because it is so fitted!
Raw edges contrast with fitted style. Great designer unique.
Unique top got lots of compliments
Super unique top great for work or dinner, but need to size up!

links_reviews_title: Not good for some work settings
links_reviews_text: Snug fit, high side slit for work
Great for curves.

links_reviews_title: Very well made great fabric, website does not do it justice
links_reviews_text: Great piece might be a little to heavy for the south in the summer
Great shirt, slimming and got many compliments. Only thing is the lining around the neck kept popping out on the sides but i am up walking around a lot at work.
Will rent again, really liked it! The zipper was stuck so it was trick to get on
Tight, hot, under collar material was showing out the top.

links_reviews_title: Nice to pair with black skirt or pants
links_reviews_text: Great for work, easy to wear. Heavy material.
Comfortable and stylish. A bit heavy material and has slits on the side but didn't show stomach with a high waisted skirt
Well fitting top but it has a high slit on one side, making it tricky for the office. Still might wear... with high waisted pants only.

links_reviews_title: Paired this sleeveless sweater top with a pink leather jacket. Verily nice!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric. Back and side zipper makes this fitted piece easier to remove.
I am obsessed with this piece. It is beautifully made and incredibly flattering. I got nearly a dozen compliments!
Pros: unique, cool design, flattering, work appropriate but chic Cons: a little tight (could've gone up to a 4 for a more comfortable fit), zippers had seen better days

I am totally in love with this jacket and really wanted to buy it, but I couldn't justify the price. I wore it for about a week to work and out with friends, etc. I love that it's gray so you can't see the lint on it and it didn't leave lint on my black pants either!!! Win, win! The arms were a tiny bit snug, but I have broad shoulders.

Wore this coat for engagement photo session in February (probably about 50 degrees out that day) and it kept me warm with a chunky sweater underneath for a few hours. Loved the way it looked and would definitely rent again!
Perfect coat for a weekend in New York. Wore it over black leggings and a black sweater-perfect!

links_reviews_title: Unique style. Wished it was warmer
links_reviews_text: I rented this for an outdoor wedding in Portland during the spring. The wool is not as thick as I had expected and it wasn't as warm as I had hoped for but the style was amazing. I got many compliments. I wish there were belt loops to hold the belt if I didn't want to tie it closed. I had to fold the belt and put it in my purse or the coat pocket if I didn't want to tie it closed. The fit is supposed to be slim and form fitting so it was a little tight over the winter sweaters I had worn under it.
Classy, gorgeous, and stylish!

links_reviews_title: Would totally buy at higher discount
links_reviews_text: I LOOOOOVE THIS COAT! It is perfect. It's simplicity makes it versatile and elegant. The wool is thin but this kept me very warm during one of the coldest winters on record in my city. The only complaint I have is that the 'belt' doesn't stay taught but as long as you are not standing and sitting repeatedly, it is not a big deal. Also, I liked that there were no belt loops in case I wanted to go with an open look, but others may not like this feature.
The coat wasn't delivered with the belt, but I still liked it. I ended up using my own belt. I wore the coat twice - dressed it up for work and down for a get-together. Loved it both ways!

Wore this throughout the day to be comfortable and it was great and still looked dressy enough for an evening program we attended without being able to change. The Small wasn't available and would have for better on me but the medium worked well enough.

links_reviews_title: Worn this several times and received numerous compliments!
links_reviews_text: Very cozy and flattering
You could wear this this jeans, or dress it up for a more formal occasion. The fit is so flattering!
Fun change from puffy coat season. Not SUPER warm. Sleeves and overall length a bit long for petites but doable.
Lightweight material
fit as described

links_reviews_title: Was the ultimate fashion and function, for me! Very cozy and loved the material.
links_reviews_text: Pros - great fabric and comfortable.

This jacket is great for fall (wine tasting, beer garden, pumpkin patches). It was chic and flattering (enough room in the shoulders) and perfect if you're doing something that requires you keeping your jacket on. I received a lot of compliments on it and I loved the contrast. The wool is a little itchy, but its warm and light weight. However, the belt is not attached - so be sure to double knot the tie!
Comfortable and warm. I got a lot of compliments at work.

links_reviews_title: Paired well with white pants and grey suede heels
links_reviews_text: Run pretty true to size. I'm 5'2 and this was a perfect Long trench coat type of look.
I liked this jacket, it fit well when tied and looked nice.
hem-less, felt like material makes it look sloppy
I had to return, too itch and uncomfortable on my skin
Flattering snug fit. Collar is amazing! Best worn with a light T-shirt style layer underneath.

I wore this coat regularly all winter long in the Pacific NW, where it's never too cold to get away with a light wool coat. It was soft & comfy - I never wore the belt - just let it swing open & it was great. Almost decided to keep it, but have learned that I kept last year's coat, and never wore it this year! there's always something new to rent at RTR.

Had rented for a work trip. The belt isn't attached, so I was worried about losing it, or losing out on the versatility of wearing it both open and closed. Would consider again when then weather cools again, but maybe not for a trip.

I rented this coat to wear throughout my monthly update in the winter weather. While it is warm, I would still layer underneath with long sleeves if its very cold outside. I received so many compliments on this coat. I had read in other reviews how the belt was missing, and when I received mine, I didn't see a belt either, but that didnt stop me. (The coat is still amazing without it an it does have a top button to keep it kinda together if you want). HOWEVER, when I went to send my clothes back, there in a little black pouch in the mailing bag was the BELT! So if you rent this coat and don't see a belt---CHECK THE SIDE POCKETS! Regardless--would rent again and highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Cold, and rainy weather in NYC.
links_reviews_text: Sophisticated, sheik, warm sweater wrap to layer underneath your coat. This piece is itchy so you must, must, must... wear a thick long sleeve shirt underneath. Or you'll be itchy all day/night.

links_reviews_title: This jacket is incredibly warm, making it a great transition piece from winter to desk to dinner!
links_reviews_text: I did not receive a belt, which would have been helpful for the sub 20 degree days. The wool is kind of itchy, so I recommend wearing with a long sleeve shirt underneath to avoid irritation. Have received tons of compliments!
This is a great winter coat in Seattle, which is typically 30-40 degrees F. Went great with all types of outfits.
Nice color but itchy

links_reviews_title: Beautiful coat that goes with many outfits. A little itchy on the skin.
links_reviews_text: Fit is slightly large, but works well if you change the jacket collar. The material is a bit itchy/scratchy on the skin. Otherwise, I'd give it 5 stars.

Obviously youll probably be wearing a long sleeve shirt underneath this coat, but it is quite itchy. It also didnt come with the belt because the person before me forgot to return it, although it still looked nice without the belt. I wouldnt rent again, but cute coat.
Have been wearing this every cold day in early fall. Great for layering. Tons of compliments love the color and simplicity.
Wore this on a trip to NYC in october. It fit great, but if i was planning to wear it with a sweater, i would order a size up. Very cute. Got a ton of compliments in NYC.
Easy to style, beautiful fabric, easy to style up or down! Comfy!!!

Originally rented this for Spring Break trip to Arizona but Covid 19 changed everything. Was planning to wear w skinny jeans or spanx leggings. Instead wore to have dinner in my backyard in Miami! Wore a tank under since the arm holes are big. Was a little warm for Miami but I loved it so much. Great quality!!

links_reviews_title: Cute work and evening blouse. Fit my 16 week belly

links_reviews_text: Nice casual piece to transition into fall. Heavy weight. However it runs large. Does not give the body shape. Cute and casual
Warm, thick fabric, and super flattering with a pair of leggings or skinny jeans. Got compliments alllll day. Considered buying it
Fit is accurate. Unfortunately color and cut reminded me of a sack of potatoes. Really comfortable and soft material. Fine running errands in but wouldn't wear to work.
Baggy. And if you are short almost looks like a mini dress

links_reviews_title: The fabric is heavy and thick, but lays nicely, doesn't wrinkle and is soft/comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'9/130 pds so I prefer slightly over-sized garments that hang nicely, and this one fit the bill. Looks great with dark jeans, work clothes or under a winter jacket/sweater.
This sweater poncho was extremely comfortable and a nice change up in style for work. I received a lot of compliments and it's a great fall color.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear , easy to style
links_reviews_text: Cute and got compliments

I would consider this more of a sweater dress. I am 5'6 and with leggings this was not very short. It also looked cute with tight jeans but always covered my butt. It's comfy and oversized. I really liked it and got lots of compliments! Yes it's nothing too special and I had to style is up a little with a belt but I thought it looked pretty cute without- oversized and baggy, with leggings and cute boots. I enjoyed this piece, simple but stylish! Super comfortable

Don't believe the sizing that an 8 is a large. I'm an 8-10 and the large was huge. I tied the oversized hanger loops inside the sweater to cinch a "waist". Otherwise the material, style and color are totally on point- I will rent this again in a medium.
Beautiful top! I wore for work and will likely wear with jeans too.
True to size blouse with a length slightly above hip bone ( 5'6 height). Lightweight fabric

I rented this for work and wore it tucked into a black pencil skirt. I loved the way the bow tied in front. The neck was low but the bow stayed in place so it wasn't too revealing. The sleeves are very poofy but I think they looked cute too. Definitely wrinkled a bit by the end of the day but that wasn't a big deal

links_reviews_title: Not a good shirt for work
links_reviews_text: I was surprised when I received this top - it didn't look anything like the pictures. The shirt was extremely low cut and the tie didn't really hide that. This shirt would be fine for a night out, but I rented it to wear to work, which it definitely was not appropriate for. It was a cute top, just not what I expected.
Loved the fit! Got so many compliments!
Wore a few times. Dressed up or down. Super cute. Love the option to tie neck area into a bow or leave loose.
Love this sweater! Turtleneck is loose enough so it's not restricting or itchy. Great length and fit! Definitely rent for everyday wear

I rented this sweater with the intention of wearing it on Valentine's Day and now I can't get enough. It's so cute in person, the material is very comfortable and the neckline + sleeves are both super flattering! Would definitely suggest sizing up 1-2 -- I usually wear xs and rented a s, but honestly could've gone up to a m if I wanted it extra flowy.
Nice sweater, but I'd prefer that the sleeves were normal length. They are not 3/4 either. The fit is short at the waist and boxy too. Color combination is really nice.
This looked so cute with jeans and boots (not pictured). I found the sleeves to be a little short but overall it was comfy and stylish and was a classic winter piece

I'm surprised none of the RTR info and other reviews mention how wide the sleeves are. They are double normal width even at the cuff! That looked crazy at first but I tried it on & rolled the sleeves up; decided that it's a feature, not a bug. Gives a twist to what otherwise is a very traditional looking sweater. I'm between 16-18 and ordered the XXL. If I rented again would try one or two sizes down as it is already oversized and feels like it loosens up over the course of the day.
Great oversized sweater. Wore with blue jeans and boots. The only downside was the neck was a little itchy and the sleeve are extra wide so keep this in mind when reaching over a plate full of food!
I wore this sweater on thanksgiving & it was perfect. It was thick, a cute pattern, and festive colors.
Love this sweater! It was a little short in the arms for me, but otherwise excellent
Loved the fit, the weight, and the design
Super cozy!! I looooove the fit of this sweater. If Madewell creates this again in different colors and solids I will rent them. Love this fit.
Beautiful sweater! Love this brand!!
I'm not sure if there was something wrong with this sweater or if it is just extremely cropped. It looked like it was for a baby! Size up!
I seriously considered buying this piece as I loved it so much! Super comfy, love the pattern, and it was super warm for these cold northern winters. Great for petites, too, as it is quite short.
I loved this sweater! I could have used an XS but the S worked just fine. (120 lbs, 5'4") I loved the pattern and the style. It was nice and warm but not itchy at all.

links_reviews_title: It was very thick, laid a little strange on me. Felt short all around and i am short.
links_reviews_text: It was very thick, laid a little strange on me. Felt short all around and i am short.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work on a cold-ish day in December
links_reviews_text: Very warm sweater! The sleeves are quite wide which makes them easy to push up. Without that I wouldn't have been able to wear this inside at all. Very cute and soft.

Typical high quality from Madewell. I've found myself reaching for this again and again over the past few days - to go to the movies, to go to church, etc. I'll probably wear to work this week as well. I haven't worn a cami underneath, and I don't find it itchy. Nice and warm!
Flattering, high quality, great top!
Great option for a work blouse.

Loved the print and fabric. Nice neckline and sleeves. It works well with my cool rosy skin and clothes already in my closet. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that it's pretty cropped and I had a hard time keeping it tucked in, despite my very high waisted trousers. It worked well under a buttoned blazer.

links_reviews_title: Great print and color palette and easy to wear. Another hit by Parker!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fabric and the pattern. Overall it has a billowy feel. The XXL was a bit oversized so next time I'd likely go with an XL. I wore a pink camisole under it (that coincidentally matched perfectly) because it was a little low cut for everyday daytime-wear. I wore it tucked into a pair of jeans for a casual look, but it can easily be more dressy if worn with a suit or skirt.
Perfect top very flattering

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors and pattern. Very versatile!
links_reviews_text: The fit was a bit wide so I tucked the front.
The sleeves were too long and the cut too low. Bummer, because it is great otherwise.
Loved this top. Wore to work with black pencil pants and a weekend brunch with jeans. Fun colors and feminine.

The colors are very pretty but the top was very loose fitting. I needed to wear a tank underneath and I preferred it untucked. The material was too flowy to roll the sleeves so the cuffs stayed buttoned.
Fits fine, a little low in the front for my taste but I used fashion tape to hold it in place. It's a pretty basic top but I like it.

links_reviews_title: Super cute pattern and great easy flattering top!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a casual couple's shower! Very comfortable, great material!

I adored this top and was able to get several wears out of it for work due to its versatility. Tucked in with belted jeans, untucked with black leggings, paired with a suit, etc. The colors were beautiful but not too memorable and the top was very comfortable. I likely could have sized down but with my height (5'9") the sleeve and overall length of the medium fit without being too baggy or low cut.
Pretty
This was more vibrant in person. The colors are great. The shirt was easy to wear as a basic top, but the colors made it fun.

links_reviews_title: Not something I'd buy, but fun for one time
links_reviews_text: It's a bit thin, but flattering enough as long as it's not skin tight. The pattern is fun but conservative.
Medium-weight fabric. Not much stretch to it. Nice, subtle houndstooth pattern with black, tan/beige, and a light pink. Velvet-like trim is a nice touch.

links_reviews_title: Very cute for a winter work conference
links_reviews_text: Really liked it! Fits true to size.

This dress is super cute, well made, and has a classic style that I love. It was very fitted -- I things tailored, not tight. It fit, bit was a little too snug for my liking. I'd recommend sizing up for this dress. Disappointed I wasn't able to wear it.
Right across the hips and bust, loose in the waist. Not a good fit for pears. Wouldn't rent again.
Wore for a job interview. Great fit and great length. Wrinkles when you sit for a while.

I absolutely love this dress. It fits great and is very flattering and comfortable - the material feels nice and thick, and it's lined. The high neck and houndstooth pattern made for a refreshing change from the solid color a-line dresses I typically wear to work. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress, but a bit short
links_reviews_text: Like the double lining and style. Got a lot of compliments. Slightly short for taller people though.

Very nice dress, have worn styled with boots and jacket and as pictured with heels. Easy one and done piece for work. Details, like the mock collar and velvet trim make it feel special. A good rental!
Cute dress but lacks weight and seems like a cheap quality. Wrinkled at every spot it could throughout the day.
Fits well. Good with black tights and a black blazer for work

links_reviews_title: Cute but puffs out in stomach area
links_reviews_text: Wore this to work and paired it with a cardigan and thin belt. Material is thin, comfortable but not stretchy.
Great fit and this dress really perked up with a black belt and some animal print shoes. Perfect for work and drinks after, too.
40inch bust, typically a 10 but took a 12 which fit nicely. Shows a little too much armpit though, see my picture.
Flattering fit. Loose enough and long enough for work but with a cut that shows off the waist. I received so many compliments on this dress.

I love the way this dress fit, very flattering cut and the skirt makes it playful! The border is a soft black velvet material which makes it a great fall transition piece. The neck fold thing is kind of weird- it looks like the collar is just folded awkwardly on itself instead of purposefully pressed. Still gave it 5 stars for cut and comfort!
I liked the structure of this dress, feels very tailored. Runs true to size

links_reviews_title: Worked well for cold weather with shirt underneath.
links_reviews_text: Form fitting for curvy figure. Just right!

links_reviews_title: loved the look & feel. Great mid range between casual & formal
links_reviews_text: overall great fit

links_reviews_title: Great work dress! Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_text: Super flattering and classy. Great length for tall ones
It fit perfectly, form fitting and flattering! Perfect for work and I definitely would reorder!
Rented this for work and it was comfortable, flattering and fit very well. Would definitely recommend.
Flattering. Conservative. Design.
This dress is so cute and flattering. I loved it. I wore it to a conference

This is a cute everyday work dress but a tad short for my frame and conservative office. I wore it anyway because the high neck balances it out I think. Also wrinkled a lot at the waist and hip from sitting.
Nice professional dress

links_reviews_title: Beautiful & work appropriate. Fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: Great for petite frame. Good length, soft & warm sleeveless.
Tight in butt

links_reviews_title: Wore this for work--nice but not my favorite.
links_reviews_text: This is a nice work dress. Great length and not too tight, not too loose so it still gives you a shape. It wasn't my favorite piece but I still wore it to work one day and was very comfortable in it. I am 5'7'', 126 lbs and 34A and got a size 4. I think I could have done a size 2 but wanted to make sure it wasn't too short being that I have very long legs.

links_reviews_title: it was fine but not my style
links_reviews_text: It fit to size, was work and after work appropriate

I rented this dress for work. It has a zipper in the back and no side pockets. The collar is very interesting. I wore it all day and biked to and from work in it. Very comfortable. Colors are for fall/winter, but the fabric is light. I'll rent it again.

This dress is really cute and would've been perfect for work. Unfortunately I didn't wear. I originally ordered a size 8 but it was so small I could not zip it up. So I sent back and ordered a 10 but it was too tight to but cute or professional. I'm really sad not to wear this dress

links_reviews_title: Nice fabric but wrinkles like crazy!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size-if you have a larger bust or a stomach you'd like to hide, definitely not the cut for you. Fabric draped nicely but was wrinkled almost the instant I sat down. Definitely need a slim belt to help define your waist in the dress. I didn't have the large armhole issue that other people had, but they were a bit larger cut than the average size 12 shoulder.
I didn't like the feel of the material. It was a little tight on top.
Great for work

This was a great dress for work. It was very comfortable and fit nicely. I appreciated the black velvet contrast trim, as it made pairing it with black accessories very simple. I would rent this dress again.
I rented this for work. It was a nicely made dress and fit well. The fabric is heavy for fall or winter. I added a belt to it as it seemed a bit plain without it. I would rent again.
True to size professional but fun
Loved the fit and detail of this dress. Just wish it had pockets!

links_reviews_title: Hey everybody! Come and see how good I look!
links_reviews_text: So I rented this in my actual size 2 months ago, right before I had broken my ankle (3 plates and 8 pins needed). Luckily it came damaged so I had an excuse when I realized it wasn't going to fit me anyway. So when it became available again , I snagged one in a bigger size. This is seriously one of the most magical dresses ever. I mean, I can walk now!! Fashion ftw

links_reviews_title: comfortable, flattering and compliment receiving dress
links_reviews_text: #day-to-night

Once I figured out how to put it on I kind of liked it. Very boxy; however, I thought trendy looking and cute. Comfortable as I wore all day on airplane and walking around NYC. Could wear regular bra too.

links_reviews_title: Interesting one piece dress that looks like skirt and top
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much that I rented it twice this summer! The combo fabric has a stretchy knit underlay with woven and trimmed overlayer. Kind of feels sporty like a romper rather than a dress. Beautiful design with interesting elements but doesn't look at all fussy.

links_reviews_title: I got engaged in this dress!!
links_reviews_text: I almost got more compliments on the dress than I did on getting engaged. This is SO perfect for any occasion. Looks amazing dressed up or down and so comfortable!

Will definitely rent this again. It was so cute, flattering, and different!! Got many compliments throughout the day. It is a little difficult to get on but once you figure it out it's okay. LOVE! Would buy if it wasn't for the price.

links_reviews_title: This dress is super comfortable and I received lots of compliments. I wore it 4 days in a row.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. No pockets.
Fits true to size, good staple piece.
Fun dress and style, not too annoying to put together once I got the concept. A little short (mid thigh).
May try to wear this over the weekend but otherwise will send it back without wearing. At my height (a very average 5'6"), it's super inappropriate for work. It's cute but soooo short.
One of those dresses that makes you feel comfortable and cool. Great structural elements.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for an everyday, polished look for work or walking around on weekends.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress! As others have said, it's complicated to get on, but worth it. I found the zipper on the interior slip goes down further than expected. I like that this dress looks kind of like a set, and it tapers at just the right place. It's super playful and great looking, too. I'm going to buy it!
Rented for euro trip - comfy and great for walking without forfeiting style. Switched from sneaks to heeled sandals for day to night and it carried well. Would buy.
I was obsessed with this dress I wore it to like every occasion for a month and got so many compliments it's so comfortable loved it

Wanted to some sundresses for work and the hot NY summer. This was perfect. So comfy and very appropriate. I could have gone down a size, a bit of extra fabric that wasn't the most flattering, but I was so comfortable!
This dress is very well fitted for my body. Not too tight and not too loose. The style adds a fun twist to a ln otherwise simple black dress.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress to dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: Very cute versatile dress that can be worn with sneakers or booties. Love the layered look.
Fun piece - looks like two, a little complicated to put on. was boxy but not in an u flattering way. wouldn't reco sizing down as it is short
This dress took some figuring out to get in to. It was really adorable and I loved the fit!

links_reviews_title: Is long! So wear a belt and tuck if you're 5 feet
links_reviews_text: This was a lot of fun, I've never worn anything like this before. I def recommend

links_reviews_title: This dress is adorable! Perfect for work and play.
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove -- there is an inner liner that zips you in up top, synching at the waist. It's a good length for both work (I work in a casual office, but it could easily be dressed up) or play! Not too short, but still playful and fun.

links_reviews_title: Much cooler on and in person!
links_reviews_text: Almost like a two piece outfit, super flattering and different and much better on than the model shows.
I loved the way this dress looked on me. It was super comfortable and work appropriate while being different. It had a strong tendency to get wrinkled though.

Apparently the top and skirt parts of this piece can be separated, because my order arrived as a tank dress with thin straps and a poplin skirt. I think this dress might be cute if it arrived intact. Renter beware, particularly if you're banking on wearing this to a particular event.

links_reviews_title: Great structured dress, too short for every day
links_reviews_text: I found this dress to fit perfectly generally but the skirt is pretty short, too short for my comfort level. If you're 5'8" or higher, you'll prob find a similar issue. Otherwise v cool cut.
I wore this a work event where I wanted to look approachable but trendy! Nailed it! The fit is so different and unique!
I got so many compliments on this dress. I wore in the fall, with tights and booties. It's unique, flatter and sophisticated. I almost kept it. I'll definitely rent it again.
The side zipper was a little tough but it was cute and comfortable !
The dress fit for the most part I'm 5'8 but I'm super curvy so it was really short didn't get to wear it
I feel like I could throw this on for any sales meeting or personal day

links_reviews_title: Cute but took forever to figure out how to get it on
links_reviews_text: Loved the look of the dress when I was finally able to figure out how to get it on, but didn't end up wearing

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a concert and could not have been happy with it.
links_reviews_text: Love love love this dress! It does run small around the rib cage where the zipper is so I had to size up even though the length and fit everywhere else worked. Unique dress with cute stitching details.

links_reviews_title: Chic design - even my student commented on it
links_reviews_text: Incredibly flattering, could be worn as dress or wirhe leggings for work. Has nice structure. I will wear again for party

links_reviews_title: hard to get on at first but ended up being a great casual dress!
links_reviews_text: I sized up and it worked out great!
tight in waist so good for those wanting to accentuate that area
Liked the fabric, but I was swimming in it. I normally wear a 4, for it in a 6, but it was way too big all around. Maybe I'll try again in a 4 or even a 2 someday as I really loved the style

links_reviews_title: love wearing different kind of clothes! very fun piece
links_reviews_text: loved it! not a look for everyone but it fits perfect.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work, dressed up with heels but looked cute w white sneakers too!
links_reviews_text: Loved! So cute, received many compliments
The slip Underneath was super cute and fit perfectly. The top was just too boxy. I almost wish they sold the bottom Part separately!

links_reviews_title: Love the pattern but not the fit and material.
links_reviews_text: This shirt was really cute, but not on me. If you have bigger arms or broad shoulders, it is going to be tiiight. Otherwise, the fit was really nice and flattering. Be warned, the fabric wrinkles like tissue paper.
I wore this several times in Maui. It was great when we toured a farm, cute at breakfast and easy to throw on after the beach.

links_reviews_title: Cute but more casual than I expected
links_reviews_text: Need a dark cami underneath due to unlined eyelet fabric. Breezy and comfortable- faded into more of a soft navy than the picture online.
Unwearable. Cut outs on underpants area! More suited for a beach cover up. Shapeless and unflattering

links_reviews_title: Very very cute dress and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to meet my friends for dinner in Miami. It was perfect. It was different enough to stand out, wasn't too dressy and flattering. I'm always looking for dresses that curvy women with ample breasts can wear. This worked on me and would work on someone more petite. I wore navy underwear and my husband loved the fact that he could see some skin. It was subtle and not trashy. I wish I had a good picture of it. I would buy this dress.
The dress is very cute and flirty. However, I should have looked more closely at the reviews. I couldn't wear the dress because it was see through--the eyelets showed my underwear in the back.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress probably 4 times in the week I had it. So flattering and well made
links_reviews_text: The details were so cute. There are holes in the back so you need to wear dark underwear but that was the only issue
Flowy

links_reviews_title: This fit is very flattering! I can't tell you how many compliments I received wearing this dress!
links_reviews_text: It was a very flattering dress. Was cut correctly for a perfect fit. I'm tall and a bit curvy and this dress was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Perfect outfit for a welcome wedding weekend party!
links_reviews_text: Super cute airy black summer dress! Perfect for dinner parties. Make sure to wear Nude or black undies! The holes are not backed #partydress

links_reviews_title: Super cute with lots of detailing
links_reviews_text: Fits loosely, but very flattering! The cutouts do not have a liner under the drop waist, which was kind of a pain.
I am a size 6 and the size small fit me perfectly. Dress is fun, flirty and perfect for a hot summer night out.
Fit is weird. Concept is cute but a lot of ties on the waist. Did nothing for my figure.
Loved this dress. Perfect for hot summer days. Only problem was it is not lined so you need to wear a slip. All the eyelets show your bra, underwear, etc.
This dress is super cute and true to size. What I didn't realize is that the eyelet lace in the back and on the sides exposes your skin (on the torso- not the skirt portion).
I love Misa! but this is my least favorite Misa item that I have worn. It is too long and just fit weird. I did wear it but just didn't love it.
This dress is so cute for summer. It could definitely be dressed up or dressed down. The best part is being able to cinch in the waist as it would have been a little too boxy if I didn't do that.
Very cute but fits more like a size 2 than 0-00

It's super cute, but it's just way too big in general. Even with the side ties it looked too baggy and you could see my underwear through the back holes. It wasn't too long, but overall just didn't seem to flatter me at all. I would size down if I could but it seems to just run large

At first I wasn't sure. Runs large and needs to be styled. After doing a little front tuck, I ended up loving this piece! Received several compliments. Very comfortable material. I wore a small and usually am a size 4.
Oversized and super comfortable! I got a ton of compliments when I wore it. Don't size up, I wish I had gotten the large instead. I'm 5'5 and it was plenty long to wear as a dress.

Even in XS, this was enormous. But I loved the color and was determined to make it work. I wore it once belted with a snakeskin print skirt and once with vegan leather leggings, and I thought it worked well both ways. I didn't love the arm cutouts but they're not a deal breaker. I would probably rent again.

The first thing my coworker said when they saw this was "wow that's huge on you." I was only able to get the S because the XS always seems to be unavailable. It was pretty large but still draped nicely. I would have preferred a slightly smaller fit though because the elbow holes were at the wrong spot on my arm. Also the fabric was really nice. I'd rent again if I could ever snag the XS....

This runs MASSIVE. I'm between an M and L and ordered a small as that was all that was available. Two of me could have fit in it and it nearly came down to knee length on my 5'3'' frame. That said, i belted it to give it some shape and hike it up a bit and that did the trick. It's beyond cozy, the color is a beautiful deep olive green, and I want to live in it.

links_reviews_title: I'm in love with this sweater
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable. A little bit longer than I would have liked but the small wasn't available.
Really huge! But awesome and cozy with a front tuck. It's cotton, not wool so perfect for cool, not cold, fall weather.
Wore this while traveling in Scotland. I don't know if was the most flattering sweater but it was comfy and fun to wear.

If you like oversized sweaters that still have a bit of sexiness, here's the sweater for you! I loved the open arm slits on the sweater, which made it nice when I would get a little hot and made the sweater feel extra luxe.

I'm 5'11" with a long torso and could still pull this off as a dress. Wore it with leggings and booties too. Got tons of compliments and almost bought it. It's super warm, so it's great for the SF fog.
So comfy and cute! Received a ton of compliments! Wish I could have bought this one! Great for a casual day at office!

Very oversized, especially in terms of length - I’m of average height and it was nearly to my knees and without the rather deep side vents it could be worn as a sweater dress. As such, it pairs well with skinny pants and leggings, although I also wore it with the Marni printed sweatpants and felt super high-fashion casual. Although it’s large, it’s not very thick or heavy, so you won’t overheat or be weighed down. I liked the unique piecing together of the knitted parts. I wouldn't have said I loved it tbh, but I wore it 3 times in a period of 5 days so...

links_reviews_title: Love love love this oversized sweater
links_reviews_text: The elbow detail was very cute but subtle. Great for a day at work.

links_reviews_title: Love this so soft and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Loved this! Got so many compliments! Length was good for me to wear it as a dress but any taller than me I wouldn't recommend wearing without paints. Honestly if it wasn't still 310$ I would buy it! Looks like I'll just have to rent it again!
I rented this to wear with jeans and actually wore as a dress! I loved it!

This sweater is amazing! Oversized and soft with long comfy sleeves. There is an opening in the center of each sleeve! I absolutely love this sweater! I normally order large but am wearing a medium in this photo (I am 5'9")

So glad I sized down to the M. I'm normally a 10-12/L but the M was perfect. Very comfortable and well made. Edgy enough to wear for a date night but casual enough to throw on with sneakers and leggings.

This sweater made me fall back in love with oversized sweaters! I love the color, the warmth, the subtle pattern made it flattering not like most oversized sweaters. You maintain your figure and still have the comfort of a warm cozy sweater. Looks great with knits and high boots. Love, love, love !
Loved this sweater!! This sweater is VERY oversized (and meant to be) so size down. The green is color is stunning in person. Super warm and cozy. Got so many compliments! Perfect for winter.
Loved this sweater. It's cute and oversized. I could have got it in a small. Loved the look and it wasn't too itchy. Recommend

links_reviews_title: Get a size smaller because this sweater is super oversized with a nice high fashion neck
links_reviews_text: This is super cute just really big so I decided to wear it like a grunge look. But i do want to buy this shirt.

links_reviews_title: Super cute. I ordered XL but needed a large.

links_reviews_text: Literally the perfect sweater dress - long enough, thick and warm without being itchy, cool slit on sleeve, great color. I am contemplating buying and will def rent again. Looks great with black tights and booties. Work appropriate, loose and baggy without being bulky or unflattering.

links_reviews_title: Very rich quality sweater... the open elbows gave it that extra fashion element.
links_reviews_text: Runs large... I think I went up in size.... definitely don't do that.

I liked the sweater. It's very soft and comfortable. I typically wear a 4-6 so the medium was suggested and it was way too big. I tried it with a wide belt and tall boots but with the sweater's hunter green color I definitely veered into Robin Hood territory.

links_reviews_title: Oversized, comfortable, and a little quirky.
links_reviews_text: I could definitely have worn a Small in this sweater. It's a gorgeous color, has great design, but is a little interesting at the elbows. The cutouts are unique, but they turn around sometimes. Some compliments, but also some questions about what was up at The elbows. I liked it enough, so I didn't mind!

links_reviews_title: Great sweater but was really long i am tall it it fit more like a dress. Really loved the sweater
links_reviews_text: Great sweater but was really long i am tall it it fit more like a dress. Really loved the sweater
The sweater runs very big

This is a sweater for when you would rather be home in a blanket but have to get dressed. It is big, long, and comfortable. The open arm detail looks nice and interesting. I ordered true to size (M) but would try a S in the future. Enjoyed wearing it.
Runs very large, fit more like a dress. I'm considering trying the XS.

Runs really big, and the one I received was very worn. But I did wer it a couple of times because it is very comfortable and cozy. And the color is great. I wonder what mine was like before it was all stretched out...

Like others, I wore this as an oversized sweater dress paired with over the knee boots. I originally ordered this for a weekend in the mountains, but ended up wearing it for a cool spring day. The cut outs at the elbows are casually sexy. Slightly itchy at the neck, but nothing crazy. I wanted to purchase this so badly - I will definitely order again!
This is an oversized sweater and it's perfect. Great color, great details, great quality. I wore it over and over.
I'm 5'2 and I wore a large. It was a little TOO oversized for me but still totally cute and wearable. I LOVED IT! It's absolutely adorable and comfy. I am going to be renting this one again!
Cozy, great material, color - all on point. Loved.
I'm 5'7" and this went to my knees. My husband.. and both dogs could of fit in with me. Way big.
Size down. Runs big but really comfortable and trendy!
Runs big but is SUCH a cute oversized looked. Loved the arm cut outs. The color was perfect for winter. Was able to wear to work and then out at night! Great piece.
Big, comfy sweater for everyday.
Definitely runs big so go down a size. I wore it with skinny jeans and boots. Loved it. Very comfortable and stylish.

I rented the top and matching bottom to wear together for work (I live and work in Hawaii). It's true to size and very well made. I am not a fan of waist tied peplum type tops but when worn with the matching pants, it's cute. Cute rental.
This was super cute. I wore it casual with jeans and sandals out, then with slacks and flats for work. Many compliments both ways.

I rented both the top and bottoms for this set. Extremely comfy while still looking put together. Bottoms have elastic waist which helps, length is a bit long but I wore them as high waisted to avoid dragging. The top fit correctly and didn't gap in the boob area.
Beautiful top that is silky and lightweight.
I liked this a lot. It's a little short so I wore with higher waisted jeans

I wore this shirt to work, but didn't love it. I could have sized down to the XS, but I'm not sure that would have swayed me much. The cinched waist hit in a weird spot on me and there was just so much extra material to cinch in - this shirt did me no favors.

I wore the top twice since I have RTR Unlimited. I paired it once with jeans and once with the matching pants. Both times I left a few buttons undone. I did not like the top buttoned all the way up because it was not sexy enough.
Great and soft fit. Very flattering with the conch waist. Would rent again. Wore with jeans once and with striped pants another time.
This top is a little shorter than I'd like but overall loved it was great with high waisted jeans to pair of a casual outfit for the weekend. Material was so soft!
I worn this top with the matching pants and it's super duper comfy and cute. Got a few compliments too
more fun than a button down or T-shirt

links_reviews_title: Perfect transitional spring work top! Looked great with black skinny jeans and heels
links_reviews_text: I wore this versatile top as business casual in the office, the feminine touches were well thought out and made a simple outfit sophisticated!
So fun as pajamas, brunch wear, a cute top over athleisure leggings, etc! What a fun find

I rented the tops and bottom to the set. It was just a little too much pattern for my taste. Again, I am large busted so unfortunately I have to be really careful. This was a really cute look but the pattern from top to bottom with my girls made me look bigger. I ended up keeping the bottoms to wear with a different top and it made for a really cute, comfortable look.

I wore this set 3x! Twice w silver driving shoes and once out with white leather ankle booties. I got SO MANY compliments every time I wore this! And it is soooo comfortable like pajamas. Dressed up with curled hair and eyelashes this look is super chic and presentable despite its comfy appearance.
This top was a NO for me. Too small & short, tight across the chest, and the fabric was cling-y.

I rented this top because I needed some tops for work that would hide my bloat and weight gain. I got this shirt in a medium but bc my breast are getting bigger by the day, I couldn't button up the shirt. It also felt tight in the back and shoulders. I liked the shirt but I didn't look good on me bc I couldn't button it up and bc of my short torso. Loved the pattern and material but would need a larger size if I were to try it again.
Really nice and versatile top. The Large fit me perfectly! My midsection is my problem area and it helped mask it really well :-)
This was a nice top for a casual day at work. I wore with black slacks. It hits at the waist and the tie makes it more form flattering and less boxy
This is navy not black.
I liked the loose fit but definitely think the outfit would have came together more with the matching pants. With black pants, it looked very Hawaiian shirt-equse.
Paired with black skinny jeans. Can be dressed up or down. Perfect for work or date night to a trendy restaurant. I think it would be way too much with the matching bottoms.
Got lots of compliments, liked the cropped fit and peplum hem

links_reviews_title: A comfortable way to wear a statement piece to work!
links_reviews_text: I love this top, far more than I expected! It's very flattering on a curvier body, and it works incredibly well under a suit and by itself, if you need to remove your blazer. It's all incredibly comfy while still looking very stylish. An absolute win!
A fun blouse that moves easily and flatters my shape. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Paired with the matching pants--Got lots of compliments, and basically like wearing PJs
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a medium, and I am glad I ordered up. The fit in the body was fine, but the length is slightly short, if you are on the taller side. Very nice fabric.
Great for dressing up or wearing with jeans.
Super cozy and going to keep it so that I can order the pants.

This shirt is beautiful in person, but it runs too small. I ordered a large, and it just didn't have the oversized look this shirt needs for chesty women. It wasn't too small (it buttoned fine), but it was too fitted. The ruffle trim hit right above my waist, and just didn't look right on me, even with high waist jeans. I think this shirt is better for someone shorter and less chesty than I am.

links_reviews_title: Easy chic and fits like a dream
links_reviews_text: I needed some fun tops for on camera work and this piece was just such an easy win. A super un-fussy fit that really nicely drapes in a way that doesn't pinch or restrict like most blouses making it really comfy. The color + print makes it interesting without being too busy. The material is really lush and feels great on the skin. Really loved this pick. Think it would be a little much with the matching pants, but that's just me.
I just felt like I was walking around with a pajama top (although my husband said he liked it). I am a D Cup and the fit wasn't flattering either.
Super comfortable and cute - lots of compliments. I wore it with the it's matching piece.
+ unique print + silky fabric
Cute but fit a little big which I didn't love
This top was awesome, it just wasn't the right style for my body. It made me look boxy. The fabric, print, and quality were great though.

links_reviews_title: I don't usually look great in jumpsuits because I have a short torso, but this one worked!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and versatile!
So comfortable, versatile and pretty. I'm seriously considering buying it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and fun jumpsuit - received a ton of compliments & felt so comfortable all night
links_reviews_text: Fit really great. It was a tiny bit on the larger side, but I preferred that so I wouldn't have anything uncomfortable or too tight. Def need to have sticky bras as the sides cut low.

Wore this multiple times, and found it very comfortable, sassy, and fun. Needed a tank since it was very low cut on me. Would love to find a few more options that don't require a shell or tank for work. Hope to rent this again and highly recommend
It fit perfect and the pockets were a great plus!

I easily could have sized down this is very flowy up top if you don't have huge boobs. Hem tape would have been super useful but I forgot it, it was very busty as a result while I was dancing. But very fun for a early fall wedding!
Look comfortable and pretty! I really enjoyed this cloth. My size between 4 and 6, and usually I wear 6 size. but 6 size ran out, so I ordered 4 size, and it was fit to me.
Fit is great plenty of room to feel comfy and pretty. Lots of compliments too!

I wore this to a baby shower and received soooooo many compliments. I generally wear an 8 but the 6 fit me well in this. Across the back was a little tight (I have wider shoulders) and the waist was about an inch too high (I'm 5'11") but other than that it was amazing! You look polished but are still comfortable!

One of my most loved style post. This jumpsuit will look great on most body shapes. The tie front feature helps with fit. I normally wear a sz 2 but had to sz up to 4. This jumpsuit is perfect for any day-to-night situation. Pair it with a denim jacket for those breezy summer nights. You can wear any shoe style from flat sandals for a casual vibe to wedges or a heel.

Fit great, super comfortable and easy to get on/off during the ever-awkward bathroom trips. Got tons of compliments throughout the night. It was a touch longer than I expected, but it looked fine with heels. Very flattering over the stomach area - would def rent again!
I had to pin the sides so my bra wouldn't show, but it was worth it. I would 100% buy it if I had the ability. I LOOOOOOVED wearing it!

links_reviews_title: Having to pin the garment so my bosoms wouldn't spill out
links_reviews_text: I felt it was very roomy. The top in particular needed to be pinned. And the length was much longer than shown in the photo but maybe I'm just much shorter than the model.

I absolutely loved this jumpsuit! I went with the size 8 based on other reviews saying to go down a size, and they did not disappoint. Super easy to get on and off. I received several compliments. Also, it has pockets!!
This is such a fun romper. It's so soft and airy too, even on a summer day this was perfection.

I seriously loved this jumpsuit. The fabric was light and flowy, but the wrap around the waist made it form fitting. I wore a regular bra which worked except it showed a bit under my arms (as you can see in the picture), not a huge deal. The stitching at the chest was a bit frayed, so I had to reinforce it a bit so it wasn't too low cut - ultimately it was perfect. I received so many compliments and my friends wanted me to buy it. Would definitely rent again!
This jumpsuit was easy to wear and super classy. Easy to dress up or down.

This jumpsuit was a nice fit, was comfortable, and easy to wear all day, unlike some jumpsuits I have worn in the past. The only reason I didn't give it 4 stars is that the material wrinkles very easily.

Loved the material and how I could be daring without a long term commitment. I wore it several times, dressed up and down and even one day, all alone, working from home! It was very comfortable, breathable but not too chilly. I wore a tank underneath because it is low under the arms and the chest. Recommend!

links_reviews_title: Mother's Day at our friends' country club. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable. Low cut, but double-faced tape takes care of that! Longer than it looked on the model but OK with 3.5" heels. Ordered a 2 and a 4, and both fit. I didn't wrap and tie the belt in back, just knotted it in front.
I was swimming in this, it felt several sizes larger than it was marked.

Really liked the flow on this. Great material nice and light for a spring event. Only issue is taking it off to use the bathroom. It was also a little low in the front so I think some fashion tape or an under garment would have made it seamless.

links_reviews_title: The pattern and colors are very memorable.
links_reviews_text: Great fit! But, considering I was wearing it in more professional settings, I chose to wear a camisole underneath (as there is no good way to pin this across the chest). Comfortable, chic and an added bonus of POCKETS!
This outfit is so comfortable and absolutely adorable. Totally in love and it's perfect to dress down or dress up.
I was nervous about renting a jumpsuit but this outfit is amazing!! I liked trying the bow in front rather than in back. Super cute, definitely rent!!
Runs a size bigger than regular size.
Absolutely perfect! It's a great print and a nice fabric. It's also long-waisted enough to fit in the rise and was a great length. Slightly low cut.

I really needed size 4, but it wasn't available,6 worked just fine, as wrap detailing- can be adjusted to what you need& may be with 6 i got more dress effects on the jumpsuit, loved it , it look dressy - without trying to hard. Its wrinkles moderate, was static slightly at first

links_reviews_title: I am obsessed with this outfit!
links_reviews_text: If I could buy this, I would!! I loved everything about this outfit-it was super comfy and flattering. I am a size 4, but I wore a size 0 and it fit really well.

I rented this for a co-workers baby shower, and overall I liked it. My biggest complaint is that my bra showed no matter what I did. Mostly on the sides -- this jumpsuit is comply side-less, only the long tie wraps cover the sides and won't stay high enough to cover a normal bra. It's unlined and very thin fabric, so I wasn't comfortable going bra-less either. I wouldn't have minded with family or close friends, but wanted to be more modest for co-workers so I wore a cami under it, which was still cute. I ordered the 2 because my normal 0 was not available, and it was just fine because it wraps/ties around your waist, so if they don't have your size you'd probably fine with either bigger or smaller size.

links_reviews_title: It was way to big up top...you'd need to be tall, have a long torso and large breasts to pull it off
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and really wantd this to fit.

links_reviews_title: I love the fit and look of this jumpsuit/dress
links_reviews_text: I am long and skinny, and usually cant get rompers to fit me length wise. So was pleasantly surprised to try this one on and have it fit so well

links_reviews_title: Chest area was way too small. Definitely needed a tank top underneath it.
links_reviews_text: Cute romper, my pear body type didn't fit.

This is a very forgiving shape and would be comfortable on a number of bodies. The fabric is cute and drapes well. Also good for petites. I ended up not wearing it because it didn't feel like my style.
Fun colors. The tie and button made me be selective in when I went to the bathroom, but a fun wear.
I really loved this but the top was too big. I am going to order a size smaller and see if that helps. I love the pockets.
A bit low cut for a baby shower- but safety pin fixed that. Flattering waistline and super comfy. Probably cropped if you're tall- but hit the top of my shoes for me.
Wore this in the winter with a tan blazer but would have been better for summer. Tons of room. 16 weeks pregnant and I'm a regular size 12 and I could have sized down.
Size down when renting unless need for extra room in the bust. Waistline is stretchy and belt can be adjusted. I would personally try renting a 0 for future Kate Spade dresses.

links_reviews_title: I love this piece! It's unique and fun, and can be dressed up or down- and SO comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I wore it with heels for a wedding and it was perfect for dancing. Flattering cut - my only complaint is I wish the armpit were cut a little higher so that I didn't have to worry about taping it to cover my bra... but nobody's perfect, and the tape worked fine. I loved that this was so dressy looking with the flowing fabric but felt so comfy on. I could sleep in this, and honestly wanted to keep it for good.

I didn't like the sweater when I first got it. It seemed static-y and kinda stuck to my jeans. I left it out for a couple days and tried it on again. It seemed to lose the static and I wore it multiple times with leggings! The arms are super long so if you have short arms it may not work out well. Length was perfect, long but not too long.
Sleeves got in the way- kinda sheer but loved it wore it a few times
Cute, casual, cozy sweater. The bottom bells out so I tucked it in front. Runs large.
Loved this sweater and the softness of the fabric. Super cute sleeves which have to be rolled up if you're doing anything in the kitchen:) wore twice and got multiple compliments.
Nice sweater. Runs large. I wore the medium and you can see I could have gone with the small. The sleeves run long, but not cumbersome. I still can't believe it's a $400 sweater.
I really like this sweater. It's so soft and cozy. It's definitely oversized with very long arms. It's great for a casual Saturday!

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Wish I could buy it, but very pricey

links_reviews_text: Was asked by a friend if I had gotten it at Old Navy. Cheap looking and too big. Would size down.
The quality on this was not great. Very thin and see through at the top
A truly average sweater. Comfortable and fine. Layer a tank underneath, it's a little sheer.
Nice loose, cozy fit. Fabric was soft and not scratchy!

links_reviews_title: I wanted to like this... but
links_reviews_text: The sleeves flare out too much. It felt like a 90s sweater.

links_reviews_title: I loved this sweater! It's simple and perfect for fall.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were a bit long on me (I'm petite) but I know that's the style. The fabric is a bit thin but loves this with jeans and cute sneakers!
Didn't really properly fit over my pregnant belly- wouldn't recommend for maternity. Sleeves were baggy and long.
Nothing special. Fine sweater for running around. Not too heavy. Good for early fall or spring.

links_reviews_title: Good everyday sweater but sleeves very long
links_reviews_text: Sweater was cozy, sleeves as shown in model photo are long but were WAY long on me, hard to do much without rolling them up. I wore this sweater a few times and loved the color and stripes.
This is a very thin sweater but overall was cute to wear once and send back.
The lines looked blue online but they are green. It was great for comfy, everyday but nothing special
Felt stretched out and gave me no shape
Super comfortable and soft, loved the sleeves, fit as expected. I'm 5'9" and the sleeves were still long enough.

Wore this sweater multiple times, with jeans, leggings, flats, boots... you name it. Super soft, the sleeves are definitely long (as other reviews have mentioned). A high-quality, slouchy / oversized sweater. It's pretty thin, so a good transition item through fall and spring.
Great for lounging and doing day-to-day errands
Super cute over sized sweater. Very flattering and comfy. Mine did come with a small stain on it but wore it anyway
So comfortable and soft! Great bell sleeves! I'm a small medium but glad I got the M

Super comfortable sweater! I wore it with a tank underneath in cooler weather and it was perfect. The sleeves are a bit long like the pictures show and that's nice for long arms. Not form fitting - but hangs nicely.
Really cute and not too heavy but I wear a 10 but sometimes prefer a large and I should have got a medium for sure in this
The sweater was flattering and comfortable but nothing special. The arms were long and cozy but not too long.

links_reviews_title: Ended up wearing this dress as a shirt, but ended up loving it even more that way!
links_reviews_text: Was very tight on the hips so I had to wear it as a shirt! Definitely size up one if you want to wear it as a dress.
Fits baggy on top (chest + arms) while fitting a little tighter towards the bottom. Give it some shape by adding a belt
Loved this loose fitting dress. It was very stylish and I got tons of compliments!

This was my first coronavirus focused rental- rented intentionally for the virtual commute! Since I am social distancing I decided to elevate my virtual meeting attire. A metallic thread in this dress gave it extra oomph while the style was oversized and comfy. The only thing I didn't love was how it climbed to my leggings. If you have leather leggings though it would be PERFECTION (mine don't currently fit). Styled with black leggings and brown booties.

links_reviews_title: When I learned that one of my oldest friends would be in town...
links_reviews_text: ... I figured we would do the usual: see art, make chat, sip coffee. This dress seemed like a perfect pick. I wore it to school over a sheer-leaning tee and dark jeans, but kept it open. Other reviewers shared it might be too big on top and narrow on the bottom. It would have been fine over leggings or tights, but seemed to hang oddly over jeans. The wool and cotton blend was fantastic the perfect weight for warming weather. The plaid, shot through with metallic thread, was memorable.

One of my favorite rentals! This dress was the perfect combo of oversized, without feeling shapeless. I was able to wear to work, out for drinks, and running errands (with ankle boots). I would recommend getting your true size or going down one. It was larger in the chest area, but more true through the hips. Would have totally bought this if it wasn't too expensive for me.
casual to date night

links_reviews_title: Cute fabric but the cut was a miss
links_reviews_text: I get that this is supposed to be oversized/loose fit but the proportions still didn't really hit me right. Sleeves felt too bulky but short, and the shoulders/torso felt too wide. I ended up wearing it open over a black shirt/leggings like a long cardigan and it was ok. I really like the colors of the plaid and there is a subtle silver thread in it too. But overall not a favorite.
The material is navy and gold with a touch of shimmer.

links_reviews_title: Unique piece that is fun to layer
links_reviews_text: Unusual but cool top. Slits are too high on the legs to wear as a dress but it looked great with leggings and jeans. Sleeves end at a weird place below the elbow.

links_reviews_title: Laura Ingalls Wilder Meets Street Fashion
links_reviews_text: The collar itself is reason enough to try this dress out. Very comfy and has pockets as well. It's a perfect RTR - I would never buy but thoroughly enjoyed my time with it. People seem really averse to this kind of "shapeless" look but it's so well structured that I didn't feel the need to cinch it. I wore it with slouchy cable knit socks and brown hiking boots. Co-workers and strangers alike were all about it. Wore it out for a casual Monday dinner and to work as well.
This fit perfectly, wore with heels (made me 6'1") and the length was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, different, casual and dressy at same time.
links_reviews_text: I loved this. It can definately look a little pajama-like but i styled it with leather leggings and super high chunky black booties and really loved it.

links_reviews_title: the sleeves are 3/4 length and the slit makes it sexy but appropriate for work.
links_reviews_text: best worn belted with boots and tights.
Lovely dress and stylish . You need to be taller to pull this dress off. Little see through fabric but I am enjoying wearing it .
Fabric is a bit see through. Very thin and unflattering. No stretch. It made me look really awkward and frumpy
This didn't work for me as a dress - it was loose on the top and tight around the hips. But it looked cute as a shirt to go apple picking! I'd absolutely wear it in that capacity again.

This dress is a cool design, fits well and pretty colors. However, it has some sparkle into the fabric that makes it soooo itchy! I wore it with an old T-shirt underneath because otherwise would be unbearable to wear. I'm happy I could rent this dress and send it back because I would never buy it for myself.

links_reviews_title: Runs big, weird collar, strangely warm and rough to the touch
links_reviews_text: Runs big, weird collar, strangely warm and rough to the touch. Might be too warm for hotter days. There's a bit of metallic thread running through it which you might not be able to see from the pics. The texture feels like those taffeta pouf dresses from the 80's. Not flattering for my shape. It was just a big sack. I'm 5'3 and showed no flattering areas of the body due to the collar which seems to be designed to be closed.

This shirt definitely runs big, but paired with a cute bralette it is adorable! The straps are adjustable, but as you can see even adjusted to the smallest setting the shirt still hangs pretty low. I ended up purchasing because it was so cheap with my member discount, and I am already planning other outfits to add this to!

links_reviews_title: Love the color and the style!
links_reviews_text: The back of the shirt is super sexy, you need boobies for this shirt, it's low cut. The straps are adjustable, but still very low cut.
Wore this 4 times! I loved it. Flowy and comfortable

This top with the right bralette is absolutely adorable, the overall fit of this top is large and relaxed which I didn't mind for my vacation but I might size down if I were to rent it again, I did love the fact that this top has adjustable straps as well.

Super cute with jeans & some statement earrings! Loved the fit- peplum fell right over my stomach in the most flattering way. Back fell perfectly where it didn't show the back of your bra but was still classily sexy. Color was so unique I felt like a 10 all night long.
Great quality. Probably could have sized down but I'm super small chested. Had to wear swim suit or bralette under. Great quality but definitely more green than the pic
Very cute and fits perfectly.

I rented this as part of my Unlimited and may keep it. It runs pretty large so I may try to rent the Medium before buying. It is low in the back so your bra will show. I don't have the option of going braless so I just wore a hot pink one and let it show.
I really wish the straps on this cami were shorter. Even with a bralette underneath, it was pretty unflattering with how low it hung.

links_reviews_title: Cute with a cami or bralette.
links_reviews_text: The straps are super long even when adjusted but the shirt would work with a cute cami or bralette to wear under it.

I couldn't tighten the straps enough, so the shirt hung quite low! It might have worked with a bathing suit top, or a bandeau, but otherwise just didn't work. The color is also much more green than the picture!

Living in Florida and wanting to participate in fall colors can get tricky when it's still 90+ degrees out. This top was the perfect summer into fall top! Loved it! I paired with skinny jeans and sandals.
It was very long in the straps and not able to wear a bra without it showing.
I really wanted to like this but the straps are way too long.. there's no way to adjust them. I had to keep pulling it up all night

links_reviews_title: Shirt falls too low on my chest!

links_reviews_text: Love everything about this blouse!

Wore this during my lake vacation. It was very cute and looked great with shorts. The straps are adjustable but still felt they were too long for my comfort. I'm very small chested, but every time I leaned over even the tiniest bit, I felt like I was flashing everyone. I wore it for half a day, and then over my bathing suit.
Heavy material when wet, wrinkles easily. Cute color but definitely need a tank underneath
Love this top! Beautiful color, drapey but still flattering.
Came with a broken hanger and a few light stains. Cute shirt but ran a little too big.

links_reviews_title: such a fun blouse! felt sexy and carefree
links_reviews_text: absolutely loved this blouse for exploring DC - was really warm, so sweated more than planned, but none of it showed, and it was a breezy, so overall, I was more comfortable than I would have been. It was super flattering. I'm normally a small, but after readings the reviews, ordered an extra small - it was a little tight in the bust (and I am not large chested), so I would say this is more true to size.
Nice tank top for summer with a pretty back, but felt like it was huge on me. It's definitely got a more flowy look.
This top is so big!! I couldn't even wear it because there was just no way to make it work. Loved the color and the fabric, but the fit was way off.

This top was super cute & comfortable. The material is really good quality. It does run a little small in the chest area. I couldn't wear a bra with it and was fine; but noticed people looking at my chest all day.

The cut of this is awesome. Great for summer when you don't want anything close to your skin. So cute with a denim skirt or shorts. The only thing is that the color online looks more mustard-y and it's definitely more olive green in person. Worked perfectly for me, but if you'r looking for mustard, this isn't it.

Very cute and comfortable tank top that was perfect for a casual weekend. The color is really pretty and seemed to be slimming with the way the details are on the sides. I paired this with jeans and sandals and a light sweater and was able to wear it to lunch with friends and on a date to a brewery. Would definitely rent again, but probably one size down as it runs a little big.

This top is really cute but the fit wasn't right for me. I ordered the small because the medium wasn't available and the chest was too tight...but the straps were also too long (even adjusted to the shortest length) so the darts didn't fit in the right place.
Very cute. Only con is that the straps are long which it makes it pretty low cut. I had to keep pulling it up for it to not be too revealing, but it is cute and a great color.

links_reviews_title: Love it but not sure what bra to wear
links_reviews_text: Great quality material and good fit. The back comes down low so I haven't decided what bra I will wear with it.
Unique modern comfy. Looks sharp. Good quality.
This shirt is really cool and fun, awesome quality and just different. I really loved it. Pretty much looked as I was expecting. Fit right and was warm and comfortable with nice flex.

links_reviews_title: Longer than expected - but still amazing
links_reviews_text: Great quality! It was a little longer than I'd like but I'm 5'2 so I can't really complain.

Absolutely loved this sweater. It is a snugger fit, but true to size and pretty in person. Turtleneck isn't too tight, the cut is super flattering, and I got lots of compliments. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Cool top it didn't fit me correctly.
links_reviews_text: It was too tight, need to order up. The ruffle in the front hit me at a very awkward spot. I wanted it to work, but it didn't.

links_reviews_title: I love this sweater very flattering
links_reviews_text: This sweater is sculpted perfect, the fit was good and the sweater held its shape. I will definitely rent again. I received several compliments!!

links_reviews_title: Casual cute, perfect for walking all day on vacation
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size. The fabric is super soft and giving. This dress is perfect for exploring while on vacation or running errands on a weekend-- the waist is very loose, so it hides the tummy, which is great especially after an epic day of eating and drinking.
Loved the fabric, great fit and classic with a stylish flair.
Love love love! Received so many compliments. Felt really high end. Will definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: So great, I wore it 2 days in a row
links_reviews_text: Fits perfectly. Has good stretch. Subtle details make it really stand out and I got a lot of compliments. Great fashion piece. I wore it to work and out for drinks after with some red lipstick and it was perfect. Also helps hide my little tummy pooch
Beautiful, unique, and flattering sweater. Highly recommend. It was a splurge but I couldn't bring myself to return this so I bought it!
Knit top fits so perfectly with sinching waist effect with the underlay satin/neoprene slit detail
Very high-quality and unique design. It's my favorite piece I've rented from RTR so far. Would buy it but it's $500++. Love it!
It's made with high quality material which makes it look very expensive. It's a must... I wish I could buy. oh and it fit perfect.
Fits perfectly and was slimming!!
Tons of compliments ahead. Fit was great. Rented for a board meeting and it was professional enough but still allowed for personality and style to shine through.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful sweater for everyday or work

links_reviews_text: Great quality. Super flattering and comfortable. Runs true to size.

This dress was perfect! I wore it to a charitable event and received a ton of compliments. The fabric is very silky and comfortable. The cut, print and style of the dress was very flattering. I would definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Ladies luncheon at the country club
