links_reviews_text: This dress was absolutely perfect for a lunch and learn I attended at a country club. There were over 60 women of all ages in attendance, including the mayor, and I felt right at home in this beautiful and elevated dress. It hugged in all the right places and loose enough to allow me to eat and full meal and still feel comfortable sitting for another hour.

Everything about this dress was perfect! Sexy yet conservative...I wore a bralette (bra with lace so gives me move coverage) otherwise it was too low cut for me without it. Love the fabric, style, and pattern.

Wore this first for date night with hubby. Then wore it again for business dinner attending as spouse - pinned top to be more conservative that night. Incredibly flattering for curvy figure (37-27-38). No gaping at all across chest (34D/32E) and I did not have to wear a camosile underneath. Beautiful pattern. Love it!
A very flattering and fun wrap dress. I wore it Christmas Eve and there were many compliments!

I loved this dress. I wore it to work and also a weekend birthday party. The material is a little thin, mostly on top, so you will need a bigger coat in the winter months. I love wrap dresses and the ruffle made it a little more flirty/feminine.

Perfect dress for a family Thanksgiving dinner. The size 4 fit perfectly (to be expected from DVF), with the wrap giving adequate coverage and a pretty modest neckline. The colors feel warm and autumnal. The dress could have used some heels for height (in the back it came down to almost my calves) but I went with boots for day-long wear. Ladies renting this for cooler weather might want to consider a slip- the fabric drapes nicely but it is not substantial.
So flattering and comfortable - one of my favorite rentals yet

links_reviews_title: Don't walk, Run to rent this dress!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress. It was super comfortable and so cute! The ruffles made this wrap dress fun for a night out. It is low cut, so if you are more buxom, be prepared.

Loved this dress!! Wore it for a work conference and the fit was perfect (with the help of fashion tape to keep the chest closed), and i felt confident and comfortable! Will definitely wear again and possibly buy!

links_reviews_title: I love the asymmetrical hem. It's a little sexy but still modest enough for work.

links_reviews_text: Tons of compliments on dress that took me from work to dinner. Loved the blue pop of color against the black. Wrap style wasn't as revealing as other DVF. Did have to adjust several times throughout day/night. Fit TTS
Not only is this dress super flattering and beautiful, it's also sooo comfortable. I felt like I was wearing a robe all day!
One of the best fitting DVF dresses. It was perfect for work. Gorgeous colors and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: To buy or not to buy...
links_reviews_text: Reeeally trying to talk myself out of buying a $250 used dress, but this one is a stunner! Perfect for work if you tie the wrap tightly so the neckline overlaps more or you can adjust to a less conservative neckline for date night. ;) the tie is a bit higher than your natural waist (think empire-ish) and no wardrobe malfunctions because the hemline overlaps a good deal.
Such a great dress. The fabric is comfy and easy to wear and the print is flattering. Bit low cut and risqué but so am I :-p
I wore this to a work function. It was beautiful and comfortable. You can never go wrong with a DVF wrap dress. Photos won't do this dress and justice. I have rented this one several times.

I got so many complements on this dress and felt fabulous wearing it. Following the advice of other reviewers, I ordered down a size and was glad I did. The bust is in fact really loose. But the dress itself is a showstopper. Traditional enough for work, but sexy enough for a date night or special occasion.
Wore this twice! To a party and to work one day. Such a great dress!
Great quality and feels like I'm wearing a robe yet looks elegant. DVF quality shows up in the great flow and fit of her fabrics.
Great, comfortable fit. Wore this to a work event and received many compliments. Very classy.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful DVR wrap but runs very large in the chest
links_reviews_text: Ultimately didn't wear because almost baggy in chest, even with push up bra. Will rent next time in a 2

links_reviews_title: What a beautiful dress! Absolutely love it!
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size. True wrap dress. A camisole is a must or you will really be out there! I loved this dress and would rent it again.

This is my first dvf wrap- I'm a fan! I agree with previous reviewers that there seems to be a lot of fabric. There is some gapping at the chest that- a bralette fixed this issue. It's a fun, flowy dress- I recommend!
Classic DVF wrap with a few extra frills. I loved the colors and the blouson sleeve. Fit was TTS.

links_reviews_title: It hurts to give this back!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful print & nice cut. It's rare that I find a wrap dress that actually stays closed. Love the sleeves & the length. The v in the front is also perfect- not too low cut. Runs small but I think it's meant to in order to fall correctly.

Love this dress! First time wearing the original DVF iconic style and I totally get it! It's refreshing to have a designer and a style that is flattering for someone like me who's busty and a larger size. This dress makes me feel classy and confident and feminine.

Wow. I loved the purple color on this dress. It's a wrap dress so it hugs your body in a forgiving and flattering way along your curve. Wasn't too low cut on the top, good modest length. Classy, flowy dress. Loved everything about it.
Wore to work, dinner dates and a wedding. Loved everything about this dress!
I wanted to wear this more but time ran out, really flattering shape and super cute!
This felt great on! I really liked it, considered buying it but the right sleeve already has a missing button and it is only 30% off retail now. It was a fun dress! Highly recommend.

Forgiving (because of extra fabric) and easy to pin at the chest so that I was work-appropriate. If you have a smaller chest, go with your usual size or even consider sizing down. I don't have much of a waist and this created one - super-flattering! I received a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Lovely DVF wrap that I wish I owned!
links_reviews_text: This dress has a lovely flowy fabric with soft draping. I am rather straight through the waist and this actually gave me shape vs a rectangle. I wear a lot of black and this addition of the vibrant blue gave it the perfect punch. I did have to pin the under wrap layer at my chest to keep it conservative, but I have big boobs (36G).

links_reviews_title: Great fit, comfortable, loved the sleeve/shoulder detail
links_reviews_text: This wrap dress was so comfortable, easy to wear, and flattering.
Love love love this dress. I wish I could buy it. The fabric, colors, pattern are all delightful. I felt like a million bucks on a day where I had been emotionally exhausted- thanks DVF.

I really like this, and initially considered buying it. Then I remembered I would have to pay $$ and dry clean it myself, so maybe I will rent it again. This is an all season dress. Very flattering and the color combo of black with blue flowers really pops, especially with the dark teal and maroon accents. My slip was a bit visible from certain angles. This is a fabulous dress that you will not regret renting.

This was my first wrap dress rental. I've tried wrap dresses on in stores before but never really liked the fit. The DVF dress fit me like a dream. The colors popped off the black background. I received lots of compliments from men and women. Only complaints: the belt placement seemed a little too high for my waistline. When I adjusted the belt to my waistline, you could a small section of my ribcage due to the opening for the belt being pulled down. The online description also states the dress is 100% silk. The tag on the dress reads 100% polyester.

I wore this dress for a big meeting at work. I loved it! Fit TTS and is very flattering. I did use a little fashion tap at the top just to be safe. The dress is just beautiful in person. Perfect pop of color! Will def rent again. May even buy it! It's that good!

I've always wanted a DVF wrap dress and this one is such a beauty. Flattering to my curves with interesting detail and color. Total win at work. I sized down from my usual 10 to an 8 and it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Love it, but runs very oversized
links_reviews_text: I love this sweatshirt, but it's very oversized. It's super cute and cozy. I just wish I would have reserved a small or xs.

I really wasn't expecting any compliments on this one, but this was a total favorite! I teach 7th grade, and all my students wanted this sweater. When a 13 year old tells you they like something, you know it must be cool :) It's really soft on the inside! I wore it with white jeans, but it'd be so cute with leggings for a weekend in the fall.
this was way too big. i'm normally and XL and i could have ordered a medium
Perfect lounging sweatshirt ordered my normal size and definitely could have sized down.
Pros: cute; comfortable; leggings approved Cons: the lilac is so light that my whole family thought it was white in the indoor lighting Takeaway: Perfect for family game night!
I like my clothes oversized. I rented the medium and it was perfectly Oversized. I got so many compliments on it and it was so so so cozy which made it so nice to wear. Will rent again

This sweatshirt is really nice in theory -- great colors, oversized fit to go with leggings, and SUPER comfy. However, there's oversized and then there is absurdly-you-could-fit-two-of-me large, and this was the latter. I'm usually a medium, rented the small, and probably would have needed an XXXS before this came even close to being the right size. Ended up wearing it under a jacket as a workout clothes cover up and it was cute for that, but never would have worn it out otherwise.
Got this while pregnant and thought I needed the XL, but it ran so long I could have easily done a L, and a M non preggo. Definitely size down if you don't want the oversized look.

links_reviews_title: This was SO big that it was like an oversized dress on me. Disappointing.
links_reviews_text: Cute, but still too big.
Nice and soft leather jacket!

links_reviews_title: Super soft leather with stretch panels
links_reviews_text: Love this jacket. I don't normally wear it zipped, but I did it for the photo so larger breasted ladies can see how it fits. It's so soft! Instead of snaps or buckles or zippers on the cuffs and at the waist, it has stretch panels on the sleeves and sides, making it sleek. It has pockets, but they have snaps to make them stay tucked into your sides when you're not using them. Flattering to many body types. A+.

links_reviews_title: Ran too small but will rent in right size
links_reviews_text: Headline says it all. Size up! Sleeves are thin.
Loved this jacket and how it looked! It was a little to small around my chest to zip. Also sadly not as warm as my other leather jacket. More of a statement piece.
Never want to give this back- exactly the black leather jacket you're looking for!
Beautiful! I like how it looked & fell unzipped.
I felt like a total bad ass in this. Side panels make it fit like a glove. Leather is super soft and high end. Love it.

This jacket is so versatile--I've worn it with more formal dresses to give my outfit a little edge, to work, and to a party with a fun skirt. It fits perfect--the arms aren't fully leather, there's like a stretchy fabric on the inside closest to the arm which I think really makes the fit much better than other leather jackets. I intended to wear this once and send it back but it's so good I might just have to buy it!
Gorgeous loved how it looked. Definitely runs small I would size up. I should have gotten a size bigger than I did and I have narrow shoulders. Would rent again in bigger size
Runs pretty small. Nice quality.
Ran just a little bit small. Super soft leather.

...but I didn't wear it b/c it's just a bit too tight around the upper arms and bust. I ordered size 38 but I had a feeling it was going to run a little small (Armani usually does). The quality of the leather and the style of the jacket are perfect, though. I'm definitely renting it again...size 40 this time!
Beautiful material but the pockets lay at an unattractive spot on my hips making them look wide and bulky. Had to return...not a cute look!
Is not a structured overcoat as it is in the pictures. Drapes more like a sweater and does not look nearly as professional or expensive.

links_reviews_title: This was a miss - I'm sorry I didn't read the reviews before I rented
links_reviews_text: This coat is not lined and is shapeless. Instead of being a chic oversized jacket It looked like I was wearing someone else's very large sweater. Did not wear, would not recommend for narrow/petite frame
Love love love this coat. Fits over-sized and has a slight stretch to the knit. Roomy deep pockets and a long length. I would even consider renting this again.
Looked cute unbuttoned but terrible buttoned, unfortunately couldn't wear

links_reviews_title: Comfy but style blanket like coat
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments, size down if you don't like an oversized look

links_reviews_title: the way it fits to my body
links_reviews_text: sophisticated

The material is stretchy - more sweater like than coat like - and there isn't the usual structure of a lined coat. I may have also got a size too big, but the overall look was kind of... frumpy bag lady. Not refined or business casual at all. Wasn't for me.
This felt as warm as a coat but was wearable like a sweater. I liked it a lot although it was a bit itchy. Excellent quality though
I love how vibrant the graphic is on this tee. My only complaint is the fit is very boxy, I would prefer if it was either oversized or cropped, but that's a personal preference.

links_reviews_title: Great print but quality was meh
links_reviews_text: With broader shoulders, I still stuck with my true size and it was fine
Cute T-shirt but definitely runs small, so I'd suggest you size up!
Runs small but very comfortable
I LOVED this tee! It fits perfectly (I'm usually size S but got size M for a "baggier" look). Fabric is way way nice and it fits so well!!!

links_reviews_title: King Louie (dog) approved! A lazy day doesn't always have to be messy. It can be trendy too...
links_reviews_text: Fit perfect! Went grate with a skirt, jeans and short! Loved the versatility of this top!
Fit well, was super cute and fun! Great for spring and summer!
Fit was small, material is stiff so order size up
Wore with some cut off shorts, absolutely love this tee!

This definitely runs SMALL. I normally wear a size women M or L in cotton t-shirts like this, and I wore an XL. Don't be afraid to size up a coup, it was super cute styled like this photo or with jeans!
Shirt was too small and had no give
Great and fun shirt. I rented a Small but wish I got a Medium. The small looked good but was more fitted than the look I was going for.
Cute print but the fabric was a bit heavy and the shoulders were small.
Fabric is not what I expected. It was stiffer than i would have liked it to be with a t shirt. Hard to do a French tuck with.

links_reviews_title: Unique collar on traditional button up
links_reviews_text: Pretty color and nice material. Sleeves are a bit long for shorter arms. Collar has longer/pointier tips and buttons run two a time along front. Good option for work - brings something different to the traditional button up.
Gorgeous color, unique button pattern, easy to wear. A little wrinkly but nothing too bad, wore this to work and got a lot of compliments!
This is a perfect silk shirt. I loved the way it fit and felt. I wore to a work dinner meeting. I like it so much that I'm considering buying it. A gorgeous color that is really flattering too.
This blouse is simple but there are subtle details that make it special, like a slightly puffy sleeve at the shoulder. Wonderful fabric, and gorgeous color.
Pulled a little in the bust.
My size 38D boobs and I couldn't get into an XL of this shirt. I was so sad. It's beautiful! But if you're medium busty to RILL RILL busty, skip it.

links_reviews_title: A button up I can button up!
links_reviews_text: I was a little worried I wouldn't be able to button up over my chest but the large fit perfectly with no gap! I love the placement of the buttons I think that definitely helped with fit. It's a simple button up but it has sweet details like the shoulders and elongated cuff. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Nice silk, good fit, interesting design
links_reviews_text: I like the cuffs and the sleeves - very interesting details!
So so many compliments. I'm an XL not a XXL but this size 16 girl felt awesome all day in this shirt.
Pretty blouse for work.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a client meeting with a suit. Perfect look and very comfortable
links_reviews_text: The small details really help shirt stand out. Very soft and luxurious material. Sizes small but the fit is amazing.
Cool design with the sleeves and buttons, but overall nothing special. Tucked the shirt into a skirt for work because the shirt was a little too wide for me.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color, sleeves too short for my arms
links_reviews_text: The shirt fit well everywhere except the arms, the top of the cuff was almost to my elbow and it just looked and felt strange on my long arms-something to think about if you are tall. Color and material were beautiful, but did not end up wearing it.
Beautiful fabric and feel. The XS fit me perfectly - was worried it might be TOO small but it wasn't. Looks good tucked or untucked (the hemline isn't too long).
This blouse was lovely and I received multiple compliments. My daughter loved the vintage look the cut and buttons created and said I looked like an "old-time" movie star

links_reviews_title: The color is gorgeous, The fabric is silky and wonderful.
links_reviews_text: This blouse fit well albeit a little gap appeared right at the bottom of my bust line. I am a 32DD but have a crooked breastbone so the way the buttons are sewn on it left a little space. I easily hid this with tape. The sleeves were a little short as shown on the model. I am petite but have a long wingspan so taller girls that's how it will look on you. Most shorter girls with human sized arms will find it ends at the wrist,
good for work, a little large

links_reviews_title: Nice style and fabric but runs small and short
links_reviews_text: The top is actually kind of short and flimsy. Not as long as it may appear in the photo.
I loved this shirt. I got lots of complements and felt really put together.
Wore this on a date night with a silk cami and jeans, and then the next day to work with a teeshirt to dress it down. Loved and will rent again!
I loved this blazer! I typically wear an 18 in jackets and this fit so well. The purple/blue color is so pretty. I wore for a conference with black jeans and got a ton of compliments!
I wore this blazer to work, book group, and school committee meeting. Very comfortable.
Fits great - I have muscular shoulders so a little tight in back
This blazer is dark blue but Has a subtle floral print that is really beautiful.

links_reviews_title: I'm a size 8 and the 44 was wearable but tight. Will size up to 45 next time I rent.

links_reviews_text: This blazer is covered in an interesting pattern. Outside of that, I don't understand why this blazer is considered high end. It wrinkles easily, was way too tight in the shoulders (even with a size up), and is completely polyester. In short, not a fan.

links_reviews_title: Fun jacket but way way too small--couldn't even lift my arms. Did not wear.

links_reviews_text: This fit perfectly, made me feel confident and received a lot of compliments.
Perfect for office

links_reviews_title: the color is great and the fabric is pretty, but its seriously overpriced!
I immediately got compliments on this blazer when I walked into a conference room at work!
links_reviews_text: The length feels like a boyfriend blazer, and I had to cuff the sleeves once. It was a little tight in the arms/back but I'm pretty broad-shouldered. It wasn't so tight that I couldn't move though; the material just didn't have any stretch to it. Overall, it was a good rental!

This is one of the RTR pieces I've rented twice and still plan to rent again. The jacket is made beautifully and the animal print pattern is noticeable but really subtle, making it perfect for big work functions. I wish I could buy it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful suit jacket. Loved the look!
links_reviews_text: Very classy and fit well
This is GORGEOUS. I will definitely be renting again

I loved the material and leopard print, but the fit was weird. It was super tight (almost to the point of restricting movement) in the shoulders and I'm not a big/broad-shouldered person. Sleeves were also very short but I'm 5'11" with long arms so things are always short on me.
Super cute
Perfect fit, great silhouette

links_reviews_title: My favorite this month. Easy to wear. Stylish. Looks great w any pants. I may wear it every day.
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size. Fabric is amazing.
Nicely fitted, just the right amount of pattern and color. A little tight across the back if you have an athletic build
Loved this so much I rented again. Tons of compliments. Wore to work and holiday parties

links_reviews_title: runs small and not for wide shoulders
links_reviews_text: I have 40-inch shoulders, 43-inch bust, and a 36-inch waist and the size 12 was at least 2 sizes too small. If you can size up I do recommend this blazer because it is gorgeous! It looks amazing and the material is high quality.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, but to flashy for work
links_reviews_text: High quality and great fit, but in the pictures I thought the pattern looked subtle. In person, I thought the pattern was a little too flashy for a professional office setting.
Wore this for a keynote. Shoulders and sleeves were snug. Lovely texture.

This blazer is absolutely amazing! It's so beautiful in person. It's a little oversized (I'm 5'1) so I paired it with a black sweater and pants for work. I hoped to wear it with a dress but it didn't look good on me because of my height. I got so many compliments throughout the day. Must rent!

links_reviews_title: Great pattern, fit is better for someone 5'5" over
links_reviews_text: Torso is long for a blazer get fitted at waste so would fit someone better who is a few inches taller. I wore it opened and it still looked good because sleeves fit ok (they have slit openings by cuff). Torso area is def slim fit.
I rented this for a trip to someplace cold. It provided lots of warmth but was a little too bulky in my opinion. I would recommend sizing down
Was able to fit thick sweaters under! Perfect for Aspen. Loved and would totally buy.

I rented this for a month And got a lot of wear out of it: brunch parties etc. Was very warm and very soft and I got compliments every time I wore it. Looks great with all black as well as with my brown turtleneck sweater and blue skinny jeans and camel boots. Highly recommend

This coat was super stylish and incredibly comfortable. It was tricky to clasp close because of the fur, but nothing impossible. Very chic and dresses up any outfit. Wore in NYC for my birthday. Would rent again!
This jacket is just asking to be hugged. So soft you could sleep with it & so so warm
I rented this for a party. I liked it enough to pair with jeans and other dresses.
Runs a little small. I found it very warm and I loved how it elevated my look.

This jacket got lots of compliments! It goes with everything from dresses to denim and you look like a movie star. It's the softest fur and the color is the perfect camel. Great collar to pop, hinge closure if you want to bundle up. A nice length for wherever your going. Would buy this!
Wore over a fairly chilly fall weekend and kept me pretty warm! Super soft and comfy. Potentially would buy but there's a lot of RTR fur to try.

links_reviews_title: Softest, coziest and warmest fur I've worn!
links_reviews_text: This jacket is soo soft - like, I wanted to cuddle in it all night! It's definitely warm without being too heavy. It does fit a little oversized, so it would work with sweaters or bulkier clothing under it. The sleeves were a little long for me but I'm shorter so that's not uncommon for jacket sleeves! Just note, I wore it with a navy velvet dress and I wound up with tan fur fuzz alllll over my dress!
I wore this jacket over a formal gown to a roaring 20s ball. It was great. I felt very in theme. Jacket was perfect. Comfy and soft.

links_reviews_title: Warm and super soft… Boxy fit
links_reviews_text: This jacket is made to fit Boxee… Super cute over dresses or jeans
I loved this coat!! It's remarkably soft and really fashionable.

links_reviews_title: Favorite faux fur on RTR so far!
links_reviews_text: I LOVE THIS COAT. It's cozy, warmer than I expected, and looks cute with pretty much any outfit. The only con is the little beige fuzzies on my darker colored clothes!
This is super cozy and surprisingly lightweight. Very warm and love getting a coat with tags still on!
loved it but a bit difficult for a pear shape at the bottom
Comfortable
So soft and the color gorgeous. Perfect for throwing over my shoulders at a black tie affair. Would also look good with boots and jeans- which is why I'm hanging onto it for a couple more wears!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for my Margot Tenenbaum Costume but beware of shedding
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my Halloween costume and it was perfect. I wouldn't suggest this for everyday wear because the coat sheds... a lot. It's also synthetic so get ready to sweat.

Starting to really love this brand hereu! Thank you rent the runway for all the new and fabulous pieces you are adding. Great tote. The magnetic closure is the perfection! I may have to make this one mine :)
Fun style. Didn't require ironing. Comfortable.

I wore this dress to thanksgiving dinner with family. The skirt is very see through in the light. I paired it with some black spanx shorts and made it way less obvious but would have given this 5 stars had that not been the case.

I actually wore the 6 but the system didn't let me choose that for this review. This was great for a wedding on a cooler evening. It's not very warm but does have the long sleeves. It's a little fluffy, but draws in at the waist so I still felt good in it. It was awesome when I was dancing and the skirt was swishing around. The wind did blow around the skirt a lot during the after party on a rooftop. So either wear shorts or have a hand free to hold it down if needed.
The back sticks out where the zipper ends. Strange looking and didn't wear because I liked something else more. The length and pattern is beautiful and well made too.

Wore this to a date of meetings with cowboy boots. Comfortable elastic waist and interesting sleeves but a bit short on a tall girl, would ride up when I lifted my arms.. but excellent quality and great shape

This dress is amazing and has pockets!! This was awesome to wear the office during Fashion week. The dress is true to size and is super flattering. I paired it with a belt and some black heels and it got some many compliments at work. The only thing is it's short but I didn't care it was super breathable. I will definitely rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Super cute but the skirt is see through!
links_reviews_text: Wish I could wear this dress but the skirt was a bit too see through for my liking! A slip would definitely help. The sleeves are a LITTLE long but manageable

Dress is flattering and easy to style, has 2 pockets. however it's really short on me and the bottom blow up easily in wind. I wore a pair of shorts underneath just to be safe. Overall, it's a fun dress to wear.

Didn't end up wearing it to my meeting because the lower half is see through. You have to wear it with a slip. Fit perfect everywhere but was a little tight at the synched waist. Would rent again after I invested in a black slip.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a party & work-was great for both. Fits well

links_reviews_text: Cute dress with tights, the waist was a little high and made my hips look wider than I would have liked as it flared out. It was somewhat see through, so recommend solid black tights underneath.
Definitely need a slip underneath. Little see thru at the bottom. A lot flowery than I expected. Runs a little large. Overall great dress.

This dress was beautiful but unfortunately I didn't end up wearing it. It did fit but I would have preferred to have a little more room in the chest area for my own comfort. I'd rent again in the next size up.

links_reviews_title: So cute! Wore with tights as it was a bit short for work.
links_reviews_text: This dress was adorable...will definitely rent again. It was cinched at the waist with elastic which made it pretty comfy and easy to throw on. Would look awesome at night with black booties and a leather jacket. Fits a little short but I am also tall.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for an anniversary dinner!
links_reviews_text: I wore this out to celebrate my anniversary, and it was such a cute outfit! I'm pretty tall so the dress was really short on me, but I wore it with tights and boots so it was fine. I don't think I would have felt comfortable in it without tights. I went with a size 8 but think I definitely could have worn a 6, it's pretty flouncy and the waistband is elastic. The sleeves are gorgeous!
Wore this at an important work meeting and got a ton of compliments. Was tasteful and fashionable. Fun and professional all at the same time.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but short and see through?
links_reviews_text: Should have listened to other reviewers. Definitely needs another layer on the bottom.
Super cute, fits well, I wore it with tights and booties
Loved the pockets. Fell slightly above the knee and was perfect for work. Worn with knee high pointed boots.

links_reviews_title: Material is light and airy. The bust is very loose and doesn't fit well in small frames
links_reviews_text: not a fan of the fit!

Rented with my unlimited but my daughter ended up wearing it. I am straight and small on top and the blousy top was overwhelming on me. My daughter is much curvier and it fit her beautifully. Nice length and great print. Waist runs small but has elastic.
Fit perfectly.
Material v light weight and runs short but overall a cute little dress
Made the mistake of not reading previous reviews. The skirt is see through, especially in the back. Would probably be ok if you wear with tights or leggings
Breezy

links_reviews_title: Cute dress with a feminine pattern and forgiving elastic waistband.
links_reviews_text: Boyfriend loved it. Wore for date night and plan to wear again when I have dinner with my boyfriend's mother. Modest on top, sassy on the bottom. Fell above my knee--great for a petite woman. The sleeves were too long, but I kept them at wrist length by using black pony tail holders at the wrist. The left sleeve was coming unstitched so I used wardrobe tape to hold it in place. Added a thick black and silver-studded belt at the waist to add a rocker vibe. Wore black ankle boots.

links_reviews_title: TTS but skirt is short and see through
links_reviews_text: I wore this out to dinner and the theater. I liked the long sleeves in the transitional fall weather. The skirt is rather short. I'm not sure I would have been comfortable wearing it if I was any taller. The skirt is see through, but really only when you're back lit. At night it wasn't noticeable. A slip would be necessary for this dress to work all day.
Too much fabric on this one. It was almost cute, but just looked puffy.

links_reviews_title: Sleeves are a no-go for petite upper bodies
links_reviews_text: Skirt was beautiful but even as a D cup I couldn't fill out the top enough and the sleeves were 2 inches too long with no way to cinch them up. Maybe better for hourglass or more sporty types. Not great for pear-shaped
Perfect for fall, a little short but nothing obscene. Will look to rent again!

The dress is beautiful and fit for the most part but the sleeves were way to big. And not in a chic way. They were so baggy I couldn't even wear it. Also it is very sheer. I thought there would be a black slip underneath but there wasn't. I am sure if I went into sunlight you could see my underwear underneath.
This is flirty - billowy up top and below with a nicely cinched waist. But I felt a little lost in it as a B/C cup, this might be more flattering for someone with more chest.
It is hard to close and doesn't hold a ton, but perfect for special date night or evening out

Lovely constructed bag in great shape. As noted earlier, the latch is a bit fussy, but not deal breaker. Holds an iPhone plus, oversized wallet, keys, eyeglasses. The daily basics but not much more. Still for such a constructed bag, it's better than the "micro bags" currently in fashion. Charming and fun.

The bag sits amazingly due to its shape, and I love the colors. Goes with a lot. The only downside is that the latch can come undone at times, so you have to be careful where you wear it. Would still rent again!

I absolutely loved this cute little dress for traveling! The material is great for warm weather. The top is a little see-through, but I just wore a nude bra and I thought it looked great. Bottom part is lined. The waist line has this cool off-center tie that cinches in the middle. The bottom is a little bit tailored to the body, if you have a larger behind or thighs I would size up. I am not that big on the bottom and it was definitely a little tight in the 6 when I sat down (no stretch).

links_reviews_title: Great white dress... easy to wear
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 2 ... the 4 fit just fine in bottom top was a bit big but it worked
So cute for wedding dress shopping! It was a tad snug around the bottom half where the buttons are. I sized up and would rise up again honestly.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress! Perfect for a summer day.
links_reviews_text: Fit well, unique cut, and comfortable.
It's a weird fit but very cute. It's is larger on top than the bottom. Ok for me but nut fir everyone. I want to purchase but $450 is a lot. If you like white eyelet this us a perfect summer dress.
Very fun to wear! Works well day to night.

I got so many wears out of this - it worked for a baby shower, out for drinks, and work. The fit is kind of weird. I ended up sizing up; my normal size fit, but was way too short. What I wore was definitely too big, but I just sort of made it work. It's true that the top is big and and the bottom is tight, so it kinda depends on your body type. The first few times I wore it I didn't think it was see-through at all, but then when I wore it to work I realized it was on top, so....oops? If you have the ability to not stain a white dress, you can wear multiple times, as it really doesn't wrinkle at all.

I ordered a size up because I read the reviews. The 12 was too big but I really liked the dress so I wore anyways. I really wish I ordered my reg 10! The top is sheer and see through so be sure to have a tank handy if you're wearing to work. On the weekend I'm just going to wear with a bra! Highly recommend this cute dress.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my daughters baptism
links_reviews_text: Top was large but bottom fit a little tighter

The rolled sleeve detail, tie waist and asymmetrical buttons make this eyelet dress really modern but still feminine. It was a bit tight around my hips/butt for work, but a great casual weekend look with ripped jeans and sandals.
Did not want to give this dress back!!! Wore it touring Napa and got compliments all day.

I sized down like everyone said, but I should have sized up. I agree that the top is big. I'm a size 4 top and there was room. But unfortunately I am a 6/8 bottom and should have stuck to that. I agree that the top is going to be large on everyone, but I would say the hips are small.

links_reviews_title: Intricate eyelets on top with unexpected deviation to the side on the bottom.
links_reviews_text: Slightly large, super cute.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with this! Going to rent again for a casual look for my bachelorette party!
links_reviews_text: So cute and summery - was nervous that the buttons on the skirt would pop open or show my tummy but it fit loose enough that this wasn't a problem at all. I also have very large 38DD boobs and the top is loose fitting so buttons around my boobs were not an issue either. Great dress!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments, wish I could own!
links_reviews_text: I wore this in the summer to work and got SO many compliments. There's no lining on top so you have to wear an undershirt to make it work appropriate.

The top was baggy, and the bottom was really fitted. I wouldn't have been able to sit in this dress, the buttons would've come open! And the inner skirt liner was really short. It wasn't flattering at all.
Very cute summer dress

Don't freak out about the eyelet when you first take it out of the bag. I repeat, do not freak out. You won't see anything if you wear a nude bra underneath. This dress is very well made and the cut of it is so flattering.

links_reviews_title: I wore it with a rough leather jacket and wedge in straw and black. it was really a cute outfit.
links_reviews_text: fit body conscience and looked very flattering
This dress is cute BUT the top is sheer eyelet, so you need a cami or slip. Unfortunately, I’m in Texas and it’s too hot for that!

This was a very cute dress that could be worn casual with flats or dressed up with heels (like I did). I am typically a 2 in dresses and I'm glad I ordered a 2 in this one. The top has a roomy, boxy fit and the bottom was kind of fitted, which I think made the style look even better on than I thought it would. There is a little bit of room in the tie to cinch the waste a little bit if needed as well. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Super cute!! Perfect for my bridal shower
links_reviews_text: Good fit.. perfect for warm weather parties/ events
i ended up wearing a cami underneath so it was fine. runs quite large so def go down at least 1 size. doesn't wrinkle, easy wknd dress.
I got so many compliments AND it was comfy. The top was slightly big, but it I had ordered an 8 the skirt might've been a little tight in the booty. This was so fun & classy - will rent again!

I loved this dress...received so many compliments. The bottom is more fitted and the top blousy. I only had to wear pasties because the front white pockets cover perfectly. I would really consider purchasing this dress since it could be worn on so many different occasions.
This was a really well made dress that's great for just running around town..perfect paired w Lilly Pulitzer colorful sneakers!

I love Veronica Beard. This dress runs big. But definitely rent it because it's really cute. I was able to tie it tighter than it's supposed to be. It just gaped a lot in the back then because there's too much fabric. No picture because I was running late out the door and then it rained and I was caught without an umbrella and was soaking wet.

links_reviews_title: Wanted this to work so bad!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this and love this line, but it was way to oversized for my frame, so much so that i couldn't wear it. Debated trying a size down but still don't think it would fit.

Very cute. Typically an 8 off the rack and 10 in most designer dresses from RTR. Could've done a 6 in this. Warning it's see through! You'll need a nude or white slip but very cute, I just overshot the size.
Loved this coat and the color so much! I decided to buy it new off of J. Crew
This is a great everyday statement coat, it's not lined so it's not super warm. Great for spring
The color is loud and fun! The coat is lighter than I expected (not lined)
I love this coat so much i'm renting it twice! It is so bright and beautiful, i received several compliments on it.
Very warm and beautiful vibrant color.
Love, love, LOVE this coat! Perfect for laying, and THAT color!!
I am from south Florida. I rented this to go on trip with my husband for his work, where it was very cold. I wanted something warm but with some personality. This did the trick!
I loved this coat so much that I bought it! It's a great material that's not too heavy- love it!
Beautiful coat!
Great color and an easy fit. Medium weight.

I rented this because the color was out of my comfort zone but I loved it. I live in SC so it was the perfect coat for our mild winter though not sure how it would fare if you needed to layer a lot under it. Would def rent it again.

This felt very scratchy. Doesn't have an inner lining. Definitely runs big. I sized up (thinking about bulky layers underneath) and wish I hadn't. If you are wearing it and planning to layer underneath, go with your normal size. If you're just wearing a dress or sweater underneath, I would size down. Gorgeous color though! Wish it would have worked out better.
I wish it had a lining because then it would have been warmer. It's an absolute lovely color, but it's itchy and just a bit tight when wearing anything more than a thin sweater.

This coat is GORGEOUS. The pink color is such a bright unique pop over my usually black monotone wardrobe. Even though it's bright, the beautiful cut and length makes it totally appropriate to wear to my office. Perfect piece bc it transitions from office to weekend/play seamlessly.
The coat is very cozy! Perfect for October cool days in Chicago. It's unlined, so don't think it will work for much colder days. And the color is awesome!

links_reviews_title: Turned out to be a favorite!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this for work and it is one of my favorites. I love the fit, the arms are a little long, but really not bad. Very comfortable. The color is a dark blue. Would definitely rent again.
I loved this sweater! It was a larger fit but wasn't baggy at the waist.

links_reviews_title: Great baggy sweater for warmer days.
links_reviews_text: Not form fitting at all, thus is a creat lightweight sweater with chunky texture blocks and nice stitching detail. I paired it with slacks tapered at the ankle and a deep blue suede boot.

I tried to replicate the outfit with the skirt but this sweater is beyond large. I just looked frumpy. The neck line is about 6 inches too large. It swings and misses the mark of "large sweater to pair with a flowy skirt"

links_reviews_title: Not going to wear this. Maybe a smaller size would be better but this did not work for me.
links_reviews_text: The arms were too long and didn't fit well. Not sure if the XS would have been better but I'm not interested in this enough to try to get the XS.
Sleeves are very long and I am 5'9". it was fine to wear as a casual top

links_reviews_title: Cute baggy sweater but a little itchy
links_reviews_text: The sweater was super cute and I wanted to love it but it was a little itchy.
Cool sweater just oversized. Size down.
It is too itchy for me and sized as an oversized item. I wore it once just because and due to the layer underneath for itchy material, I was way too hot. It's fine.

links_reviews_title: Arms WAY too long for me.
links_reviews_text: Cute sweater, great quality and warm, but the arms were extremely long and the bust/shoulder area very oversized compared to the hip area. Actually didn't end up wearing, which was disappointing as I was sooooo excited to see this brand added!
The quality of the material is wonderful and pictures do not do it justice. I'll be renting this dress again. Great fit, comfortable and very classic!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to present at a national conference in my field. It was the perfect dress for this event
links_reviews_text: Nice to have longer sleeves for the winter. The blue was a beautiful color too! I ordered the 4 as a backup size and it fit perfectly! Really flattering and comfortable!
Fit is very flattering and shows curves. Great for someone with a short torso. Great for a conservative office.
Loved this dress. It was perfect for work and the bold color was flattering.
The material has an interesting texture, it is a classic. Comfortable and beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Got me the job! (At least it helped me look the part)
links_reviews_text: My lighting is poor, but this dress is the perfect shade of cobalt blue. The fabric has texture and is thick for colder days. The dress is cut in a way that flatters curves perfectly. The neckline provides some additional detail. Wore for a job interview in a more casual office and it was just the right blend of professional without trying too hard.

The color is a unique deep blue and the pattern makes it more interesting than the average dress. I didn't love the fit though. I have a long torso and found the bodice to be a bit short. It wasn't particularly form fitting. Appropriate for work, but didn't love it.
I wore it to work once. No plans to rent it again. It was fine.
Love the color and fit. I am chubby and always love A-line styles. This fabric is heavy and so beautiful. A lot of stretch so if you are a 16 get a 14w Ralph Lauren dresses always run a bit bigger .

links_reviews_title: Great dress for an after work event.
links_reviews_text: Great dress. Was a little big around the shoulders, but fit perfectly otherwise. Great for the more conservative after work events.
Classic colbolt blue dress. Paired with a scarf and stilettos for a job interview. Conservative, a-line skirt, on trend.
Beautiful color. It fits true to size and the thick fabric is flattering.

links_reviews_title: Nice but too casual for the occasion
links_reviews_text: Thicker material and kind of a knot pattern. Nice dress but ended up being more casual than I had expected, so I didn't wear.
This dress was so flattering and comfortable, and the color is fantastic, especially if you have blue eyes.
This dress was comfortable and flattering but it is just a black dress. It wasn't quite what I was expecting and the material was a little thin.

This dress was super comfy! It's more like a T-shirt material, so the rouging can be moved and adjusted for maximum flattering. It was prefect for my 18week bump. I paired it with tights and boots to dress it up a bit. Would definitely rent again
Super soft fabric. Nice cut. Can be longer or shorter depending on how much you scrunch it in the middle. Runs large though.
This lightweight sweater had a refined elegance about it. It was body skimming without being too tight. Normally I do not like very fitted clothes but this one was well made and flattering.

This was a surprisingly warm and comfortable dress. I wore it to work a couple of times. The material was a bit thin, so you might want shapewear if that's your thing, but all-in-all, it's a delightful winter take on the LBD.
Cute dress flattering in the top and mid section. Would've purchased if the material was a little thicker

links_reviews_title: I ordered size a bit big thinking theory might run small but it was true size small would work.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable sleek good fit. Conservative but dressy casual.

LOVED this dress, I felt amazing in it - it hugs all the right places. it's snug but super stretchy so you don't feel trapped. my only issue is that it's extremely See-Through. so make sure you have a cami and some bottom spanx to wear underneath! super comfy everyday/night type of dress though. I wish I could keep this one!
Light material - great fit and very flattering.

Fits true to size. Comfortable cotton dress. Slightly see-through and the material is a little thin. Not the usual heavy theory material. Side rouching is very flattering. Overall nice business casual dress.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress. Runs a bit large.
links_reviews_text: Runs a bit large. Nicely made. Fun to wear. Can be dressed up or down!

links_reviews_title: OBSESSED and so figure flattering and comfy!
links_reviews_text: This brand is a bit more casual/bohemian vibe. This dress was surprisingly sexy, and I dressed it up with heels for the evening and a leather jacket! Got tons of compliments and wore it during the day with sandals for a more casual look. If you are large chested, you may want to wear a bralette underneath it.
Loved the flirty slit, it is low cut so it's not good for work but perfect for the weekend or date night!

This dress is pretty thick and made with quality. The front is pretty low cut and I felt somewhat exposed even on vacation! I used a pin to bring up the V just a little. The length is mid shin and the slit in the front is not too risk-ay! The sleeves have a cute gather where you can tie a bow. Not see through or too hot (despite the thick material)! Loved and would def rent again
Perfect dress for a vacation or the vineyards. Wore this to Napa with my girlfriends and felt so good in it. Definitely low cut so not appropriate for all events. Would rent again in a heartbeat!
I loved the vibrant orange-red color! It was flattering & comfortable.
I loved the color and fit of this dress only issue is that it's low cut but I just used a bralette. It's tru to size and surprisingly cool dress in hot weather.
The clasp on my dress had loose thread. So I had to reinforce with a pin as the dress is very boobalicious. Otherwise the dress is super cute, flattering, flowy dress.
Great dress! Hid my flaws well and highlighted my waist. Perfect for wide hips. Deep cut so ready to wear pasties or a cami underneath. Got complimented all night.
This dress was everything. Perfect length to be around family, fit TTS, cool for hot weather. I might purchase. Truly attractive and will make you feel 100% about whatever you wear it to.

I rented this for a birthday party at a winery and it was perfect! The fit is so flowy and I got soo many complements all day! It runs very VERY tight in the chest and is very low cut. I had to size up and wear a tank underneath, but I'm a 36DD so I usually expect that. Didn't want to give it back!

I loved this dress!! I wore it to my son's wedding rehearsal dinner and also to church. I had to wear a white cami under it but it worked out fine. It also had a hook on the front that I didn't use since I had the cami on. I wear an 8 or 10 so this size fit perfect. I got lots of compliments on it. This would b one I would love to own!!! Also pretty color!!!
Runs a little large. I'm a 6 and wore the small.
Definitely worked for my height and body shape! With a smaller chest a bra is not necessary!

Loved it! My waist looked so tiny! Remember there is a secret hook and eye - I didn't find it until I was at work, so in the photo it is a bit lower in the cleavage. I did wear a lacy bralet to make it ok for work. The length was great and it wasn't too sexy. I did have to ask a friend to help me tie the sleeves, but there were nice and roomy for us full bicep ladies.
Lovely and forgiving dress very light and easy to wear
The hook and match was broken so there was no way to actually wear without an under tank without having your entire chest exposed! Cute dress. Comfortable to wear.
I love this dress! It's low cut but there is a hook closure so it can be worn more modestly too. Hugs nicely on the waist and gives a pretty hourglass shape. Perfect for a summer party.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress! Very flattering on and lightweight and comfortable. Perfect length.
links_reviews_text: Fit wonderfully. The hook in the front helped the neckline not go too low.

links_reviews_title: Great color! Very comfy.. and pockets :)
links_reviews_text: It was pretty true to size but the low low neckline needed a cami at the daytime family wedding I went to.
Amazing dress ! I have huge boobs and it was very revealing so I had to pin the shit out of it. It would be amazing if you had a small chest !

I fell in love with this dress! I have a slim waist compared to my hips and smaller chest so I sized down knowing that some of the v neck dresses run a bit big on me and saw it had an elastic waist. I'm usually a M but got the small and it worked out great!! Received so many compliments and it fit right in all the places and was the best vibrant red color. Super comfortable and flowy too in a great light fabric. Also could be worn without the chest clasp if you want a deeper v neck. May have to end up buying it because I miss it already!
Cute dress. Fit great. Easy for weekend wear. Wore for Mother's Day with sneakers.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress so much I almost bought it
links_reviews_text: This dress is adorable. I received so many compliments. The fabric has stretch around the waist so you can get by with sizing down. A little low cut so you may want to wear something under it. Highly recommend

rented for vacation and was a bit too big - i'm normally a size 4/6 and i should've ordered the size xs. it is a comfortable dress and very flattering but beware VERY LOW CUT - probably a lacy bralette or no bra at all works best. will rent again for a different event.

This dress is perfect for a warm day or date night with a leather jacket. I do with the clasp in the front didn't have so much of a gap between it and the other buttons. But overall, super cute dress.

links_reviews_title: I think i received 20+ compliments from men and women on this dress over the course of one day
links_reviews_text: This is an amazing day to night transitional dress. Throw on a pair of heels, and it's perfect for a nice dinner. Wear it with sandles, and it's great for day time. It's quite low cut, so the type of bra you wear is crucial. I wouldn't wear this aroudn conservative compaony like parents or people you work with.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so fun to wear to a music festival!
links_reviews_text: The most comfortable dress and the color is amazing.

links_reviews_title: Great fit, delightful boho look, low neck
links_reviews_text: I loved the way this dress made me feel. It had weight to it and a slit that made the extra length work even on my medium-short frame. The bust is SUPER low, even with the hook and eye. I was okay, since my bust is small, but it was definitely revealing. I really went back and forth on buying this, but ultimately I didn't feel confident I could find enough places where the low bust wouldn't matter.

links_reviews_title: It's so cute, I got so many compliments on the color. The buttons and the slit make it perfect!
links_reviews_text: What I love about this is that the sleeves are a tie, so you can resize them to fit what you're feeling. It also has a clasp so you can either show some skin, or tighten it up on the cleavage!

links_reviews_title: So cute! V low cut though but I don't really have boobs so it's not a problem lol
links_reviews_text: Really cute for an everyday fun dress. It's super low cut so if you have big boobs it may not work. You can dress it up or down depending on how you style it which is always nice.
The fit is perfect just had to add a safety pin to make it not be so low!

Rented this dress for a photoshoot on vacation. The color is super vibrant and beautiful!, and the full skirt lends itself well to twirling. The fit on the top is a little loose, but overall worked well for me.
I needed to wear a camisole underneath, very revealing in the front. So, was not a fan overall of the dress because I had to wear a camisole.

Light, breezy summer dress-- easy to dress up or down. Very low-cut, so prepare to show some cleavage. With 36DD bra, I had some difficulty hiding my bra from sight without a safety pin but a cute bralette or cami could solve that issue. Loved this dress, received many compliments and never wanted to send it back.

links_reviews_title: this dress was very comfortable and colorful
links_reviews_text: it is VERY low cut, i used sticky bra because there was no way to hide the middle part of my bra from the deep v

links_reviews_title: Way too big, much lower cut than shown
links_reviews_text: XS fit like a S/M. The neckline was also very low cut and cannot be worn with a bra.
Better for flat chest/small bust. VERY cute but I had to wear a top underneath and felt like I was at bible camp.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but fit was unflattering if you have hips
links_reviews_text: Cute dress and color, but pockets on the side made the hips appear wider.

links_reviews_title: AMAZING DRESS!! So flattering and so comfortable
links_reviews_text: The only con I have with this dress is that the cut is very low.. If my boobs were a full B cup I'd be spilling. But amazing fit, the waist detail is so flattering. The high spilt in the middle keep this from being too boxy, the buttons keep this casual but easily can be dresses up with heels or wedges. love

links_reviews_title: Stunning! Am probably going to wear again when I visit another office this week!
links_reviews_text: Great fit, heavy fabric hides everything. Only con is the lack of zipper makes it hard to get off and on.
Very flattering, I wear a 12 usually and the 14 was roomy enough to be work appropriate but still fitted enough to be flattering. Really great dress with a nice weight and flattering pattern.
Arms are a little snug, other than that good fabric, not see through and doesn't pile or cling.
Obsessed with this dress! Wore it to work but could easily dress it up for a party. It was super comfortable and easy to wear.
I'm still undecided about this dress. It fit fine, but it didn't feel as high quality as I would have expected. I wore it anyway.

links_reviews_title: SUPER tight in the arms and otherwise stretchy and comfortable
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfortable and very stretchy - everywhere except the arms, where it was *extremely* tight. I loved how casual and cool it looked with a navy blazer and white sneakers, and the diagonal lines were very slimming, but the bands on the arms were truly like vice grips. So tight. Sizing up might help but then I think it would be baggy everywhere else.
The dress is made of a thicker fabric, good cut and pattern - very flattering. The only downfall is the button in the back which lays a bit funny though, and it bothered me.
Fabric was not very forgiving but the pattern was flattering. Created a nice shape

links_reviews_title: One of my MOST FAVORITE RENTALS
links_reviews_text: This dress is AMAZING. The cut, style, and fabric are awesome. It fits to your figure but doesn't feel restrictive. Nor does it pucker after you've sat in it. The style is just great. One of my most favorite dresses from RTR and perfect for work or work to happy hour/dinner.
Loved this dress so much. The pattern and fit was perfect!

This was a form fitting dress that ran true to size. The only thing that made the dress not absolutely perfect was the area around the back/neck button/slit bunched up. There's some extra fabric that tucks into the slit that wouldn't stay inside. Other than that, the dress got so many compliments.
I loved this dress and felt very comfortable and covered at work. The different stripes are flattering on curves. Sleeves are a little tight as everyone says.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and really easy dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work with sneakers and it was ideal. Very comfortable and easy to throw on. Felt polished but still easy to dress down. I could've worn flats or heels and made it dressier if I needed! Loved the fit.

links_reviews_title: This dress was very comfortable and attractive! The design made this dress very flattering.
links_reviews_text: I added a belt to break up the pattern. I liked everything about this dress.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress but not easy to get on and sleeves are tight
links_reviews_text: Once I was in it, this dress was great. Nice fit, cut and length. Sleeves are a tad tight.
I loved this dress! I loved how it looks and my husband liked it on me.

This was gorgeous and form fitting but in a good and flattering way. However I felt like it was a little too form fitting for my work place and the longer length made it a little more formal and I did not end up wearing it - I have no upcoming events where this would be appropriate. But will keep in mind for the future.
Very flattering lines for my pear shape! I felt very put together and professional. The 18W fit me well and is my usual size.

links_reviews_title: Not for broader than average shoulders
links_reviews_text: This dress has lots of potential. I agree with other reviewers that the material is very high quality, and hold things in. Great shape for my curves! However, the back loop hole will contort for broad shoulders. I have a small chest, 34B, so this has to be a shoulder thing for me. It was also weirdly tight in the arms, like another reviewer said. In the picture you can see how it sticks out, so much so that I can't wear this. Very disappointed.

links_reviews_title: Excellent fit and length for work
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress. The fit was great, the fabric thick and forgiving, and the dress could be worn with heels to flip flops. Loved it!
I liked this for work and drinks afterwards with the girls. The fabric is nice and stretchy.
Comfortable. Eye catching flattering fit & print. Heavy weight fabric. I felt great in it & looked fantastic!
Fit has some give. i felt amazing in it, but photos don't look as good to as I felt I looked in life (stripes and curves). But it is such a sharp dress.
I like the design of this dress and the fabric is thick and flattering. My only complaint is that the band at the end of the arms is SO tight. Somewhat painfully tight. Got many compliments though!

Loved this dress for work. I am 32 weeks pregnant, and this dress was a little tight on the belly and boobs but I think it would have looked weird if I sized up (in the shoulders and length). Overall very happy with this dress. Prob won't be able to rent again until after I give birth. Would recommend!

This dress is a dream to wear! Body hugging but thick enough material so everything looks smooth. The pattern is nice. I didn't realize it was navy until I read it on the site--It still looks black and white to me. I wore it for day-tripping in NYC and also to the office. It worked for both! It's long, so it's great for taller gals. I am keeping this one on my favorites list.
This dress is so comfortable!! I wore it twice! The shape is amazing, and the design is flattering. I will rent again!

links_reviews_title: It was a very nice dress,great fabric, lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Snug but flattering, nice fabric
Wore this dress to speak at an event. The design is so interesting compared to regular stripes. Design created flattering curve hugging appearance.
Really solid and very forgiving while still sexy
Great looking dress slightly snug in the waist but not too bad, knee length. I received tons of compliments! I would wear it again.

links_reviews_title: I love, love, love this dress!!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was AMAZING!! Probably one of my favorite all time rentals! The fabric was awesome with just enough stretch. I am 6ft tall and length was perfect! Definitely rent if you are tall!!
The material was amazing. Wore with nude heels. I'm generally between a 4 & 6.

links_reviews_title: Chic tea length dress that's perfect for work. Runs a tad bit small but not by much.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wrinkle, was easy to wear, and I felt super Chic in it. Would rent again.
Comfortable fit. Flattering style. My only complaint is that the arms were tight (but that's probably me)!
Lovely sheath dress from Badgley Mischka. Hugs everything you want and hides everything you don't. Got compliments the second I got in the office

links_reviews_title: Fun and comfortable. Great design to hide figure issues
links_reviews_text: Order up 2 sizes, no slit in the back hard to take steps in. Sholders and chest area didn't fit as well the rest of the dress.
Rented during corona isolation, wore for video calls. Loved the dress, very well constructed. Will rent again!
I would rent again. PROS -Spanx friendly CONS -None-
Feel like a professional without sacrificing yoga pants feel! #quarantinepants #remoteworking
Rented the M and it was way too big . Got to wear the S but by end of night it stretched out a bit . Nice for warm weather . Fun and easy to wear

I liked these for something a little different. Wore them to a 6 year old party where the we're learning hip hop, so I felt a little cool and on brand for the occasion :D. They were definitely not fitted but weren't too baggy on the hips

links_reviews_title: Great pants for a casual professional event.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable pants but more professional looking. I wore it to a work seminar where the dress code was casual. I'm 5'2" and the length hit a bit above my ankles which was perfect for me. I got a M because I carry a little extra weight in my mid section so the pants were a little bit too baggy. A M was the right chose. I wonder if a S would fit better through the seat/legs.

links_reviews_title: Classic everyday pant with a stretchy waistband
links_reviews_text: These are comfortable and easy to wear. Nothing super special though. They do wrinkle. Went with a medium and they fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: They were ok a little big in the waist - not as polished as I was hoping for.
links_reviews_text: I think this would be cuter for a casual saturday. I got them unlimited for work and wasn't blown away by them. They were on the big size. I usually can wear a 6 or an 8 but closer to an 8. Definitely would have worn a medium and been ok.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a Holiday party instead of a dress & loved it!
links_reviews_text: The fitted bottoms are the ankles were stretched out but other then that I loved everything about these pants, the pockets, material and pattern was great!
Love these pants - a bit thinner and ran larger than expected. Great pants to dress up or down.
Didn't love these. Maybe it's me and it's the jogger, baggy, saggy fit that I like the look of on others but not the feel of on my body.
I love these pants but they were too large for me. I'll try again in XS.

links_reviews_title: Too Tight for People with Butts
links_reviews_text: These were cute and okay material. They were a little too tight on my thighs and butt for me to want to wear them. The waist band wasn't great either - just a skinnier piece of elastic so they cut into my soft areas.

links_reviews_title: Works for work & everyday, but can be odd fitting
links_reviews_text: I sized down, and it worked - but I could have gone either way! I have a bit of a booty, and the smaller size worked! I think this works if you are shorter & have the exact right outfit. Otherwise it may look a bit frumpy. I paired it with a blouse & oxfords, and it looked cute.

links_reviews_title: These pants were cute and comfy!
links_reviews_text: A little bunchy in the crotch but otherwise looked great!
Love these, great to dress up or dress down!
Fit great, casual, but up a notch! Super comfy and loved the pockets!

links_reviews_title: Love the style--too itchy to wear all day
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love these pants so much, they were absolutely adorable and easily styled. But, and this is a big but, after about 30 minutes of wearing them, they were so itchy I could no longer wear them. I immediately began looking for something else to change into and it was such a let-down.

Had high hopes since the photo showed it's a cropped pant. But my 5 foot frame was still too short for it. I only wore it once, didn't feel it was very flattering on me. But the print and quality are great!

links_reviews_title: Loved these pants but if you have a booty, size up. They fit much smaller in the seat.

links_reviews_text: These are cute. Run a little big in waist and the elastic at the bottom is not tight.
Loose pants with a professional look we're great in early pregnancy. Loved these pants!
Great substitute to jeans.

I liked these joggers but wish the fabric was a little thicker for winter wear. Minus one star for the waist tie. I don't know why the designers chose that type of tie because it keeps coming undone on its own. I was constantly retying it!
These were amazing and paired with everything. I wore them a few times with white blouse, black sweater, booties, sneakers.. all. I loved them!
The fit was fine but the fabric of the pants was uncomfortable so I didn't end up bringing them on vacation

links_reviews_title: Cute style but run VERY large
links_reviews_text: I loved the style of these pants but should have gotten a small. I usually wear a medium in pants but these in a medium were enormous.
Runs large. Did not wear.

links_reviews_title: Cute plaid but very thin and runs big
links_reviews_text: Cute plaid Jogger. Wish the material was a little thicker for fall. Unfortunately runs to big for me to wear. Size down.
If you have any booty size up. I'm typically a 4 in pants and jeans and the small was too tight through my butt and hips. They are super cute so I'm going to try a medium.

links_reviews_title: Cute for those who are long and lean
links_reviews_text: I took a chance with these pants because I am into the plaid Fall trend but these are not for the petite customer. They went past my ankles, in an attempt to roll them they still weren't tight enough to look like joggers....more like a straight leg. I don't fault the pant or it's quality, it just is not for a petite frame.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful pants but too baggy for petites
links_reviews_text: Great looking and high quality. I'm petite and had a feeling these wouldn't fit but still wanted to give it a shot. Surprisingly they fit length wise but were too baggy on me. They fit more like sweatpants on my frame.
Oh I love this sweater! It definitely is heavy but it was fine with me. I love the collar.

links_reviews_title: Glad I went up in size
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a M. I read reviews and knew I'd size up. The L was not available. Glad I did the XL because of length. Classy look and the next is beautiful!

I got this sweater for a transitional spring piece, however, the sweater was definitely thicker than I expected. Also, the collar definitely ages it quite a bit. Overall, it was a decent piece but I probably wouldn't rent again. Update: I've worn it three times in the past week alone! If styled right, it's cute but I find it doesn't go with as much as I hoped.

The size I got was a medium but I am normally a small so this is definitely a small medium. Fits beautifully and is super warm. The only con is the neck is super tight so get dressed before putting makeup on

I was surprised by how much I loved this sweater. It is definitely a bit cropped but with mid/high waisted jeans it hits at a very flattering spot. It is really comfortable and thick (I wore it without a jacket in mid 40 degree weather and was perfectly happy). The detailing on the neck is beautiful and I got so many compliments!

Gorgeous detail, soft fabric. Cons: I wore the XL as someone who is usually a medium. It made the sleeves long, but the waist just skimmed the top of my jeans. It's not itchy, but it's very heavy/thick. I was too warm inside.

This sweater is what Unlimited is all about! A lovely high quality piece - very warm and perfect for feeling more stylish in yucky winter weather - but I wd never pay that price for it so a nice treat to rent. XL fit perfectly & I am about a size 10 right now so definitely recommend sizing up.
I loved this sweater. I paired with jeans, brown suede chunky heels and a brown vintage handbag. It's heavy and warm, but a bit on the short side. It'd be an excellent apres ski sweater.
I got this for work for it's more appropriate for play. It's short but paired well with a skirt.
Very appropriate for recent polar vortex temperature. Super thick and warm fabric. Maybe a bit too cropped on a longer torso. I found it perfect for my size.

I wore this to work and on the weekends throughout the month I had it for Update, and every time I put it on my husband mentioned I looked nice that day. Cozy and comfortable and matches many things. It's cropped a little shorter than most sweaters so make sure your pants are not too low-waisted or you'll be afraid to lift your arms.

links_reviews_title: Cropped sweater... so cute and comfy and SOFT
links_reviews_text: Fit is numbers true to size (I'm a 4 and got the M which is listed as 4-6). It is very short (I'm 5'10") but works with high waisted pants. It's super soft and comfy! Not itchy at all. Love this sweater.
This sweater is cute and well made but it seems like it was washed because it was like a tween size sweater! Disappointed.
Sleeves are long but I liked them. Sweater fell just below my waist.

links_reviews_title: What made my event unforgettable? How am I supposed to answer this question?
links_reviews_text: This is a fairly soft, quite heavy sweater. It was perfect for walking around the Pacific Northwest without a coat in December. It does run small--I read the reviews and ordered an XL when I normally rent a M for tops, and it fit perfectly.
Fits close to body, did not get stretched out. So soft. A few pilly spots but in Love!
I am short but I don't care for the cropped look. So I ordered it in a larger size
Couldn't wear it. The material was way too thick for me. Additionally, it was tight and short and the collar fit weird.
Really cute, very thick material.
It was super warm and had extra long sleeves that u can cuff. The mock neck bothered me more that i thought because of the texture. But otherwise solid option.

links_reviews_title: Felt in touch with my heritage in this one
links_reviews_text: This looked like an authentic Celtic sweater. It received compliments in Boston
It's cute and warm but bulky and sort of cropped. I wouldn't rent it again. I got a small and should have gotten medium because it was very fitted.

links_reviews_title: Looks great with higher wasited pants or a skirt
links_reviews_text: Loved the raglan sleeves and high neck - very flattering.
No stretch and felt snug everywhere. (Even the neck)

links_reviews_title: Should have ordered a medium, would have made it fit better. Close to a crop but warm and cozy.
links_reviews_text: Close to a crop. Cozy
This was a pretty thick sweater. Added a lot of fluff. If I was going to Aspen for the weekend and need that layer it would have been great, but for cooler weather in Dallas it was too much.
Cute piece was just too short for my torso
Felt really stuffy on top and would've liked the length to be a bit more cropped to make up for that. But overall just an awkward fit on my 5 foot frame

This sweater also comes in blue. I rented both. They are very thick and warm, if weather permits, you would not need a coat too. Can be dressed up or worn casual. Too expensive to buy so I'll rent again.

links_reviews_title: Awesome sweater. The fabric is beautiful, extremely comfortable and not itchy.
links_reviews_text: It fits close to body and kind of short—I’m 5’4 and it hits me just below the waist. I’ve worn it a lot, but it’s a very warm sweater.
Great sweater that keeps you incredibly warm. RR suggested an XL for me, which was a flattering fit in the bust. The sleeves were too long and overall ran large. I would rent again a size down.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater - very warm and nice design with the weaved stitching.
links_reviews_text: The sweater was very thick and by the end of the day a little too itchy for me.
Very heavy and well structured

This sweater looked so pretty in the photos. I expected it to have the fit of a shift but it was awkwardly fitted in some places and massively bulky. It may have just been that it didn't work with my figure but it was not at all flattering. However, the material was very cozy and didn't itch. Hopefully it works for someone else!

links_reviews_title: Did not look like what I expected.
links_reviews_text: The fit is very tight around the neck and also quite short.

This is a beautifully made sweater that is very warm and soft. Those are the positives now to the negatives : The sweater is very cropped so in less you’re wearing a mid rise are high rise pants your tummy is going to be showing. I would also suggest sizing up. The medium felt nice and roomy however it still didn’t offer much length. The overall style of the sweater is not very figure flattering particularly for those at the larger chest. I would not rent this again and less I was very petite and very cold LOL ! 🤣

This sweater is very thick and warm. It runs very small, which I had read from other reviews. I normally wear a small and rented the medium. It fit just right. The material is very soft and cozy. Since the material is rather thick, it flattened out my small upper body even more than normal. It wasn't my favorite look, but would be great for someone with more curves/larger chest.
I rented this for a ski trip to Breckenridge and it was perfect. Super thick and warm but still cute and somewhat fitted. Really beautiful crochet detail on collar

links_reviews_title: Warm like a fisherman's knit sweater
links_reviews_text: Liked. Ordered large and for well. Sleeves are long but easily cuffed. Warm and toasty for a day outside. Only complaint was did show its wear with a bit of pilling. Still nice sweater for casual wear
Warm, perfect sweater.

Wore this out to dinner with friends. Got lots of compliments! It's a great piece if you just want to change things up a little. Great color! Great pattern. Looks better in person, photos don't do it justice. Also love this dress for a big dinner, cause - well it's loose. :)

This dress was everything. I rented twice, and will certainly rent again. Loved everything about it. The details are spectacular : puff sleeves, collar, buttons down the back, and Pockets! Such a unique piece.
This dress was soooo chic! It's pretty roomy so not the most flattering but 10/10 for chicness

links_reviews_title: Unique dress with SO many ways to wear!
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress - tons of compliments. Wore it so much throughout the month of August. Perfect for day and night. Super trendy!
Love this dress! it's lightweight, has an amazing color and the sleeves are the perfect on trend puff. Fits true to size and will get compliments all day.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful print and eye catching dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this dress- the high collar, the puffy shoulders, the length, the fabric and the pockets! Only downside is the back is all buttons so you need someone to help you put it on. Otherwise it was just perfect!
I was worried about looking like a line backer but the poufy sleeves totally worked. Everyone loved the color and it was a easy dress for in between seasons.

Love this dress, the print the shoulder, the fit BUT I wore it to work and every time I sat down and stood up the buttons in the back would open! Showing my back side like a hospital gown. I should have safety pinned it. But I love it!

Dress is gorgeous. Such a fun print with amazing shoulder details. I almost didn't order thinking it'd be too short for work but the length is perfect. I order a six but actually could have gone down a size. Such a fun summer dress - could easily transition to fall with a pair of boots.
