Cute, but way too big and the neck was really large. Ordered in smaller size, and we'll see.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to wear for work but dress was too short and summery. Might rent for summertime
links_reviews_text: Even though model has styled it with boots it is very lightweight material. Save for summer rental. Very bold print and colors
Loves the ruffle neckline and slight poof in the sleeves! Very comfortable and had pockets! I sized up up one size and did not need to, was a bit roomy.

I wore this to dinner for Valentine's day and felt so cute in it! The colors and beautiful and vibrant, and the puffy sleeves and frilly collar felt feminine and flirty. It's cut very loose, so I will probably size down if I rent it again.

But my boyfriend said it looked like a painting smock. I sized down to a 4, and it was still pretty big and puffy all around. I never would guess I'd wear a 2, but curious how that would have fit. Loved the fun colors and the short cut
Super comfy dress that hides a post partum tummy! Dressed up with black tights and leather boots. Loved the color and the tie dye. So fun!

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love this more for colors/patterns
links_reviews_text: But fabric was disappointing. Cottony with no sheen and wrinkly texture. Was hoping for silk / crepe.

LOVE LOVE this dress. I wish I could buy it. I got so many compliments and people asking about it. The colors are perfect and the crisp cotton is really fine. The tie dye is adorable without looking childish or inexpensive. I really think you should try this out if you're thinking about it. To top it all off, it's incredibly comfortable
loved this - lots of compliments. it runs big - i wore a 2 and could have used a 0.

links_reviews_title: Great colors and fun to wear
links_reviews_text: Rented for a date night and it was perfect. Shoulders are puffy, good high neck and it has a forgiving loose cut. Colors are fun and it is funky with combat boots :)
The shoulders are too ridiculous alongside how loud the dress print is. I took one look at myself and laughed and put it right back in the garment bag.
this dress is so cute! color in right on point. and puffy sleeves make this dress fashion forward
They fit really nice! Fun touch on the sides, would rent again

These jeans have NO stretch so I'm glad I sized up. They're pretty tight the first time you put them on, but like a very good pair of jeans they eventually mold to your body. I really like the little detailing up the side - it's really fun and adds a little interest. Definitely considering buying these.

links_reviews_title: love the details and the fit!
links_reviews_text: love the tight fit, so many compliments! length is perfect too

links_reviews_title: Cute and casual but a little thick
links_reviews_text: These pants fit perfect size but they just felt a little thicker than normal jeans. I liked them and i wore them 3 times and then I got sick of them.

links_reviews_title: Lovely fit. Made to look oversized
links_reviews_text: Very on trend
Would size up for more loose fit
I got so many compliments wearing these. Very cute and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Love this jeans, true to size!

links_reviews_text: Loved them so much! Fit like a typical 501 and love the button fly.
Very trendy, loved the way they fit.
I liked this sweater a lot more than I expected. The fringe is fun. And it's really warm.

links_reviews_title: Curious how it would fit if I sized down
links_reviews_text: I LOVE the look of this jacket when searching on RTR I just don't know if it was the right fit for me. I would definitely try a size smaller to see if a fitted look would be better for me. Other than size the structure and design is awesome.
Very cozy and easy to layer with a tee or thin turtleneck underneath. It fit great and was super soft.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Colorado Chic / you could sleep in it
links_reviews_text: This jacket was easy to throw over anything from a dress to a casual outfit. It instant puts you on trend and is so comfy that it feels like you are wearing a blanket.
Well made jacket. Supposed to be oversized, but I ordered XS because I wanted it a bit more fitted.
So cozy and can work as a jacket or as a sweater. True to size.
Wore this to a cowboys football game. Was perfect weight for a nice New York fall day!
This jacket can be worn to work or on the weekend hanging with friends. It's so comfortable and flattering. The fringe makes it so fashionable - I love it!

This sweater runs really big. It runs big in a way that is unflattering and not an oversized look. The fringe sticks out instead of falling down and it doesn't look right. It looks like a a lot of fabric. The sweater also doesn't have the normal stretch of a cardigan just FYI. A pro is that it is both blue and black (which I didn't realize) so you can pair this with black pants & jeans, although I did not get a chance to wear this because it looked so large.

really liked this sweater. it was different and unique to the usual knits I wear. Usually a 12, ordered this in L and felt the arms were too tight. I wore it and was fine, just felt too restricting for how I normally like to wear sweaters- lose and cozy. Cute with white top and jeans for a casual office day. Overall would recommend this.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, Classic but also stands out
links_reviews_text: Was perfect for casual work and then casual hang with friends! A little slim on the sleeves, thin layers only underneath

links_reviews_title: Cute statement coat, but bigger than expected
links_reviews_text: Small was looser than I would have expected. Size down if you want it to be more fitted!
Love this! I think the sleeves are a little shorter than depicted on the model, could've maybe sized up but then again might've been very boxy. Really enjoyed this piece! easy to throw on
So cute and stylish! It's so easy to pair with outfits and great for fall/winter. I'll def be renting again.
I loved this jacket! Fit was great. I have really long arms, and it was the right length for a L (bust size was a little larger but it wasn't anything terrible). I got tons of compliments
Fun warm fridge jacket that went great with black jeans. I would rent again for fall activities.
It was very warm and was an awesome fit.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful coat, nice design and rich touch
links_reviews_text: The small wasn't available so went with a large. Just way too big.
I really wanted to love this coat, but somehow I couldn't... it's warm and has a good fit, but i wasn't the best coat I've ever worn, which for the price it should have...

links_reviews_title: Great coat for an upscale vacation
links_reviews_text: This coat is gorgeous. It is heavy, warm, and oversized. I wanted to purchase it! I wore it over many different vacation outfits, including dresses.
Coat isn't flattering. Hangs like I'm wearing my tall boyfriends blazer. Flares out at the bottom, would be nice it it were a slimmer cut.

This is much longer on me than it looks on the model. I'm 5'4" and it comes to mid-thigh but it still looks great, just more of coat on me than a jacket. There is only one button to keep the cold out, but the fabric is very warm.
If you need to rent a coat for an 18th century costume, then you should rent this! The arms are long and wide. The whole coat is thick wool and uncomfortable.

links_reviews_title: Heavy enough jacket to keep you warm in sub-30 temps
links_reviews_text: Pro: heavy and very warm. Con: I couldn't figure out the front button and there's slits in the back and it's kind of oversized

I put this on and found it was way too large. I rented a L and usually wear a M. I wanted it for a fall coat, but it was baggy, had no style, and didn't compliment me at all. My husband looked at it and said, "no way". I might have tried for a M, but I felt the lack of style would be the same. Too bad, because it is nice quality fabric and well made. I didn't even wear it once.

links_reviews_title: A winter coat, not a suit jacket
links_reviews_text: I thought this could go with blouses but it's actually a proper coat for cold weather. That said, it was much too large and manly. My mom said I looked like I was wearing my father's coat. Returned it without wearing out.

links_reviews_title: It's perfect if you're into Charlie Chaplin cosplay
links_reviews_text: If you're not dress for Halloween as the kid in Big or Charlie Chaplin, do. not. rent. You look like you were wearing an interesting tuxedo style wool coat before you were cursed and shrunk two feet. My husband laughed and said no. He has never done that.

links_reviews_title: Good quality, but too big for a petite
links_reviews_text: This is a warm and heavy jacket that would be great in the fall and winter. However I'm 5' and the sleeves are too long and it's also too wide at the hips. Good quality item, but not the right proportions for a petite. Returning.

These are super comfortable and loose-fitting (which I prefer). Size down if you like a snugger fit. I wore them 4x! Dressed down with a sweatshirt and sneakers and dressed up with a silky floral blouse and booties.
Cute and comfy pants. The medium was pretty y loose on me. If you like a more snug fit, size down.
I rented this for comic con. The medium was a tiny bit big on me but it fit comfortable & loose.

So I bought them. Just the right fit. Flattering. Perfect length. So comfy. I didn't want to pay the price, but decided they were worth it since I couldn't stop wearing them. :-) Highly recommend for everyday.

These pants are so cozy and comfy. They are different than what I would normally wear. They fit perfect right out of the bag but as I wore them, they got more and more baggy. I might have been able to go a size down. I'll order again. I'm a normal size 14 and ordered an XL.
A little tight in the butt and hips and loose in the waist. Overall comfy and easy to style.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and cute, runs a bit large
links_reviews_text: Super easy to throw on and goes with everything, a bit baggy in the butt area which has never been a problem for me before so I think I could have sized down, but the medium was comfortable and I still wore it multiple times

I was worried because these fit a little snug. Shortly after wearing them, my fears slipped away! I adore these pants. Will be buying them to keep in my collection. Thank you RTR for this fabulous piece!

This might be my first rtr keeper. These are so comfy so versatile and all around great pants. I should've gone with xs (117#, 5'3") as they stretch out a bit with wear but still looks great a little slouchy.
Comfortable for my long trip in Kenya. Fits at the hip.
The pants fit a little loose, I probably should have gotten a medium. They arrived with what looked like grease stains on them so I didn't keep them. Fun casual pants though.
Like these a lot! Super comfy, true to size, and look good too. Perhaps a smidge long for a petite person like me, but I expect to wear these a few times (or even buy!) before returning.

I loved these pants and got compliments on them! I wore them with a two different tops and liked both looks, they are more brighter green then on the photo, if they were an olive green I would keep them longer. but overall the fit was great, not too tight and not too baggy, a nice change from wearing jeans

I rented these to take with me on a vacation to California. I am normally a size 4 or medium. I was going to get a medium in these until I read a review that said they stretch out. I knew I would be wearing these for a few hours so risked getting the small. The small was a little more snug than I would have liked, but not as tight as I expected for someone who doesn't normally wear a small in pants. They stretched out a little bit but not too much, and ended up being the perfect pant for me. Even the length was great for being under 5'2".
Stupid comfy!!!! Can wear with so many things. I might keep this one!!!! Seriosly PJ level comfy.

Love!!! These cargo pants by Sanctuary are amazing to wear to any event. I recommend sizing up for a backup, the waist tie can adjust the pants tighter. I love how the hem of the pants scrunch up. I would pair these pants with sneakers to dress it down or a pair of strappy heels.

These pants fit great and were incredibly comfy! Most pants from RTR never fit my hips and butt but these were perfect. Only reason i didnt give 5 stars was because they were a little long. Ankle length on my 5'3 frame
Slightly large at waist and tight on thighs which made them fine for staying at home.

links_reviews_title: I LOVE this pants. They fit perfectly and are so comfortable to wear. I loved them & I bought them!

links_reviews_text: Good for a casual day running around.

links_reviews_title: Love these pants! So well fitting!

links_reviews_text: A great pant for everyday. Definitely some stretch so if you want a tighter fit, size down. No binding at the waist and an easy elastic band.
I would rent again
Flattering, chic, can dress up or down

I can't describe how much I love these. They fit true to size, are super cute and casual and I'm in love. I would 100% rent these again and am considering buying them. They're relaxed and comfortable without being frumpy and perfect for running around on the weekends.

links_reviews_title: Cute cargo pants, can be dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: The review questions are innaccurate; these pants are number sized not letter. I rented and then purchased a size twenty (I'm in between an 18 and a 20). Like the zipper detail on the ankle.

links_reviews_title: Comfy pants, liked the zip detail on the leg.
links_reviews_text: A bit saggy in the butt, but they still wore well on a petite woman.

These pants are really great and I love the sturdiness of the quality of the fabric. I really needed a small but they were so cute I ended up wearing them and rolling the waist band to shorten and tighten them. I recommend but size down!
The pants were a bit loose down the length of the leg, but were comfortable and great for everyday wear.
Very good pants!
Great pants for weekends and casual days. Wore these a bunch on my family vacation with tees and flip flops. Flattering and very comfy.

links_reviews_title: Loved so much I bought them!
links_reviews_text: Love this brand and loved these pants so much I decided to buy them after holding on to them for a bit.

links_reviews_title: Can dress up for work or wear casually.
links_reviews_text: So comfortable! Have been wearing them at 20 weeks pregnant, and they are the best!

I wear 18 in pants and jeans and wore the 2x. These were extra comfortable, roomy and light. I wore them to work with a Tanya Taylor blouse and received compliments. I even wore them to roller skating.
I really wanted to like these pants. They were just too big in the crotch, hip. Fabric was nice and if they had fit I probably would have bought them.
cute stylish everyday pants
These were very comfortable, and flattering on me (a size 14 in an XL).
Quite roomy in the stomach and hips for an apple shape. They hold up even after a long day of bending and moving.
Roomy and comfy pants - looked so cute with fitted top and denim jacket. Color was great and style was flattering.

links_reviews_title: warm and casual, but runs a bit big
links_reviews_text: great monochrome flannel and incredibly warm. It does run large so next time I will have to size down but it works if you like an oversized look, or maybe tie the front.
Comfy flannel button down shirt. Cute with black Leggings and knee high boots!
This is probably one of my favorite pieces I have rented. The material is really nice and structured. The shirt is meant to be oversized and is a bit longer in the back. Perfect for leggings!

links_reviews_title: Extremely soft luxurious flannel- husband said it looked like I was wearing another man's shirt
links_reviews_text: This flannel is out of this world luxurious- it's incredibly warm but not hot so you feel comfortable and cozy indoors. It's just right during a cold day. The fit runs HUGE. Like a tent. My husband said it looked like I was wearing another man's shirt. It was nice to wear on a casual thanksgiving day with leggings and booties with my family as we played dominos. I probably won't rent again, but I think everyone should rent this just to experience this type of flannel- out of this world!
This Flannel is great quality however runs very large. I rented the XS and was swimming in it. Great for layering on cold days, and very comfortable.

I got this for an every day top and have worn it dressed down with uggs and leggings as well as dressed up as shown in the photo. The fit is intentionally oversized but i'm a big fan of oversized things! super warm as well!
Too big. I'm sure it is supposed to run a little big but his just looks sloppy. I think an xs would still be too big. Fabric is soft but it's not all that pretty either.
Too big but it still worked. Great for everyday wear and good quality. I would rent an XS next time.
Nice shirt. Runs very large. Size down for sure!
Heavy oversized flannel. perfect for lounging and causal weekend looks.
Soft and cozy. Oversized
Did not wear. Shirt was huge - and not in a cute/flattering way. Rented medium which is my usual size.
Didn't even wear, small was like a tent.
huge and bulky. nice fabric but the fit is just enormous on a petite frame - both long and wide.

links_reviews_title: Love it other than the structure!
links_reviews_text: I love the material or this shirt and I want to love it so badly that I ordered it again in a smaller size but it's still just way too bog and boxy! Maybe it's just my body type though?

links_reviews_title: Super soft yet not to heavy
links_reviews_text: I loved this flannel the material is so soft yet not too warm. The only down side was it was really oversized so definitely size down on this one.

I had no idea flannel could be flattering, but this shirt has literally blown my mind. Such great quality fabric, the cut is oversized (but within reason). It doesn't look like you're swimming in it. The cut is flawless! O b s e s s e d

links_reviews_title: Very cute and soft. Runs true to size if you want a slightly looser look.

links_reviews_text: A bit bigger than I was expecting but its comfortable and the wool isn't itchy
I wish this was cheaper bc I'm in love with it! It's a funky mashup of patterns, got an extra large for a more relaxed fit. It's a thick knit and will keep you warm, highly recommend this look!
Great for work. Wore to holiday party. Soft material and not too heavy. Left side shoulder was a little on the larger size compared to the right. Overall liked it though.
I love the patchwork pattern of this sweater. The material is soft and not itchy. Loved this rental so much.
Great autumn sweater, warm and quirky chic. Fun piece but looks put together. My friend really liked it on me as well!

Absolutely love this sweater. It's 100% wool yet still soft and so well made. The colors and fit are perfect. I'm usually a S/M and after trying both in this, the S is perfect. The M overwhelmed my petite frame a bit and the sleeves were way too long.

Super comfy sweater! The details are awesome. I wore it on an extremely warm day and if definitely kept me warm! It has a croppedish fit so size up if you're in between sizes and want to wear to work or something. I probably could've fit in the XS but I loved it as is!

links_reviews_title: Pair with a Pleated Skirt For An Elevated Look
links_reviews_text: There are no complaints. Not itchy. Perfect sleeve length. Super comfy. Cozy. Not too long, easy to do a front tuck, love the color block patchwork

links_reviews_title: I loved this sweater so much I want to wear it during the summer, too.
links_reviews_text: It fit true to size, was quirky to wear on its own and simple enough to pair with other patterns. I loved it!
This sweater is somewhat cropped, but has a very cute relaxed look. It was not itchy at all, and was not too warm to wear inside. Really enjoyed it!
worn in the video with alexa chung and camille charriere

From the photos, I deduced this sweater was a bit short, so I went a size up and took it in a "boyfriend sweater" kind of direction. It hits about right in terms of length, but is kind of big, but still looks super cute. I put a short sleeve collared white shirt underneath and boom -- casual fantastico. Got lots of good comments, from young hip ladies to my mother, who knits and has a very good eye. It's also 100% wool, so this sucker is WARM. Wore it to a hockey game last night with a Columbia performance shirt underneath and I DID NOT GET GOLD FOR THE ENTIRE GAME. That never happens. So, as you an tell, I really like this sweater! :)
RTR please bring in more ALEXACHUNG pieces! I absolutely love this comfiness and design of this sweater! Tempted to buy, but still too pricy. Standout piece.
Love this sweater. A little itchy so I layered a long-sleeved t-shirt underneath.

This sweater is gorgeous, fit well, super high quality and comfortable. I wore it about five times, and got several compliments each time. I was so sad to send it back! I would've bought it but it was wayyy to pricey.

Soft, warm and cleverly designed patchwork crew neck sweater in a very nice color palette. I am renting a second time because it works with jeans or palazzo pants and is just right for this time of year. I did not find it itchy at all.
Great for every day with a pair of jeans!

I wore this to work on casual Friday and on a flight to Denver, and it was fabulous. It's the perfect balance of cozy and chic, and the fit is really flattering (as far as sweaters go). It hit right at the top of my hip. Because of the different weaves, one of the arms (the dark brown) fits tighter than the other arm (the camel brown), but it's not very noticeable - and, honestly, it kind of adds to the off-kilter cuteness of the whole sweater. My boss, who either wears dad jeans or three-piece suits, really liked it, so make of that what you will, haha.
Again, felt a little worn but the quality is still good and it's a great sweater to throw on over jeans or a skirt.
I liked the look and feel of this sweater, but it was too short for me
Im a big alexa chung fan and was soooo impressed by this sweater. Super warm and not itchy literally at all. She nails knits every single time. So good i wish i could buy it!
Comfortable, cozy, unique.

links_reviews_title: Great on-trend (color block) sweater with fun details/texture for fall weekends.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a medium and the sleeves had to be cuffed because they were too long. There was some extra room in the fit, but because it is a casual sweater that didn't matter to me that much. I love the design, color and details of this sweater. It is color-blocked and also has a mixture of textures from knit, to cableknit, tight weaves to looser ones, plus some raised seams... so well made/interesting!.
Loved this cozy sweater. It's literally perfect for a fall afternoon because you don't need a coat.
Loved this sweater for everyday wear. It was cropped a little so it hit in a really flattering place without being a crop top/showing any midriff

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved it! I wore it three times - to work, a day party, and dinner out.
links_reviews_text: It was a great fit - I was worried it would be cropped but it fit perfectly. Really cool texture too!

Really warm and colorful sweater. I tried on small and XS and went with the XS bc it fit me better on the shoulders. Sits a bit short on the torso so if I raised my arms my tummy would show so something to be mindful of. Hits big in the shoulders but I still loved the fit overall

Loved this sweater- did not want to send back. Looked great with jeans and skirts; wool is soft, warm and not itchy. Very well made. I usually wear a small, but went with a medium and I'm happy I did, but I prefer a bit of roominess. Want to feel like the cool girl in the room? Get.

links_reviews_title: Color is amazing but not super flattering
links_reviews_text: Fabric is lux, but oversized and not super flattering.
Runs large. Size down. Had to iron. Comfy and bright.
Rented this for vacation. A little heavier than I expected but a nice color.
You could definitely size down in this dress. It fits like a mumu, but the belt doesn't help at all.
I loved the color and size of the bag! Perfect for everyday bag.

links_reviews_title: A little darker in person than it looked online.
links_reviews_text: The straps are such that you can wear it long, cross body or under you arm. Very cute and versatile.
The color is more brown than I expected via photos but it still worked when wearing black.
This is such a cute bag. The color was a little darker than I was expecting, but it was perfect for my work trip and matched everything.

links_reviews_title: I'm not sure who would look good in this
links_reviews_text: The tie comes up below the breast line and is a muted navy color, making it seem highly faded. I'm not sure who would look good in this, but it for sure wasn't me. Sizing was spot on though, in a 4-6 top and this fit my shoulders well.

links_reviews_title: A good basic top for every day wear!
links_reviews_text: It was comfortable and didn't wrinkle all day!

A cascading tie adds a contemporary-cool touch to this crisp poplin shirt by VINCE. This top is incredibly lightweight and perfect for layering or between seasons. An easy buttonup shirt with a modern twist, I tied a small bow in the front to add a feminine touch. I paired with business-casual striped pants for work. Running true to size, my typical size runs between 0 and 2 but size up due to having a larger chest. The 2 was comfortable giving a bit of an oversized look to it. Would recommend to any working woman looking to make a subtle statement!
I thought it was gonna be oversized but it's not it's weird. If I sized up two sizes I might've liked it

links_reviews_title: Wasn't as flattering on me but very chic and cool

links_reviews_text: Loose fit.
The fit is a little oversized and I loved the tie detail. It's a great twist on a basic button down for work

links_reviews_title: Modern twits on a button up
links_reviews_text: Modern edgy minimalistic
Title says it all. This is a quick grab out of the closet. Easy to style up or down. Will definitely be renting again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for work and then an evening dinner and event. It was great - should have bought it...
links_reviews_text: Fit can be snug if you tie it that way.
It's loose, but runs a little small

Nice color and a cool detail to a regular button up top. I looked one side through the loop and tied it to one side - it looked best this way. The top crops shorter when tied so I wore this with high waisted pants.

links_reviews_title: Loved this shirt! Will probably rent again
links_reviews_text: Great for work

links_reviews_title: Super classic but elevated and unique
links_reviews_text: Comfortable- is like a midnight navy color
I couldn't figure this shirt out. It's a stiff material which I didn't expect.
runs true to size and the tie ads a cute contemporary touch to it.

This shirt will work with some outfits, but is difficult to balance. With many bottoms, the overall appearance is dowdy. I wore this with a silky skirt, which toned down the skirt for daytime and dressed this up a bit.
The front is cropped and was too short and tight to wear. I would size up

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing it, but v pretty!
links_reviews_text: Love the tie waist. Looks better tied to the side.
I didn't like it. I was always tugging at it. It felt like it needed constant adjusting. I was surprised how many people liked it when I was feeling so uncomfortable.
I'm 5 8" with a larger bust. Because of my height and breast, the shirt was way to short for me. Also, where the shirt cinches is not flattering on a larger bust.

These were great for all manner of events. I wore them on vacation, to walk on the beach, to a nice lunch, to work. Great all around. Wish they were softer inside (a bit stiff and bordering on scratchy) but comfy enough. Flattering and worked for a pear shape.
These marni pants were cute and flattering, but the material was super thick and sort of itchy. Wouldn't rent again.
Runs large. Great fur curvy bodies

These are sooooo big. I sized down one size and should have gone down two. But, they are super cute and stand out. I got lots of compliments even just wearing them to work and around town. I had a little trouble styling them but found a simple white shirt to be dressy enough so the pants didn't look like pajamas!

These are really cool and very high quality - the pockets zip closed and the rib-knit of the cuffs and waist is very luxe. They are amazing if you have the opportunity to dress casually but need to look really put-together and stylish. The fit was great as they are shaped like a sweatpant but fairly slim-cut, and the length was perfect on me - came all the way down to my ankle (not really cropped when standing) but did not pool in the leg which I think makes a jogger look sloppy. I only wore once and I’m glad I tried them / might rent again, but the fact is despite being sweatpants they aren’t in the end all that comfortable - the material is tight-knit and somewhat stiff, almost a little scratchy. If I’m wearing sweatpants I kind of want the benefit of feeling like I’m wearing sweatpants.

links_reviews_title: Love the print and confront of these joggers
links_reviews_text: I needed a fashionable casual look for work meetings. I wore these pants three times It's very comfortable but big in waist. However the next smaller size would be too tight in the thighs. The weight of these joggers are great for sam FRANCISCO is perhaps colder climates. But they don't pack well.

links_reviews_title: Roomy and comfy and very cool but not "flattering" per se
links_reviews_text: Very roomy and relaxed fit; I wore long underwear underneath for the polar vortex and it was still super easy fitting. I LOVE these pants but I wouldn't wear them if I needed to convince (trick?) people into thinking that I am really slim.

Some people commented that I looked like I was wearing pajamas, one said they looked liked mc hammer pants. I loved them. The waist is not really flattering, but they are fun. Dressed up with a turtleneck and cardigan, also more casual with graphic tshirt.

links_reviews_title: Italian made! Sterdy fabric. Just ran too big
links_reviews_text: Too big, thick fabric
Cute pants but are very thick- not suitable for summer. 36 was too big. I wanted a size smaller (unavailable) but even then I don't think they would have fit.
Definitely runs large. I'm typically a 10 and sized down to a 6 based on reviews. It still fit loosely, but appropriately so. Nice casual wear.
Big.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, but material is very thick
links_reviews_text: These were obviously very well-made pants with cool pocket zippers. But the material was much thicker/heavier than I expected and made them feel much more like a Winter pant. They read very casual...like a fancy sweatpant...which was fine for me but may not be appropriate for work or something more formal. They definitely ran large but I'm postpartum at the moment so I didn't mind!

links_reviews_title: Cute everyday pants, got lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: they're a little large on top.
Thick material so good spring or fall pant not a Summer pant due to thickness. So cute though!!

links_reviews_title: Love the pattern and colors, especially the green stripe down the sides.
links_reviews_text: Bulkier than I was expecting, the material is pretty thick (with the waistband even thicker).
The material was a lot rougher than I expected and, unfortunately, it irritated my sensitive skin. So I couldn't wear these pants.
The fit of these was just off. Based on other reviews I sized down, but the volume of these combined with the short length made these unwearable. It's a fun print, but the fit is just off.

links_reviews_title: Amazing!!!! Comfortable, cute and unexpected - L-O-V-E!!
links_reviews_text: These pants are super comfortable, flattering and cute! I am in love with them (and I was on the fence about them when I ordered) - These pants are like a perfect new haircut - you just want to go out so more people can see you in them - super cute with heels, booties, and flats!

links_reviews_title: Fun pattern and style, but just not right for me.
links_reviews_text: TTS. The waistband and ankle cuffs are very heavy ribbed knit. The print is turquoise, black, and a reddish brown.

links_reviews_title: Corporate visit nailed! Chic pants that are an easy way to upgrade your look!
links_reviews_text: Love the print, details, and saturated color palette. High-waisted which helps cover anything unflattering while remaining chic and stylish.
These were fun pants to wear for a daytime celebration! The fabric is thick and really nice feeling. I paired it with a white crop top and heeled booties.

I usually wear 10-12 in pants right now (I'm postpartum do my abs don't exist yet but I'm about an 8 in my hips/butt/legs). To be safe I rented the largest size in these.. they run very very big! I definitely could have sized down 2-3 sizes. The pants were very comfortable and cute, but I just couldn't manage it a second time bc of how baggy they were. These might be a great maternity item.
Very flattering fit, comfortable and cool! Loved these pants. Would wear them every day if I could.
These are one of my favorite rentals. I love these and want to buy them. They can be dressed up or worn casually.

links_reviews_title: The pants are easy to match with different tops and shoes!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is a bit coarse but overall comfortable to wear.
These fit horrible. The waist would go all the way to under my busy. Very large in general.

I love these pants so much. The material was thick, the design and colors fashionable and they were so comfortable. I got a ton of compliments on them from my colleagues. Everyone should experience wearing $900 sweatpants! Other reviewers recommended sizing down so I did that and it worked out well.

Just what most reviews had said...these are huge! I ordered the down a size and just as if they ere two sizes to big. the fabric also just didn't drape well and they were short on me and I'm only 5'4"

links_reviews_title: they were a bit big but very cool
links_reviews_text: they are also bulky so more relaxed than sporty
Fabric was stiffer than I was expecting. Fit well, but not super comfortable.

The pant is a little thicker, so if you do not have long legs they "wear you"... if that makes sense! I liked them, and they were fine but I would not re-rent them again! The material is very thick, so great for cooler weather.
I wore them even though they were too big because they were so fun! Going to rent smaller size soon.

links_reviews_title: Good quality. Unique pattern. Nice fabric.
links_reviews_text: True to size.

links_reviews_title: Cute pants for a weekend statement piece. Super comfortable.
links_reviews_text: True to the picture.

links_reviews_title: Just did not fit well. Very big in the waist area. Material made it feel clunky.
links_reviews_text: Tried wearing it with the matching top and I felt like a mall walker. Then with a small tank top, the waist area was too thick. Couldn't make it work no matter how I tried
too large, oversized
Too big to wear.
Too big
These run really large and are NOT slim fit or skinny jeans. They also ran a little long, so maybe good for tallish girls. All in all, nothing special about these jeans.
I love these! They fit like they were made for me. Comfy and flattering on my bum. I am 5'9"/5'10", so they were a tiny bit short, but with with right shoes, that didn't matter at all

links_reviews_title: Runs way too large, even the smallest size was 2 sizes too big
links_reviews_text: Cute otherwise
I know it is supposed to be baggy, but this cut was super unflattering.

A little baggie, I had to size down roughly two sizes ( I'm usually a 28 or 27 ) they were not particularly flattering and were just a teensy bit short and I'm 5'4 but I really enjoyed wearing them and just rolled the bottom they were really comfortable.
I ordered the wrong size so didn't wear.

I selected these jeans as a way to try out a new style, but they did not work for me at all. I have long legs and a long torso, so they didn't look right no matter how I styled them. Never wore them, but happy to have learned that style & cut doesn't work for me.

Rare to wear baggy jeans anymore but that's basically what these are in a fun & relaxed way. Took them on vacation, wore to work, and good all around casual jeans. Def considered buying. Boyfriend style runs loose.

These were well made and basic, but I didn't love them. I think they would be more flattering on someone with a straighter body type. On me, they ended up being formfitting on the upper leg and loose on the lower leg--would look better if they were loose all over. Cute jeans, probably the "boyfriend fit" just isn't flattering for my hourglass body type!

links_reviews_title: Jeans were a little baggier fit than I expected but they were comfortable and fine for casual wear
links_reviews_text: Baggier fit, more of a mom jean than I expected but they were comfortable for running errands
Would size down to a 25 as the 26 was a little bit loose.
Pretty basic.

links_reviews_title: Super soft love these jeans however run little big
links_reviews_text: The jeans were super comfortable and soft ran just slightly big but rolled up bottoms and wore with booties and fitted top cute!
Like the color but the fit was large and boxy.
Good for everyday.

links_reviews_title: Wayyy too big and frumpy style.
links_reviews_text: I buy this size in other brands and fir perfect. These where huge on me in all areas.
Great fit, stretched out a bit with wear but overall a great pair of jeans. I wore them a bunch!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear. 2 sizes to big
links_reviews_text: Usually, I wear a 26 in jeans and 25 or 26 in boyfriend fit for the loose fit. These did not fit like a boyfriend fit so the 26 just looked big as if they were a 28. Big waist, big hips, big crotch. Did not wear. I will try to order again but in a 24.
A bit baggy
great jean
Sort of mom-Jean like. Weren't as cute as I expected.
I know these are supposed to have a more relaxed fit but they do run large and stretched out quite a bit after just one wear. Probably would go down a size if rented again. Still great for everyday!

links_reviews_title: Super cute pair of classic jeans
links_reviews_text: Classic, non-stretch pair of jeans. This particular pair is great for us short ladies. Would suggest sizing up if you have a bit of a belly.
These boyfriend jeans are labeled slim but do run large. I could have sized down.

Size down!! I usually wear a size six, so in jeans a 27 or 28 depending on the brand. I read online that these run big so I rented a 26 and they were still big, also way too long. I guess it's a boyfriend jean so supposed to be loose but RTR photo made these look like a slim fit.
Comfy and soft. If you can get it go for it. I wish I could live in this one.
Beautiful cardigan with heavy silk "lapels". I could wear this every day. Made me feel like a million bucks. Goes great with jeans or leggings.
Heavy and long! Loved the thumb holes and had a lot of compliments!
Great sweater for fall in NYC. Wore it multiple times in the week that I rented it. Considered buying it until I saw the price.

links_reviews_title: Fit for First-Class.-Perfect traveling companion for fluctuating temperatures.
links_reviews_text: Pairing options galore; dress this knit up or down. Slim-cut arms best with thinner layer underneath.

I like this brand so tried this sweater. It's kinda quirky and I like it like that! I wore it out one night to a dinner/music club and again to a casual work event and it was a champ. I did use a bit of double stick tape to hold the collar in place, which wAs needed. Would rent again.

Nice sweater. I love the detail of the contrasting fabric on the font. I think it would look better with a skinny crop jean or legging. I'm not wild about the way I paired it. Sweater is warmer than I expected.

I usually pick something eye-catching and special from RTR, so this was a bit more low key for me. Paired it with an oversized white button-down, dark jeans, and my trusty Doc Martens for a casual vibe that still brings it. Not your every day cardigan but kept me warm with a sense of style. The XL fit like a 12.
Fitted arms. Super long length. Wear with a solid tank underneath and it's perfect for the office. I wore with black leggings. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Amazing versatile cardigan got so many compliments and was so comfy and warm for travel in Europe!
links_reviews_text: #flattering #layer #classy

I love this long cardigan! It is the perfect weight- not too hot but warm enough, if that makes sense. The suede detail is fun and unexpected. The sleeves are a little long, but I was able to roll them up no problem. It does have thumb holes so I guess if you're using those it would cover your hands. I'll def rent again as part of my Unlimited!
I wore this to work. A really nicely made and super comfortable cardigan. Lived the finger holes and pockets. I would rent again.
Love the fit and color. Great with jeans. And it has pockets!
Perfect long cardigan for a chilly fall. Felt nice and high quality. Perfect fit.

I rented this in hopes of taking it on my Europe vacation to wear as my open-cardi. But it was not to be. It is very frumpy - but maybe the size was too big for me? Also, the sweater material was very scratchy. It would not be comfortable for travel or to lounge in. I did like the thumb holes. Returned immediately.

This was a lovely sweater with good pockets that is super unique with the collar. I share others' skepticism that this is worth the 4-figure price tag but it was fun to wear nonetheless. Wore on a spring day that was not too hot but definitely not cold and it was the ideal weight for both indoor and outdoor.
Wore this to work for three separate occasions. Love the length and fit across the front. Very professional.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to see what an $1100 sweater was like
links_reviews_text: Really well made and comfortable. Looks fab with nice pants or with jeans. I also think this could be great for flying, because my hands always get cold and it has thumb holes.

links_reviews_title: Nothing spectacular but still turns heads everywhere I go!
links_reviews_text: Generous fit which is perfect for the style. The garment is crafted impeccably and people DO notice. I really hope Rent the Runway keeps carrying this brand!

I can't say this is worth $1,000, but I loved wearing this to work and on the weekend. It's super comfortable, high-quality and flattering. I liked the thumb-hole situation, but I had to role up the sleeves to work as it was pretty uncomfortable to type in that manner.

links_reviews_title: Amazing fabric, so chic and simple
links_reviews_text: This is such a versatile cardigan. It could easily transition from work pants to jeans. Pictures don't do it justice. The fabric just feels expensive. So cozy and comfortable but yet tailored and chic.
I wore this twice in the office. Went well with slacks and blouses, and was really comfy. A little fancier than a typical duster sweater but I certainly wouldn't pay retail for it.
I don't understand how this retails for so much. It's fine for an every day rental, but definitely doesn't feel special or expensive.
Love a good cardigan? Want to be more polished at work? This is the one for you. Excellent quality

This cardigan fits beautifully. Given the color, it works with just about anything in my closet. The lapel appears somewhat purple in the pictures but looks more gray (with slight purple tint) in person. It is better than I expected!

This is a large, heavy sweater. The XL was pretty large -- lots of room. It didn't feel too boxy though, and the thumb holes were a nice touch. Would make a nice outer layer in the Fall and a great sweater for the winter.
I really loves this jacket and wore multiple times. It had the perfect below the hips length and the fabric was a great quality. Not very warming beware of season.
I loved this sweater/jacket. Unfortunately I ordered a Medium, which was a bit too big on me, but was probably TTS. I wore this at work and on the weekends. Really interesting details and warm!

links_reviews_title: Warm, cozy but too much fabric
links_reviews_text: I want to like this cardigan as I like the different fabrics but it just had too much fabric. The inside fabric needs to be pinned back to create the lapels shown in the pic, otherwise it lays messy. I wore a tight black turtleneck and black pants underneath which worked well and offset the fullness of the front fabric. For ref: 5’7”, 138lbs, size small
Pretty standard long cardigan, details make it a bit more coat-like/dressy
Comfy and polished enough that even when I'm feeling a bit messy it makes me look more put together. a nice mid-weight for foggy weather.

It's longer, just like the model indicates. As someone who is 5'8", this goes over my butt so it would be perfect for leggings. Worn to work with a black blouse underneath. Really warm, doesn't have any indication of pilling. Would rent again. Would even buy if it wasn't still so expensive.
It's very flattering and paired well with a white shirt and jeans. I'm pregnant so I just want to be comfortable, but still look like I tried. This did the trick.
The fit was OK. The lapels were floppy and wouldn't stay how they were intended; they flipped upside down immediately upon putting it on so it looked messy. The arms were kind of stretched out.

This sweater looks lavender in the photo but is more grey in person. It's long but has stricter and feels dressy enough for work. It does have thumb holes (which I couldn't see from the photo) which makes the sleeves a little long

links_reviews_title: Great for traveling. Warm enough to wear on a flight.
links_reviews_text: It's a pretty tight woven, heavy knit so for 50-60 degree weather is perfect.
Great material that Is not bulky and feels great. I wore a sleeveless shirt underneath so it was easy to wear. I wouldn't want a bulky sleeve shirt underneath.
Sleeves were super long

I had waited for a bit for this cardigan to come back to being available. Wow, it was worth the wait! I absolutely loved everything about this (well, except the price tag, otherwise I would have bought it!). I definitely see myself renting this again in the future. It is so comfortable, and I love the long length and thumb holes for it. It is perfect for differentt ypes of weather.

links_reviews_title: This was an okay long cardigan!
links_reviews_text: I would say it runs true to size. Overall has a good fit. I expected it to be special in someway just because of the original price- but it was very standard. Nothing bad about it just not overly exciting or stylish.

This top fit exactly how I wanted it to fit! It is loose enough to be comfortable but still has a really nice shape. It's great with jeans but also long enough to wear with leggings. The material is thicker which I really liked. Recommend this top!

links_reviews_title: Great weight for fall or winter officewear
links_reviews_text: Loved this top! Heavy enough to wear under a jacket without a ton of layers and not freeze but not so thick that you'll sweat in a hot office. Great silhouette and would rent again.

Loved the color, the sleeves, and the versatility. If this was offered in more colors, I would continue to rent! Also really wanted to buy this but decided I'll just rent again.. maybe then I'll decide to buy it!
Very nice shirt. High quality and the color was great. The cuffs were much much to wide though.

links_reviews_title: Weird shape--tight in body, lots of material in the arms
links_reviews_text: I did not love this. There is no give in the fabric so you've got things you're trying to hide, size up.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments, very comfortable and cute!
links_reviews_text: I worse this with a skirt and with pants. Very cute either way. Loved the color and fit.
Maybe my body, but I just thought it was an odd fir on me. I was also not crazy about the material. Did not wear.
The sleeves are very large and billowy - which can make this look a tad overwhelming. However, the color and fabric was amazing

links_reviews_title: Great sleeves but it runs big
links_reviews_text: I rented my usual size and I was swimming in it. The fit was loose and the statement sleeves (which I loved) were huge, and all in all, there was just too much fabric for my frame. The fabric has nice drape, and the color is a beautiful dark green, so I'm sorry this blouse didn't work for me

Loved the fabric and color but the sleeves were really long and the bust line very short I wasnt able to wear the blouse but had it fit correctly (on my body) would have loved to wear it as the quality/weight of the fabris was really nice.
I love the loose fit on this top. The sleeves are billowy but it's a good look. Not long enough to wear with leggings. Plus, the fabric doesn't wrinkle.
This shirt was massive and I ordered the XS!! Huge sleeves and bulky fit. I did not wear. I loved the color and wished it worked for me.
Got so many compliments on the color! Nice thick fabric made it sit well on the body. It is not form fitting but is flattering. Would like to own this shirt.
Beautiful material and color.
Great with jeans or skinny work trousers and heels, whilst oversized, it sits nicely.

links_reviews_title: Lovely, casual top. Great for everyday!
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed this top and I thought it fit well if you like the billowy look in the photo. The sleeves are really cute and added an extra pop to an otherwise plain-looking top. The fabric was really nice, too!

Great blouse, would definitely rent again. I have broad shoulders so blouses don't always fit well but this fit great and I didn't feel constricted in my shoulders. The material was thick and the color looked great with skinny jeans, tan suede, and black leather.
I like this shirt, but I sized up and it was still tight on me. I unfortunately was not able to wear it.
Fits true to size, the material is very thick.

links_reviews_title: Loved it...came in new with tags
links_reviews_text: Wore it as a blazer under the red blouse..looked great

links_reviews_title: Love the color and the sleeves. They give a traditional button-front shirt some femininity and inter
links_reviews_text: The crepe fabric is heavy. More suitable for cooler weather or as a lightweight jacket. Hope we get a few cooler days before I return this!

This shirt was too tight on my chest. I really wanted to wear it because I love the sleeve. I just knew i wouldn't be comfortable all day at work with the shirt potentially spreading in the front due to my chest. I feel like it's smaller than the suggested size. I usually can wear XL or 1x and this fit more like a L to me.
Warm, Fits true to size. Great rental!

Can't part with this jacket. It's super lightweight but also super warm. Perfect for milder 40 degree winter days. The asymmetric zip makes for a flattering silhouette and the thumb holes in the sleeves are a nice touch. And the good is the best part - it feels like a cocoon for your face and it's the coziest thing
Wasn't sure about the color at first but wore it twice and ended up getting a ton of compliments. It's nice and light but kept me warm, the style was adorable. Was happy with this jacket

This jacket is AMAZING! It is so soft and warm. It is flattering in the fit but not uncomfortable. The sleeves are great even on my long arms, there is also a thumb hole, which I love! I want to keep it forever!

This coat arrived brand new with tags. First that alone makes it awesome. Second it's super stylish, I kept getting stopped on the street, people telling me they LOVED my coat. The color is really pretty. You should rent this for sure, you'll love it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this multiple days on vacation
links_reviews_text: Super slimming, bulky sweaters still fit underneath, really warm but lightweight and easy to pack. Perfect for travel.

links_reviews_title: This puffer coat is so cute!! It was super comfortable and very warm while I wore it in Michigan!
links_reviews_text: The fit is AMAZING. I don't have a picture to show but I loved the slimming look to it, even though it's a puffer jacket. I loved the thumb holes in this coat, it definitely was a great addition to the productivity of the coat. With 14 degree weather in Michigan, it was successful in keeping me warm throughout snowshoeing event I attended!

links_reviews_title: Like being wrapped in a cloud...
links_reviews_text: I love this jacket so much. The hood is a bit large and hard to keep on, but the jacket is gorgeous, warm, comfortable.
Excellent fit, beautiful color, very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments - wish I could afford it!!!
links_reviews_text: This is such a great jacket! First of all it's extremely thin but very warm, so you get the warmth without the bulk. I love all the details - the unique hope, the diagonal zipper, at the hands it's a sweater like material that has thumb cut outs. I wore it 10 times the month I rented it and got compliments every day.

links_reviews_title: New with tags! Warm, comfortable, stylish
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, cute and comfortable, warmth without bulk!
Love this so much I might have to but it. Far superior to North Face. Feels so cozy. Long arms and long on the torso. Perfect in EVERY way!

Though it was a bit bulky, I did like this coat and wore it twice. It was perfect to throw over myself as the afternoon turned into evening. It's soft and warm and a deep forest green. I wore it with a sweater the first time and over a tank the second. Because, like me, sometimes the weather in San Francisco has ADHD and can't make up its mind if it's hot or cold, so this coat was perfect!
I really like this jacket. It's comfy and warm but yet still has some style to it. My torso is short so an ok length on me, but if you don't like cropped or short tops this may not be for you.
This is such a good winter jacket. I wore it to work and out in -5° weather and stayed warm. The color is really nice in person.
I really wasn't expecting this to be as cute as it is. I love it! So much more structured than I thought it was going to be. May keep throughout the season. Love RTR...

I love a costume that just requires normal clothes, so I decided to be Mathilda from Leon the Professional for Halloween. The character wears a bomber jacket, and I found this one to be a super cool updated version of her look. The jacket was SO warm, which was perfect since the party was in a courtyard. Felt like real expensive material. I'll definitely rent again--for everyday use.

This was much much bigger, heavier and bulkier than I expected. The shoulders were super wide and I looked like a quarterback in this, and I felt it made me look larger as well. It also was very heavy and would be best worn in under 50 degree temps.
Wore it all the time!

links_reviews_title: Great casual jacket for cold weather!
links_reviews_text: Snuggle worthy and VERY warm, not recommended for warmer climates - but I was in the snow and it kept me very warm - perfect! Stylish with the leather trim, yet casual with the cut - went well with jeans and cropped black booties for out, or tennis shoes through the airport. Definitely bulky as others mention, but a good look overall - more cozy than sleek. Recommend!
Love love love, a solid fleece. Super warm and cozy, very cute.
Every time I wear it I get numerous compliments. Love it so much I’ve kept it for 2 months now.
By the end of the day they were so baggy

links_reviews_title: Super comfy- read reviews to determine your size
links_reviews_text: Most of the reviews recommended sizing up. I'm curvy so I got a 10 and they were HUGE. I SIZED down to an 8 and they were still falling off me. Finally I got the 6 and they were big but I could pull them off. You can see they're kind of an odd length but the comfort level is beyond so I wore them anyway.

These pants are huge. I typically wear a 26 in jeans and the 0 in these was too big. They're super comfortable (because they're so large) and the color is awesome, but I don't think I would rent these again because I was afraid they were going to fall off all day. They have a side zip with no clasp, which wasn't very reassuring for them staying up. They did not stretch out even more during the day though which was a plus.

links_reviews_title: Comfy, fashionable pants for work. Lots of stretch!
links_reviews_text: Stretchy! Comfy. Not one for bright pants but I do like these!

I am so pleased with these pants! I normally wear a 14 and am slightly bottom heavy in the lower abdomen from 2 c sections. They fit like a glove. Are on the shorter side but look adorable with heels (I am 5'9).
I am obsessed! This is super flirty but also professional. I wore this to work and received complements from my sister before I left for work, clients, and my boyfriend who surprised me at work!

links_reviews_title: Runs large and on top of that they stretch out as you wear them
links_reviews_text: I would size down AT LEAST two sizes. The 0 was ok the first time I wore them, but by the end of the day the second time, they were getting saggy in the knees and butt.
From the pic, I expected these to be shorter pants. The length was ok, but they ran pretty large. I am usually true to size with Trina Turk, but these were big.

These pants are comfy. They are stretchy and a nice vibrant color that makes them stand out. The pink is a rich color that has some blue in it, making it more like a very pink purple color. I'm 5'4", and the length was right at my ankles, but not so short that it looked like the wrong length.

links_reviews_title: Amazing color and fit, but runs large!
links_reviews_text: These are really fun and easy to wear pants, perfect for work, going out or a casual look! I would have been head over heels if they hadn't run quite large. I almost didn't wear, but ended up pairing with a tight sweater that helped hold the waist up. I find Trina Turk to run a bit larger than many brands on RTR, but this style ran particularly large for me. The fabric has quite a bit of stretch to it, so you might want to go down one size. The color is fabulous, as is the cut of the pants. I would rent again in a smaller size, for sure!

These were a touch big, but not too big to wear. I just think I could've sized down and been okay. Not sure if these were supposed to be cropped, but on my short frame, they were ankle length which was fine. The were very comfortable. Probably not the most flattering, but nice for an office day.

Loved the color of these pants. Better suited for someone with a straight figure instead of curves. Had to fold the waist over (no belt loops) to prevent it hanging in the crotch. Can easily dress up/down with sneakers or heels.

links_reviews_title: Waistband is a little weird, but these are still comfy!
links_reviews_text: These pants are very comfortable! The waistband is a bit weird, but it ended up looking pretty good with a tucked in blouse. They're stretchy and wide leg. I'm 5'7, so these hit right above my ankle. I wouldn't purchase them, but they were great to rent for a workday!

I am 4 month postpartum and still working to hide a little extra weight.. these received so many compliments and felt like I was wearing PJs. The color was amazing. I am y'all and was unsure if the cropped leg would look weird without heels, it did not disappoint. They did stretch out a little throughout the day, I'd probably size down if I was going to keep them but didn't want them not to zip so I went with the 8. (My hips are about 40 inches and waist about 34 for reference)

links_reviews_title: Perfect pop of color but not crop length
links_reviews_text: Beautiful pants & a perfect pop of color to shake up everyday work clothes. However these pants run big and the length is not crop. The model must be 6 feet tall! I will order again but next till I will size down.

Cute pants. Unique color. They were super hard to zip up but that probably prevents the zipper from unzipping on its own. The waist was not super flattering but I paired it with some longer shirts. They seem to run true to size. Maybe on the larger side than some other designers.
These fit great and I am closer to a 10 than an 8 right now - not a fan of the side zipper - but fun color. May hang on to them until a less snowy day when I can pair w snappy shoes.

The fit is very large. I usually wear a size 8 and sent these back for a size 6. They were still roomy in the seat and the pant legs were huge. I loved the color and was able to wear them because I wear a lab coat and could hide the poor fit. Would not have worn these without a labcoat.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress pants but not what I expected
links_reviews_text: Love the fabric and color of these pants but that's about it. I definitely could have worn a whole size smaller, they were big and baggy on me. Also I thought they were a more cropped style, but even at 5'8 with long legs they hit the ground with flats. I don't know how short girls could wear these.

These pants ran slightly large although I am currently in between size 8 and 10. Even though they were a bit loose they still looked great. I received a ton of compliments! I will definitely rent again.
Very bright, very comfortable and lots of fun. Size down one size!

links_reviews_title: so great that I bought them!
links_reviews_text: I adore these pants! I wear them for work all the time and I always get compliments. I am a few months postpartum and they really hide my post-baby pudge. I recommend them for anyone.

links_reviews_title: Sort of baggy in the stomach hard to find a shirt that didn't make me look bigger with the pants.

links_reviews_text: Wish I would have gotten a size 4. I'm 5' 8", 140# and don't have a tiny waist.
Fit well. Nice pop of color for winter.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color. I wore with a red top and got compliments all day.
links_reviews_text: These pants fit a little looser than I expected from how the model wore them. Not sure if they run a little large or if that was the correct fit, but I ended up really liking them.

links_reviews_title: I'm on the shorter side so they came past my ankles but wore them with booties.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size.
Great, deep pink color, soft, flexible, mid-weight material was very comfortable with stretch.

These are generously cut (read gigantically cut). I usually wear an 8, which is the size I selected. I definitely should have rented a 6. The waist is particularly large for my hourglass frame. The material is nice and has some stretch to it. The color is awesome!
Very comfortable for work. Thick fabric and good upper
Great fit, comfy, and look GREAT on.

links_reviews_title: Cute but order a size or two down
links_reviews_text: I got a ton of compliments on these when I wore them to work! They're very roomy though. I typically wear a size 4 in pants and while I rented a 2 in these they would have looked a bit more professional in a size 0.

links_reviews_title: Great color. Probably want to size down.
links_reviews_text: Love the color. The particular pair I rented was a little over worn. I got a 12 which was a little large and felt baggy and therefore a little sloppy. Would try again in a 10. Probably would feel better.
Nice bright fuchsia color, but not overwhelming. I wore with a black top. Very comfortable. I'm short so it is not cropped but hit right at top of foot and could still wear flats.

links_reviews_title: Tons of Compliments! Would recommend for work or business casual event.
links_reviews_text: Great Fit!
Gorgeous color! Got so many compliments.
Great color, but too big.
Love the pants but it runs pretty big.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, odd fit if under 5'6"
links_reviews_text: "Ditto" to the other reviews that say these pants are not cropped for someone who is 5'3". I wore them with black slingback peeptoe pumps which was presentable. Wish they were more tapered.

links_reviews_title: Tried to wear these on a date, something about the fit wasn't tight enough in the right places.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful bright color, fits loose. I'm 5'1 120lbs and a size 2 fit perfect in the waist, if not maybe a tad loose. My main criticism is that these are supposed to be cropped, but because of my height these looked like regular pants, which could have worked perfectly but because they were made to be cropped the style just didn't look right for regular length pants so they made me look even shorter.

links_reviews_title: Such a cozy sweater! The material is really nice and thick. Will rent again!

links_reviews_text: This sweater has so many great qualities--the pockets are located a little high up so when you put your hands in them, the sweater sort if takes in a different (cute, scrunchy), the fringe on the bottom and sleeves is great, the sleeve length allows for the fringe to NOT get in the way of anything and the COLOR is gorgeous. Also, the feel of this sweater is very luxe--it's thick and well made.

links_reviews_title: Great for cold weather- super snuggly!
links_reviews_text: Fabric is soft and luxurious- a great weekend sweater!

links_reviews_title: Just loved the pockets and the snuggly feeling I got wearing it
links_reviews_text: It is all pros from me. The sleeves fit snuggly in your arms and the length is perfect

Adored it. Considering buying. Fabric and texture feel very chunky, bouncy, soft. Very high end and snuggly while still looking unique. Kicked my jeans and T-shirt up a notch and added a chunky necklace to round out the look.

This piece is gorgeous and if it wasn't so expensive I would rent it. The sleeves are a little tight so if you want it roomy, size up. Also, I saw some reviews complaining about the odd placement of the sleeves but although higher up its perfectly designed for slipping your phone or keys in and it not weighing down your whole cardigan and doesn't look bulky. It's genius!

I was pleasantly surprised with this sweater. I was worried it would look a little grandmotherly, but it was really cute in person. I sized down and was happy with the fit. The sleeves are definitely short, about 3/4 length, which was a nice touch. Pretty heavy material, so nice and warm for the winter.
Super cute casual sweater! Lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: Perfect for fall just missed the mark a bit
links_reviews_text: This sweater cardigan is pretty stiff and structured and was a bit tighter than what I was hoping for but a gorgeous warm cardigan for the fall weather.
From the look of it, I thought this would be a kind of summer/spring sweater. It definitely isn't. It's basically a super thick, non-breathable blanket. I didn't wear it.

I enjoyed renting this cardigan, the color goes well with many clothing items. It has an oversized fit as well. I wore it to travel and it kept me warm while in the plane. The sleeves are a bit short, and stop at a weird length on your arm, so I folded it once to give it more of a 3/4 sleeve look. The pockets are higher up at a weird angle, but still held my phone and earphones without them falling out or looking bulky. Since I can't keep this cardigan, I will probably rent it again!
Loved wearing this on top of dresses at over-ACed work! Super comfy.

links_reviews_title: so cute but kind of weird fitting
links_reviews_text: the sleeves are honestly really short and almost like 3/4 sleeves. in addition, the pockets are right below your boobs and its just awkwardly put together
Great addition to my maternity wardrobe. Versatile and fun sweater.
The material of this sweater is nice with lots of detailing but the sleeves were about halfway up my forearm and there is a lot of extra material in the upper back, creating a baggy look.
This was the perfect length and super cozy. Will def rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, received a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for an every day casual look!

links_reviews_title: Great for casual and denim. The pocket placement was odd.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size
Didn't like how short the sleeves were but a cute sweater nonetheless.

links_reviews_title: Nice, but not as comfy as I was hoping for!
links_reviews_text: I rented this jacket to wear during the snowiest month in Minnesota's history. Typically with "chunky sweaters" I'm looking for soft fabric or wool that can be layered over another sweater. Unfortunately this wasn't an option with this piece. It felt more like a coat and with the tapered sleeve, I wasn't able to layer.

Im not returning this piece...buying!!!! It's such a staple that amps up any outfit. It's cozy, thick and high quality, 3/4 sleeves which I loveeee since I'm short, and perfect color. Highly recommend especially for spring. I literally can not stop wearing it.
WS cozy and cute but I'm tall and the 3/4 length feel of sleeves made it feel off for me.

links_reviews_title: Overall, the sweater was very stiff and the arms very very bulky.
links_reviews_text: The pockets were very high and a bit bulky. They don't look bad when your hands are in them though! I loved the color, but the fit made it feel like it had been dried before and shrank upwards.
Very cute sweater, a little oversized with shorter sleeves which works well for the chunkiness of this.

The sweater material is thick and luxurious - loved that. The arms were a bit too wide for me - I was going for an oversized look, but with the uniformity of the material it just ended up draping a bit bulkier than I would have liked.
The sleeves were barely 3/4 let alone arm length.
This was so adorable. It was heavy and looked high quality. Kept me warm and I loved the pockets.
comfortable, cute, casual. Fits true to size.
Did not wear, the fit was odd and the arms were too tight and short

Loved this!! Very comfortable with slight stretch to the fabric. This is an oversized sweater, very heavy. Very flattering dolman shape. The color is an organic neutral, rather than a flat cream. My sister also borrowed it. She is a M, but wore the XS as a smaller fit. I would not recommend this to be worn under a coat, as the sleeves are bulky.
Such a cute cardigan. Thick and warm
Warm and big. Would rent again but for spring
Loved this top so much. The fit was perfect, as was the length. It was a go-to for both evening time and day time wear.

Love it! Was very comfortable wearing it to work. Although the front is a little low-cut, the rest of the shirt is very modest and balances it out. I wore it both tucked in and loose with different outfits and loved it both ways. The fabric is nice, not too light nor too heavy. Shown with the amazing RTR Slate & Willow Dawn Wrap skirt! I will rent this top again and may try to buy it someday!
cute and comfy. but not sure to rent it again.
key hole detail is much lower cut than i had originally realized, so i could not wear it to work.

links_reviews_title: Can be dressed up or down!
links_reviews_text: Rented both the small and extra small; wore them XS as it seems to run big. Love the neckline and cutout. Love that this comes in a cream color too!

links_reviews_title: Nice black top with a little flair
links_reviews_text: Very nice black shirt. The neck cut-out makes it look pretty fancy. Great worn alone or with a vest.
Incredibly flattering, comfortable, and subtly sexy neckline
Really cute neckline.
Beautiful! Conservative and sexy at the same time.

links_reviews_title: The neck makes it fun and different, but you still get to wear black - so it's great!
links_reviews_text: Solid top for fall/winter dates lol. I got compliments on it - the neck line is flaring and different without "trying too hard"
Despite looking fun... it's kind of boring. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: This is a classic shirt! Fits beautifully, has some stretch.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are gathered and a little cropped. The waistline is looser. Overall this is great top that can pair well with black pants for a dressier occasion or with a skirt or even jeans. I would definitely add this to my permanent wardrobe.
I enjoyed this band tee. I wore a large and expected it to be a bit looser fitting. It still fit just fine, but I'd you want a more casual fit size up another one. Looks great with a leather jacket
Feels so soft! And fit is great, loose and cropped. I wore this multiple times!
Soft tee, thick material so it doesn't get wrinkled, crop hits in just the right spot

links_reviews_title: Comfortable shirt! Perfect for everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: #gameday #football

links_reviews_title: Perfect tee for a festival or just chillin
links_reviews_text: I wore this t-shirt over and over again. It was so comfy to wear all day at a music festival and then I wore it during a road trip all day/night long. It was well made, not too thin, but it didn't feel stiff and starchy either. I would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Love the band shirt and perfect fit
links_reviews_text: Perfect with the leather skirt for date night
Cute basic everyday tee!
Cute
Love all the tees by Daydremer LA. The tie dye on this one is subtle and pretty. Pairs well with jeans.

links_reviews_title: Loved the way it fit and looked
links_reviews_text: Crop style , loose fit very comfy
Loved this cute casual tee so much that I bought it!
Cute tee, fits true to size- I wanted mine a little bigger so I wore a M vs S and it was perfect for my look
It's a cropped t-shirt so if you pair it with high-waisted pants, you won't be showing any midriff.

links_reviews_title: Such an easy shirt to throw on with jeans or a skirt!
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and cute. Loved wearing it leggings on a plane, and then with jeans out to dinner. Thought about buying it if the price tag wasn't so expensive!
Fit well! I like a more oversized look, so i'm definitely glad I got the large. The large didn't even feel to big, so I wouldn't have liked it any smaller!
It's just a tee but was super cozy, flattering and fun
It's adorable , loose fit and perfect crop top.
Not the best cut, really square. I tried the medium knowing it may be too big and it was. This runs true to size or even size down one to help with the boxy fit
You'll never feel boring in this jacket

So soft and smooth!! Lined, but light. It's warm here in Southern California now, and nowhere to go, but I love, love, love this gorgeous jacket. Fits like a glove. I plan to keep it for awhile and rock it with my PJ's.
I was so in love with this jacket! Tons of compliments on it! Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: One of the most amazing jackets
links_reviews_text: Loved so much. Wish I could keep it. Perfect fit and weight - not bulky. Perfect for Florida winter.
Beautiful leather jacket ! I received so many compliments, I think I may have to buy it!
I rented this jacket for both a work function as well as a party. I got so many compliments both nights. The jacket is butter soft. I hated returning it.
Different Application for animal print. Freshened up basics separates.

Attract compliments with the vibrant leopard print, and stay comfortable all day long in the buttery soft leather! Fits TTS. Minus one star because the attached belt was a bit droopy, had lost its shape. Would rent again!

This super soft leather jacket goes with everything Believe it or not, you can wear it in place of a black leather jacket in most cases. It's so nice to wear a patterned jacket for a change of pace. It's mid-weight, ideal as outerwear in the Bay Area. The medium got with a little extra room. I hated to send this back.

links_reviews_title: So soft and fun and fab
links_reviews_text: Just rent it. It's fab. The body rubs TTS but the arms a wee bit short and snug. It's so soft.
This was such an easy rental. It looked great, expensive and on-trend. You can't lose with this jacket.
This jacket was really pretty, and very soft. The only negative was that the buckle on the bottom kept coming open. So instead of zipping it up I just wore it open.
Soft and supple leather. Surprisingly versatile, I've worn it several different ways. Wish I could buy it!
Super soft, stand out jacket. Wore it multiple times and received many compliments. I sized up for a looser fit but it would've been to small on hips to zip if I'd gone with the large.
Ugh, got so many compliments while wearing this. It's so soft and so comfortable. Highly recommend renting! Got an XL for an oversized fit but TBH I could have sized down.

This jacket could not be cuter. The leather is buttery, the leopard print is vibrant, and I get so many compliments in this. Runs somewhat small, but I'm tall and also like my jackets on the roomier side.

links_reviews_title: Butter soft leather and fun pattern!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a party and it was a crowd favorite! Love this brand and can't wait to rent more of their leather jackets!
This is such a fun piece. It feels expensive... well it IS. So it feels luxe. I wore it for a week and sent it back and got the gold glittery version because I loved it so much.

I'm obsessed with Veda leather jackets and this was my 3rd from the brand. They are buttery soft and high quality. Small for me perfectly but if you want to layer a sweater underneath I'd size up for more room. Such a fun print to wear!
This jacket was like butter and fit perfectly. It's an outfit in itself, and I would definitely recommend for a weekend.

links_reviews_title: Statement Leather Jacket - would've bought if cheaper
links_reviews_text: This is a statement leather jacket. No hiding in this print. Definitely received compliments, I think all from women with good taste lol. If it was less expensive, I'd consider buying it. Not sure if it would wear well overtime though because I think the print is painted on the leather. The only thing that annoyed me a little bit was the noise of the buckle on the waist and it not being removable. Overall loved this, would recommend, & rent again!

Love this moto. So soft, Veda makes amazing jackets. I am a size 4 but prefer some room in a jacket so I can layer, so this in a Medium is perfect for me. Tons of compliments, I haven't returned it yet. Love my RTRUNLIMITED and the choices available.
Gorgeous. Wore it indoors, all day--didn't want to take it off. As others have said, soft as butter. Rich, deep colors and a flattering fit.

links_reviews_title: Wore everyday over work out clothes and with jeans and black top.
links_reviews_text: Very soft leather, lots of compliments.

Love this jacket. It's so soft! Perfect for cool winter nights in Florida. Cons....the belt is attached, although at least you won't loose it. Would love to purchase but too expensive. Could not get my picture to upload.
It fit snug but not too tight. I would go up a size for a looser fit. Really cute and great quality.

Overall, I really like this jacket - the pattern and the fit were perfect; however, I don't care for the belt along the bottom edge, in my opinion it adds extra bulk where you don't need it. It is sewn into the jacket and therefore not removable.
Chic and trendy. This jacket is smooth and beautiful. Dress it up or down. Loved it!
