I ended up keeping this jacket for about a month and wore multiple times. Always received many compliments and loved the quality of the jacket. If you're considering renting- do it!

links_reviews_title: I love this jacket. Warm enough for most nyc December days
links_reviews_text: the leather is SO soft! This jacket is a great topper for any outfit. A little edgy with greats personality
Perfect fit, buttery soft leather, gorgeous jacket! I kept for two months and was so sorry to send it back.

links_reviews_title: Pairs with dressier tight black jeans or casual blue jeans and sneakers. Very comfortable
links_reviews_text: Very easy to move in as its very soft and pliable. Loved wearing it since animal is the rage right now.

links_reviews_title: Love this jacket. Would love to keep it
links_reviews_text: Wore this to holiday markets and Thanksgiving. Compliments, Compliments, Compliments
Adorable jacket, so soft and buttery and the print is amazing! The only reason I returned is that it got too cold to wear regularly!
This is such a fun moto jacket!
Perfect leather jacket. Spruces up a basic outfit!

links_reviews_title: Everyone wanted to know where I got this!
links_reviews_text: Not for a winter day, but so stinking cute. Fits true to size. I paired it with jeans and a white tee shirt and got a ton of compliments. Would definitely rent again.

This jacket it soft and so comfortable. I can't wait to wear it out this Friday night with jeans to go out for drinks and live music. I may even wear it with a cocktail dress. Luxurious fabric, not real leather so not sure why so expensive. Looks worth it though. May hold on to this for a few weeks!
The softest leather jacket that provides a lot of warmth as well. Stylish and easy to wear everyday.

links_reviews_title: It's very simple and easy to match with dress
links_reviews_text: It runs a bit large around the waist
I'm consistently an 8-10 / medium in Kate Spade and found a 10 to be tight through the hips (probably because the dress is definitely trumpet shaped, not a-line)
Too low cut, runs big, sleeves are more exaggerated than they look in the picture
Beautiful dress for a party. I originally planned to wear it for work but it's way too low cut for that. If you are more flat chested, this is work appropriate.
The fit is perfect I love this dress you look beautiful in it coming and going!
This dress was so much fun for an outdoor afternoon party, tons of compliments.
This dress was perfect to throw on and go. Completely effortless. Got compliments all evening. Also I am rather short and the length was completely fine. Such a great dress!

links_reviews_title: I was actually wearing this when my fiancé proposed last week and it looked absolutely beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I was obsessed with this dress long before I was able to get it in my size and it didn't disappoint!
Good maternity option (pre-pregnancy size at 32wk, so runs large)... but the design looks like a loaf of wonder bread. Regardless, i really liked it for a summer night

links_reviews_title: Perfect dinner on the beach dress!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress! A lot of material so not the most flattering but amazing quality and so pretty!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric and embroidery. Stunning silhouette.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, I'm 5'9" and the length was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely love this dress! It's very cute and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering for pear and hour glass figures.
Loved it and wanted to keep it! So cute and wonderful quality. The shoulder part sits tight so you never think it might slip away. Would rent again for my next vacation!
Such a beautiful dress and comfortable! A must rent!
Would have needed a slip so didn't end up wearing it
uncomfortable under arms
This dress is beautiful in pictures but the linen material is terrible. There is so much material! The top of the dress is true to size but the bottom is huge.

I thought this was going to be a little sexier and form fitting. Instead I just felt bulky as the material is ribbed and is cut very straight, so it clung to my hips and bagged at my waist. Didn't feel great. Also this is not a sweater-- more of a medium weight long sleeved shirt.

I was looking for a versatile shirt with a bit of flair and that's what I got! Another reviewer mentioned tightness in the waist but for me it was true to size. The fabric was a bit thin and I don't think it's meant to be very stretched out. Buttons are not functional so there's no chance of a weird moment happening with gaping and accidentally showing off your bra.
Thin and comfortable. Cut a bit low. The buttons add just a little something different. Really liked it!

This shirt certainly isn't gonna get you noticed, but it's a great basic. The fit is a little slouchier than I expected, and the cut is super flattering. It's fairly light so worked well for a blazing hot LA "fall" day in a cooler office.
vf
Love the extra long sleeves. It’s kind of low-cut, but the buttons are nonfunctional. Nice soft fabric.
This top is amazing but I couldn't wear it because it had not been cleaned well from the last renter. I was very upset about this. I will try renting it again though.

links_reviews_title: Fit was great and loved the button detail
links_reviews_text: The shirt was soft and fit well. I am tall and arm length is always an issue but it went a little past my wrists which is how I prefer to wear my long sleeve shirts. The button detail was so cute. I am 5'9.5 and a 36D/DD
Very soft and comfortable. Fits true to size. It was pretty low cut on me. I have a larger chest and definitely had to wear a top under it.
This is one of those pieces I almost kept. It was so comfortable and flattering. I wore this 3 times before finally returning it.
Very cute for a basic top. Love the detail, but the V neck was too low for me. Too distracting pulling it up all day.
Loved this top--wore it several times with compliments each time. Cute for everyday wear.
Fit perfectly and I’m a full body gal. I wear xl so size was perfect. I think the slant line was flattering for my body type.
Wore multiple times. Easy to throw on and look nice. Soft and comfortable
Too small in the waist even though I ordered a size larger.

Cute top and super comfortable. Not a very stretchy or tight top so I probably could have gone down one size. I wore this to run errands and that's probably the most I would do with it. I probably wouldn't wear it for a night out or anything fancier.
Cute design.
Looks and feels great! Got many compliments
I got a 12, which I usually am, and it was way too big. I tried to add a sweater but still looked too large.

links_reviews_title: Pretty fabric but ... just not right
links_reviews_text: Loved the fabric but the fringe on the sleeves and bottom seemed to detract from overall look. Fit well
This was a nice, heavy dress for cold weather. It was a little boxy and not super flattering, but fun to rent!
Love this dress! Slightly shorter so may be really short for taller ladies (I'm only 5'4)
Love the colors and the fit. Super comfortable yet stylish dress for work!
An actually flattering shift! I was worried the 6 would be too boxy, but it was perfect! Incredible fabric. Great length. Business appropriate.
Great summer dress! Went from work to fundraiser to dinner. Looked great!! A little snug at my butt but really looked great for these events.

The dress is a bit deceiving at first. When I took it out of the bag, I thought it looked super boxy, to my surprised as soon as I put it on I fell in love with it. The material is also much lighter than it appears in pictures and at a first glance. The fit was perfect, even for someone tall, it was definitely long enough for work. I received a ton of compliments and wore it out to happy hour after work. Would absolutely rent again!
This was a great professional yet fun dress for work! I probably could have gone for a smaller size but since it's a looser fit anyway it was fine. Got tons of compliments!
Phenomenally comfortable and so many compliments! From men and women alike!! Love this dresss

Fits TTS, but a little short- I'm 5'1 and it was almost too short for work! I wore a cami under it for work too- anywhere else it would have been fine without. It hid my tummy but didn't really accentuate it either. I got a lot of complements but someone said it reminded them of a rag rug "in a good way"

links_reviews_title: One of those dresses that make you excited to get dressed and go to work
links_reviews_text: Fun, comfortable, and professional. You'll want to have happy hour plans after work so you can keep wearing it

links_reviews_title: Work Approved.... classic with a pop of color
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress -- was a little big. May have been able to go with a 10 -- loved the cut and pop of color in the tweed. Absolutely adorable and fun!

links_reviews_title: Great work dress, lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It seemed like the dress was going to be too tight around the thighs, butt and arms at first but the dress gave a little stretch once I had it on for a bit. I got many compliments on it at work.

I wore this to work and literally got about 20 compliments! Super cute and unique fabric. Very well made. I put it runs true to size but it is a very loose and comfy fit. I wear a size 2 90% of the time and that is the size I got.

links_reviews_title: Loved this more than I thought I would
links_reviews_text: Loved the fringe and cut. Perfect work dress.
The fit was a bit boxy and from The side made me look a bit flat since it was a little large. But overall a polished look and comfortable dress that won't wrinkle during the day. Will rent again!

This was a cute dress but was very oversized. I got it New with tags, so I was the first one to wear it. The lining is very bright pink, but you cannot see it at all with the dress on. The colors were springy with bright neon tweed mixed in (yellow, orange, green, purple, pink, blue) with the whitish/grey. I paired it with navy tights and brown boots. After closer examination, it seems there is no navy in the dress, just black. Oh well. The body was huge. The arms were not that big so I worry that they would be tight if I sized down. I got some compliments, but it just felt like a burlap sack to me. Trina Turk's sizing is all over the place! Some 12s are way too small, others too big. I wish it was more consistent.
Vibrant colors are muted by the black and white in the tweed. Fabric was great. Fit perfect. I wish it were a little more discounted! I would love to buy this one!
Love the fun but classy nature of this dress. I wore to a business meeting and also a bridal shower. Got lots of compliments. It's a generous fit and super flattering.
Really great dress. Comfortable, roomy, beautiful color and material. I received brand new with tags. Appears slightly short, but I am 5'11". Still appropriate for work.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't even wear it. I was very excited, but it was so short! Not tall girl approved.
links_reviews_text: Fit: Small Pros: Very pretty, nice material Cons: Very small, not tall girl approved by any means.
Cute but runs much shorter than I expected. Couldn't wear it to work so just returned it without wearing. If you're not on the shorter side, it will be a minidress.
Little on the small side in midsection/ hips. Also too short for my liking and I'm only 5'4"
This dress has no give. Don't rent it if you have curves.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous fabric, so cute! Versatile and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I love this designer and this dress is one of the reasons why. Beautiful fabric with a luscious lining, flattering for my straight and narrow frame and poochy tummy. Slightly low in the cleavage arena and possibly too low for some workplaces. Wore this with pink flats, black pumps and nude heels, and wore to work, a play, and a fundraiser. Compliments everywhere!! Super dress.
True to size. Got many compliments!
fits right and looks very elegant for a day/night event
way too big

The fit, as others have mentioned, is a bit boxy and the dress is very loose - but that also makes it very comfortable while still having interesting details. Its light weight, good for late spring/summer/early fall.
I wore with black tights and black riding boots. I really liked how unique this dress was. I would rent again. Runs a little large since it's a shift so I would Zaire down when I rent again

Loved this dress. Pretty hot pink lining, and the dress is substantial, gives you a great shape and is so cute. Got lots of compliments. Wore with a blazer to work. Will rent this again in the spring.
Very comfortable and able to move around. Not too short or form fitting so it was great to wear to work and not feel too sexy. I really liked this dress.

I should have sized down. (Having lost a few pounds since I started renting regularly, I followed the suggested size.) It was roomy but did not look ridiculous. I got lots of compliments both times I wore it (a work dinner at my husband's office and the symphony)

I wanted to wear it so badly. It's very cute and seems high quality but it was 1) too short for a work dress 2) not quite right for a date 3) huge on top 3) a little tight at the hip. Had to accept defeat and return without wearing.
Flattering shift dress. Fabric is stunning.
This dress was so easy and perfect would love to own! Received lots of compliments when worn for an opening night function and will definitely rent again.
Beautiful and original, I wore it may times and I got complements on it every single time! I returned because im pregnant and my growing belly needs new dresses now!
Fantastic piece for my spring wardrobe
Just as pictured. Has an elastic band on inside so it shows your waistline and is less bulky looking/gives some shape.
i like this jacket, enough that i'll probably order it from JCrews website, since i can get a brand new one from there for $89 vs a used one from RTR for $105
If you like the camo trend rent this jacket! Fit is true to size. Got several complements and a few women wanting to know where I got the jacket.

links_reviews_title: loved this one. super cute and great for layers.
links_reviews_text: fit perfect and flattering. sporty and cute!

links_reviews_title: Loved this so much I got the next size down and bought it
links_reviews_text: Huge fan! Very waterproof!
The small was overwhelmingly big on me. Ordered the cvs to try because it's such a cute jacket!

Green silk material is like no other! This dress definitely have me a more hourglass appearance than I have! So many complements! I dressed it down a bit with a shaggy soft duster. I will rent this again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my office's Christmas party, and it was quite a hit.
links_reviews_text: beautiful dress, silky and falls in a flattering way. I enjoyed it a lot. It's a bit long.

This dress is a gorgeous color and the fit is so comfortable. It wrinkles a bit easy and the belt is super long. It was one of the things that drew me to the dress in the first place, but once I ended up actually wearing it, I talked it up further because it bothered me.
I wore this to work and got tons of compliments. Got perfectly if not a tad on the big side. Definitely rent it's a classy stunner.

links_reviews_title: Size up if you have hips, but then the top is too big
links_reviews_text: Fit is weird. I'm a 6, sometimes 8. I rented the 8 and I'm glad I did only because I have hips, and the fabric was almost stretched so far the buttons pulled a bit over my hips. But I was swimming in the top. Felt like I needed a 4 up top and an 8 on the bottom. Other weird complaints: the buckle banged my knees every step I took, and I had to hold it when I walked, and the fabric puckered around the seems in the back. Also, fabric is too heavy to wear in the summer. Overall, don't think I'd rent again.

links_reviews_title: There is a reason this dress is never available
links_reviews_text: This has to be my favorite rental to date. And that's a big statement as I'm a heavy user. I lost track of the compliments. The color is so dynamic and flattering on my chocolate skintone. I took a chance and ordered a dress 2 sizes smaller than my usual and was Shocked (and pleasantly surprised) when it fit. Would love to rent this again and totally understand the price tag! A Dream rental
I really liked this dress and received a bunch of compliments. I did have to fashion tape the front closed and had to wrap the belt around my waist twice to keep it from being too long

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color but fit weird on me
links_reviews_text: I love the jewel tone and the details on the sleeve and belt. An added touch of luxury is that all the buttons are hidden. But unfortunately it was just a strange length for me. I am 5'6 and it hit a little too low for a midi and a little too high for a maxi. Also the belt had to be wrapped three times around my waist. I tried tying it but that just looked messy compared to the sleek lines of the dress.
High quality, flattering fit.

links_reviews_title: Amazing color and obvious designer piece
links_reviews_text: Enjoyed this dress for a recent grand opening party. The color is stunning! I did have to pin the top, as their isn't a button to keep it as closed as I would like, but I'm very self conscious about cleavage!
Runs a little large but great color. Many compliments at work.

links_reviews_title: STUNNING dress - very fashion forward and chic
links_reviews_text: This dress was a dream! I felt so beautiful in it for this party. The jade green worked perfectly with my complexion. Truly a high quality fashion piece. Perfect for hourglass ladies!
Tons of compliments on the color, cut, design of this dress from coworkers. Will be saving it to take next time I present somewhere. It is very appropriate yet commands attention in a good way.

I wound up not wearing this because the buttons create an unflattering pull across the hips. I wanted to love this dress SO MUCH but it just did not get there for me. The color is very pretty. Maybe for someone with narrow hips.
If you are considering ordering this-- do it! It is a fabulous dress for any occasion.

Rented this for a company holiday dinner, the color was perfect, fabric felt lovely on the skin, and the cut was flattering. But ended it up not wearing because it was just a size too big. I'm usually a 4/6 where it fits fine depending on the brand. The 4 wasn't available so I went with the 6. The six seemed too loose around the chest area, where if I sat a certain way the fabric would gather loosely enough to show my bra. Will be sizing to a 4 next time!
Pretty color. This dress was way too big for an average size 6. It made my shoulders look bulky.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and hugs the curves.
links_reviews_text: It's a stunning dress in an even more stunning color! I absolutely love it. Classy and fun at the same time! It had a tiny snag when it arrived, but it's unnoticeable. It hugs my curves perfectly. I am a curvy size 12 normally, but this 14 for perfectly, with just a little extra room - which helps when sitting down.
True to fit
I chose this dress based on it suiting a pear shape. However, my normal size was huge on top and too small to wear on the bottom.

The color was exceptional. I loved the green. I'm between a 6 and an 8, and I tried the 8. It fit fine, but I wish the chest was a little bigger. I'm a 36DD and while it fit, I wish it was a little roomier. I wore it to work with a tank top underneath. The length was also a little long for my taste. I'm 5'4" and it was just an inch longer than I like my midi-skirts to hit. Got lots of compliments on it!
Nice material, great color, perfect for office. Ran a bit large in my opinion and would have rented a smaller size
love this classy, stand out dress. wonderful fabric, really pretty.

I am going to a military affair in Washington DC in a couple weeks and did not have time to store shop for appropriate outfits to pack. RTR fit the bill. This green beauty was perfect, fit well, and made me look "put together."
The color, the fit and the fabric, everything about this dress is amazing
Great color, but runs small
It was too long for my petite frame.
Unfortunately this gorgeous dress wouldn't fit around my hips BUT I wore it over work pants and top as a duster and got tons of compliments. The color is rich and the fabric is gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a work conference. It was just this huge green sheeth. Awful.
links_reviews_text: way too big. Just no style. too long. felt very dated. Not new, contemporary or fresh.
Bit long for a 5"3 person. The belt is super long and the v is very low. Didn't wear this.
Received so many compliments
The gap between the button in the front will show undies - should plan on a slip

Fit was a bit loose but the fabric was luxurious! The cut makes my broad shoulders look a bit larger but that could be because it was a bit too big. Hits mid shin on me and with the loose nature felt very politicianesque wife on me. Would love to try another size but my mother finds it divine!
Loved the color, but fit is weird.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but not for anyone with a larger bust
links_reviews_text: The color is beautiful and the dress seems very well-made, but unfortunately with my larger chest it gapped too much in the front to be wearable.
It had a low neckline that needed to pinned. Received many compliments.
While the dress technically fit, the fabric had no give so it made it not very flattering. I do have a hard time with wrap dresses to begin with anyway but was so hoping this would work!
Nice fit, needs cami underneath, but super cute.
too big to wear. very low cut

Am wearing to work today but should have sized down, it looks boxy and may be better for someone less curvy. I also have to wear a long sleeved undershirt since it's very itchy. Salmon is a flattering color though and I like the pattern!

Loved the print and colors in this sweater. Or maybe wasn't the right shape for my body but that didn't make me hate it. It was VERY itchy. I had to put a long sleeve undershirt on under it. But overall it was just okay.

links_reviews_title: Itchy. Not at all soft like alpaca wool should be
links_reviews_text: This sweater was thick, itchy, and bristly. I needed to wear a long sleeve, crew neck undershirt because the feel of it against my skin was terrible. The color combo and fit are amazing, so it's a shame it's been over processed and ruined the texture of the wool.

links_reviews_title: Warm wool for weekend in the mountains
links_reviews_text: I love this style, it was loose with a great pattern (without being too funky). It is wool so it has a minor itch to it, but comfortable enough that I could wear it without a shirt underneath. I rented for a weekend in the mountains. I wish it was colder where I lived so I could wear it more!

links_reviews_title: Wore to work, to the bar and to an Apple orchard.
links_reviews_text: This sweater is colorful and incredibly versatile. It definitely runs large; I sized down so that it would be a bit more fitted and not so slouchy, and it was still quite roomy.

I have been eyeing this item forever! Thank God it did not disappoint. I wore this sweater to brunch and a long day of Sunday Funday. PROS -The color was great! -The fabric is not itchy! -The length was perfect to cover my behind when paired with leggings. CONS -None-
Fit was a little boxy but I loved this with leggings. A little itchy as some reviewers said, but nothing a cami couldn't help. Very warm and a great, cheerful winter/spring transitional piece.
Kinda itchy
This sweater was very disappointing in person. The color was a dull, sad salmon, and it is SO ITCHY. I couldn't stand to wear it.
Warm but ITCHY

links_reviews_title: Way too itchy to enjoy the compliments
links_reviews_text: Was baggy which works well for wintertime comfort but was way too itchy to actually enjoy it. Good colors and pattern, got nice compliments all day.
Would have had to wear something under it. Material was way too itchy. Cute pattern though

links_reviews_title: Adorable, true to size but scratchy!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous and on trend, fit exact but the material is so itchy you need to layer carefully.
Really love the look of this sweater-- it's perfect for a cold day but was a little itchy at times. Would rent again though!
The pattern was fun but the sweater was a little short in my opinion. My be related to my large bust but not right for me.

I didn't wear this because it is 55% wool and therefore is very itchy. My fault for not checking the fabric content. I ordered the 6 because the 4 was not available...true to size, but for my body , the 4 would've been the better size. Cute design and colors!

This is a wonderful and fun warm cozy sweater that is perfect for the weekend. I ended up wearing this to a party with some of my very artistic creative friends, and I got compliments from them all night long. This is the kind of sweater you want to live in, and it's very warm. Do yourself a favor and rent this one this winter.
Cute everyday sweater, a little short on my 5'11'' frame. It's itchy too, but I like the design enough to deal with it!

I'm normally a 4, but rented the 6. I loved the oversized look of this sweater! It was a little itchy, but nothing a tank underneath couldn't solve. The pattern and colors were a fun change from the normal fall/holiday sweater. It was perfect to dress down with vans or dress up with booties. Overall, a great sweater and I would definitely rent again!
Super cute for work on a Friday. Got lots of compliments.
Loved the pattern, but found the fabric to be very itchy. Had to wear a long sleeve tee under it and that made it pretty warm. Hit right at the hip with a little bit of a boxy fit.
This was a great sweater with a cute print.

Definitely a wool product! Fit is good, I ordered a size up for layering. The arms were bigger than I wanted, but not too big. I got overheated very quickly and needed to change, not being able to enjoy the sweater as long as I wanted. Might rent again when it's colder.

links_reviews_title: Then itchiest sweater I've ever worn.
links_reviews_text: This sweater is 55% wool and I guess I should've known better. It's incredibly itchy, to the point that I went and bought another shirt to wear the rest of the day during my lunch break. I do not recommend if your skin is sensitive to wool like mine.
I love this skirt, it has nice movement, the material is soft and it makes you look thin <3

links_reviews_title: Great color scheme but weird fit
links_reviews_text: I really wanted to love this skirt but the fit was bizarrely clingy and kept getting caught on random places in my body. Odd material contributed to this.
Super comfy and looks great with a white turtleneck. I wore this to Xmas dinner.

links_reviews_title: Tight in the waist, large through the hips
links_reviews_text: Biased cut silk. The fabric is luxe and it's overall very pretty, but the waist was small and the hips were roomy. I wore a sweater over top to try and hide some of the weirdness going on in the hips. Great for work!

links_reviews_title: Love the print, great for holidays!
links_reviews_text: Wore to work with a chunky navy sweater. The print is lovely and fit was true to size. Even after steaming looked a bit wrinkled but it wasn't horrible. Took off one star because the waistline was a little weird, hard to describe but wouldn't really lay flat and almost looked a bit unfinished. Easy enough to cover up and might have just needed to be ironed.
I wore a 4 and it fit pretty much perfectly but when sitting was a little tight around my waist but I think a 6 would be too baggy. Very cute for the holidays! I would also wear to work

links_reviews_title: Nice length. Cute for a one time rental
links_reviews_text: Didn't sit completely smooth but that could have been a sizing thing.

Fit very high on the waist with no stretch. Not uncomfortable with a big sweater over it though wouldn't want to wear with a tighter, tucked in top. It also wrinkles easily when you sit though it's not very noticeable. Overall a very cute fall skirt!
pretty true to size- surprisingly flowy!

links_reviews_title: This skirt is beautiful and very flattering.
links_reviews_text: There is no stretch and the 10 was almost a little tight.

Ended up not wearing. I believe it was the right size because of how the zipper closed but the upper waist was loose and then it was tight in the thighs/butt. I have a small butt compared to hips so this was odd. 2 stars for feel of fabric and pattern.
Perfect essential coat for everyday. Loved the structure and quality

Oh my. It may be early March in N.H. but I finally found my ideal winter coat ! It zips up and can fit a thick sweater underneath. Very warm! I am thinking about purchasing it but I will need to als I try it in a 6- the 8 was slightly wide under arms or across chest but on the other hand it fits bulky sweater so I am on the fence about sizing down! Will try the other size and color before purchasing :)
This is a warm and stylish coat. The size I got was a bit too big for me. And I wish that it had pockets.

links_reviews_title: Great but not able to wear
links_reviews_text: Since it was a short and mild winter I was not able to wear it as much. Well def rent it next winter if possible because it is a great staple.
Loveeeee this coat! Has great amount of pockets, the length was great and SO SO warm!! The only 'complaint' is that it picks up a lot of fuzz, etc.!
This coat is perfect! I love the high collar neck. Perfect length. Perfect fit.

I loved this simple black jacket. The gold hardware dresses it up just a little. It was warm and looked classy and appropriate for an outdoor awards ceremony. I ended up buying this in a tall size from j crew. Love it!!
Importantly the shoulders are not tight. I wear size XS shirts and the 2 was perfect so I don't agree with those saying this runs large. The perfect black coat for many occasions.

I thought this was a great coat for the cold weather. Held up well in the rain. VERY warm, so don't wear on a long commute/plane where you can't easily take it off. Great for an outdoor tour in Portland in December.

I rented this for a NYC long weekend vacay and would say it's a good coat for 10°- 40° weather. Absolutely love it and don't want to return it. I might end up buying it but I also live in LA so it would only get worn at night. 😂 it fits well and has shaping at the waist.

Why in the world are reviewers saying this coat doesn't have pockets? It absolutely has pockets, found in the exact places you'd expect pockets to be. Runs very large - I am about 5'3" and 118 pounds and a 0 fit very loosely on me.
Super warm jacket. Goes with just about anything. I received lots of compliments on it every time I wore it. I would totally bring it again
Whichever size you think you wear- size up one size! Fabulous coat otherwise, received many compliments!

I ordered this as unseasonably winter temps came early and it is my new favorite coat for work. Received lots of compliments as it is nice thick wool with deep pockets and clean design lines with a nice dark blue satin, lint free, lining. I will check the price again because it is tempting to just buy it already :)
Perfect jacket! The size was great for me. Plenty of room for a thick sweater and scarf underneath. Length went to mid/high thigh on me. Kept me very warm
compliments

I wore this on a trip to Europe in early October. The coat is nice but a bit heavy. It also runs a little big for a petite person...would probably be perfect for the average height person. It looked nice.
I plan to wear this jacket everyday all winter I'm in love with it!
Loved the way this jacket fits. I usually have to size up because of my busy, but not with this one. It was plenty warm and fit just right. Will be renting again once winter comes to KY!
ordered a size up to accommodate pregnancy. love, love this coat!

I wore this while I was on a trip to Boston! It was spring - so still a bit chilly at times. I live in California and tried wearing it one day - not at all good for the Bay Area in May. It's too hot. This would be a great winter or snow coat!
It's a very heavy coat. I often felt hot in it, but would be great for the right weather.

I LOVED this coat! I rented it for a trip to London where the weather was supposed to be cold and rainy but changed to hot and sunny 2 days before we left. I was only able to wear this coat once at night but was so glad that I had rented it! It is lined with the softest material so is very comfortable on the inside. I would rent this again in a heartbeat if I ever need a simple but cute warm coat again.
Heavy coat, definitely made me feel insulated and comfy!
Great jacket, fits perfect, didn't wear it though because I thought it would be a bit lighter. Rented it a couple weeks too late.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a business trip to chilly Chicago!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 4-6 and based on reviews sized down to the 4. I probably could have gotten away with a size 2, the sleeves were a little long but it was super warm and cute and very professional-looking for my business trip to Chicago where it's still cold. Will definitely rent this again next fall/winter!

links_reviews_title: like it. Can be more casual or ok for wearing to work.
links_reviews_text: I'd buy it!

links_reviews_title: LOVE THIS COAT. Simple and classy. So great for daily use or occasion alike.
links_reviews_text: Fit was spot on, material was so nice.
Great classic coat! Really slimming & can dress up or down. Only downside is I didn't have many cold days left when I discovered it!
Loved it and probably would've bought it if it had pockets and if it didn't pick up dog hair like crazy! Even after lint rolling twice, it was always covered in fur.
It was big on my arms but good everywhere else
I went with a size up, which allowed for bulky sweaters in the spring Chicago weather! Loved having this for the few days that the Chicago weather allows for medium weight coats.

I rented this to switch up my puffy coat game at the end of Boston's winter season. Super warm and sleek looking. My only complaint is that the black wool collar sits so close to my face that I often get scratched by it.
Absolutely love this coat. Will probably buy.

links_reviews_title: Stylish coat, not best for shorter individuals
links_reviews_text: I'm about 5'3", so this dwarfed me quite a bit. But otherwise, it felt true to size. I'd recommend for fall /winter - it's very stylish.
Cute coat, nice details but runs large. I'm going to swap it for a smaller size.

I didn't wear it. I would have needed a size 18, but the 22 was the only size available before my trip so I thought I'd give it a try (J. Crew clothing tends to run small). It was WAY too big so unfortunately I never wore it.
Love all of the pockets and the overall sleek look. Felt warm and chic.
Warm and durable! Rubs large only complaint is no pockets

I took this on a 2 week work trip to some colder parts of the country (I live in LA so I don't have a ton of winter wear) and I loved it! It looks super professional and smart, but is extremely comfortable and warm as well. I feel like it upgraded my cold weather look - usually I just wear a puffy jacket but since this was an important work trip I wanted to look a bit more professional.
This shirt was a perfect fit and was so comfortable! Great fall/winter color. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Basic top with a little SPUNK
links_reviews_text: This top is great quality and has an overall good fit. Basic button down, with a little snake skin print flare. Classic work shirt with a little spunk. Tucked in for a more put together look. For more work week looks follow @renttherunway_teacher on Instagram!
Nice blouse but the medium is way too big.

links_reviews_title: beautiful print, i have a short torso so had to tuck it in.
links_reviews_text: everything but the material makes you sweat

links_reviews_title: Great silk shirt that's also edgy
links_reviews_text: Really great shirt that's dressy and edgy at the same time. Wore this to a dinner event over the holidays tucked into black jeans and wore with black boots. Absolutely loved it! I think the shirt I received has maybe just been around a long time since it seemed a little stretched in some areas and didn't necessarily lay flat when on the hanger. Not a huge issue though or super noticeable when i was wearing it. Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I didn't even wear it. Sent it back the next day.
links_reviews_text: Probably better for bigger chested women. The scoop neck was too deep and wide on my chest. If I tried to pull the top up so it wasn't too low, it would gape at my shoulders. I didn't wear it. Immediately returned based on fit. Still a pretty shirt and the material was nice.
Cute shirt in a fun subtle pattern. Rented for a day of work - nothing special, but was happy to have a quality shirt. Silk feels very expensive.
I usually wear M or L. Sized up to XL which was loose but fine layered underneath a cardigan. Nice fabric. Nothing special but attractive as a basic for layering.
This blazer is light but also slightly structured with shoulder pads. Fit perfectly and got tons of compliments. Go a size down!
This was a great spring jacket. I'm 7 months pregnant and wore it both for work and casually. Great over a dress or a T-shirt.

links_reviews_title: Stylish, great fit, color was perfect for spring
links_reviews_text: Love everything about this blazer, didn't want to return

This jacket is meant to be a little large. I'm very short so it looks exceptionally large on me but I like that style. Fabric is linen and very light so it's the perfect springtime/summer jacket. I got an XSM and usually always wear a small in everything FYI.

links_reviews_title: Nice color and fabric, good weight for warmer weather.
links_reviews_text: Slim fit. Looked very wrinkled after a full morning of wear.

It's a super cute blazer for a casual Friday at work, especially in the summer given the material and color! It does run a bit large though especially when worn unbuttoned so would recommend probably a more fitted outfit on top and bottom than something oversized or an outfit with no fitted waist

I was so excited to get this blazer for work, but just so disappointed in the overall fit. I'm usually a small or medium, so seeing the other reviews that say this runs large, I went with a small. I put it on, and I was just swimming in it, it looked like I was wearing a bathrobe. I probably could have taken two more sizes down (if only that were an option). I really wanted this to work, the color is really nice, and it does feel like good quality, but the sizing and shape was just so unflattering, I had to return the next day.

I rented this for a work event and loved it. Beautiful color and lightweight fabric. Runs very big - I'm normally a small in jackets and the XS was still an oversized look. Definitely will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Very cute - versatile. Felt a bit oversized to me.
links_reviews_text: This is a fantastic piece but gets very wrinkly.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this.
links_reviews_text: It was too long/big on me, but I normally have this issue with blazers. Love the color, weight and fabric.
Runs big but is supposed to. Tapered nicely at waist and wasn't boxy
Thin material, not as structured as the photo looks.
Good tailored fit
I was swimming in a small
lightweight and unflattering. I ordered an extra small and it was huge on me (and not in a cute, oversized way.) The sleeves were way too long.

links_reviews_title: Bought for work, definitely for a spring day
links_reviews_text: Strong shoulders!
This dress is a great color, the fits ok, the straps for around the waist are really long and black which is kind of weird.
Nifty in every way, this dress is classic in blue and white stripes. Many good details and good surprises the dress like the black fabric on one side of sash and the criss cross back. Perfect!

Gorgeous dress, wrinkles semi easily- but stands out beautifully, classic style, gorgeous colors, and cute bent with contrast underbelly for the flip/tie.... As other reviewers said the arm holes are gi-normous- you MUST wear a Cami/spandex slip with this. I understand it's the care free crisp New England summer style, but it's excessive. As a curvy woman, the last thing I need to do is add more bulk. If you're in between sizes, definitely size down (unless ALL of your weight is in the bottom- then stay true to size, the dress buttons & has no stretch).
This dress was a nice weight fabric but way too long for me

My favorite colors , stripes are in, love cap sleeves, the belt was a bit complicated at first but I looked up the description and figured it out. The best thing about this dress besides the color and stripes is the pockets!! They are slit to the side and deep. You can adjust the dress from Inside the pockets.
Great outfit for a Sunday brunch outdoors.

Lovely quality and design, it just runs at least a size large. I was able to make it work with the belt for one day, but it was huge on top and had gaping arm holes. Also worth noting it wrinkles pretty easily.
Fit perfectly. The fabric is very crisp and the style in the back is a really nice touch. The perfect length. It has pockets too!

It's just ok. Kinda tight in the mid section and big up top... and I have large boobs! I wore it unbuttoned at the top because it was awkwardly baggy on top when buttoned up. It's pretty tight on the stomach so uncomfortable sitting, but I was still cute for the day!

This is a fantastic dress. From the material to the cut to the color, it is impeccable. Creates an instant waist for those of us who are straight-bodied and is made from a very crisp, sateen-like cotton that doesn't seem to wrinkle. I wore it out and about on a work trip on a day where I did lots of walking and I was so comfortable, then wore it to the office and a work dinner a few days later. Loads of compliments!

Got tons of compliments on this one. The fabric is nice and thick, and the buttons and belt were in all the right places. It has pockets which is always a plus, too. I can't say it's the most flattering dress ever, but I still liked it. Only drawback is that it wrinkles throughout the day, and my bra peeked through the arm holes a little bit.
Great fit. Comfortable and stylish at the same time.

links_reviews_title: It fit but just barely, not for the hippy

links_reviews_text: it was a little loose but looked good with a blazer and flats
I rented this for work. The temperature was just a little too cool and the dress was just a little too much. I didn't end up wearing it. It is cute though.
Wore this dress for a Saturday day out with friends. It was a little big in the bust but I tied it a little tighter and was good to go for the day!

links_reviews_title: Unique back. Traditional stripes with a little edge.
links_reviews_text: Different but cute
Flew to a one-day conference in this dress. Very cute - polished without being too formal. The only thing I'll say is that it is much longer on a 5'6" frame than the model. Hit me mid-calf.
Very boxy on top.

links_reviews_title: Summer Fashion - work appropriate with a bit of style
links_reviews_text: Runs a bit big... lot of material. I'd size down if I rented again. Love the color and the double-wrapping belt. F

links_reviews_title: This is one big expensive sack
links_reviews_text: Ugh. I had such high hopes for this dress but my standard size looked like I was wearing a big sack. I could tighten the belt, but there was still so much extra fabric and you could see my whole bra through the gaping armpit holes. What a bummer.
Lots of compliments. Vibrant color and flattering. Very pretty for work or play!

This dress has fabulous detail and fabulous color. I had to get used the front slit and side slits being high when I sat down, but I think that's just because I'm not used to having slits at all. The slits didn't seem high at all when standing. Some folks may want to sized down if they don't like a looser fit, but I thought the fit was great. Tummy tire approved.

links_reviews_title: Great professional look for creative industry
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a (creative industry) interview and it was so perfect - easy, comfortable, and chic with that tailored shirt dress work look and a great hire-me strong shoulder crossed with summer-style stripes. The overall look is conservative but a warning that it can be a bit peek-a-boo with the slits on the sides and also at the front placket, and at the arm holes. Also it's fine with nude undergarments but even light pink (usually close enough to nude on my skin tone) showed through. It's very flattering because you can tie the belt however you want, and the sizing is forgiving because the fit of the garment itself is loose. As others note it runs pretty large so don't be afraid to order down if you are between sizes or even if your true size isn't available. I was ok on the 38 but would go down next time - especially as that might help with how open the arm holes were. But it was perfect for my interview and I will definitely rent it again for work or a summer party.
fit very wide but I got compliments and it was comfortable. Arm holes were HUGE

The bold blue and white stripe on this was not appealing to me. The tie around the middle is very long so you have to wrap it around several times. It's obviously a high quality garment but doesn't look like it on - it looked frumpy and the bold stripe was just...too bold. It was not flattering, chic or cute...I didn't wear it.

The cut was boxy. I should have ordered the 6 equivalent even with my large bust. The belt is awkward and does not tie beautifully. It was just an okay dress. Btw the cut out at the top of the back might make this a little too much for some offices.

I am full breasted and it was too baggy on top. Had to wear s tank cause you could see my bra on the sides. The dress wrinkles easily. Wore it once but wouldn't go through the hassle of ironing for another wear.

Really nice quality dress but runs small. I generally wear a 50/52 in Derek Lam tops but this dress came no where near buttoning up. Will definitely order this dress again but will likely need to size up one or two sizes.

Very interesting and fun dress for work. My regular size was unavailable but both the sizes bigger and larger were there. I went with the size smaller because it seemed roomy and I'm glad I did. My regular size would have been too big. The dress is adjustable around the waist and has space in the hips and bust. Very flattering for an hourglass shape. I was slightly concerned that the back would be too open for work, but it's not quite as open as in the model's photos.
It was huge and I could not wear it.

go down at least 2 sizes. this dress isn't supposed to be tight, but is still massive all around. i'm typically a 2/4 and the 2 was huge. the 0 might be better, but i think the armholes and chest area, etc will still be large. if you're smaller than me i wld not recommend this dress only because of sizing. the style is awesome and i cannot recommend it enough for the pattern and gorgeous blue, esp for spring. great pockets, etc. if only the sizing wasn't so off this wld be a staple for spring!
Dressed it down with gym clothes and nikes for the weekend and dressed it up with leather leggings and boots for work! Loved this piece
very warm, over sized

I was thrilled to relieve this and show it off! It was a bit baggy so I would size down but I jazzed it up with some black jeans and booties so I could wear it to work. I will absolutely rent again if a smaller size is available!
Dress up an outfit, throw over leggings, jeans...this cardigan is so versatile. I am only 5'2" and the length hit me at the ankle, which did not bother me. Perfect for travel.

links_reviews_title: Had to fight myself not to wear this everyday
links_reviews_text: I loved this piece! I wore this back to back for several days. I would wear it to work, around the house, out and about shopping - all the things. It it pretty warm and cozy and loved the print. Also litle details like the cuff gave it a nice hold so the sleeves weren't in your way. I had to make sure I didn't wear it everyday and switched it up a little. Highly recommend
Warm and snuggly. Worked well on a cold winter day. Small was plenty big enough and I am usually a Medium.

Rented this with Bailey 44 Tolstoy Eco Leather skirt. Great pairing. So many compliments on the cape. Yes it felt a bit like a super hero outfit but the color was just so gorgeous, and the outfit was so playful and sexy. Loved it.

This is a lovely shirt with high quality fabric that's simply fun to wear. The 8 fits correctly in the shoulders, waist, etc., but due to my larger bust size, I should have sized up to a 10. In the size 8, I had some gaping and worried about buttons popping open. Overall, though, a great rental.
Definitely looks better tucked into high waisted trousers! Chic and easy to style, wore this for dinner and drinks. Insta @lexaire

links_reviews_title: Fun, different shirt that's easy to pair with!
links_reviews_text: Really easy way to spice up your outfit. Can easily dress it up or down!

links_reviews_title: Love the cape! So different, elegant and dramatic while not being over the top.
links_reviews_text: Fabric and construction were beautiful. Rented this for the holiday season, and ended up wearing it for our Christmas card pictures. Wore it to holiday parties as well.
Absolutely fell in love with this blouse! Wore it to a family dinner and also to work. It's so flattering and fun! Would totally love to rent again!

I absolutely love the way it flows, it shows off your figure in a subtle but sexy way. Got so many compliments on this blouse! Wore this to work then date night, it's the perfect transition blouse! I wore with black faux leather leggings and black leather boots and the ensemble was a hit! I could also see myself wearing it with a pencil skirt or something else high waisted, with the blouse tucked in. The shirt runs TTS for a flowy feel, maybe a bit big but I think that's the style.
Very cute and flattering - only problem was that the top button kept popping open.
I got compliments on this. People liked how it was a cape..... :) It looks like the photo and I think it runs true to size. I'd recommend. I wore it for work.
If you have large breasts please do not size up!! I couldn't even button my top so I went down a size. I listen to the reviews and I shouldn't have get your regular size
Felt like I had my super woman cape on!

links_reviews_title: I loved this but I looked a little like a super hero
links_reviews_text: I really like this! My boyfriend however thought it was too much (he was right) for our local bar. This would be perfect for a night in the city!
I wish the neck line was a V but it's a very flowing top and easy to wear with jeans and skirts.
Hated it

links_reviews_title: Interesting top but not ideal for everyday wear.
links_reviews_text: This top is generous everywhere except across the bust, which pulls funny due to the buttons. I'm average size (36C) and it pulled a good bit.

links_reviews_title: Versatile piece for work or date night
links_reviews_text: Love this versatile top. Wore to work and then out for date night, got compliments on both!
In a good way

links_reviews_title: great top, super flowy and fun
links_reviews_text: great top, super flowy and fun, but the buttons kept popping open. Fixable with fashion tape.
This is a pretty and glamorous top that becomes slightly less glamorous when you reach across a dinner table and the buttons all pop open and your bra makes an appearance. Lol.

links_reviews_title: Love love love makes me wanna dance!
links_reviews_text: This cape top is the epitome of my fashion style. I love wearing capes that are figure flattering and that flow well. This top looks great and made me start dancing joyfully as soon as I put it on. Bought it 'cuz I love it!
I really liked this blouse. The front buttons kept coming undone. Would not be a good option for a large breasted female.
was not my style but for someone else it might be great, just a little too much material for me.

I wore this with leather leggings and it was amazing. The flow of the cape is very attention grabbing. Only note- the buttons tend to just pop open if you are busy and move the right way. It wasn't pulling at all, a perfect fit, just reach for something, show a boob. I used a small safety pin to secure the top right below the button hole because I was out of clothing tape. Just a heads up if you have a chest.
Wore to a holiday party with black skinny pants and loved it. Fit was spot in.
This looked great. The cape back is very dramatic, but it is essentially a simple blouse, easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: This was the superpower fabulous energy for the Monday after a long weekend!
links_reviews_text: Fit very well, I could have went down a size. Beautiful and feminine piece!
So flattering. Recieved many compliments. Will get again in my unlimited, and will do a size down.
LOVED this jacket. Typically I am a size 2/4 but I ordered a medium and it fit perfectly. I suggest sizing up!! Super soft leather- looks as expensive as it is!

It's a nice jacket, amazingly soft leather with fun details, but also nothing groundbreaking. It did hit in a perfect spot to be paired with a dress, however the non leather material is a bit rough to the touch. Overall, cool piece. Wore it to work with jeans before pairing with a dress for a party.
Rented this for a chef's wedding. It was perfect for the group of creatives. The dress was also rented and both were a perfect combo!

links_reviews_title: A jacket that makes you feel bada$$
links_reviews_text: Great over a dress, with jeans, at work, for weekends, basically anything you have going on! Highly recommend renting.
This is a great fall option. Really pulls an outfit together. Yes, sleeves are a bit snug but with the zippers you can open them up slightly for more room. Overall would rent again.

links_reviews_title: BEST JACKET EVER! I wore this jacket many times
links_reviews_text: The fit is great. The sleeves are cropped which I like because it gives it an elevated look. I also liked wearing it with blouses and buttons downs as you can see the shirt sleeve at the wrist
This jacket felt very snug in the shoulders. It's cute, but nothing special. On myself, I felt it was very unflattering. The crop of the jacket made me look larger then I am.

This jacket looks cool and I like how warm it is since it's a mix between leather and wool but it was so small. I felt like I was trying to squeeze into kids clothes. I'm a size 12 and 5'8. This awkwardly hit in the middle of my arm and barley hit my waist. Didn't wear at all just sent right back

links_reviews_title: A staple rent- I wore this everyday! Pulls the look together.
links_reviews_text: SO CUTE. Definitely tight in the arms so if you like things looser or more comfortable, size up but this goes with everything. I wore it on a date, I wore it to work, and I put it over a formal gown for a black tie NYE party and it SERIOUSLY pulled the look together. Absolutely recommend, it is a staple item!

Great jacket - got it for a week in Paris. It was great dressed up or down and the zippered pockets were roomy enough to mean I didn't need to carry a purse when I was out and about exploring - big win! I will say it is pretty short, which worked great for me since I'm not tall, but may run short on taller ladies!
I had tons of compliments on this jacket with tons of detail. It is well constructed. It runs small.

At 5'5", 130, I am not a large lady. I rented a size large, and the sleeves were so tight I could barely move my arms. It's a cool enough jacket, but nothing special. I think I was expecting more (too much?) from a three thousand dollar jacket. I wore it to work once, and sent it right back.

Great jacket! I rented it for a trip to Europe and it was just the right weight and style for London's early fall weather. The leather was nice and soft and the knit sleeves made it so I felt like I could easily dress it up or down depending on the need.

links_reviews_title: A great night out with friends!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous!

I wore this jacket to a concert with my hubby and out and about on several other occasions. I love it! It is a great fit and good for chilly transitional weather. I definitely didn't want the give this one back.

links_reviews_title: The sleeves are short but I think they're supposed to be.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a small but this was a medium and I liked the fit except the sleeves were short. However I think they are meant to be. I didn't like it as a quarter sleeve but if you can dig it I'm not mad at you.
Chaqueta liviana y con mucho gusto.
Jacket ran a bit small through the arms but i was able to wear it. It has lots of character with the multiple zippers, the leather is very soft and it was perfect for a Las Vegas rock concert.

links_reviews_title: Love a good leather biker jacket!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jacket! Mostly because it wasn't all leather. I love that the midsection of the jacket is leather but the sleeves are different. It breaks up the look and gives it a more comfortable feel. Since it doesn't really have stretch, I would recommend sizing up if you are unsure about your size, or if you typically wear thicker shirts/sweaters that would feel bulky under a tighter jacket. The sleeves are slightly cuffed, which is also another detail I actually really like. Overall a great jacket!

Very stylish and the leather is like buttah! I loved wearing it and got tons of compliments. I wore with wide leg pants and black skinny jeans...I will likely try wearing it with a girlie dress next for a contrast. I highly recommend this jacket. Very good quality and goes with everything. I know the cropped/fitted look is the style but it was still slightly tight for me and I wear a 10-14.

It's a glorious back motto jacket of mixed materials. The leather is delicious and soft; the knit is sturdy and thick. It's perfection. It's simple. It can be work with any and everything in your closet and in the RTR closet. Just get it.
It was tight in the arms particularly when wearing over another shirt. I ultimately ended up taking it off for the rest of the day because it felt too restraint. Liked the style though!
Super stylish and cute! Also warm!

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love it, but hated this jacket.
links_reviews_text: It runs REALLY small. I should have been a medium but ordered a large based on other reviews. Even then, the sleeves squeezed my arms. I normally like cropped sleeves, but with the waist also cropped, it looked like I was wearing my 13 year old daughter's jacket (size-wise) and was super unflattering. Returning immediately.
It just doesn't fit like you want it to - short in the places I wanted to be large but boxy all around. Didn't wear

links_reviews_title: Liked it so much I put a ring on it! (rather, bought it)
links_reviews_text: Rented several times for everyday, to work, to dates. Loved it so much I HAD to own it ... so had to buy it!

links_reviews_title: Did not end up wearing this.
links_reviews_text: Hm, this fit a bit oddly and was very tight as well...The 3/4 sleeves on such a heavy weight jacket did not look good at all. The black zippered vents were not flattering either. Bummer as it's a stunning jacket on the hanger.
Pretty chic cut on a petite frame but the weather got too warm to wear this jacket so I returned without wearing. Arms were tight.
Nice look, but the XL didn't fit.
This jacket was so small it fit like a medium, not an xl. Would not recommend for large chested woman.
Tight in sleeves and sleeves are cut short. Wore it to dress down a cocktail dress and it served its purpose
Did not wear. XS was unavailable to I rented the S. It was way too large at the bottom.
Cute and true to size. Wasn't heavy or bulky. Loved it.
Tight on the chest for women with full bust
Definitely runs a little small.

As other reviews have mentioned yes, it does "run small" but that is the style. It has a cropped fit overall (short waist, 3/4 sleeves) if you're nervous about the shoulders being tight go up 1 size but don't go up too much or it may loose it's proportions. There are zippers up the back and the sides of the sleeves that you can use to adjust the fit if you're layering. It is a beautiful jacket don't be afraid of the runs small warnings you read.
It looked better open
This jacket has an awkward arm length, hitting maybe 3 inches above my wrist. I am small and petite but this jacket still runs small. Maybe a size up or 2 would have been a better fit.
Very cool jacket. I agree with other reviews that the arms can feel tight, but it was not in an unbearable way.

I usually wear a 12 on the top so thought the XL would be fine since I was planning on wearing it with a sleeveless Tneck (no bulky fabric to wear under the sleeves) but it was still way too tight. Back it goes, even though I really liked the style.
thin neoprene fabric is so soft and easy to wear. pairs well with the floral printed slip dress by atm anthony thomas melillo. fun take on the animal print trend.

links_reviews_title: I never wore it out of the house.
links_reviews_text: The feel, thickness, and luster of the material was strange. The animals were also more garish and strange in person. Too "young" feeling for me (as in "mistakes I might wear when I was young!").

After reading reviews I knew this guy was meant to be boxy (which looks great on my giant shoulders and general lack of feminine curves), and I felt safe getting my regular size even if it ran big since boxy is a pretty forgiving shape! However, they weren't kidding that this runs large! The waist skimmed my hip, but the sleeves were waaay too long. Did I wear it anyway? Sure did. The print is adorable and the neoprene-like fabric was a ton of fun.
On me this was a little boxy and the sleeves were a bit long (it also is not very warm for a sweatshirt), but the animal print is so cool, and it's very comfy for casual settings.

links_reviews_title: Super fun and fits to size
links_reviews_text: This sweatshirt is super fun and whimsical. Fits true to size. I received lots of compliments and would recommend renting for weekend wear.

links_reviews_title: SO cute, wish it was lined
links_reviews_text: The print on this sweater is ADORABLE and I would buy a full track suit if they made it in sweat material. I would recommend sizing up if you don't already do that naturally (I do because long-sleeved tops tend to be too small in the shoulders and through the arms) mostly because there is not a lot of stretch throughout. My only knock on this is that there is no liner, so the inside of the SWEATer is cold when you first put it on; it isn't exactly a sweatshirt, more of a heavier long-sleeved shirt if that makes sense. tl;dr: print to die for, size up, no lining, may rent again but not a top choice
It's fun but the sizing is much too large. Also be aware it's not very warm.
This is such a fun sweater, the animal designs are so cute.
The fabric of this top is interesting and chic but the fit is bad - it’s boxy and short and runs really big.

although it appears relatively basic I still received multiple compliments. The back was fun with the bow although I'm not sure if too many people saw it. Even though I'm tall I did not find the dress to be too short. I can envision myself styling this in plenty of ways. Will rent again!
Not sure why everyone says it runs large. Only the sleeves were big on me, so I just rolled them up.
Wore this 30 weeks pregnant. Probably could have worn a small although it was quite short for someone 5'9". Cute back detail and comfortable.
I probably could have gone with a smaller size but this dress is cute & warm for my New Year's Eve party.

links_reviews_title: Fits in all the right places
links_reviews_text: This was great for a nice dinner with the family that allowed me to also kick back and lounge on the couch afterward. Very versatile, warm, and comfy. For a sweater dress, it clearly isn't form fitting and yet it does well to show off your form in all the right places. Very cute.
I'm usually a 4/6 and got the Small but it was too big to wear out. Also, the bow on the back was sewn in at strange places and caused the fabric to flip over.
Runs large, made me look a bit bulky. I would have loved hidden pockets. Love the deep V in back though
Wore this to brunch on a cold day. The back is very cute so wear your hair up with this one! Comfy and forgiving

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and soft for third trimester
links_reviews_text: I like this dress its a light gray with some baby blue hues depending on the light. Lovely and comfortable. Not too short like even with my 35 week belly.

I liked this one, but it was a lot more boxy than I expected. Still it was a great, cozy and comfortable work outfit for a chilly day. The back is lower than I realized it would be, so I had to wear a bandeau to prevent my bra from showing - but no big deal.

links_reviews_title: Cozy sweater with deep v back
links_reviews_text: It's a bit of a boxy shape, so not super flattering on me. However, I wore this with a belt which made it more flattering. This dress is better if you dont have a booty (although i do) to wear it more as a sack as it's intended. I won't rent again but would recommend it to others of a different body type.
The fit and tie feature in the back of the dress add just the right amount of pizazz to an otherwise ordinary outfit!

This was easy to dress up a touch or be super casual. I wore it twice. It is more fitted than I expected which was nice. It isn't a sweater dress that fits like a sack. The material and make is also very good.
This ran a little big, perfect since I'm 39 weeks pregnant! Made me feel comfy and stylish, a little special for everyday with the v back detail and the bow.

links_reviews_title: Loved it and I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is understated sexy. I bought it. It had a great back and looks great bare and with a racer back lacy bra.
Super comfy and cute. Be sure to size down from your normal size!
It was okay, not super flattering shape
Great dress for colder weather. Fit is great. Really cute.
I love the material and the style, but it runs really, REALLY big. I somehow looked boxy and shapeless at the same time.
So unflattering large and floppy. Returned

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfy, but not special
links_reviews_text: I was hoping is would be softer. It fit fine and was big but not frumpy
A little right around the bottom, but a decent fit overall.

I rented this for work and the weekend. It really did nothing for me at all. I got a M as I read other reviews about it being too big. The M was definitely the right size, it's one of those dresses that clings to the wrong areas but with shape wear looked nice. I didn't think it really did anything for me or my shape.

links_reviews_title: Not what I expected even though I rented in store.
links_reviews_text: The sweater sticks to the body. I was hoping for a more flowy over size look.
It's cute and really showed off my bump! The back is a little low so it was hard to wear a bra with it.

Received compliments, love the big bow on the back! Great if you're fit. The material does show your body a bit, so if you're self Conscious about tummy rolls showing, this might not be for you (or wear spanx underneath). It was warm, a simple knit with a nice surprise detail on the back.

links_reviews_title: L was too big even at 28 weeks preggo
links_reviews_text: Ordered the L since suggested to order up in size when pregnant , but was too bulky on top- saggy armpits. Hopefully can get the medium to wear. Cute sweater dress!

Other reviewers are correct, this dress runs extremely large. I'm normally a 6/8 and the small was big on me. If it weren't for the details on this, the sizing wouldn't have been as noticeable. The open back just didn't work with so much extra space, and it was too long to be flattering. I still wore it but constantly felt like the back just wasn't sitting right no matter what strategy I tried when tying the bow.

Love this. Wore it to work with black tights ankle boots and a camisole and felt like it was winter weather appropriate without feeling shrouded. Would've worn it a bunch more but I got too many compliments to repeat
The color and feel of this sweater dress was amazing. It was stylish and cozy at the same time.

Pros- Warm-this dress is perfect for winter parties/events Sexy, yet conservative-I really liked the open back, yet the rest of the dress is fairly conservative Fit-may be on the the slightly larger side, but it was very comfortable and not too form fitting Cons- None (I was concerned about being able to wear a bra b/c of the low cut back, but I was happy to discover you CAN wear a bra without it showing :)

links_reviews_title: This dress did absolutely nothing for me.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 6/8 so I rented this in a medium. It just hung on me in the front and had so much extra unnecessary fabric in the stomach area. The back was better, but the slit at the top where the tie is came down low enough to show my bra strap. If you're going to rent this, size down.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for work!
links_reviews_text: The style was great for a cozy but stylish work day. The only con of this dress was the tie in the back. Having it tied too tight would pull at the lining, but having it too loose made it challenging for the shoulders of the dress to stay up. Otherwise, loved it!
Flattering and comfortable! So soft

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable, but still great for work
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress a lot, unfortunately it just ran very large. Definitely get a size smaller than you typically would.
Very pretty knit and design but sizing was odd. Sleeves were very long and bulky while body of sweater a bit trim.
Comfortable for sure! The silhouette was a bit loose, but the overall look was elegant.

links_reviews_title: This dress was worn mostly for work, and it is a beautiful and cozy dress to wear. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: The fit is on the bigger size, but I think it was meant to be that way

Comfortable dress, wore for a November, bar going birthday party and it kept me pretty comfortable when outside, wore it with tights but it's long enough you don't have to. The back is VERY low cut and will show your bra, so plan to go braless, wear one of those fancy back bras, or add a camisole (I went for the camisole)
wrap it up and walk away. easiest top to throw on with any high-waisted bottoms. soft fabric and adjustable fit will have you reaching for this piece on repeat.
I took the undershirt off . I really liked this top

links_reviews_title: Great for casual weekend wardrobe option.
links_reviews_text: Very cute. Runs a little short in torso but looked cute with thin turtle neck underneath for winter wear. Received lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Super cute but a little uncomfortable
links_reviews_text: I really liked this shirt, but I found that the wraparound kept coming loose, so I had to tie it pretty tight which made it a little uncomfortable. Overall, though, it was super stylish. Also, there was a small ink stain on the sleeve which was disappointing.
Ok top, but nothing special. It is very cropped so you'll need extra high waisted bottoms if you don't want to show any skin.
Not a super heavy textile so good for layering during autumn shoulder season - don't do wrap arounds a lot so fun change of pace for me.
Love the wrap feature of this shirt. I like the material. It is thick without being too heavy.
It fell a little awkward at first. Needed a cami. But it stayed in place all night at a concert. Sleeves were really nice. Fun print.
Great for work. Lightweight so great for layering and easy to wear. I would rent again.
Very cute. Kind of tricky to wrap.

I was really excited about the shirt. I have a small bust and a normal torso. The shirt was tight in the arms the bust and I had to wear a Cami underneath otherwise my stomach showed. I'm disappointed because the shirt looks great.

links_reviews_title: This top was a little shorter than I anticipated.
links_reviews_text: The sleeve length was perfect. The body length was a little short for me.

links_reviews_title: Nice style for casual weekend wear.
links_reviews_text: Runs short, needed to wear a cami underneath. Too bad because it was fun style and wrap around was slimming.
True to size, the ties are thinner than what is pictured, great to layer over a tank
You have to adjust the wrap belt a bit
Warm top and super comfortable to wear. Great for a night out in the winter.

The fabric is soft and the pattern very pretty. The ties were too long and I couldn’t make it wrap right. It was more cropped than I expected with no fabric over hang below the tie which would have been flattering.
Cute top! Not too short. Wore it with a black camisole to work.

links_reviews_title: Really cute with a black skirt
links_reviews_text: fits snug but well
Cute shirt, but a little too short for my comfort level.
Doesn’t work for a large bust.
This is a true wrap shirt, so it opens on its own. It's great for nursing if you're in the same situation!

This top was extremely fun to wear. Different spin on a flannel shirt. The wrap style top not only made my waist look smaller, but even with a 32E chest I didn't have cleavage showing. Wore this to work and put a black cami underneath which I tucked into my pants as I didn't want my midriff showing. Definitely something to consider if you aren't a fan of true crop tops.
Very cute pattern and good fit overall but the top is too short in length and the wrap tie makes the top look lumpy if you wrap it (which you have to because it's so long).
Very cheap material. Would not consider this rent worthy.
Too small in bust
I rented this sweater to walk up and down an outdoor, nighttime, holiday light show. It was a little itchy because of the mock turtleneck being right on my neck, but that's to be expected.
This sweater is beautiful. I got a ton of compliments. The S fit me perfectly, but I'm petite so may want to size up.

This definitely runs small! I sized up to a large (normally a medium) and I was surprised that it still fits very close to the body. The material is also a little itchy- nothing that can't be solved by wearing a tank underneath, but still worth noting. Overall, it's just ok. I was hoping for a really cute classy black sweater and it's just so so.
Ran very small or maybe was laundered too many times. Even with a tank top underneath, it was too itchy for me.
Basic black sweater. A little tighter than I prefer but still fit.

Got the xl as I wanted it loose. I'm usually med or large. It was tight and arms were short. Also says no wool but this was super itchy. I'm allergic to wool and I took it off immediately as it was unbearable.
Good black sweater. Wore a few times during rental. Sightly itchy so would recommend wearing a tank top under. I'd rent again.

links_reviews_title: Everyday top with a little character
links_reviews_text: Wore this with black jeans and combat boots to watch football - easy sweater with a lining under, super light so could wear anytime of year, hits right on the hips so flattering, soft material, sleeves have a camp print which is a nice touch on an otherwise simple top.
I liked this top, wore it several times. It has an attached black tank under the sweatshirt that hangs down below the bottom of the sweatshirt to prevent belly show
Great top!! Has a liner so it's perfect for a cool fall night.
Comfortable material, easy everyday staple. Not super special but I love a nice long sleeve this time of year.
Almost kept this. Word it many times. Great weight.
True to size fit, super soft. Great casual top.
I wore this top so many times. I even considered buying it! So so soft

links_reviews_title: LOVED THIS! Super comfy, cute with jeans.
links_reviews_text: The cutest spin on a basic black crew. Loved the layering piece but you do need to take your time getting dressed. It can get a bit tangled if you are not careful. I loved the layering piece inside of it, takes out having to put one on yourself. Cute detail. Soft fabric. A homerun
Fit was true to size, a very comfortable medium. fabric was soft and cozy, kept me warm on a brisk autumn day. LOVE the camo detail!!
Cute sweatshirt. It has an inner piece that provides a layered look. It's awkward to put on, but once on, it looks good.

links_reviews_title: Didn't love it. I wore it to a couple soccer games.
links_reviews_text: Boxy. Not flattering for me but maybe it would be better on someone else.

links_reviews_title: I have worn this top several times. It is soft and comfy....perfect for running errands.
links_reviews_text: The top is super soft with a tank underneath. It is a little shorter than what I typically wear but I liked the fit. It hit right at the top of my pants.
Good
Can dress this up or down, heels helped at 5'6. Slightly heavy but comfortable. Loved it.
If you're on the fence about getting the set, go for it! It's surprisingly wearable with so many compliments Found the jacket a little tight since I have broad shoulders

The quality and construction of this piece is perfect. I wore it for a night out so I wore a nude deep v bodysuit but would certainly wear this again multiple ways. With a higher neck body suit for work. Rent both pieces and then wear the duster with different pants and then wear the pants with a different top. I'm 5'6 26/27 pants 34c 130lbs
Great way to dress up basic office wear or casually with jeans/leggings. Will definitely be renting this again!

I got lots of attention in this jacket. I felt kind of like Darth Vader. I felt incredibly confident wearing this at work. It was a little tight in the shoulders, but wass fine as long as I wore a thin shirt under it.
Loved this take on a suit separate. I want to keep it! So many ways to style this.
Wore this to church and got tons of compliments. Very comfortable and warm. Only downside is when you sit it drags on the floor. Might be a bit long if you're short.
Amazing coat. Wore twice....once with heels and the other with sneakers. Totally adorable either way
Flattering and very hip. Wore it to proposal presentation: nailed it. Rent the pants too! Power Suit!
Great jacket, and I love that it has so stretch so it moves w/ you, I just wish the pinstripe patter was narrower, the wider stripe limits the look a bit.

Really liked this, but if you have wider arms, might be a bit narrow. Loved the length on me it's very long, skimming my ankles at 5'10". If you're much shorter than 5'8" it would probably be too long.

links_reviews_title: Chic, tailored, but still cool and sexy!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to my daughter's jazz band concert. I received dozens of compliments! While it is very tailored and is very chic and understated, the bottom of the coat is slit into panels that allow a little leg to show while you walk. I am VERY short (5'0"), so this was floor length for me and added to the drama, but even at ankle or tea length it would still be a very smart and sexy piece.
