If I didn't have 3 kids and it was not Christmas I would buy it!

I am a slim 5'8". the jacket hit the top of my foot. I wore a navy turtle neck with matching slacks and heels the out fit was perfect. If you are a bit thick in the middle or shorter than 5'8" I would not rent this piece.
I wore this sweats set for a day running around the city with a friend and it was super comfy. No complaints here.
Worn on flight and at ski resort --- light weight sweatsuit material/ light hoodie material

links_reviews_title: Comfy yet smart look for airport
links_reviews_text: Wore it often during plane trips as the sweatshirt material is thick but comfy. It is stylish so doesn't look shabby when paired with jeans/ shorts. Will rent again
Comfy and cute!
Great for everyday and so comfortable
Rented this matching gray sweatsuit for a weekend at home and absolutely loved it and considered buying. The sweatshirt and sweatpants are so comfy and soft, I never wanted to change out of them!
Normally wear a S in tops/sweaters so they aren't super tight. This top is so comfortable and loose but not baggy. Perfect for every day outings to the store, class, etc. A very comfy casual top!
It’s just a little short but it works

links_reviews_title: Size Down - it will fit perfectly
links_reviews_text: Rented with Rebecca Taylor Malbec Vegan Leather skirt. I ordered a size down and it fit perfectly. Nice material and drape.
It was a bit tight around the mid-section. I sized up my NW size and that was a good decision. It was flattering overall.

links_reviews_title: Loved so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This is the first piece I bought from RTR. It is just a solid everyday piece. The fit isn't for everybody but for my athletic body type with bigger shoulders it is flattering. It is a bit tight around the waist but I sized up and it was perfect. Might not be for everyone but I highly recommend!
I really considered keeping this but don't need any more winter clothes. It's the perfect sweater, so warm, not scratchy, the fit is ideal. It just looks expensive
Fits true to size. Can't decide if it's a cowl or turtleneck. It doesn't really do it for me.

Love this shirt - it's cozy, warm and flattering. It's fitted in the waist line with wide sleeves. Perfect with a scarf or poncho over it. Tough to fit inside of a fitted jacket due to the sleeves. Also looks great with a long necklace.

Very cute, comfortable winter sweater. The fit is loose on top and tight around the hips, so I didn't care for how it looked with jeans because you could see the waistband. I wore out with jeggings and that looked much better. I wore my normal size and probably could have sized up for a looser fit. Since the sleeves are so loose anyway I don't think it would have looked too baggy in a L.
Really like the look of this sweater. Was more fitted in the midsection than I expected and the sleeves were a tad short but overall a good sweater and I would rent again.
Great sweater - not itchy. Got 6 compliments on my way into work.

I was surprised by how warm this sweater is! I love the slight nod to the ‘70s with the bell sleeves but the turtleneck is wide enough it wasn’t sitting on my neck all day! I received quite a few compliments each time I wore it but I can’t see myself loving this sweater year after year so that’s why I’m not buying it.

links_reviews_title: Felt amazing and fit like a glove
links_reviews_text: I'm bigger on top than on the bottom. This sweater accentuated all the right places. It was thick and heavy but soft, perfect on a Fall NY evening. I would buy this if it got cold enough where I live. Definitely the favorite sweater out of 3picks.

links_reviews_title: Perfect sweater for work or out & about
links_reviews_text: Honestly at first I wasn't sure about this sweater but it grew on me & I can't wait to wear it again. It has a dolman cut and is pretty fitted (but stretchy fabric) around the torso. Material is soft and was super easy to pair with jeans & boots. I have a larger bust and the medium fit perfectly. Size up if you want it to be looser in the torso, though.
Loved this sweater!
Loved it but to get the oversized look I think I should have sized up. I'm 5'5" and 125 lbs and the small def did not give me the oversized look like on the model.
This sweater was cute and flattering but the neck was really itchy
The waist line of this is really tight while the rest of it was really loose. Pretty strange looking.

Other reviewers are right - this is an odd fit. It's snug on the hips but balloons out at the waist/bust and the sleeves are very baggy. I'm not sure what to make of it. It is nice and cozy, but I just don't know how to make it work. It's going back.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable with just enough polish for a meeting presentation with a skirt and boots.
links_reviews_text: A little more cropped that in the picture, nice overall fit. True to size.
Runs large and bulky but a size down would look nice.

This sweater is every bit as snuggly as it seems, which is great for the cooler weather. The shoulders and arms are roomy, but the lower torso runs very small and narrow. I originally ordered the large and then sent it back for the XL, which was still way too snug for me to feel comfortable. I so wanted to like this!

links_reviews_title: great for casual but looking put-together
links_reviews_text: fit's great. accentuates the right parts

Couldn't wear this sweater. For someone of my size this is not flattering. No matter how i tucked or rolled it, I swam in it. I understand it's a baggier look, but I would not recommend for a professional setting if you are tiny like me.
I got a size large and it was so small, it fit my size 4 friend perfectly. Looked beautiful on her but runs truly small.

I got this for work b/c my office gets cold. It was super cute. It was a bit more fitted than I expected since it tapers in toward waist, so if you want it to look like photo and be a little more loose-fitting, order a size up then you'd normally wear.
It was a little too slim fitting at the bottoms like the top part and sleeves
Didn't suit me. Sleeves were huge and torso was short
Loved the fit. Lines were very flattering

links_reviews_title: Great fit, stylish for the office.
links_reviews_text: Cozy yet stylish sweater, great for work or just casual, everyday wear.
Sometimes I'm between sizes, so sized up on this. Cozy, very warm. Fun to wear.

Believe the reviews! It's a good looking, high quality sweater with a great neckline, but it is a very tapered fit. It gets much smaller at the bottom, so if you want a fit like the model pic, then order a size (or two sizes) up.
Easy piece to wear to work! Loved the snug fit around the waist and the bell sleeves for cute detail.
Loved it so much I bought it!

I have curvy figure and picked XL to fit hips expecting it to be big. It was not. The bottom cut of the sweater is very "stiff" with little stretch so didnt want to fit down on hips and kept riding up. The rest of the top was too big. Cute sweater and got lots of compliments but not really meant for small waist and not so small hips.
Wore it several times and always got compliments. Arms are big but the waist and stomach is more fitting which I liked. It didn't seem too itchy either.
Sleeves are wide but also short so it looked a little weird. Didn't love.
Nice. Turtle neck wasn't too tight. Arms were nice and flowy
Thought it was going be a lot looser and was tight on my hips. I could of work it but I didn't love it so I didn't.
Loose and unflattering up top but strangely tight around the bottom/hips. Did not wear
Its a cool neckline but made my stomach look a little pudgy
great for weekend and for work nice fabric warm and cozy nice structure

This jacket lives up to its review hype. It's seriously so stinkin cute. I received tons of compliments and it's so cozy! I rented the large and it fit nicely but I couldn't button it comfortably if I had wanted to. This didn't bother me at all! Size up if you have a large(r) bust or abdomen and want to button it up. want to buy! Will rent again.

I received so many compliments on this jacket. It is slightly cropped so size up if you want it longer or are going to wear it over a thick sweater. Surprisingly warm. Cute with a little edge. Wish I could buy it!
I can't wait to rent this jacket again it's amazing. Very cool - can dress up or down. In love with this.
So warm and cozy. My boyfriend loved it because it leaves nothing to the imagination - very form fitting. Considering buying it. Very long on a petite build - I wore it with boots and no tights.

Super cute dress. I wore it for work and it kept the shape for the most part throughout the day. The dress wasn't too long on me which was great since I'm 5"3'. The fabric is thicker which is great! My only issue is that the arms are sooooo long. I folded them over three times to make it work.
Super cute, well tailored and adorable with the baby bump. Ordered a size larger than I normally would so that it wouldn't be too snug and I'm glad I did. Great silhouette.
Ribbed sweater dress, extremely flattering, hits mid shin. Hugs your curves but not tight. Wore to work.
It was a very comfortable dress and fun and flowy

Warm, well made sweater dress. If you like something more form fitting, size down. I wore my regular size and it wasn't boxy, but just hung nicely off my curves. Paired it with black tights and ankle booties. Tons of compliments!
Loved the fit and style of this dress. Warm and comfortable. I was worried it would be too long in me but I think the length was perfect.
Stretchy sweater dress that is perfect for a day at the office.

links_reviews_title: Enjoyed wearing this to work and being comfortable
links_reviews_text: Easy and fun fit!

links_reviews_title: This was great for a night out with mom friends and for work.
links_reviews_text: Super comfy. wasn't to tight, so hid all the lumps and bumps
Such a good work dress, made entirely of sweater material. My office is always cold so this was perfect for a chillier workplace.

This dress may seem boring in theory, but in practice it looks expensive, it drapes beautifully, it's warm and comfortable, and it's very flattering. Pair with statement bling or trendy boots! Wore in my 39th week of pregnancy and got a lot of compliments, which I consider quite an accomplishment lol

links_reviews_title: Long sleeves and a little itchy, but overall nice fit!
links_reviews_text: I really like the length and cut but the material is a little heavy and issue. Overall a good choice for a one time wear.
Wore this with tall black suede boots and a cropped black leather jacket. The sleeves are pretty long, but not crazy. Material is comfy and opaque. Will def rent again.
Dress was great!
Wore once and was cute for the first half of the day but stretched like crazy and hung on my body later in the day and was no longer flattering
Nice fit for my body type but the sleeves were long.

This dress is amazing for cold days. I was hesitant about how professional it would look and put it on today and loved it. It is perfect for casual events and can be dressed up or down for your event. WIN!

links_reviews_title: Overall comfy dress, but itchy around the neckline
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress with black tights & combat boots. It was stylish for a day at the museum... but the neckline became itchy.

This sweater fits like a glove and the tight knit makes it feel pretty chic. Sleeves are perfect length and bottom rests right above the hips, good for my shorter torso. I wore this with black slacks to a zoom meeting, a leather pencil skirt on my date night in, and with leather loafers & jeans while running errands. Very versatile. I would rent it again.
This sweater is stretchy and so comfortable. It is definitely a cropped sweater which was perfect for me since I am only 4'10". If you are taller, you are probably going to have some skin showing.

Wore it for work with black pants and heels. Bottom of the sweater sat right at hips so if you don't want your belly showing, make sure you have on high waisted pants. Great material, very comfortable. Will keep this is my rotation. Will be cute with jeans and flats as well
Loved this for walking around bourbon street! Paired perfectly with a green satin midi (also rented). A little snug so I sized up to L and I'm glad I did. Would buy! Material is thick and forgiving.
Cute sweater but probably more flattering for smaller chested gals. I have short torso so length was ok. I am a 34D and Medium fit comfortably but just not that flattering.
Great with high rise jeans

I really enjoyed this little crop sweater. It's pretty short, so you have to wear it with high waisted jeans and even a Cami underneath for the occasional peekaboo. The fabric is not soft, but it also is not scratchy. I just really felt the pattern was lovely and the occasional splash of pale pink was refreshing for an animal print. I would rent this again
I LOVED this sweater! Wanted to keep it! Fabric is perfect for spring. Warm but not fuzzy looking. The pink gives a spring vibe also. A must rent!
Absolutely loved the print and lighter material! I typically wear a small and sized up after reading reviews. I probably could've worn a large for a baggier style. Would definitely rent again!
Great quality, heavy material. Short torso so may be a bit too cropped on some people. This is something I'll definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to love this sweater, but...
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this sweater, but its so cropped! I had normal jeans on and I swear you could see my belly every time I lifted my arm. This is such a cute sweater, but I just can't stand cropped sweaters. I like long sweaters. If this had been 6-8 inches longer, I woudl have no doubt purchased it! Make sure if you get this sweater, that you wear it with high-waisted paints! Especially you tall ladies!

Wear with high waisted pants. Runs small Size up one size unless you want a tight fit Great material Warm Wonderful bright, standout pattern Bottom band stretches out throughout the day Worth the rent, just not 5-stars

The fabric is a much heavier weight than I expected, so it seems like this is a really high quality piece. It's not itchy at all, and the leopard spots are actually a light pink color. Only problem is that it was way too short for me (5'7", long torso) even with high-waisted jeans.
Definitely short length and slim fit, but easy to dress up. I felt great in it!

links_reviews_title: This sweater is amazing! The print and colors are gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: I wear a size small and it was a little bit snug. But I think the style of the sweater needs to be snug.
This sweater is a dream. It fits perfectly and snuggly no can be dressed casually for the weekend or dressy with slacks or a pencil skirt.
Heavier, quality fabric, but size up!
Fit close to body- the fabric is thick and soft- beautiful popping colors. Looked great with black jeans.
This sweater ran small - definitely size up. I woe it twice and loved it, though.
I loved the print, cut, and style of this sweater. I would normally get a small but saw other reviewers suggestion to size up. The medium worked out perfectly.
S runs small. Didn't end up wearing because it was the wrong size but it would be adorable if you get in in the right size for you!

links_reviews_title: For the petite or smaller ladies
links_reviews_text: The material of this sweater is insane! So luxe but it runs so small I felt like fat man in a little coat. Normally a size L but would have needed a 2XL

links_reviews_title: Overall good look! Its a very thick fabric so it's perfect for fall
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, smelled a little bit in the armpits though! Turned me off

links_reviews_title: It was a great color combo
links_reviews_text: The material was a bit stiff

links_reviews_title: Fun top for jeans or slacks.
links_reviews_text: The fit was short at the waist just hitting the top of pants. The sleeve length was perfect and the top is stiff but not too much for comfort. Cute look.
Runs small
Got compliments
Not itchy. Short on the torso but long enough to cover my jean button. High quality and holds shape well. I paired it with faded jeans and booties and black jeans with slides. Lots of compliments.
Tight fit. Wore it 2 times

links_reviews_title: Would have bought this if winter wasn't ending
links_reviews_text: I loved this and wore it a bunch. It's a thick, heavy, tight knit not exactly sweater like. Easy day to night item.
like new
Loved this sweater, but it is definitely on the shorter side (I wore a black tank underneath to give me some added coverage in my midsection). Has a bit of stretch and was a fun everyday piece.

I loved this shit. I'm 5'7 i wear a 36B. And the shirt did not hit in the right spots. I think a medium would have worked. I didn't think it was too cropped like some people said, i had on high jeans, but the sweater just looked wrong. Also the print isn't what I thought it would be. It was more of a pinky leopard print than a tradition animal print.
Love the fit, quality of the sweater and the vibrancy of the colors
Lovely print, great quality sweater! Fitted & flattering. I wore with jeans although this knit could definitely be dressed up as well!
I love this sweater, the fit was perfect and the material was super high quality. I got compliments every time I wore it. This is one that I definitely wish I could have kept!

links_reviews_title: The arms were too short and the length was too short.
links_reviews_text: This is a nice sweater very comfortable and roomy but the arms are too short and so is the length. This is made for someone quite short and petite.
Wore this with black coated skinnies. Got a lot of compliments
This sweater is a stretchy fabric, but felt way too snug on. Was not comfortable so I didn't wear.

Love this sweater! Very high quality with a great and flattering fit. The print is very fun and it looks great with jeans or black pants and white boots. A red lipstick makes the look wearing this sweater. I will be renting it again.

links_reviews_title: This is such a cute bag and I really love it!!!
links_reviews_text: PErfect bag for everyday. love the details

This bag is much smaller than I expected and it doesn't have a bag inside to hide your items. The handles fit perfectly on your arm with super soft leather. I'm glad I got to rent this before considering purchasing, it's not super practical for day to day use but it's very cute.

links_reviews_title: Loved this bag. Made me feel extra fashionable without having to try!
links_reviews_text: Perfect size and fit

I've always wanted to try those earrings that have some detail that hangs from the back so that's why I picked these. The nice thing about this pair was that you could almost wear it 2 ways: without the large hanging back or with. There's a metal piece in the middle that connects the two hanging parts so if you wanted to use that as a backing for just the front part, you could. Didn't love because they reminded me of gages though.
The fabric of this T-shirt dress is very thin, which was fine for me because I wore it around town to do errands. It is a smidge short so if you're bothered by that maybe size up.

links_reviews_title: perfect length and not too tight
links_reviews_text: I have bigger boobs and a little bit of a stomach with an extra long torso- it can be difficult to get a dress to accommodate all three things super well at the same time- this dress does it. It was short but not too short, I never felt self conscious about the length of the dress. It hugged my boobs without hugging my belly but also didn't look like a tent on me. The material wasn't see through and the fabric was comfy. I wore it multiple times and lived it every time!!

I ordered a large so it would fit a little baggier and not cling to me (5'8 138 lbs). I REALLY want to keep this, but I can't justify spending over $100 on a T-shirt dress, even one as lovely as this. I will for sure order again!

I stumbled upon this while browsing and it turned out to be a perfect casual dress for MDW! I wore to work on a casual day then to a family bbq. Runs tts. Probably a little short for work but fine in a casual atmosphere.
Fun, casual tee-shirt dress. Not super fitting, not unfashirothy'sonably loose. Would look adorable with some Rothy's - comfy.
Great T-shirt dress for everyday . Loved the stripes and the sleeve length
Fit well, was a bit short but great for a beach vacation

Really cute dress and easy to wear/layer. I wore with a cropped olive green jacket and black slip ons. The stripes are orange and blue, but the effect is somewhat neutral. It is on the shorter side so I wore beige spandex underneath and felt comfortable. I'm a small size 12 occasional 10 and the large was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Highly recommend this tee shirt dress!!
links_reviews_text: Runs TTS, not see thru!! Great daytime dress that doesn't ride up!

I found this dress to run small. I can be either an XS or S in dresses, and I wasn't comfortable in the XS, particularly the length. I also found the material to be very thin, showing ever line underneath. Had it been longer and more quality material, I could have worn, but had to return.
Wore this to a casual brunch and didn't want to take it off. Very comfortable and flattering.
Dress ran short on me (5'8")...might've been ok for walking around but the risk of bending over or lifting my arms deterred me from wearing this. The material also felt/looked cheap.
Looked a bit like a night shirt
So comfortable! Casual, yet cute. Perfect for everyday wear or date night. Fits true to size and perfect length.
This is a great t shirt dress. The length is very flattering and while it's loose it's not too body. Super cute!

I wore this in the summer, but I see this being a dress that would be great for a warm spring or fall day too as you could easily style it with a jean jacket. I'm pretty short and the dress hit my mid-thigh. Tall gals might want to be weary of the length, especially if you are moving around a lot.

links_reviews_title: Great Dress for Work or Day
links_reviews_text: I wore this a LOT. It was perfect with a pair of sneakers or sandals and casual enough for my work or during the day. It wasn't too tight. I honestly almost bought it because it was perfect.
A little loose fitting, but it was still cute for everyday casual wear. Wish it wasn't so expensive or I would have bought it!

Cute t-shirt dress but thin fabric so a bit see through and more fitted and short than expected so I didn't wear for work as I had planned. I would size up in this and plan to wear for more casual occasions if I do rent again.

This was a great dress! I did choose xl and thought it may have been a bit to big but I liked how it fit. I do agree like other reviewers, it is on the shortish end. So I was constantly making sure it wasn't going up but I loved it and it was super comfortable. Not heavy either so good for the summer.
This dress was waaay shorter than I anticipated.

The size small was a little snug on me to feel comfortable wearing. I will size up to a medium next time. The dress is cute and the material is not too thick or thin. The sleeve length is a little sporty and the colors appear more red and blue.
Easy to wear with a sweater or jean jacket. Not see through, which is a major plus. Cute dress for everyday!
Comfortable, breezy spring dress

links_reviews_title: Basic stripe dress, how couldn't you love it?
links_reviews_text: Such an easy wear! I love it! I work it to work and got so many complements!
I normally wear a medium but they had the XL at the RTR store and it worked on me. Sort of looked like an oversized t shirt dress. Really cute.

links_reviews_title: Cute casual dress but too short for comfort
links_reviews_text: Soft, cute, easy casual dress but much too short for my taste for work or even running around town. I won't be renting again. I'm only 5'3 and was constantly having to pull the dress down to ensure I wouldn't flash everyone my bum. Dress looked cute paired with white converse.
This dress hugged all the right places. Was a little short, but still cute to run errands, etc.

Fit exactly as pictured. Loved the feel of the cotton, plenty of air flow for Miami. Worked well as a cover up, dressed up with sandals and a jean jacket, and just to throw on. Could imagine it being in high rotation this summer.
Comfortable, good length, not see through, classic stripes.
Very comfortable and great for everyday wear. I would have bought it if it wasn't $133 for just a t-shirt dress. I received this with tags still on!
Really comfortable fit! Wore during a crawfish boil party and it was perfect! Can be a little big and long for someone who is petite size. But I liked it because it allowed for some food babies hah
I love the red color and the black faux leather details.
Red is striking and eye catching! Wearing thicker sweaters underneath we made me wish for a size up. Loved the cut and color!
Great coat, lots of compliments. Nice material and cute style. I felt it ran slightly small. Will rent again a size up.
Beautiful

links_reviews_title: So want to buy this one!!!
links_reviews_text: Obsessed with this jacket!!! I usually wear a black jacket and was glad I chose this red piece for a trip to London. Will definitely rent again.

Went with everything This is perfect for 30-40 degree weather - maybe even colder if you layer a bit. Roomy enough for sweaters - rented this for 2 work trips and loved it the whole time! Perfect coat Nice for work but can also be dressed down with jeans. Awesome coat
Perfect coat for a Paris vacation. I wore a lot of layers under so it looked a little bulky but would look beautiful over a LBD.
Beautiful coat for seeing the sights in DC. Didn't want to give it back!
Rented this for a weekend getaway in Philly and loved it! Perfect pop of color for winter

The shade of red on this coat is gorgeous. It's perfect for those deep winter months, although the coat isn't terribly warm. Size up if you plan to wear anything thick underneath. It runs small. I'm always a L to XL and this XL was tight.
Runs a little small, medium was perfect with light weight sweater but a bulkier sweater and scarf made it a little tight. The difference between medium and large is most noticeable in the arms

Having read reviews, I ordered a medium (I would normally wear a small) and it was very fit. I could not wear a bulky sweater under this coat. But this coat is so pretty, and it's warm too. Wore this out for New Year's Eve with my guys on a Colorado snowy night.

I sized up based on previous reviews and I'm happy I did! The jacket it warm, but I wouldn't say it's the warmest peacoat I've ever worn so the extra room was also nice to have to layer. Beautiful color, it was perfect for the holidays!

It fit wonderfully and the color was so vibrant - felt absolutely amazing in it. Elevated every outfit I wore! The arms are a little snug for wearing over sweaters and it isn't a heavy duty cold. Southern winters or fall/spring in colder climbs.
Cost was old and over cleaned. Also the color is not to e bright red in the photos but more or a dill cold red. Not like the photos. Also runs small. Disappointed
Super cute jacket. Fit perfectly and was very flattering. I was happy the size recommended was accurate because I would have been disappointed if I ordered my normal size and it was too small.

links_reviews_title: Pretty and warm slim-fit coat - runs small!
links_reviews_text: First off, I'd say it's a slim-fit coat, so size up. I'm usually a size 4-6 (with hips) and I feel like the medium fit me perfectly. I was nervous because it says size 6-8 but it actually was perfect especially if you want to wear a sweater underneath. If you plan on wearing it with a dress or something light underneath, then your true size would be fine. I love the diagonal look and that the buttons are hidden. Mine came with a missing button up top but it still looked fine without it. I would totally buy this if it were cheaper!
Beautiful fit, gorgeous color. Loved it!
Great cut and style of outerwear as well as a beautiful red perfect for the holidays or everyday pop of color. Rated 4 stars because a little over worn but I still wore it multiple times.

I this was a nice coat. I didn't take a picture because I hope to rent again in a Small. The Medium was big, but I don't think it runs big, I just took the larger size because I wanted it for a specific weekend and the S & XS were not available. Great color, no pilling yet and not too boxy as some wool coats tend to be.
The sleeves were tight and it was also a little tight through the middle

I really liked the shape of this coat, though it didn't look as good on me as I wished. I got a size too small and should have worn a Medium. I'm in between S and M, so would have def sized up. The collar was lovely, but on chilly days didn't do enough to keep my neck warm. Though the coat itself was very warm and comfy.

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing this for a work event!
links_reviews_text: Perfect jacket for a work event and also made me feel like mrs claus!
Fit was great for petites (5'2"), very structured, amazing fit, color was rich and fabric was wonderful. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this coat.
links_reviews_text: I tried this coat on once and returned it. I am sure it looks great on most people, but something about the fit made my hips look weird.
Very comfortable, a little tight but super cute coat. Got many compliments. Loved it!
Sophisticated coat. Perfect red

links_reviews_title: wonderful warm jacket. perfect for a vacation in london and ireland.
links_reviews_text: Fit, runs a tiny bit large. I am usually a medium and got the large and fit perfectly. pros: warm, stylish, easy to style.

links_reviews_title: The color and flattering style make this a winner, but it's TOO SMALL.
links_reviews_text: I love everything about this coat, except the sizing. I would normally wear a Large coat, but this was XL and I couldn't close it around my hips. It's also not warm enough for winter, but it's good for Spring. The color is very flattering, it comes in a bit at the waist, and the pockets (while shallow) are trimmed in "leather?" and snap close. I got a lot of compliments when I wore it.
Little snug
Great color and cut. Looking cool while staying warm!

This coat is lovely. The red color is stunning and very vibrant, and the cut is very flattering. I got the size large which was too big for me so I can't wear it out - I guess I should've gotten the medium instead (I'm about a size 6/8 but all the reviews I read said this coat runs small so I played it safe and went a size up). In any event, this coat is beautiful!
Tailored nicely, received a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Red coat stands out with class!
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed wearing this coat! I wore it for work several times and to a couple of formal evening events. Lots of compliments on the red color— it really stands out. Beautiful, quality made coat.
Gorgeous coat! Even the inner lining is luxurious! Wore this is zero degrees. Although the cost is warm, sleeves do not allow for a bulkier sweater underneath.
Loved the collar on this coat- it could be worn more open or popped up for a different look. Not the warmest, but great for mid-30s.
Didn't end up wearing... it was a very thin material and too tight across the shoulders for any kind of layering. Not the kind of luxe coat I was expecting.
I was happy

links_reviews_title: I've had so many compliments wearing this coat.
links_reviews_text: Simply beautiful in every way
Loved this sweater! Great quality, great fit. The white trim was a fun touch. I wore it with jeans. It's a thicker fabric but not overly warm. I recommend!
my husband loved this sweater. I did too. Only draw back is that my arms are short, like the rest of me, and the sleeves hung a bit long.

I thought the sleeves looked fun in the photo, but forgot to account for the fact that the model is tall with likely long, lithe arms. On me, the sleeves went down past my finger tips and looked strange not stylish. I ended up folding the sleeve at the slit and tucking it into the sleeve so I could wear it once, but honestly, I probably shouldn't have left the house in it.
This was my first RTR unlimited find and I was not disappointed it's so easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Cute look but not the softest
links_reviews_text: Looked really cute. I love a good cropped sweater. True to size. Only complaint was it wasn't the softest material - not itchy, but not soft either.

links_reviews_title: A little scratchy, but cute style
links_reviews_text: Not as soft as I was hoping. Really cute dramatic sleeve. Short in front so you need high waisted pants to wear with it. I thought it was just okay.
This sweater wasn't very comfortable to wear. It's itchy and the fit isn't flattering. Overall, I was disappointed with this sweater.
The fabric is thick and a bit itchy, it makes me look chunkier
Not my favorite, ended up returning immediately. I have broad shoulders and am very tall, didn't feel like this hung well on me.
Not too oversized and the perfect length for petites
A little snug across the chest, but cute look with jeans.
not a great fit

Loved the cut but the material was no fun! It was itchy and literally collected every hair and piece of lint it barely came in contact with. Wouldn't recommend for a polished look at work - always dirty.

High quality sweater that looks well, just like the picture. The arms were totally manageable and did not get in the way for me, which was a huge plus. I wore this to a casual gathering and felt comfortable yet pulled together. I have a short torso, so the length was not a problem, but may be on the shorter side for tall ladies.
Really loved the look of this sweater but it was the itchiest sweater I've ever worn. Arms are really long and wide so petite peeps beware.
Sleeves have a cute cut but overall this sweater is really boxy, so it's not very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great sweater - fit well, lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size - short, boxy, great sweater.
The sleeves added a bit of flirt and flare.

links_reviews_title: Work from home sweatpants. Cute and love the striped waistband, but run super big!
links_reviews_text: Comfort and cute but probably wouldn't have worn out of the house. Waist band is big and a lot of extra material around the crotch. Short torso girls beware!
I wore this sweats set for a day running around the city with a friend and it was super comfy. No complaints here.
Worn on flight and at ski resort --- light weight sweatsuit material/ light hoodie material

links_reviews_title: Comfy and Cute to Lounge In
links_reviews_text: These sweatpants are super soft and comfy. Easy, loose fit throughout so they're comfortable enough to sleep in. But also cute enough to leave the house!
I wore RTR's maternity clothes throughout my pregnancy , so this matching set was a great comfortable option to lounge in after coming back from the hospital.
Super comfy, flattering, and versatile to style
Great for everyday use and very comfortable
Runs large.
Rented this matching gray sweatsuit for a weekend at home and absolutely loved it and considered buying. The sweatshirt and sweatpants are so comfy and soft, I never wanted to change out of them!

links_reviews_title: Nice fit - but runs a little short.
links_reviews_text: Like the fabric, comfortable. trim fit, just a bit short. I do have long legs but seems about and inch or 2 above...
I liked these joggers. They were comfy. They stopped above my ankle which was the only thing I disliked.
No cons only pros.

links_reviews_title: Fantastic print but next time I'd size up.
links_reviews_text: It has pockets! I really liked this dress. It was classy, bright and cheery, and very well made. This dress has great on vacation but would work equally well at the office. I'm a 36D and it felt tight across the bust. I would rent this again but if size up.

So the waistline is not elastic, it's not even remotely stretchy. Unless I missed a zipper or something it felt wayy too difficult to get it on. But then once I got it over my shoulders, it was way too big in the waist! It was kind of like wearing a balloon. Add to that the tightness in the shoulders, it was just a very odd fit. Overall it looked ok, but not something I would rent again.
Cute spring or summer dress--love the print and style. But the waist area was a little wide, and just made me feel slightly matronly.

links_reviews_title: gorgeous floral print and vibrant colors
links_reviews_text: I love the bright colors and pretty florals on this dress. It has vintage vibes and made me feel like a 1940s housewife, haha. I received many compliments when wearing this dress especially from strangers. And who doesn't love a dress with pockets?

links_reviews_title: Great wear to work and out dress
links_reviews_text: Wore this for my husbands birthday dinner. Fit was great and I received so many compliments

links_reviews_title: Rented this for my boss's retirement party.
links_reviews_text: First of all, this dress was so pretty and so fun. Fabric was perfect - light but not thin. Extremely comfortable (as are most Kate Spade dresses). EVERYONE complimented me on this dress. My coworker actually told me to buy it just so she could see it again because it's so pretty. And some random woman on the street stopped me just to say how pretty the dress was. RTR - please let me buy this one!
Super cute. Lots of compliments. Size down 2 sizes if possible

A great, versatile spring dress. I wore it to a daytime party and to work and felt perfect in both places. Really bright, lots of compliments. I'm between 4/6 in Kate Spade and went with the 4. Almost a little snug in the bust, but I think the shoulders would have been too large in a 6.

Just wasn't the best for my shape. Skirt really puffed outwards and buttons popped open a bit at top when I sat. However, with the jean jacket it calmed down and looked cute. Still received lots of compliments, though hard to wear a jean jacket to work.
This dress is beautiful! It's comfortable and great material. Highly recommend!

Fit decently through the waist and had a nice, not-too-frumpy poof out. The colors were great and it is a great work or otherwise outfit. Arms were a little loose on me. Long enough to walk in the wind and it didn't blow wildly!

links_reviews_title: Cute but not for long torsos
links_reviews_text: I was hoping for a polished retro spring look, but this dress just didn't work for me. The elastic waistband hit way above my natural waist, although adding my own belt did help. Length was surprisingly not too short (I'm 5'7") but the stiff fabric kind of made the skirt feel ballooned out and too airy.
Loved it! Pretty long skirt but good quality fabric and such a beautiful pattern
This dress was a beautiful fit and fabric. Lots of compliments and very comfortable for a family Easter egg hunt. I'm pretty short so it is a little longer on me but still felt good in it.
One of my favorite dresses! Length was perfect, sleeves fit nicely, and there were no gaps from the buttons that usually happen with button ups. Would recommend for any spring/summer event.

I am an 8/10 and it's great for anyone who is curvy since its form fitting up top (I'm pretty Busty (DD) and yet doesn't make you look oversized as it puffs out towards the hips. It was very comfortable, and I liked that you could button to the top. Looked great for Spring, and is perfect for the day time, I almost wore to a night event, but it seemed to casual.

The print and detail on this are adorable. Unfortunately, the proportions of the cut are suboptimal, at least on my body. I'm pretty solidly a 16 in Kate Spade, so I was surprised when this seemed small not just through the busy but also in the length v the skirt shape and overall design.
Love! I was worried the full skirt would overwhelm my petite frame and make me look too hippy, but it did not at all!! Fit like a dream and love the pockets. Would rent again for sure!
Cute, comfortable. The details are beautiful! Pockets hold my phone!
I wore this on my birthday for brunch and it was perfect! Just the right amount of classiness and girliness!

links_reviews_title: I felt feminine and pretty in this dress! The longer sleeves and hemline made me feel confident.
links_reviews_text: This dress had a modest and attractive design. I didn't have to worry about it being too inappropriate for work or that something was showing when I didn't want it to. The only complaint is how big the bottom is. The skirt kind of bellows out and I had to pull it down in the back so it didn't balloon.

links_reviews_title: Perfect spring dress for date night or work!
links_reviews_text: I had so many compliments from this dress! The dress was a bit tight for me over the bust, but nothing crazy! It still worked. It's such a high quality dress and you feel like a Southern Belle. My boyfriend said I looked like Reese Witherspoon. I would totally rent again.

I got loads of compliments on this but I felt it wasn't very flattering and hung on me a bit bag like. It also wrinkled very fast all over so made me feel a bit sloppy and way less tailored than I'm used to in rtr clothing. Might look better in a smaller size or on other body types who like things less fitting.

This was a perfect dress for being a tourist in Cambodia, where you have to dress modestly at religious sites (covered knees and shoulders) and it's insanely hot outside. The loose cotton is wonderfully breathable. That being said, the cut was a little dowdier than I'd expected. Maybe it ran a little big, or maybe the waist was a little too high- I'm not sure exactly what was wrong but something made this dress a little less than perfect. Gorgeous print though.

Wore this Kate Spade dress for work and it fit great! I chose a size 14 and it's perfect! I look and feel like a million bucks!! I would definitely recommend this dress for work or a spring/summer social.
Loved this dress. Wore it to work on a dreary November day and got lots of love. The quality is phenomenal. Excellent attention to detail.
I really love how the material of this dress feels luxe. It's heavy and holds shape very well, so the dress just looks expensive and fits brilliantly. It's a really lovely dress.

links_reviews_title: Cutest garden party dress ever! So many compliments
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much. I hate to send it back! It's adorable, comfortable, flattering and unique. The only "drawback" is that it has a pretty big skirt. It's puffier and wider than the pictures on the model imply. I thought it was cute but it definitely made it more of a statement dress I wore this for a work trip to Charleston. I felt comfortable and work appropriate, but also cute!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Great fall print!
links_reviews_text: Fits tight around ribcage, but flows well from there. Good for broad shoulders. 100% would rent again.

Super cute, somewhat stretchy material, would wear a cami underneath so buttons behave. It was midi-length on me. Pockets deep enough to carry real stuff in. Not super breathable so would wear on a cooler day than 90 degrees

Loved this dress! The sleeves were a perfect length. I loved the buttons that allowed me to button to the top in the beginning of the night that I later unbuttoned for a more casual vibe on the dance floor. This dress moves so well. The fabric is light enough. It was ideal for my friends September wedding. Love the style and the print. I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Waist is high, better for a slimmer girl
links_reviews_text: Beautiful pattern, classic Kate Spade, but the cut does not work for me. I have a long torso and this would have been more flattering if it hit at my natural waist, and I should have known better about all the pleats. I feel I can look much slimmer than this dress made me appear! Decided not to wear it and just return.

This is the epitome of Kate Spade classy and classic. I can't tell you how many compliments I got wearing this dress! I adore it and may buy it. It fits like a glove, pretty true to size but with NO give so if you're in between, go up. Especially in the ribcage area. But truly, this dress is beautiful and I loved wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Preppy and fun look to spice up the office rotation!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It runs slightly large and if I were to rent again I would likely size down to an 8. Otherwise the cut is comfortable, it's moderate neckline and sleeves perfect for work. I wore this several times, including to a tennis event and got a ton of compliments! I would still consider buying this piece!
I absolutely love this dress. It's professional, yet stylish. Definitely an attention-grabber!
I absolutely loved this dress! It was lovely and so very comfortable.

Definitely 50s style/retro/conservative in styling, but great construction and details, and I loved the colors and print. The fabric is a thick, substantial woven cotton, almost like a light canvas, so it’s stiff and keeps it’s form well. In terms of fit, the waist runs true to size or slightly large but although the fabric has some stretch the waist unfortunately doesn’t stretch because of the way it’s stitched. I also found the waist fits quite high – maybe 2 inches above my natural waist, which made it a bit less flattering on my own body. Otherwise the hip and below is unfitted, and the shoulders/arms were to size, with more space in the bust area. The length is longer but not really tea length, about to the bottom of my knee. The neck is fairly tight if you want to button it all the way up. The print is beautiful, the colors are beautiful, and the pintucks and oversize eyelet trim at the chest are great. Be aware that those eyelets are open and not lined (same trim is also just above the knee), so you will be able to see your skin through it – in case you want this to be a very strictly modest look.

This dress was amazing to wear, so many compliments. It was very comfy, perfect length and hello...pockets!! Such a plus. It fit just right around the waist. The material was a bit stretchy but not as breathable as I would have preferred. On a hot day, I was getting kinda sweaty. Overall I would rent this again! Love the flower pattern as well.

links_reviews_title: Liked it way more than I thought I would
links_reviews_text: I thought this would be a plain boring floral dress but it looked really cute on! You can pop the collar the make it a little more sassy, the pockets are great, and the material is heavy enough that the skirt doesn't blow up in the wind, but light enough that I could still wear on a hot day.
Colorful, springtime outfit. The style is fun and unusual enough to feel festive and fun, so I dressed it up with very high, pastel blue shoes and wore it to a friends wedding. Compliments all night!

I loved this top so much that I kept it for an extra month! I wore it two different ways: tucked into a pencil skirt for work (so many compliments!) and with jeans and ankle boots for a birthday dinner. It's a beautiful color and very flattering. It was a little big but I liked the looser fit. I might order a size down next time but I was very happy with this blouse and will be ordering more from this designer!
Great shirt, but If you put deodorant on after you put on your shirt--beware, the fabric is super delicate and thin, and it's gonna make it look like you have sweaty pits!!!
Great color and fabric. I wore it at work with jeans and looked appropriate and stylishly dressed. Would work for a casual evening as well.
This shirt was absolutely suffocating around the chest. Fit nice everywhere else. I'm a 34DDD and felt smooshed and flattened. Couldn't pull off even one wear.
Nothing bad to say about this shirt. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Fun shirt for work or play.

links_reviews_text: This is fun flowy top. I'm small chested and it was slightly tight in the chest. So, if you have large boobs, you may want to jump up a size. I wore it out on V-Day. perfect! :)
Boring, loose fit. Color is dull

This blouse fit perfectly (I'm a pretty standard size 6), and I received multiple compliments. The color is a great deep winter red, and the ruffles add enough pop to make it feminine but perfectly acceptable for a professional work environment. Worked well with multiple suits (navy, navy pinstripe, grey, black...). May have to keep this one!
Loved wearing this to work.
Beautiful color, comfy, looked great with jeans. Long sleeves on my arms.

links_reviews_title: I didn't get to wear this as it was too small tight across the shoulders
links_reviews_text: Very tight across the shoulders and bust area. Size up

links_reviews_title: Great shirt but a little small in the armpits
links_reviews_text: Overall, I really liked this shirt. Great color and fit, it was just a bit tight in my armpits and shoulders. Felt a little limited in my movement but that didn't stop me from wearing it.
Fine in the waist but really small in the bust. Did not wear
Love the brand and the top!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blouse - worth the price for the details
links_reviews_text: Beautiful blouse. The details are very flattering - rented it for Christmas season but would wear it throughout the fall/winter now that I've seen it on. I am small on top so the size was not a problem but I see what others are saying about small armholes. Size up if you are bustier.
Couldn't wear the top, was too small in the chest/shoulder area for me. Nice look though wish I could have worn it.
This blouse is absolutely lovely - beautiful color, great fit, high quality. Wore to work with Osman Grey Pleated Culottes and got tons of complements. Adding this one to my RTR "Favorites" list.
Beautiful rich color, heavy fabric with a nice drape. This worked well both for work with a jacket and for more casual with leggings.
Love! I wore this several times and received several compliments. Size up if you are chesty - I'm flat (Barely a 32b) and this was super tight on me.
the blouse fits a bit snug wish i would have got a larger size. got plenty of compliments on the style and color.
Loved this top...unfortunately I did not end up wearing it. Will hopefully rent again!
I wasn’t sure about the ruffles, but I really loved it. I fashion wise, it looks right on point, and not too frilly. Would definitely wear it again.

Beautiful blouse in a great fall color. The ruffles in front and full balloon sleeves make a statement, and the hem works tucked in or worn out. I rented this to wear for a job interview, looked great layered under a black blazer. Also wore alone with black jeans to work - got tons of compliments. Gives a long lean look when worn this way, even on a shorter girl (5' 4"). Will probably rent again.
Beautiful shirt, perfect for the holiday season, loved the details in this shirt. Runs true to size.

links_reviews_title: Pretty blouse, great for work or date night. Gorgeous deep red color.
links_reviews_text: Fits unusually tight across the shoulder blades
Tight fit under the arms, perfect length top to wear with leggings or dress pants.

links_reviews_title: This top is dressy while being casual. Loads of compliments.
links_reviews_text: No cons on this top. Loved it!

I rented this with my unlimited membership, and intended to wear it on a cruise Thanksgiving week. It goes well with faux leather leggings for the cruise, as it dresses up well with some large Nocturne earrings. I also wore it to work before and after the cruise with traditional trousers. Very versatile and comfortable!

Really tempted to buy this one. High quality silk, comfy and forgiving fit with lots of detail touches. The collar, pleating & cuffs offer many ways to style. Wore casually with jeans, but also to an informal business meeting under a suit jacket with the cuffs folded out over the jacket sleeves and my customer loved it. I prefer more modern patterns with geometrics or solids and thought this may be too "holly hobby" but it's really a modern update to a 70s blouse. Ok maybe I SHOULD buy it!
Great work blouse. A little large but still cute.
I loved this top!!! If it hadn't still been so expensive, I probably would've bought it. I loved the high neck, the pretty luxe-feeling fabric and the keyhole in the back. So cute dressed up or down!
I wore this with the Trina Turk Banshee Pants. I could've sized down in the top but I wanted it to be long enough because I wasn't sure by the models picture. It was plenty long.
Had a really hard time with static cling but still loved it
Absolutely loved this fit and pattern and style. The low turtleneck, the front detailing, the buttons on the sleeves -- all so classy and sophisticated. Looks great tucked in.
definitely had the feel of a part time butter churner, part time corporate suit. also kind of fit like a tent. cute pattern though
Loved this top SO much I'm strongly considering buying it! It is perfect, the silk material feels lovely and the flora design is absolutely beautiful.
Runs true to size, pretty details

links_reviews_title: Love the blue color in this blouse. Fit is great, love the length.
links_reviews_text: I am tempted to purchase, but too pricey. Really like this blouse. It goes great with jeans.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, luxe piece of clothing. Fav!
links_reviews_text: One of the best things I've rented. Much lovelier than the pic.
the pattern has more shades in it / is more muted than I had expected.
Would have preferred a more breathable fabric for work. The shirt fit nicely and added interest to plain black slacks.

The fit was so odd, I wondered it I was wearing it backwards and tried it on the other way! I couldn't even stand up straight in it. Maybe a looser size would be better but I wasn't tempted to try. So I guess size up!
The cutest top! I wore this tucked in with high waisted jeans and knee high boots for work, and received compliments all day long. Such a great top that really elevates your look!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to work with a black skirt. It works well for casual wear also.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful soft shirt. Lots of compliments. Sleeve is a little long (I'm 5'5")
These were too heavy. They are pretty though. Got them during quarantine, so didn't have anything to wear them for.
Too big; didnt sit correctly on ears; flopped down.

links_reviews_title: Unique sweater adds color to winter
links_reviews_text: This sweater is a great basic. I wore it with a black leather skirt and tights. It was nice to wear something basic but not boring
This sweater is cute and comfy. Nice detail. A little tight going over the head -no stretch there but fine once it's on.

links_reviews_title: I really did get a ton of compliments wearing this sweater!
links_reviews_text: Perfect for a warm day if you work in a cold office - It was easily transitional from inside to outside without overheating or looking ridiculous wearing a sweater when it's 80 degrees and humid outside! The cropped length was great with work pants and would also look really cute with a pair of jeans and sandals for a breezy summer night! I always read on here "I received a ton of compliments" but I really did keep getting compliments on this sweater all day.
Very soft and comfortable, a looser fit, but definitely true to size
It's a little short and not fitted. But worked really well with a high wasted skirt. This sweater can be easily dressed up or down.
Sweater was soft and comfortable. The neck was tight though, and difficult to get over my head.

Sweater wasn't itchy at all even the mock turtleneck. Pretty true to size and thicker material so you don't have to wear a tank or tee underneath. Appreciated the pop of color with this raised stitching.

links_reviews_title: Great quality and fun style. Wore it to work under a leather jacket and it was not too bulky.
links_reviews_text: Fit well, sleeves perfect length, hit mid waist. Loved the stitched detail. Was in great condition.
Fits true to size, flattering cut, and very comfortable. Got lots of compliments!

This sweater is fantastic. Fit perfect, very well made, and the color stripes are just the right amount of subtle pop. I received many compliments on this sweater. I wanted to keep it, but the purchase price was just a little too steep for my wallet. I highly recommend for everyday wear.
Very soft sweater. Not itchy at all. Wore it with plum trousers for work. Would rent again this season. I'm a 6, so it was slightly big around my armpits. I would get a small next time.

I thought this sweater was true to size. Shoulders and arms fit well. The only draw back I would have is that it felt like the waist could have been a little longer. I felt like I spent a lot of time smoothing the waist back into place.

Cute kind of girly day time sweater took me a little bit by surprise because it's pretty lightweight it's a cashmere cotton blend it's nice to wear indoors but nothing that would keep you warm on a cold day. Gray background with playful bright colors makes it a tiny bit girlish in my opinion but a cute sweater and different

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater and unique pattern; would rent again
links_reviews_text: Fits TTS, not too warm and soft. Enjoyed wearing it.
comfy! got lots of compliments!
Cute design. Didn't blow me away but it was good for running errands. Wish it was a tad longer.
Cute sweater, unique colors
Super soft and fun to wear. Received so many compliments that the colors made people happy 😊

links_reviews_title: This sweater is so cute. I loved it.
links_reviews_text: This sweater is the perfect length to wear with high waisted jeans. The neck wasn't too tight like a lot of turtle necks. I wish I had kept it for longer.
Received tons of compliments. Long arma but short on mid section so I had to wear a tank
Rented for casual, cold days at work. Warm for a very cold office environment. The stripes add some interest to what is otherwise a pretty basic sweater. Cute and fun!
Great sweater! Went nicely with my work dress pants!

links_reviews_title: Great, warm sweater, Comfortable. Goes with everything.
links_reviews_text: Fits beautifully, super nice casual sweater for the weekend.

This didn't make my favorites list because I thought it would be too thin and too tight in the chest based on the model and reviews. However, I saw it in the store and it is thicker fabric and the large fit looser on me so I rented. It so cute and comfortable--=no itching despite the wool. It is a good sweater for unpredictable spring weather in NYC.
so unique, can wear for many occasions, and fits really well
Nice and well made. Had a hard time pairing it because of the color.
A basic sweater with a fun, subtle pop of color. Nice; however, it didn't wonderfully flatter my hourglass figure.

links_reviews_title: Candy stripes on a neutral background make this soft knit sweater fun and versatile
links_reviews_text: Cute, comfortable sweater. I should have kept it! Great piece from Rag&Bone
Neck is a bit snug, but sweater otherwise fit perfectly and was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Nice casual sweater, not thick but warm
links_reviews_text: Pros: Fits well, high quality material, different color stripes give a nice pop. Worn to work with jeans and tall black books Cons: As others mentioned, it is a bit short for a typical sweater but not annoying. I didn't feel like I was tugging at it all day.

My seven year old begged me to buy this one; but I think it was just a little short to look right on me. I'm tall but don't have a particularly long torso so I think this is just cut on the short side.
Was tight in the busy and short.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it because it was too short.
links_reviews_text: The construction of the sweater is very cheap
This beautiful sweater fits true to size and is flattering. I wore it to work with black trousers, and it looked professional but with some feminine flare.
Wore with jeans- was classy and playful
This was my husbands favorite sweater. Fitted and so cute. He thought I should keep It. Very classic. Really pretty.
I love Rag & Bone but I can't lie. This sweater is just ugly. I could not bring myself to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this sweater
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small for larger chests...

Was so excited to receive this as part of my unlimited even more so when it arrived new with tags. I am a huge fan of rag and bone. It however runs small and very short. I am very thin but tall would be cute on shorter frame.

I loved this shirt, really nice material and flattering cut, but it was hard to keep the tie on the shirt, so every time I lifted my arms the shirt would ride up and the tie would stay put. had to do lots of adjusting. Super cute if you're not planning on moving around too much.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing but overall it was cute
links_reviews_text: Cute top, pretty short on the torso, but soft material.
Wore this out to a concert with jeans and dressed it up for date night with a maxi skirt. Loved the wrap and low cut neckline.

Fit well and was exactly how I pictured it. But the wrap around and tying was annoying because the tie part would fall below the bottom of the shirt in the back and I was constantly tucking it back in.
Super cute and fun.
Didn't want to return this one! Found it in vacation wear but it's my style for everyday wear! Loved it so much

links_reviews_title: The dress that does it all
links_reviews_text: This is my second time renting this, and I should probably just cave and buy it. It's perfect for vacation because you can use it as a cover up, or wear it out to dinner.
Winterized with a turtleneck and got tons of compliments. Super comfy, can't wait to rent this again in the spring!
I loved this dress and would purchase it if it weren't so expensive! Comfortable, flattering, and amazing quality!
The fabric material is not my favorite but it was very breathable in the hot weather. Very low cut so I had to wear a white tank top underneath. Flattering fit overall.
Great dress and super comfortable, perfect for those who are tall with larger bust. Wore to an outdoor mountain wedding in 89 degree heat and wasn't too hot, would definitely rent again!

This was once nothing I would ever wear on my very petite figure. But now that I'm trying to hide a shocking amount of first trimester bloating in the desert heat, it is the best thing ever. It covers without clinging. The material is light and airy and flows beautifully. It made me feel like a million bucks while my body has felt bloated and uncomfortable.

Classic Fuzzi dress (comfy, stretchy, mesh like fabric), gorgeous print, and very easy to wear. Pair with some great wedges or a peep toe chunk heel sandal, and great accessories.... Don't simply relinquish this dress to the beach cover up pile as others have- this dress deserves more than that- it just needs to be styled appropriately 💃 Wore to work on a casual Friday & for a weekend at the beach.

I was unsure about this dress but gave it a chance and loved it! I wore it 6 months pregnant and am thinking about buying it for after pregnancy. I've worn it with flats and wedgeS, belted and unbelted. It's incredibly versatile and makes me feel so glam. The SR fit fine but the XS would have also worked though not available.
Cute dress and material is great! Colors make it a little more like fall, but still adorable in summer/spring

This runs huge and I could have gone for the S or maybe even XS. The dress looked much more crisp and structured in the pix but is actually gauzy and flowy. As others have said it is very low cut. Also the back hem comes down much lower than I thought- the fabric kept hitting my ankles when I walked which was kind of annoying. It is a weird mix of summer fabric with fall colors. All that being said, this was a fun and easy wear on a summer day and would also be good for vacation.
Rented this for vacation and I ended up wearing it several days! Super comfy for my travel days but mega cute for photos!
Rented it for vacation and wanted to get another wear before sending it back. Got tons of compliments!
So comfortable!! Love this dress!

Worn to a luau on vacation. The dress is very comfortable with lovely colors, but the material was kind of cheap appearing. The dress is low cut so I couldn't wear a bra. Overall, looked nice but probably wouldn't rent again.

Wore this on vacation and it was the perfect bathing suit cover up. I don't think I would wear it as a normal dress but it was super versatile for the day. I am normally a S but sized down to an XS and glad I did for this piece.
Felt so comfortable in it! Got so many compliments as well! I'm pregnant and it fit so well for my growing tummy!

This dress is amazing--super glamorous and fun. I wore it for the entire time I was in Miami Beach--pool, beach, lunch, drinks. It has a beautiful print on the outer layer and a separate cream colored silk lining. The sleeves are dramatic and the neckline is cut low in a very flattering way. There's a lot of material so I did get a little lost in it, but I felt like a million dollars every time I wore it!
Very low cut V neck, makes it very difficult to wear without a tank to under. Not the most flattering fit, but might be good as cover Up over bathing suit

links_reviews_title: Cute, but fabric does not breathe well!
links_reviews_text: The dress looked cute on an was perfect for a dinner date on the island. The only unfortunate thing is the dress is made of fabric that does not breathe well, so you get hot easily. Even with a light breeze, I still found myself uncomfortably warm.
Comfortable dress but had serious Mrs Roper moomoo vibes.
Never thought I would find a summer dress for a fall swim party but here it is! Styled over a swim suit for an indoor kids swim party in October. Was comfortable and cute!

I love the comfort of Fuzzi dresses and the light, stretchy material. However, this particular design did nothing for my figure, and made me look top heavy. It's very low cut and required a cami or bandeau for my large bust.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for Indian Summer daytime events and dinner out!
links_reviews_text: This dress was SO much more flattering than it looks in the photos. I am very petite/small and the XS fit me perfectly. I received so many compliments. I wore it with chunky black Frye boots.
Perfect fit
Decided this wasn't for me, but it fit fine and was roomy enough in the chest area. I am a 36 C/D.

links_reviews_title: I just had surgery and I have a swelly belly. This dress was perfect for my first day back at work.
links_reviews_text: Loose and flowy, stretchy fabric. Cinched in at the right places, very flattering and comfortable.
This is one of my most complimented rentals. It was so easy to wear. No adjusting or shapewear required. Just an easy summer dress.
Flattering and easy to wear. Could be casual or dressed up.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but kind of cheap material. Looks more like a beach cover up.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and cute, but definitely looks more like a beach outfit than anything else.

links_reviews_title: I was expecting a much nicer fabric for the price.
links_reviews_text: Not as vivid as photo'd and looks a little cheap on.. not like a $500+ dress...

links_reviews_title: Wore this over the weekend and really enjoyed it. An easy, casual dress to throw on during the day.
links_reviews_text: It was super soft. A bit low cut in the front, so in case you are small chested like myself, you might want something underneath. The tulle seemed a bit cheap, but the look of the dress and the overall flow was perfect for a summer weekend.

links_reviews_title: Rented for everyday wear but did not fit well.
links_reviews_text: The thought that this frock could retail for almost $700 is ludicrous. Feels and looks cheap, chest area fit was odd and the seam was essentially cutting my boob in half. The print is lovely but that's the only nice thing I can say.
This dress was super cute and forgiving.

The quality of this dress is a little lacking for the price. I got it on unlimited, but would've never went for the it if I were paying the actual rental price. The neck is a very deep v, I found myself constantly having to be concerned about showing a bit too much. Might be great for more of a vacation setting, but wasn't the best for every day wear.
This fit amazing it was loose and flown which was exactly what i wanted. Material was a bit warmer than anticipated also. Colors are great. Would wear again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an afternoon tea in Los Angeles
links_reviews_text: Fit is large but cute and I loved the print.

links_reviews_title: It was so comfy and a total head turner! Got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I loved how it covered the back of my arms but not the front- one of my problem areas. Very unique cut, comfy and fashionable!

I rented this for a beach vacation. It's very flowy and comfortable and I thought it was very cute- until I put it on and my husband said it was Thanksgiving colors! And he's totally right. Weird juxtaposition of colors on this otherwise beachy dress!

links_reviews_title: I love it! The dress received many compliments and they wanted to know where I found.
links_reviews_text: It is very flowy making it nice for casual events.
It's a really warm coat but it's so heavy. My shoulders hurt after wearing it for half a day. Other than that its great.
I liked this coat because it was warm and cozy. But it ran very large, wasn't soft, and had a low, single closure. I wish it had a hook higher up.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fur coat! I love the fit! It's was great. I will definitely rent again
So warm!! Teddy bear made into a coat
links_reviews_text: Picked this up in store in Chicago for the day and it was perfect length and warmth. Chocolate color is beautiful.
Wore this to a 1930s themed rooftop party in LA. It kept me nice and warm and it was pretty soft. I would definitely rent again
Wore this multiple times and rented twice. Love the length and thickness.
Me, to my 12yo daughter: "is this cute or do I look like the abominable snowman?" Her: "uh...you look like a bear." Me: "a good bear or a bad bear?" Her: "a bad bear."

links_reviews_title: Very warm! Great for formal events.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a NYE event in 20F weather. Kept me warm and gave me those very glam feels.

links_reviews_title: Nice fit, keeps you VERY warm.
How much do I love you, Brown Faux Fur jacket!!?
links_reviews_text: I feel so decadent in this jacket. So, so tempted to buy but trying to resist as this does not make sense for a southern Californian. But I love her. Roomy fit as others have said but I would say it's true to your normal size assuming you have wintery clothes on underneath. Color is a rich brown, super versatile. Big hit at my east coast sales meeting.

Wore for going out and about in the cold. It's super warm and true to size. I only knocked off a star because the color could be richer and I wish there were more options. It was brand new with tags which was nice. Kept me warm in the 20s.

I originally rented this for a holiday party (pictured) and loved it so I wore it to a wedding. I'm normally between an XS and an S because I have muscular arms but this is roomy so the XS was perfect! Kept me warm for an outdoor wedding. Got so many compliments! Looks super cute slightly off the shoulder too.

Versatile coat can be dressed up or down. It saved me from freezing while Xmas tree shopping on a windy day. In my photo it's paired with Sweet Baby Jamie's buttery novelty stripe sweater. Had fun modeling it for the designer as well! I really don't want to send it back. Thank you. Sweet Baby Jamie and RTR!
Warm oversized coat I think i could've ordered a small and still have the oversized look.
Sort of like wearing a teddy bear. Size down if you don't want an oversized look.

Unfortunately it was too big for me. Ordered a medium but could have worn a small or Xs. Wanted to exchange for a different size but I guess it is popular and was not available. I will definitely try to rent again!

Rented this for winter holidays on the east coast and was toasty warm and happy walking around NYC in 15 degree weather - loved it so much I kept it for two cycles. Only complaint is the pockets were ripped out. Funky in the best way.

I was aiming for 60's glam but ended up looking more 80's Fozzie Bear. It was warm but more teddy bear material than anything approximating fur. It ran really big. I wore it to a party as a lark, but wouldn't wear this to a formal event.

links_reviews_title: Coat was warm and it was nice to have an everyday rental
links_reviews_text: Big loose Fit but that's to be expected
So warm, fit was perfect
Do it for the coldest days
fit perfectly on me, it appears a bit big.
This guy is so comfy and warm for the cold weather. Feels like you're wearing a blanket. Definitely oversized but that's just the look. I don't want to give it up :)

Love the dual handle options and hardware. Spacious and can fit a laptop but not so large that it's overwhelming to carry. One large side pocket on the inside, no divider in between. Magnetic closure a plus.
This bag looks really nice and high quality however, it was was too big for my frame. Would be a great travel bag. Although it doesn't have any compartments.

links_reviews_title: Obsessssssed! Such a fun and flattering top. Should have bought it
links_reviews_text: Great fabric and fit. Def recommend. Wish they had it in white or black though
So fun and easy to wear!

links_reviews_title: I got engaged wearing this top!
links_reviews_text: Great fit!
Great fit and color

links_reviews_title: Felt like Belle from Beauty and the Beast
links_reviews_text: Very flattering, beautiful color and fit. Highly recommended.

The shirt was definitely "extra" but fun for key west. The sleeves are puffy and hang low but it pairs perfect with high waisted shorts or a skirt. I went up based on availability but M or L probably would have worked.

links_reviews_title: Statement top that falls a bit short
links_reviews_text: I liked this top but it 1) was tight on the arms (to the point where I was aware of it all day), and 2) didn't photograph well even though it's so pretty
Loved this top so much! Perfect for a trip to Miami.
Cute top! Loved the sleeves! Needed it for a football tailgate and it was everything I wanted!
I wore this to my friends party. Got so many compliments and color was amazing. Definitely recommend!
The color is absolutely gorgeous! Top of the sleeves were a little big around my arms, but wasn't too noticeable.
I loved it in every possible way! The fabric , the fit everything
Took this beauty on vacay to Carmel and it was such a great and easy piece to style. Def needs a high waist bottom. In luuuurve with it!

This top is so cute. It's cropped more than usual but as long as you have high waisted bottoms you are fine. I got so many compliments and stood out in a good way! The color is even more beautiful in person.

I loved this shirt and got so many compliments on it. I probably could have fit into the medium but got the large because I didn't want the elastic to be too tight on my arms. My only con is that the shirt is pretty see through and I wore it sans bra hence making a stranger at the bar say "she's not shy at all" so rent at your own risk/ reward
I wore with with cutoffs and tory burch sandals. Adorable. TONS of compliments from strangers and friends. My date loved it. Sexy!

links_reviews_title: I really wanted to like this top...
links_reviews_text: But it fit weird, baggy in the boobs and waist and just not very flattering on someone with a shorter waist.
Loved this look! Easily able to tighten or loosen according to how you want it to fit. Eye catching top!

Did not end up wearing this because the material of the sleeves is so voluminous that it looked a little bit ridiculous. Would not recommend this for women with larger bust. It fits more like a bra top with sleeves than a shirt.
Your mid drift will show but if you don't have a problem with that, you're good. Sleeves are as they appear. Cute top! A definite eye catcher.
This shirt was very very cute in person, nicer even than the model photos made it seem, I got compliments on it, I thought about keeping it.
Thought this was black but it's actually Navy. Really liked this though. Great for work.
As any LK Bennett item, very classic item and the ability to have a bow tie gives it that extra touch of #glamour

Cute on the hanger, star design made the shirt more playful. I am 5'2", and the shirt was long and made my legs look stubby. In addition, the sleeves were a weird length on me. Would be cute on a different body type.
Easy to tuck in or out and highly flattering. The sleeves were a bit billowy for me but otherwise it's really nice.

links_reviews_title: This is a really cute top for either work or play.
links_reviews_text: The bow is cute as are the full sleeves. This too does run a little small across the chest, but it's adorable.

The fit on this top is generous. Flowing but hangs nicely and do t have to do a lot of adjusting. The bow is sweet but sophisticated but it is really the little bit of puffed sleeve that sets it apart. Could tuck it in or wear it hanging and can go more casual or dressier as you choose.
Loved the sleeves and the tie at the neck. Would buy this.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed with the bow detail and sleeves
links_reviews_text: The style of this blouse is adorable. The bow detail and the somewhat puffed sleeves made me feel like a bad boss princess. Still on the fence whether I want to buy this one.
I love the fit and style of this shirt! It is nice and long too, so you can wear it tucked or tunic-y. It's very comfy and well-made.

The overall fit was large, so you may want to consider sizing down. It's a great blouse for work, and I already know it's one I'll look to rent again. I wore it under a jacket to work, and the static struggle was real after that. That was the only issue I had with this one. I didn't notice the bow in the front of the shirt in the pictures, and only realized it was there after I tried to figure out what the ties were for. Added a cute little detail to the front that is not necessarily visible in the pic.

links_reviews_title: Perfect blouse to dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: I really love this blouse. It drapes well, has beautiful details and is very flattering. Comfortable to wear even with the neck tie in front. Wore it tucked in with jeans, and with red l.k. Bennett trousers another day. One of my favorite RTR rentals.

links_reviews_title: Classic, well-cut, everyday work or play shirt
links_reviews_text: Fit loosely but still tailored. Can be buttoned all the way up or not depending on your style that day. Substantive but soft fabric - the star details add to the uniqueness of the shirt - it is more than just a standard button-down. Loved it!
I loved this top! The sleeve length is fun and unique. I ended up keeping it for a couple weeks and more it 3x.

Very flattering top! So cute with tight jeans. The tie string kept getting moved around to back and thought I lost it a few times but overall very cute top. I could have probably worn an 8 but I am always nervous w RTR items and my chest. Will rent again and maybe even buy it!
