links_reviews_title: Nicely draped material and unique sleeve shape helped this stand on its own
links_reviews_text: Liked the material and sleeve shape/length. Star pattern was not my favorite although subtle enough to pair well with a variety of items.
True to size, flattering, easy to dress up or down
Nice material, pattern, and sleeve detail. It looks less distinctive in person than online but is still a nice work blouse.
Would purchase this blouse if it weren't so expensive. Wore it to holiday events, work, everything and received so many compliments. Will definitely rent again!
Great fit, super flattering and fun!
Easy to wear. Comfortable and fun but professional.
Loved this top. Classic with unique details. Perfect for work!
This is a cute top - runs a bit large and blousy, but a cute print and fit. I received several compliments on it.
Adorable fit, very flattering.

I liked the pattern of this shirt in person (stars) and wore it to work, but found that I was constantly adjusting so that the buttons weren't gapping at the bust. Couldn't have gone up a size because the shoulders would be too big. I wore it buttoned up all the way (left the very top button undone) and bow tied tight like in the listing photo.
My favorite of the week. Only complaint with this one was the ties. felt unnecessary.

links_reviews_title: Simple shirt that is classy without shouting.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 16, but this was a 14 and still a bit oversized on me. There was no gap at the bust line. For casual wear, I wore it untucked with the top button open and tied the bow just below the open V. The shirt length was pretty long. The sleeves are oversized, but it was okay. I liked the star print on it.
Fit really well and enough room for my chest size. Fun shirt to wear in hot weather
Fun details. Pairs well with black or white pants. Did "pop open" a bit in between buttons, but easily fixed with some safety pins. Would rent again.
Flattering shirt in light and beautiful material, very breathable.

links_reviews_title: sooo cute with white jeans for work and dinner with friends after!
links_reviews_text: love the bow! and the sleeves are the perfect amount of poofiness

Pros: nice material, cute print, light and good for warm weather but still professional. Cons: Something really off on the fit of this blouse for me. I suspect it is better for taller ladies, probably especially for athletic build. I am 5'3" and hour glass. The shoulders, sleeves and torso fit great and were flattering but it was too long (yet, rather short when tucked in) and the armpit seemed low. Moving my arms would pull the torso and then I've got a gap right in the center of my bust. Sigh.
very comfy
Loved the material/fabric of the top, but felt like it ran small (specifically in the chest/stomach area).
This blouse was more blue than I thought. Still cute and great to wear to work. Sleeves are puffery which didn't come out well in the picture.
It was perfect for work with black pants as another reviewer mentioned
Pretty but runs large and looked matronly on me. Might would rent again in a smaller size.
Perfect work too, great fit!

Maybe if I had gotten a size smaller it would have looked better. I did not care for how the sleeves draped on me. They seemed overly large and extended down to my elbows with too big a poof around my elbows. I wear a large in some things and XL in others so I think I just got this one too big.

Cause these are some balloon-y sleeves. My sister said I looked like a museum employee, and I did feel cool. I liked the bow and print, but I usually don't play up my arms and sleeves so this was a one-time rental for me.
Loved wearing these with a body suit for a classy but also comfortable vacation look! Would totally wear again! Love them!
These were fun to jazz up the classic shorts and a T-shirt look. The front is a bit billowy so I felt it gave a bit of a pooch at times but whatever! They're true to size and comfortable!
Comfy and fun short! Fit true to size and i loved them. Hard to send back!
Cute alternative to sundress
Loved these shorts. Wish I could have found a better top to go with them but perfect for strolling around on a hot day!

links_reviews_title: Great pop of color for vacation!
links_reviews_text: Loved these! They were a great pop of color on vacation and were a fun statement short over a black bathing suit. The high waist and wider legs have a good slimming effect and there are pockets! I would've bought them but they're 100% polyester and not of a high enough quality to justify the absurd price tag. But I'd definitely rent them again!

links_reviews_title: Everyday, these shorts are great. Quality top notch.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit and comfy

links_reviews_title: This shorts are the best. Super soft and comfortable!!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Perfect shorts! Comfortable, don't ride up, good length
links_reviews_text: These are a perfect silk short! Look fancy, but are comfortable and cute. Perfect high rise. Can be dressed up or dressed down for whatever occasion
The shorts are really cute - fun color and pattern. I just didn't find them very flattering. Perhaps on a more petite frame or with a perfectly selected blouse...
Fit great and was fun to wear.
Great sizing, just like pic, so pretty, elastic band can be a little tight on tummy so maybe don't wear on your period lol

links_reviews_title: Cute but felt tight in the waist
links_reviews_text: Would rent again in a large. The waist is stretchy but i felt like it was cutting into my sides which was unflattering. Needed to size up.

These shorts were to die for. So easy to toss on with a tank and run out the door looking presentable and even chic ! The high waist is so flattering. Pockets !!! And the length was perfect. Dressy enough to wear w heels and a dressier top but casual enough to wear w a tank and jacks. Love these shorts

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear, lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Like wearing fancy boxer shorts. Super comfortable, very cute.

These were so fun to wear! And looked dressier than how comfy they feel. I wore them for daytime with a short sleeved white button tied up and sandals, and wore them at night with a black crop top and wedges.
Easy-fit and stylish, got compliments on the beach
Beautiful, but fabric was like PJ-& i dont have enough confidence to wear it out, may be Mexico or my backyard. Fits nicely on 29" waist-39" hips

links_reviews_title: Cute but kinda looks like PJs
links_reviews_text: I'd say they are more like PJ shorts than public attire. There isn't a lining so they are very thin and show everything. They are super cute but just very thin. They cling a lot.

links_reviews_title: Forgot to add a photo in my previous review -- gorgeous bag!
Love this bag, used it as my go to statement piece
links_reviews_text: The color is really vibrant in person, which I absolutely loved. The bag is definitely pretty small but good for going out. I had no problem fitting my wallet keys lipstick and phone inside. The chain is really special and makes the bag stand out. Love the clear and gold accent pieces in the chain
Very cute bag for a statement piece, and fits everything you would need for a night out! Only thing is the straps squeak but it's not super obnoxious
The color, the quality, everything. Only small note- the chain squeaks.

Cute workwear. Love the LK Bennet brand for work clothes. I read the other reviews that the torso is cut short and thought it would be good for me. I have a short torso and this jumpsuit fit perfectly!

I loved this jumpsuit - supremely cute. But be advised the torso runs short; I'm 5'7" and it was pretty tight in the crotch and definitely rides up when you sit! And if you're tall, the pants will be a bit cropped.

I got a ton of compliments wearing this to work! I am normally a 6-8 but the 4 fit perfectly. The length was great with heels. My only complaint is that the piece has belt loops, but didn't come with a belt. Apparently this is an issue for RTR as it's not the first piece I've received w the same problem. However, I just wore a blazer so the empty belt loops weren't visible.

The proportions were a little big for my petite frame. Definitely needed to wear heels, and I think the fit would have been better if my legs were longer. But I received several compliments and it was comfortable.
Very comfy. very stylish. Only con is hard to zip up by yourself so don't drink too much water lol.

This jumpsuit is why I love rent the runway! I never would have attempted to wear a jumpsuit outside of this service. The pictures do not do it justice. I am curvy with a short torso so it is hard to find one piece items to fit. This was perfect - it was comfortable and flattering on. I was worried about getting in and out of it during the day but the zipper was easy to manage on my own.

I really wanted to love this, but it was just ok. I love LK Bennett as a brand and I normally love the tailoring of each piece. This jumpsuit however was just ok. I'm 5'9" and normally a 4, but sized up to a 6 for my long torso. I'm so glad I did because a 4 would not have fit. I'm glad I got it, but I'll be swapping it out almost immediately.
Fit well, nice material

links_reviews_title: Cute Jumper, (at 5'10", almost a camel toe!)
links_reviews_text: This is not your usual jumper from RTR, but I loved it anyway! It is unlined and the material is soft, but not flexible. The cut is adorable and the drape is great. With all reviews, the same comment re: the big belt loops - needs a belt! I am tall and the jumper was borderline short in the rise, but I ate a long brunch sitting and chatting with no issue. If you are 5'10"+, I'd be forewarned you might be sporting some unplanned "cleavage." ;)

I am a huge fan of jumpsuits and this one gives me another reason as to why! It is super chic and looks very professional. Comes with belt loops so I would definitely pair with a belt of some kind! It is a little long and does bunch up a bit in the back but overall very happy with the fit!
Loved this jumpsuit! So cute, fit well, and was very comfortable and flattering. I would say it's a bit of an awkward length though, but I could get away with wearing a small heel.

Was not too long on me, even it flats. Waist was a little loose. I wish I had a belt that worked for that reason and because it has belt loops. Saw it styled by other renters with a blouse underneath and it made for a great look! Will rent again in summer to go sleeveless.

I didn't know if this was going to fit based on reviews from other tall ladies, but I really loved it. I do have long legs and average torso, so the belt hit slightly above my navel, but still at the narrowest part of my waist. I threw on a cardigan at work and it was great. Plenty of compliments. I did go a size up as LK Bennett tends to run small, but I would have been just fine with my normal size 6. I would totally rent again.
This was a great departure from the norm for a work day. So comfortable, loved it!
I looooved this jumpsuit! Sad I have to return it lol I am short so I always stay away from jumpsuits but this one fit so perfect. Super comfortable yet perfect for work. :)

links_reviews_title: This was so chic and flattering.
links_reviews_text: This is such an amazing work outfit! So many compliments!

I needed a few items for a work conference and picked this for the trip. Super comfortable which I didn't really expect and the pockets were awesome. Only drawback which I did not see in other pictures was it has belt loops but no belt/sash provided. I thought the loops were too large to ignore and not wear a belt with it but I didn't have one to really go with it so I think it could have looked better with the proper belt.

I ordered this for a cocktail party and wasn't totally sold at first. It's super comfortable and I liked that I was able to wear a bra with it. I ordered the 6R as opposed to my typical 2R/4R size and I can't remember why (either based on reviews or they didn't have my size available? Who knows) But, I ended up wearing it and really liking it. It's a slightly odd fit. Probably because the silhouette photo suggests that it's a little more fitted with a flare leg. For me, the waist was roomy, but still slimming. The length was a little too short. I think if I didn't receive this jumpsuit minutes before my event, I might have reconsidered. However, it's a good quality piece and I know that had I gotten my size I would've been really happy. I want to order again in a 4L.

This is my fave rental ever! Great fabric, flattering cut, unique yet classic. And it is comfy! I got so many compliments. I am short (5'1"ish), so wore with a small heel. It does run a tad large, so if you like things super fitted, order down a size. Highly recommend!
Although the jumpsuit was a little big, it was still so comfortable and I got a ton of compliments. I styled it with a white sleeveless blazer and it was appropriate for work. Wanna rent this again!!
This jumpsuit has no shape. Was very blah. Returned immediately.
Might have been a bit large but I liked it. Easy to wear.
Great fit, length, and quality. I rented it for work and it worked perfectly. I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Felt frumpy for my body type
links_reviews_text: The waist was not form fitting , Which did not suit my hourglass figure. Otherwise loved the fabric.

links_reviews_title: Very fun- have rented this many times
links_reviews_text: Needs a little belt, FYI
Cute but it runs extremely large.
Wore to a brief work event and immediately returned. Felt like a prisoner in this striped jumpsuit. Maybe it would look better with a belt.
My rental was also missing the belt. The torso was too short, I was not able to lift my arms. Overall, the style felt a little boring and child like.
I'm usually a 6-8 with 36Ds. It fit well in the chest, but was otherwise really loose. It had belt loops, and would have looked better w a belt.
Love it! Great fit and material. Wore it with a black and tan wrap belt

I wore this with nude heels and a white blazer. Got a million compliments, was super comfortable all day. Going to rent again for sure. Only complaint is that is has belt loops...and no belt...so you kind of need. Blazer or jacket (or a belt) to cover those up. A belt wouldn't work with my body type, so...blazer!

links_reviews_title: Obsessed is not a strong enough word!
links_reviews_text: If I could change my permanent address to this jumpsuit, I would live in it! I rented it on a week when it was boiling hot and I wound up being on a jury-meaning I would be required to look professional and sit fir hours while enduring outside temperatures of 90+. This jumpsuit ticked all those boxes and looked darn cute doing it! Bonus points for the pockets!

links_reviews_title: Lots of complements! Professional appearance. Very comfortable. Did not come with belt.
links_reviews_text: Did not come with belt. Fit well.

only a 12R was available, but i thought i'd give it a shot for work. ended up being really baggy, most notably in the waist. i would have liked it to come in a bit more. probably won't rent again even in a smaller size.
Short torso. Too small for me.
Lots of compliments on this piece. Conservative yet stylish. Cropped. Size up if large chested.
Liked the outfit. It has belt loops but no belt. It looks a bit off if you don't wear one

It was true to size but in roomy way. Wasn't tight anywhere but flattering cut. Want overly excited about the length. I'm 5' 5" and it didn't feel cropped enough to me but with heels looked fine. Wouldn't rent again as it wasn't that exciting but did look cute, got compliments and if the length (and weird belt loops!!) were fixed I'd be much more likely to want to rent again or keep. Solid staple for a fun work outfit.
Wore this twice because I liked it so much! Great fit and length for shorter people. It hit me just above the ankle and looked great with a nude heel.
Perfect for work. Wore with a white shirt under

links_reviews_title: Cool sweatshirt, lightweight stretchy material but so oversized - better if you're tall/as a dress
links_reviews_text: Would be a cool look with tights and boots. Love the print but it was comically big on me, especially being short. Wore it to knock around on weekend then returned

links_reviews_title: wore to music festival as a dress. Loved the fit.
links_reviews_text: SUPER cozy and would be great to wear around the house or to run around in. I wore it as a dress to a music festival and loved the overall look.

Oversized to begin with note than I realized when ordering. Got M instead of Sm and felt like it was pretty big on me. Plan to reorder in small! Shirt is a beautiful red color and the embroidery is nice.

links_reviews_title: It gives you the tunic look!
links_reviews_text: I'm adding the picture this time (previously wrote a review earlier this year). Love the fit. Will definitely rent this again. It's perfect with leggings!
It's cool and comfy, and a touch lighter weight than I'd imagined but I'll probably end up wearing this everyday.
Very comfortable would rent again! So easy to pair with leggings and up the weekend errand-running look

links_reviews_title: It's cute but not for petite
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'1 around 113 lbs and ordered XS. As you can see, it's more of a dress than a sweater. I still find it really cute and comfy though. I was going to wear it for a long flight but given the size, I had to change plans. I might rent it again for a bonfire or something.

links_reviews_title: Amazing weekend piece. Super soft and chic for over leggings.
links_reviews_text: Loved this. Easy to throw on with casual leggings and sneakers, or with leather leggings, or over the knee boots - heels or flats! Super soft and comfortable.
This was very cute. Casual but stylish

I can't believe how much I like this! I wore it for a long weekend with my sister in NYC. The color, fabric, detailing, fit, the hood--everything was perfect. Highly recommend. Tempted not to return it anytime soon.

It's the oversized sweater you can wear for a day out without looking too much like you should've been home instead, if that makes sense. It was a bit long for my preference, I probably should've gotten the S instead of the M, but I still loved how roomy it was and how comfortable I felt. I'll definitely rent it again!

I wore this so much. It's super soft and I love it. It's longer so it's perfect with leggings. It's kind of heavy fabric so I wouldn't want to packet to travel. If it wasn't for the price tag I would totally buy this.
goes well with everything
comfortable
Love the oversize fit on this hoodie. I wore this multiple times in a 2 week span.
Really fun and so comfortable! A tad larger than I would have liked- it's definitely meant to be oversized but I still would have gone down a size.

The image is stitched on, which makes it look a little nicer than a typical sweatshirt. It's definitely oversized, but not sloppy, and it's really heavy. I wanted to pack it for a trip but couldn't justify its weight in my checked luggage.
It runs large but that's the way you want it! great with leggings.
Super cute soft material small fit fine! Trendy and would buy if wasn't so expensive! Would rent again for everyday look w jeans
The heavy but silky smooth fabric pulls this hoodie above the rest. The bright colors keep the mood upbeat. I really enjoyed wearing it and will rent again.

links_reviews_title: Used as maternity wear for around town and the house
links_reviews_text: Definitely fits large -- boyfriend fit. Very comfortable and great for running errands and around the house.
Really soft and comfortable - length is slightly awkward to look cute in

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a casual weekend look.
links_reviews_text: Super soft. Cool, slouchy fit. Great for weekend-wear.
Oversized but comfortable to wear

links_reviews_title: It's cute & comfy; I got compliments everytime I wore it.
links_reviews_text: It is oversized but still fitted.
This sweater had a lighter material than anticipated but was still quite heavy cute and comfy with jeans and leggings
Fits perfect perfect for hanging out

this is a fun and comfortable piece. the design is actually embroidered, not screen-printed, which is a nice touch. This isn't typical 'sweatshirt' material, but has more of a nylon feel to it (but still feels very high-quality). I always wanted to know what a $350 sweatshirt felt like - now I know. It'll be hard to give this one up.
I love this hoodie! The fabric is thin but very good quality and keeps you warmer than you might expect. It's a little heavy but not in a too uncomfortable way. Highly recommend!
I felt like ariana grande
Unique twist on the everyday hoodie
This fits more like a Sweatshirt Dress, which was perfect. I wore with leggings and sneakers to a couple different outdoor fall events in Western NY. Very roomy and warm. Perfect for fall!
Long. It covers your butt. Garnet red that I prefer, not a tomato red. Densely knit, but it has give. Not fleecy inside.
Silky fabric and intricate embroidery add flair to the standard hoodie. Very long below hip length. Should have gone with a large.
Didn't like this. Fit was weird on me. Sleeves very long but body snug
This was a great rental for a drafty ski lodge. It was a bit bulky - no problem for hanging in ski lodge, but too cropped for my taste
I wore the only size available which was XL but liked the oversized look. It's a beautiful and well made piece, one of my favorite rentals!

Loved the soft graphics of this sweater. Also really liked that the collar stood straight up instead of rolling over. Kept me very warm on a 30s day in the PNW. Slightly oversized but not too much, definitely not a fitted sweater if that's what you're expecting.

Super soft and heavy weight, this fair isle sweater runs TTS. It's comfortable to wear on a cold day or in a warmer winter day (with no coat). It is boxy (as pictured) but I love it. I have a petite frame so it wasn't too short for me.

I am normally a medium but wore the large in this sweater which fit perfectly. It was very cropped, more than I anticipated; however, it was cute and I received several compliments. I'm loving the Fair Isle comeback.
Such a perfect winter sweater. I loved the colors and it was so cozy and extremely warm for a snowy day!
Love the color and pattern, and almost fit well, but was a little too stiff to fall right. Not sure if that's the wool or it's been overly dry cleaned. Neck was also snug and itchy. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Cozy and sweet for early spring
links_reviews_text: This is so cute! It's cozy, but has pretty springy colors, perfect for the start of the season in New England - still freezing here in April! I like the cropped length, perfect for high-waist jeans. This is warm, and a little bit itchy. It didn't irritate me, but if you tend to be sensitive to wool/texture/itchy sweaters, you might not enjoy this. Otherwise, I loved it. Looked cute, for well, and felt cozy and cute.
Great color combination. Very warm but not too thick, just right. Boxy, relaxed fit makes it really easy to wear.

links_reviews_title: Nice sweater for everyday and work.

links_reviews_text: This sweater was rather thin and the neck splayed out weird once it was on, didn't end up wearing.
This was a cute sweater and though I live in Chicago- I could not wear it to work. Check the wool content. It's very warm. Ok on weekends
Ordered an XL; felt like an S. Sent right back.
Rented this during the holidays and wore several times. Pretty colors and print, easy everyday sweater in the cold months.

links_reviews_title: Cute pattern but neckline is a little too high
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and a cute pattern! The neck was a little too long to be flattering

links_reviews_title: Warm, cute sweater for a winter roadtrip.
links_reviews_text: A bit disappointed in how used the sweater looked but since it was for everyday use, did not mind as much. Loved the colors and the not cropped but not too long cut.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to send this back
links_reviews_text: So cute, so warm, so comfortable. Not itchy! Wish I could've kept this one! Loved it! Wore it at least 5 times.

links_reviews_title: Cozy & cute for cold weather months!
links_reviews_text: Fit is on the smaller side. I wore a medium & it fit perfectly, however I often wear small.

links_reviews_title: This is a cozy on-trend sweater. Colors are pretty and it fits true to size
links_reviews_text: cute sweater for everyday
Wore this several times while I had it. Very comfortable and nice for everyday activities with jeans or cargo pants!
Really nice, not itchy fabric <3

links_reviews_title: Cozy sweater for walking around the city.
links_reviews_text: Boxy fit. Very 1980s
Was much pinker than showed in the photos and felt Very very young. Not flattering.

A nice addition to your fall winter casual work wardrobe and weekend wardrobe. It's quite oversized except in the length - it's not cropped per se, but it his me right at my natural waist so I had to wear higher waisted jeans.

links_reviews_title: Cute and soft. Runs small. A bit boxy
links_reviews_text: I did like the sweater but it does run small. I am usually a S but ordered a M for this knowing how the designer's sweaters run. It does come up a little short so was best to wear with high waisted jeans.

This top definitely runs small! I usually order an M or L but based on other reviews I went with the XL and I'm so glad I did! I loved this on and got so many compliments on the whole look.. the sleeves occasionally slipped but it wasn't a pain to adjust. Would definitely rent again!
So flattering and easy to wear with any sort of high waisted pants or shirt, wore a few times and love it!

links_reviews_title: Super flattering! Wish I bought it
links_reviews_text: Very flattering but this runs small as I'm usually a M but had to order a large and it was still tight. Cropped but doesn't show much skin with high waisted jeans

links_reviews_title: Felt super confident while wearing this!
links_reviews_text: This top was seriously too cute! I've always wanted to try products from Reformation because I've heard such great things, and this top truly exceeded my high expectations. Such nice quality and an adorable cut - I'm obsessed!

links_reviews_title: Not for those with long torsos!
links_reviews_text: The material is great (thick and holds everything in), but as a tall person, it looked like a baby's shirt on me. I find that most Reformation runs small or extremely short on me, so I probably should've known to size up. Could potentially see myself giving it another shot with a super high-waisted skirt, but not jeans.

Loved this top so much I bought it - a good dinner / going out staple. As with reformation, runs small ~1 size, and fit is a bit odd on the shoulders, but some double sided tape kept everything in place.

I wore this with high waisted jeans on a cool tropical evening while on vacation. It's sophisticated but casual and lightweight enough for warm weather. I could wear comfortable without a bra. Also cute with skirts, linen pants & shorts.
I tried this top in a medium and in a large and still it was too tight and short. It's a great top and very comfortable but not great on an apple shape like me.

Shirt runs small. Arms were very tight and the shoulders slid off (probably because it was too tight on me). Otherwise, enjoyed wearing this on multiple out of office occasions. I'm sometimes an xs, sometimes a small petite, sometimes a small in tops. I'd recommend sizing up if you're in between sizes.
I loved this top! It is very cropped but only an inch of my stomach showed with high waisted jeans. The shirt was tight enough to wear no bra was needed. Flirty, fun, versatile.
This top was okay. I ended up not wearing it because the fit around the shoulders is odd.
So cute
Was surprised the L fit really well as I'm typically a medium, but Reformation usually sizes pretty small. VERY cute on though. Going to wear with jeans/jean shorts, can dress up or down.

links_reviews_title: Super trendy dress! Oversized but meant to be that way
links_reviews_text: Loveddddd

links_reviews_title: Love this dress- but it's big!
links_reviews_text: This is seriously the most comfortable dress ever! There is a TON OF FABRIC. I paired this with platform sneakers and I got a bunch of compliments. The fabric is heavy woven fabric, so it's more appropriate for warm and transitioning weather.
Sized up just one size from my normal size (because I'm currently 39 weeks pregnant) and this fit like a glove. Still TONS of breathing room too, definitely runs large. Good, thick quality material.

Volume. Volume. Volume. This dress is big and blows in the wind. I belted it to make a little less of a statement. They cotton material brings the dress back down to earth, but the size and shape is a real statement look. And I love it

This was possibly the heaviest garment bag I've ever received from Rent the Runway. There is A LOT of fabric here, and it's WEIGHTY. I probably could have worn a small, but then I most certainly would have been choked by the neck, which was cutting me off all day. Despite these complaints, all the gals at the office absolutely loved this dress (and the silver heels I wore with it). One of them noted it is a "man repeller" dress - women love it; men don't. Fine by me!
Its gonna be a no from me dawg

This dress was everything. Dream summer dress. Pros: Dreamy volume, pockets, went from work to happy hour to a summer concert in central park, photographs well, lots of compliments, great for tall girls! Cons: The material is a stiff cotton thing so EVERYTHING sticks to it. There is so much dress that I like couldnt keep track of it all. Could easily drown someone who's on the delicate side or more petite.
This dress could be nice, but it is just SO big and bulky. It's not as heavy as others make it sound, but there is a lot of volume to it.

I LOVED this dress. I paired it with a huge statement necklace for a daytime party. It was incredibly comfortable. There is a lot of material in the skirt, but the dress runs true to size as it is fitted in the shoulders/neck. There are pockets (yay!). I am 5'8" and the length hit my at my shins, which was perfect. My husband hated it, lol. This is a funky fashion forward dress and sometimes men just don't get it. I got tons of complements though!!

links_reviews_title: Rented for my birthday party, wore two more times.
links_reviews_text: This dress is voluminous, but unlined so it's not very heavy. I loved it and would buy it in a heartbeat, but that would defeat the point of renting for me. When I told my friends it was a rental, they encouraged me to just buy it because it was so perfect. Puffy in a fabulous way, but I did wear it to work on casual Friday which was also my birthday. Then I wore it for my birthday party and AGAIN for an art opening dinner event. Each time with different necklaces that made it more or less formal. I sized down to my top half size which is a full size smaller than my pear shaped bottom half. The neckline is a bit snug, and I have a thin neck, so be aware when selecting the size. I'm also tall but it would probably look a bit more tent like on anyone below 5'7".

Loved this dress. So so much material. Since I am an the shorter side, it hit just above ankle, way longer than on the model and I basically had to wear a heal so it didn't swallow me. Felt very breezy but dramatic in a fun way since I paired it with a bright colored shoe

Channel your inner 4-year old in this dress. It makes you feel like twirling and leaping with all the glorious fabric!! The only downside it going to the bathroom, I left like a bride scooping up all the fabric just to sit on the toilet (lol!)

Yes, it's absolutely huge so size down but really kind of avante garde with the massive volume and tiered flounces. The fabric is quite stiff a d a bit thick so it poofs out. Fun dress if you're ready to take a bit of risk. I wore it with chunky platforms as shown in the RRT pic and that helps balance it out. Great dress for late summer moving into fall.

links_reviews_title: Loved it but a little avante guard for every day life
links_reviews_text: Felt so amazing in it but didn't feel comfortable wearing to anything because it has so much fabric!

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear this dress because it was too big.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this dress, but it was huge! It fit me like a tent. Size down at least 2 sizes.
very flattering, usually a 6/8 and the 4/6 fit

This dress is massive and I am 8 months pregnant. Could have had another person hidden in the dress and no one would have known. The fabric is really heavy and overwhelming. The only occasion I foresee this working for us Halloween.
Didn't upload a picture of this dress because it looks exactly like the picture- and it will on any body type. It is huge and tent-like - and I loved it. It will be my go-to dress this summer.

I could tell that this would be flown, so I ordered down a size. But it was still huge!!! There was a LOT of fabric. If I were pretty pregnant, I think this would be flattering, and the thickness of the material would work to make me feel covered without feeling to hot. At 5'4", there was just too much material--I was swimming in it!
I loved this dress. I wore it to work twice throughout my month with it. It's comfortable, sexy, work-appropriate, beautiful. I could go on and on.

This dress fit like butter. Soft, comfy material. It was a little big but still flattering. A size down and I might need shapewear. Perfect for work and winter in the northeast. I'm really tempted to buy it.

The sleeves add a nice touch to this sweater dress. It runs a little loose so it's not a dress that will hug your curves. No problems with undergarments showing through either. Good for a casual day in the office.

This is the second time I've worn a VEDA dress and it fits like butter! The fabric is stretchy, but feels somewhat like cotton. I wore tights and black suede booties. You could def wear this on a date or a cooler night out- it was a little sexy for work, but I pulled it off and felt fabulous!
The dress was very long - I'm 5'4" and it went to my ankles! I tied it up with a small scarf so it hit knee length which was perfect. Runs a little big. Loved loved loved the color!!

links_reviews_title: I loved it so I bought it!
links_reviews_text: I ended up wearing this dress so much that I couldn't bear to send it back. Nice lightweight knit and a great color. I wore this to several parties including Thanksgiving dinner.
My husband loves the dress :)
Flattering fit bit material feels worn
Gorgeous - I'm very tall and it works on my frame

links_reviews_title: Dress seemed worn - didn't love it.
links_reviews_text: The color / fit of this dress was great. It seemed worn and stretched out, especially around the neck. The ruffle sleeves were shapeless, so they just looked stretched out, not flounced like the bottom. This hit me around ankle length, which worked because of the tight fit of the dress. Warning: it's thinner / tighter than I expected (although not uncomfortably so), so it shows every bump, curve, and line!

I wore this dress to participate in a press conference. The color was vibrant and the fit wonderful. I couldn't have probably had a smaller size but it was perfect and I received tons of compliments. Would rent again.
Love the fit!! So many compliments!!

I wore this for a work event and the color popped! Got so many compliments on the overall fit - It is long, and tighter so I wouldn't wear for everyday but I loved it as a standout look. Will rent again!
Tons of compliments on this dress. As expected, it was super form fitting and stretchy but very comfortable. Loved wearing it and would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Cute color and cut for work
links_reviews_text: I liked this dress. The color is great, and the cut is perfect for my casual but conservative workplace. The material is thin and stretches out quite a lot during the day.
Fabric is not thick but very comfortable. It becomes not as tight as the day goes on.

links_reviews_title: The color was great. Very comfortable to wear. and very slimming. Got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: great. no cons. will rent again.

links_reviews_title: The knit fabric was very thin. It showed every bump
links_reviews_text: The knit fabric was very thin. It showed every bump

links_reviews_title: LIVED in this coat for two months. Absolutely love
links_reviews_text: This coat is amazing. Everything you want in a good winter coat plus a fashion statement. I would buy for all of winter.
So cozy and oversized and warm!
Warm af. Cute too!
Such a cute, comfy and warm jacket. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: This could have been great but I was swimming in it.
links_reviews_text: I should have followed the other reviews when it said that this coat runs large. It was so big that I immediately sent it back. If the size didn't make me look so big, I would have kept it to wear a few times. It is cute and perfect for the freezing temps that are happening here!

This is my second time renting this coat. Yes it runs large and the size smaller worked better. It is bulky but super soft and pillowy and VERY warm. I love this with casual jeans/sneaks and athliesure wear. Getting me though yucky midwest winter.

links_reviews_title: did not wear it - it was going to be for a boat party at night
links_reviews_text: It was way too big, did not wear it, I should have ordered a small. My normal size is 4-6

It does run large but it's part of the look. So so warm! Cute shearling details and honestly just a great jacket for very cold weather! I wore it everyday for a few weeks-was also great on my ski vacay.

links_reviews_title: Warm!! Looks intimidating and big at first, but I grew to LOVE it
links_reviews_text: This is a really warm coat for winter. It is definitely part of the over-sized coat trend. At first I thought it was too much coat for me, but I grew to love it (in part because it kept me so very warm on a freezing cold day on the sidelines at my kid's soccer tournament). The fleecy details are a nice touch. It's definitely an everyday coat, and I have kept it longer than I expected because I keep reaching for it every time the temperature drops.

If you are pregnant this may work for you. The jacket could have fit two of me in it! Least flattering/ functional jacket. I rented a Medium (usually a medium or large in jackets) and it should have read XL. Save your rental and look for another jacket!
This coat is boxy and makes you look about 100 pounds larger than you actually are.

I'm obsessed with this dress. This is the second time I've rented it. I'm contemplating buying it, but I live in Florida, and summer is approaching. It's very thick, stretchy material. I got so many compliments. I bought the blue shirt dress with the same design. Love Tibi!
Basic black dress, pretty material. Runs true to size and best for smaller chests :)
Modern and stylish. Really a lovely dress. The fabric is high end and dress falls perfectly. Nice length too.

Wore this the week of Halloween to be festive. This dress takes a unique take on the black word dress and it does it well! The asymmetrical buttons and puffy quarter sleeves bring character to the dress that is fitting all year round but especially loved it for the holiday. Bonus that the material is very soft and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable and unique with lots of stretch
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a work conference. I really liked that it was simple but had a little twist with the asymmetrical buttons. It was a little short so I wouldn't have been comfortable wearing it with bare legs to work. It fit perfectly in the hips was was big in the waist and chest - there was a lot of stretch so I think this would be great on someone with a more generous chest. Overall a fun work rental, though!

links_reviews_title: Dress for the job you want in full effect
links_reviews_text: Great quality dress, a thick enough knit that it hides belly and keeps you warm in freezing office environments. The left bottom hem was noticeably longer than the right side. Didn't bother me as it is an asymmetrical dress. I loved the dress, felt like a boss in the making.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for work and everyday!
links_reviews_text: This dress is very comfortable and is a great piece that goes from work to everyday wear. I am typically a size 2-4, and the 6 was just a bit too big in the waist. Definitely will get a 4 next time around!
Wore to work. Flattering dress.
This dress is comfy and just a bit edgy. I get teased for how conservatively I dress so this was a fun compromise. I'm between a 6 and 8 and would size down next time.
It's fun, but not amazing

This dress has heavy fabric and the buttons are a really nice detail. It was super comfortable and I got compliments. My only issue was that the dress ran too big in the waist, and was the perfect fit in the front and back yet was too short on the sides, so I felt that I couldn't have sized down. But if you're shorter or have shorter legs, this dress is great!
Didn't think this rent would work but it's a great piece. Comfortable, flattering and chic. Loved wearing it.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress! Perfect for work or play
links_reviews_text: Absolutely loved the style and fit of this dress. I am 20 weeks pregnant, and it fit my growing chest and belly. The style is a unique spin on a classic black dress. Wore to both work and a birthday party. Will be renting this again!

Never want to give this dress back. It's super flattering. Nice fabric. Very versatile. Great fit shorter ladies. Perfect for work, after hours or weekend wear. Love the asymmetrical details. In terms of fit, I am not typically a 0 (usually 2) and this fit perfectly and wasn't tight at all. If you're a bit less boyish / more curves, your normal size should work!

I styled this as pictured but decided it looked more like a night out outfit, so then paired it with grey tights and black flats, no jacket for a more casual day look. It's very comfortable and thick material.
Loved it! Flattering and that pocket!
Very comfortable. Good cut, design, and material. Perfect for and all day workshop

Super cute dress, I loved the symmetrical details. Thick knit fabric, runs slightly big- for me, it was in the shoulder/neckline/bust area. One pocket is a bit weird but still cute. Got lots of compliments!
Dress only has one pocket, I thought that was weird but the buttons and cut were different and interesting. Was a bit tight on my huge bump maybe better before 30 weeks.
Super cute dress! You can tell it's made very well. It was a little too big for me to actually wear. Large in the waist/sides

links_reviews_title: A simple black dress with a fun twist!!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and nice thick fabric! Has a pocket, which is awesome. Love the button details. They are functioning buttons too. Loved it

I normally wear a size 6 and this size 4 fit well. The material is stretchy and thicker so it can be form fitting and still flattering. The buttons cause a little bit of pulling and gathering of fabric. I loved the pocket (there's only 1), and was able to bring my phone, cards, lipstick without a purse.
Love this dress so so much. Super flattering, stylish, its work appropriate, and also perfect for a date night. Material is thick too which is a plus in the winter.
Looks, feels great. Very comfortable. Running small, I usually wear size 6 and this one 8. Really would like to buy this dress
Loved the style of the dress, the only thing was that it felt a little lopsided at times. I received many compliments in London about this dress!

Sadly I didn't get to wear this dress as it was too big. It is a gorgeous design and beautiful material but I found it to be really big through the waist and hips, making me look bigger than I am. There are pockets (great!), but they bulged out a bit at the side in an unflattering manner. This dress is probably better suited for people who aren't so petite.

The material is definitely on the thicker side, which is nice to wear during fall. I did get lots of compliments from both clients and coworkers about the dress, which is nice. There is a pocket on one side of the dress, so that's handy. I would say that the dress does run a bit big, because I feel like I'm closer to a 4 in size, but the 2 fit perfectly! It is not curve hugging, but it is of course tailored very well so you still look shapely without the dress being tight. I will definitely rent again!

Most comfortable slip on dress ever! Fabric is thick so it is perfect for these upcoming winter months. I am a true 14, however I wore a size 12 and it fit perfectly. I'd pick up spanx of you are looking for a smoother look, however the material hugs you perfectly. If you are curvier in the hips or bust I'd recommend going up one size as it was pretty fitted.

links_reviews_title: Great work dress - the button details are super cute.
links_reviews_text: This is not a super right dress. Pretty loose fitting and appropriate for the work place. Size up if you have a large busy.

This is my favorite rental so far. The fit is spot on - it hugs curves in all the right places and really drew in my waist. It's even better in person. I already have plans to rent again and am contemplating buying this dress.
Fits great, comfortable and great fabric.
Easy work dress with interesting details - asymmetrical hemline , cute buttons, slightly poofy sleeves. Good for petites
I am certain I'll rent this again - great year round staple piece

I really liked this dress - I almost bought it. Its very comfortable to wear and gives shape with out being too bodycon. The diagonal buttons make this dress exciting and I got a lot of compliments. I will likely rent again.

This was way better than I expected it to be! The material was thick and almost suit like. The sleeves have a rouching that makes them puff a little and the back is a shirt tail which totally makes this a five star!

The one sent to me had a little run down buttons to where I was afraid one would pop off! Has one pocket off to the side that can seem a little awkward but I found myself really using it throughout the day. Such a comfortable dress. Really flattering. Would definitely recommend wearing with tights if you're selecting for work - found it riding up a bit
Love this dress. It's a great black dress you can dress up or down. Keeping it for a bit so I can hopefully buy it. Material on the thicker side, but super flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, too short for work.
links_reviews_text: I'm almost 5'8" and as much as I wanted this to work for everyday wear it was just too short. Super cute and nice material.
flattering, great stretch, very forgiving

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a magazine photo shoot
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit! I’m petite and the length was perfect. I also have more broad shoulders and I didn’t find it to be too snug in the shoulders. The color is amazing!
Great pop of color.
This blouse is a fun blouse that's great for work to post-work shindigs. It's super flattering and a great summer/fall piece.

links_reviews_title: Great for transitioning from summer to fall wardrobe!
links_reviews_text: I rented this and wore it to two dinners over the weekend. It fit well, gaped a little at the bust for me but it wasn't bothersome and is to be expected for someone with a smaller chest. Nothing exceptional about this blouse, The fabric is fairly stiff and is kind of hard to iron - a steamer certainly doesn't cut it to get rid of wrinkles.
The fit was phenomenal and I felt great! I loved the color and would absolutely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Very cute top that could be worn dressed up or casual. Fun color.
links_reviews_text: This top is true to size. I wish it were a little longer in the front, but the top still did a great job of hiding my belly. Had to fluff the bow some to rid of the wrinkling.

The color on this is exactly as shown, bright and eye catching. Smaller busted ladies will probably, like me, need to use some fashion tape. Im usually a very solid medium/6 and the bust area had some room (waist was as expected). Overall, very cute, happy with it for the meetings I wore it to. Was surprisingly warm though, I was glad it was overcast and on the cooler side when I wore it.

links_reviews_title: Great color, a little too poofy
links_reviews_text: Loved the cut and color, but the shoulders were a little too big for me and the neckline a little too low cut. (Had to use double-sided tape.) I'm pretty small in the shoulders, though, compared to my waist -- in J Crew jackets I wear an 00.
This is super cute and flattering, and the color is bright orange. I got complimented lots walking down the street wearing this!

Loved the color and the airy eyelet sleeves! Top came with bow pre-tied at side-I appreciated that. Cons: very low cut, zipper on side difficult to get up and down, front of wrap pressed incorrectly so it was folded down, and front of top had a few kind of dirty-ish areas that maybe reflected being pressed often. Would look fantastic with white jeans and metallic accessories!

Loved the color and styling of this top. For anyone with a larger chest it's a bit more low cut than I thought so great for a night out but definitely not work appropriate. Would definitely wear again!

Wore to a birthday party. Loved the bright cheerful color. Would give it a 5 star if I didn't have to keep pulling it down because it would rise up. Also had to wear a cami under or it would be too revealing.

links_reviews_title: Bright and catchy, but not super comfortable
links_reviews_text: Loved the color and detail, but the fabric was stiff and didn't lay well.
Cute, but I could tell it had been through a washer and dryer a couple of times at least. Was pretty worn, a little tight, and not nearly as vibrant as the picture.
Wore it out to dinner but it was too big
Beautiful color
Loved this shirt. The sash allows you to tailor the waist in a little. Loved this shirt.
Color is great - top is a little boxy and wrinkles, but the color is fab and it looks great with jeans
It's a beautiful blouse but the neckline was bent a bit. I also did not anticipate it being such a low neckline. I think this blouse needs to be retired.
Didn't end up wearing this top - it looked like it wasn't taking too well to being dry cleaned and it was very orange. Not at all coral or reddish-orange.
Loved this shirt once I ironed it - the zipper is slightly awkward but I zipped it before putting it on and it worked. Very fall festive and bright!
No stretch to this blouse. I couldn't get my broad shoulders into it.
Loved this top!!! Wore it so many times. The color was beautiful and vibrant, the perforated details in the arms made it breezy, and it was just so easy to wear. Would rent again!
Loose in the breast area. I should have sized down. Eyelet fabric is super cute. Bright orange! Great piece dressed up or worn casual.
Great color, a little low cut but not too bad.

Super cute top and great for “fall” when it’s still 95+ degrees. The color is fab and the fit was perfect. The sash/tie looked a little worn and definitely had not been pressed when I received the blouse. Otherwise, perfect.
The shirt is VERY short in the waste and not at all flattering if you are busty. The material also wrinkles very easily.
The color is so cute and it looks great with any high waisted pants (it's a bit shorter than a typical shirt). I got a ton of compliments on this.

Perfect for the beginning of fall chillin and beer festival I rented this for . The top was stiffer than I was expecting, no stretch at all, and It was hard to peel off even though it has a zipper and Im an A cup, so not for big boobs. (However I did stupidly order a size 00)Also it looks like a wrap top but it's not.
perfect for the fall season

links_reviews_title: The zipper on this shirt prevented me from wearing it
links_reviews_text: Cute shirt, fit good but the zipper kept getting stuck and i couldn't wear it

links_reviews_title: It fit great,,,flattering Bow was very wrinkled...had to press it out
links_reviews_text: It fit great,,,flattering Bow was very wrinkled...had to press it out
I love the style and color. The only problem was this top had clearly been worn A LOT and was dingy and stretched out in some places. It should probably be pulled from rotation.
Very nice color but it's EXTREMELY short; basically showed my belly. Returned without wearing.
I loved the pop of color of this piece. I wore it with ankle jeans and black block heels for work. I totally plan on ordering again!!

links_reviews_title: Will rent again in a bigger size
links_reviews_text: I am a 36 DD and usually wear a size 8 but this was too small in the bust area. I LOVED the color and design but the side zipper was difficult. After I rent one that fits, I'm sure it will get a glowing review.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing- got it in August and too hot to wear.
links_reviews_text: Fit well. Lower cut-might need cami underneath.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments felt great
links_reviews_text: Very low cut had to wear a cami under

Very flattering and true to size! Was a bit tight around my rib cage - you might consider sizing up if you have a larger cup size. I got a lot of compliments and would definitely rent this again. The only con was that I had to iron the bow/tie as this was very wrinkling and crimped upon arrival.

This is a beautiful top but not for the summer. The eyelet material is quite thick, which makes it a good fit for an air-conditioned office but not really under any other circumstances. The color was bright and the fabric sat neatly. The wrap style was flattering, so I'd recommend.
Sorry for the selfie. Loved this jacket

Second time renting need I say more? Great coat! Super fashionable! Great powder blue color. Nice & long w/ just enough weight to keep you warm on a 35+ degree day but not too heavy to make you sweat on a not so really cold day. Downside is sleeves aren't the longest but definitely not a deal breaker. It is definitely oversized. A M was still big but liked the looked...

This was the perfect coat to make a statement but stay warm in real winter weather. Walked around in high 20s and this kept me warm. Definitely a heavy coat. But got lots of compliments for the color.

I took this coat with me on a trip to NYC in December and received so many compliments! It's a beautiful color. It runs big which is great if you need to layer clothes. Loved this coat! #winter #coldweather #nyc

links_reviews_title: A little bath robe in shape but SO comfy
links_reviews_text: This was roomy enough to wear a sweater underneath and kept me warm during a Rhode Island January. Not the most flattering and kind of reminds me of a bath robe, but I'd rent again for the fun color and warmth.

links_reviews_title: Wrapped in a comfy blue cloud!
links_reviews_text: This was the PERFECT coat for a snowy weekend in New York City! I never felt the cold! It blocked out wind, snow, and temperature all the while being a pretty pale blue wonder! Lots of compliments. I usually wear a medium, but this small was very generous. It cushioned my seat on a 5 hour flight to and from, so that was a sweet plus too. It is too warm for California weather, so I had to part with it.
It's an oversized fit, which I really loved. Definitely so cozy!

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing this blue coat around Vail!! Got so many compliments :)
Perfect for the winter! Absolutely loved this coat!
links_reviews_text: This coat is perfect for the winter! Long, warm and beautiful for casual weekend outings!

This coat was amazing. I purchased it to put over my dress to go to the hospital to have my baby boy. I'm pretty tall, and with the bump, this covered me with no problem. I will say it runs a bit larger, so if you want the oversized look, go with your true size. Or, if you want it more fitted, do a size down.

links_reviews_title: The most comfortable and beautiful thing I have ever put on my body
links_reviews_text: This coat is so comfortable and warm. I wanted to sleep in it. The arms are short --for T Rex arms as one reviewer said. Happens to be I have those so it fits perfectly. Definitely an oversized look.
This coat made me feel like a walking teddy bear - in a good way. I received compliments on the coat everywhere I went.

This coat is beautiful and warm. And if you have t-rex arms the sleeves will fit perfect. I'm 5'3, assuming that I have regular length arms, the sleeves are quite short for a winter coat. Manageable with a long sleeve sweater.

This was a great addition to my wardrobe. Being short I am hesitant to wear bulky coats because I find them unflattering but this coat is cropped so it is great for more petite women. Wore on multiple Occasions.
It's a biggish coat. That's the look but it can overtake you as well. And I'm tall. It's super warm and fluffy. Have fun with it!
I wanted to love this coat but it had a very boxy and bulky fit. The quality of the faux fur was nice and it was warm and cozy, but I felt like a linebacker. Recommend sizing down.
Wore it everywhere and wanted to keep it but was worried style would be out by next year. Also very warm for synthetic fur. Rent this now. It's so versatile!
Super fun and soft!! So soft I may have slept in it !

links_reviews_title: Love this! So big and cozy!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size short and cropped, long sleeve hit me perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Loved, loved, loved this jacket for an easy way to dress up a fall/winter outfit!
links_reviews_text: The quality and fit of this jacket was 5 stars, it was so comfortable and looked very expensive. Absolutely loved this jacket I didn't want to let it go!
This coat is so soft and warm! I received so many compliments on it! Would absolutely wear again! It was so easy to wear for an event and out running errands paired with jeans and booties.

links_reviews_title: Cute and warm but a little puffy
links_reviews_text: This was a really cute coat for a date night in NYC. I loved the color and everything about it except it was just a little too puffy for the length. I would rent again
I rented this for a christmas event to wear over a j crew tartan plaid sleeveless blouse. It was so comfortable, soft and warm. I could have sized down to an xs.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to give it back!
links_reviews_text: Obsessed with this jacket. The color is a perfect caramel, softest fur. It was snowing the day of the wedding and this jacket kept me perfectly warm
Could not love this more - so darling and fun to wear!

links_reviews_title: This was perfect for winter weekend day and night activities in NYC
links_reviews_text: The material is SO soft and cozy. Looks chic dressed both up and down. Loved the color as well.
This is definitely a statement piece because it is oversized and fluffy. It is soo soft and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Amazing for that 3,000 go to meetings each day!
links_reviews_text: These are great for working from Home for virtual video meetings. Add a pop to any outfit. They are lightweight but plan on using speaker phone since they are a little large.
RTR describes this item as a shirt. I opted to wear it as a shirt dress and it worked out beautifully for a chilly fall day. Paired it with tights and knee high boots. Perfect, cozy and warm!!

Fits TTS. Can be worn as a dress with a belt if you don't have much in the way of curves , but didn't work for me so I wore it open over jeans and a graphic tee. Not much my style, but made it work for casual Friday.

links_reviews_title: Made my casual look more stylish
links_reviews_text: The shirt was so comfortable and soft. It was super flattering and looked as good as the picture.

links_reviews_title: Cute casual print but odd fit
links_reviews_text: Too tight in the shoulders - maybe my shoulders are too broad? Did not work for me so couldn't wear sadly.

links_reviews_title: Very cute but longer than I expected
links_reviews_text: I love flannels and this one was super unique. It was a little longer than I would have liked because I had envisioned wearing it as a dress and it was just a little too long for that. I wore it open with a black t-shirt and jeans and it was super cute. I would maybe size down if you're concerned about length.
I really loved this shirt - it's flattering, so soft and pairs perfectly with leggings.

links_reviews_title: Not a shirt, not a dress
links_reviews_text: Thought I could get away with wearing this as a dress with booties. Instead it looked like a walk of shame man's shirt. Also too much sparkle in there silver thread for me.

I really wanna but this one because you can dress it up or down. I wore this as both 1) a dress with black tights and boots to work and 2) as a layering piece with a tee, jeans, and sneakers. Also for my fellow short friends, you won't be drowning in this :)
It was a bit long on me at 5'2" so could have worn it as a dress. It was cute and casual with leggings.
perfect fit
This shirt was really cute paired with a tank top jeans and chunky boots. The fabric was so soft.

This sweater is a great fall to winter transition. It's soft and warm but not a bit cropped and not heavy. Fun accent with the bell sleeves and cute pattern to make it the perfect ounce of casual. Great piece!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on bell sleeves!
links_reviews_text: Obsessed with this rental! Wore it to work with slacks, then to brunch with jeans (in picture) and the again with leather leggings and booties to HH. It was very versatile and so cute.
Loved this sweater. It's cropped so it works well with high waisted pants

links_reviews_title: Not very happy with this one. Sleeves way too baggy. Just too oversized.
links_reviews_text: I sized up because I don't love cropped style but ended up just being way too big and unwearable. Stick to true size or even size down
Speaks for itself! Adorable. Would rent again.
So cute. I love this sweater and have already worn twice. The bell sleeves are great. Perfect for winter

links_reviews_title: Wore this on a winter day in Boston to go shopping and get dinner!
links_reviews_text: Really warm and comfy, dresses up your outfit easily! The flare sleeves were really fun, but got in the way a little while eating.

Loved this sweater, it was a little on the itchy side but the fit was cute with high waisted jeans, the only thing I didn't like was how large the sleeves were too large to comfortably fit into a coat and were hard to eat/drink with.

Loved this sweater! It is cropped without being too short, warm without being too warm, and not itchy at all. Love the wide sleeves, which aren't too wide so they don't get in the way. I was very comfortable all day.
Love this sweater!! Super warm, perfect for a night of walking to dinner/drinks.

This sweater was awesome for a pop up museum. The knit was definitely heavy and went perfectly with high waisted jeans since it's a bit cropped. Curvy girl friendly but you can definitely size down for the back up if you like a more snug fit.
Super comfy!

links_reviews_title: Adorable and easy to wear. Perfect for ski lodge or weekend brunch.
links_reviews_text: Loose, slightly cropped fit, so you're best wearing high waisted pants
The sweater is super cute and really warm! The sleeves make it hard to get a coat on over it though. It is also very cropped

links_reviews_title: Sleeves fell in my coffee! But otherwise very cute
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are a little too long and tough to fit into outerwear. But the sweater itself looked cute and I got compliments
Fit was great and so warm. Love!
Good quality and fun design. Shape was super unflattering - short and boxy. Would be better on smaller busts.

links_reviews_title: beautiful, warm, cozy and lovely. All the things you want from this sweater.
links_reviews_text: Its a little high on the waist, almost like a crop sweater, which is wonderful cause then the open sleeves makes it pretty unique

links_reviews_title: Such a cute sweater! Wore on a mountain trip with friends
links_reviews_text: Very weather, would highly recommend for cold weather
I liked the print, but it swallowed me whole.
Great everyday sweater! Comfortable and effortlessly trendy. I will be renting again!

links_reviews_title: Weird fit with awkward arm width.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear. Super short in mid section and the arms were awkwardly wide. Not flattering on me at all.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and soft perfect for this long NYC winter
links_reviews_text: Great soft and not super itchy sweater. I felt cozy in it all day. It's a little more cropped in the front than I would like, but not unmanageable (I hate cropped sweaters and didn't hate this). Runs true to size, perhaps on the slight larger size with lots of room in the sleeves.

So fun to wear with the big bell sleeves. I wore it with jeans and a tank underneath. It's also nice and warm for cold days, I was able to wear it without a coat in 30 degree weather. It runs a bit short in the front (even though I am short) but looks fine with a tank underneath.
The belle sleeves on this sweater were fun without being WAY too big. The material was soft. I wore this several times while I had it and received compliments each time.

Was so excited because this sweater didn't contain wool (sadly allergic). Unfortunately the quality of acrylic is extremely itchy. I tried wearing a turtle neck underneath and had to rip it off in less than 5 minutes.
Sleeves will definitely be long even if you are taller than average. The neck is a mock turtleneck, which I loved! Over all this is a super cozy, versatile sweater.

This was a fantastic sweater and SO comfy. I worn it to work and on a casual date night. My boyfriend, who is oblivious to fashion, even mentioned that he loved it. I would consider buying this piece.

links_reviews_title: Cute sweater, too long of sleeves for me!
links_reviews_text: I had a hard time distinguishing whether or not this was true to size or runs large. In many cases, I am a size medium, but I wish I would have gone with the size small with this sweater. Super cute style. Everything fit perfect except for the arms- the sleeves were way too long. They show this way in the pics with the model but they were even longer on me. If you are okay with really long sleeves, this sweater is great!
Really cool sweater. Loved the sleeves and style. Perfect for a casual brunch

I was really surprised I didn't have a picture of this because I literally wore at least twice a week for the month I had it. I typically wore it with high waisted jeans and loved the cut and bell sleeves. Contemplated buying because I loved it so much.

links_reviews_title: The sleeves bell out and the torso is short, but was not cropped on me.
links_reviews_text: Loved the pattern!

links_reviews_title: My new years eve outfit was a hit!
links_reviews_text: This was very comfortable but sort of itchy material. Would definitely rent again!! I wore this with jeans and high black boots!
I loved the style but would definitely rent a medium next time
A little sloppy looking. Oversized -- good for romping around and running errands.
Boxy, itchy and unflattering. Didn't end up wearing
Cozy and comfortable sweater. Not itchy at all. Got lots of compliments. Sleeves are a little large and get in the way some
Cool southwestern print. Great for every day wear.

The sweater is definitely cropped. I wore high waisted jeans and a shirt underneath and was fine. The sleeves are fun and loose. If you're going to be cold, I'd wear a long sleeved shirt underneath to keep warm.

This was fun sweater to wear and it's super cozy. It feels itchy around the neck when you first put it on but it goes away pretty quickly. It was very warm. The only con is the bell sleeves are huge and kind of hard to keep out of the way while eating/drinking.
Loved these jeans!!
Really cute jeans!! They fit perfectly, will rent again.

I wore these for 2 months before returning. Perfect for this Disneyland trip where the stretch made it easy to climb in and out of rides. These jeans were so easy to dress up or down and so comfortable.

LOVE THESE. The denim is soft, the cut is flattering even if you have thighs, and the length is perfect. LOVE. Super comfortable amount of stretch, too. Not too much, but just enough to hold your shape.

Absolutely LOVE! I have a bubble butt so it's hard for me to find jeans that don't gap at the waist, they also worked with my thick thighs- these are just perfect! Fabric is soft and comfortable with enough stretch. Highly recommend!

awesome awesome awesome jeans! got so many compliments and they are so comfortable and easy to dress up or down. im on the shorter side (5'2") so these hit my legs a little closer to the ankle compared to the model. but they fit like a glove in the waist and hips and are perfectly stretchy and flattering

links_reviews_title: So comfortable! Love the look and style
links_reviews_text: Only con is that that they were a little big around my waist, but so cute!
Fun trendy jeans and super soft. Not exactly high rise though - they hit about an inch below the belly button
Super soft, a tad stretchy and perfect for spring / fall weather. Paired with an oversized sweater and sneakers, and absolutely loved my outfit. 100% will rent again (and maybe even buy)
These are the best jeans ever, they do run small in my experience I'm a 28/29 but for these the 30 Is best! I bought them I loved them so much!

I rented these for a trip to Disneyland where I wanted something comfortable getting on and off rides and walking around all day. These were perfect. They had the right amount of stretch to be comfortable all day but they never stretched out or got loose. I strongly debated keeping these and will likely rent them again.
I absolutely loved these and wear them often! Pairing with a cute pair of sneakers, sandals, booties all worked well. Received many compliments on them.

These jeans definitely aren't high waisted — they are mid-to-low rise, which definitely wasn't what I was looking for. They were very stretchy, but ran a bit small. I didn't end up wearing them because they looked so tight on my thighs.
Cute jeans but should have gotten a bigger size. Didn't end up wearing because tight around the hips. Soft denim though

links_reviews_title: Beware- these are not high rise!
links_reviews_text: Comfy, true to size, but these are NOT high rise
Fit great and cute casual style. Loved so much I bought them.
Could not close the button. Perfect length for petites. Soft denim. Will reorder size larger. :(
The length was perfect .

links_reviews_title: Wore these just about every day for two weeks.
links_reviews_text: I rented these for vacation. It was actually the second time I've rented these jeans. The fit is perfect and they have a little stretch but they didn't stretch out even after wearing many many times. Love these jeans.
I got a number of complements- and who complements jeans?!
Fit well, comfortable, looked great with flip flops and heeled sandals. I wore with a nice blouse and with a tank and both looked great.
These jeans have the perfect amount of stretch and so comfortable. They keep their shape throughout the day and are such a flattering cut. I would definitely rent again.
Loved these jeans. They are a nice update in the cut and fit great.
Was worried that the ankles would be too wide and silly looking. They weren't though - fit was right on and the fabric color and style looked nice and casual.
Nice light color.
I think I would have really liked these jeans if they had fit - haha! I will probably rent again but size up.
Great jeans, go with anything.
Great jeans. Received a ton of compliments and really went with everything. I usually prefer high rise but these were still great.

Wonderful fit, comfortable and fun. Good stretch. Got lots of compliments. Wore these several times - with tee on weekend and with dressy Boho tunic and jewelry at an upscale bar. They were versatile enough not to feel out of place. I'm 5'4" with curves. The longest part of the hem hit around my ankle and the shortest part just above. Not as cropped as the pic but still enough to look good. The asymmetrical hem-longer on the side seams-seemed strange before I put them on but it works.
A fun, everyday, comfortable option for denim. The cropped detail and raw hem is awesome!
Great fit
Fits perfect and love the soft denim.
I want to buy these... if they weren't over $200! I loved the fit and they made my butt look amazing!
Definitly not high waisted. Usually a true 29 and the 30 is a little tight.
Very comfortable and great for everyday use
Loved these jeans. So soft and comfortable. Fit like a true 31R. The raw hem was the perfect touch on a fashion denim. I wore them with with T-shirts to nice blouses.
Great jeans

links_reviews_title: Wasn't for me. Great style but not for my body type
links_reviews_text: While the jean fabric blend was amazing and the color was good, this cut of jean is just not for me.
Comfortable and good length
Fit perfectly and came with tags on! Might be cropped on taller girls but fit perfectly on me!
So cute. Can be dressed down or up. Wore to a luncheon and it was perfect.
Semi-stiff cotton ruffles make them stand out more than lay flat but cute on with a T-shirt and sneakers !
This skirt was large, starchy and stiff. Did not work for me.

links_reviews_title: Not flattering at all on my very tall frame.
links_reviews_text: Normally I can pull off bold and big styles but this just added lumps and bumps in the wrong places. Also was odd to style and the fabric looked overworn or faded (I don't think it was just is the look- but you can't actually tell from the pictures) Was excited for some whimsy. I wore it to work and returned the same day. Definately too thin for winter and too thick for summer so plan accordingly

links_reviews_title: Wanted a comfy and classy moment!
links_reviews_text: Skirt was super cute and full! Felt slightly faded.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous print, but a peculiar fit and stiff fabric.
links_reviews_text: I saw this skirt on Shopbop and was thrilled to see it available for rent on RTR. I rented it for a dinner party, but was so disappointed when I received it and tried it on. First, the fabric is stiff and has little to no movement which doesn't make for a very flattering silhouette. Additionally, the fit was odd. The waist was just fine, but the there was way too much room through the hips which just added excess fabric to an already full/ruffled skirt. Just not flattering altogether. Sadly, I didn't end up wearing it.
I ordered this a bit bigger so I could fully Button it and have it close without the gap. It wrinkles easy but is very cute

Rail shirts run big! Size down. I am usually a small in shirts but the arms were baggy, even rolled up, and the waist ran long so I tied it to make it more cropped. Overall, should have rented the XS for a better fit but this shirt is super cute and fun. Really light and soft material.
Love this cut and the lemons! Will be renting another pattern ASAP. Large was good for boobs, no pulling. #roomforboobs
Loved it and got lots of compliments. Such a cute pattern and nice material. Medium was a little on the big size- but still really cute tucked in.
Silky shirt, easy to layer, was running very cheap so I grabbed it for summer.

links_reviews_title: Not my favorite Rails shirt I've rented, but it was super soft and comfortable! Small fit great.

links_reviews_text: Fit as expected, liked the fun print. Wore it as an outershirt with a black tank under and was a nice fun work outfit.

I think I should have gotten XL based on Rails size chart on line, but XL wasn't available, so got XXL. It is huge - far bigger than just one size up. Perhaps supposed to be oversized. Very cute - I like tops with prints, and the lemons are adorable.
Love the print, wrinkles steam out easily but re-wrinkles easily as well. Bit short for my torso, hard to tuck in
This is such a fun, casual summer top. It is long sleeve, but light, silky, soft and surprisingly not that hot! I paired it with olive shorts one time and white jeans another. Definitely recommend!
Me to this shirt: "it's not you, it's me"

I styled it almost identically to the pic above on the fit model (rolled the sleeves, undid a couple buttons) and paired it with cropped jeans. Amazing. So soft, fit awesome loved the detail. Not sheer at all.

Shirt is so cute and very versatile. I rented w/ my Unlimited membership, wish I could afford to buy this it. Received compliments every time I wore it. Loved it so much I kept it for almost the whole month. Could've gone with a Large but I liked the oversize fit.
Pros: Nice fabric, cute print. Cons: Almost silky material so would be too hot for outside.
Love this shirt! Super comfortable and airy for a cool summer night.

I really needed an xl or maybe even a large but the only size available was an xxl. It was actually really cute even thought it was way too big. The material is very soft so it wrinkled easily. I would definitely rent this again in a smaller size
Received lots of compliments but probably should have ordered a size down.
Fitted turtleneck, not scratchy. Was kept warm at Ice Castles in Colorado.

links_reviews_title: Lovely ski sweater for trip to Vail
links_reviews_text: Sweater can be worn skiing and apres ski. Great fit and function!

This is the best sweater for a ski trip! I wore under my jacket and to apres. Loved it, the quality and of course, expect compliments. I rented a M and L. Both fit, almost the same. But I ended up wearing the L. Totally on trend this season, I saw many of these sweaters, in different colors, on the mountain. Everyone having their Perfect Moment.
Warm and soft. Loved this sweater for our Christmas vacation to Vail.

This arrived after my ski trip, but it would have been a perfect ski slope layer. The sweater is warm wool and snug so there is no extra bulk. I wish it was a tad longer, but that's just my personal preference.
I wore this as both a base layer for skiing and around town. It's a great winter option - especially in a ski town. The wool wasn't itchy at all.
Loved it! I rented a large so I could wear it with leggings... loved it and go so many compliments!
Cute sweater but it is child size. Hit me 2 inches above my belly button and was so tight I could barely put my arms down. I even got a medium, and I still think the large would be too small.
I mean I HOPE someone washed and dried this without realizing they were shrinking it to the size of a toddler. This sweater is TINY. I have worn perfect moment mediums before but hunti, THAT AINT IT
Fit great. Paired well with warm leggings, snow boots and a beanie w puff on top!
This sweater feels very luxurious, not itchy or scratchy. It is a soft merino wool, very high quality. I wore it skiing and off piste as well.
Is fits good and ver warm
Great quality and really cute!!

I wore this sweater everywhere!! I loved the soft texture and the collar is the perfect height. I can't say enough about how comfortable this sweater was. I would have bought it in a heartbeat if it was less expensive. Loved it and want to rent it again.
Great fit, not ichy, form fitting but not too much. Wore w boots and leggings multiple times.
Awesome ski sweater. Sleeves are nice and long and slim fit.
Perfect for the slopes and looks great for apres! Felt like it ran true to size
This sweater was great! A bit itchy, but really good for layering and nice and cozy. I sized up for a bit of a baggier look, so I would say it's true to size. Really nice and lots of compliments!
Wore this to a horse race over a slip and it turned out to be my favorite outfit EVER! Looks so cool and different - comfy AND chic. So many compliments
A little short for taller girls but comfy and very chic
I really wanted to love this sweater because it is so cute. It is just as cute in person, but the material is so itchy. I could not bring myself to wear it to work in fear I would itch all day.

I LOVED this sweater. I'm a big fan of turtlenecks in the winter so this unique one caught my eye. The double sweater look is so cool (it's actually just one sweater). I got tons of compliments and would have bought if it wasn't so pricey.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for walking around town with my guy. It is so cozy and stylish.
links_reviews_text: So easy two wear. The side slits mean your side and tummy may be seen (I wore a long tee underneath). This sweater is all about details: the two color sleeves, the drape over tops of hands, the soft turtleneck. I love it (actually checking out purchasing).
When I first put this on, I thought that the fabric might feel scratchy. Throughout the day, this sweater was super warm and comfortable. I got lots of compliments on it and am sad to return it!

Absolutely obsessed with this sweater. Wore it to work on what felt like the first proper fall day and loved it. Got several compliments too! This easily works for both the office and just hanging out after work or on the weekends.
